Boston had 25 assists to just 11 for New_York , and the team committed just 6 turnovers on the night .
All-Star Isaiah_Thomas once again led Boston with 27 points , while star center Al_Horford scored 15 points and stuffed the stat sheet with 7 rebounds , 5 assists , 3 steals , and 2 blocks .
Third-year point guard Marcus_Smart impressed off the bench , dishing 7 assists and scoring 15 points including the game - winning three - pointer .
Sophomore big man Kristaps_Porzingis had 22 points and 12 rebounds as well as 4 blocks .
All-Star Carmelo_Anthony had 29 points , 22 of which came in the second half .
Point guard Derrick_Rose also had 25 points in one of his highest - scoring outings of the season .
The Phoenix_Suns ( 39 - 38 ) escaped with an 87 - 85 win over the Utah_Jazz ( 34 - 42 ) .
The Suns moved to 3 and a half games behind the Oklahoma_City_Thunder for the final playoff spot with 5 games remaining .
Gerald_Green scored 24 points in just 22 minutes for the first time since November 26th .
After 3 straight double - figure scoring games , rookie T.J. Warren was limited to 4 points with Green putting on a show .
Brandan_Wright continues to start for the injured Alex_Len , supplying 14 points , 3 rebounds , 4 blocks , 3 steals and 1 assist in 33 minutes .
Hood replaced Joe_Ingles in the starting lineup and scored 17 points .

The Suns engage in a 4 - game road trip Tuesday beginning against the Atlanta_Hawks .
The Jazz conclude a 2 - game , 2 - day road trip when they play the Sacramento_Kings on Sunday before hosting them 3 days later .
The host Portland Trail_Blazers defeated the rivial Denver_Nuggets on Tuesday , 122 - 113 .
It was a big night for 2 Blazers in particular , as center Jusuf_Nurkic and guard C.J .
McCollum combined for 72 points for Portland ( 36 - 38 ) .
Nurkic contributed a career - high scoring output of 33 points to go along with a whopping 16 rebounds and 3 blocks .
Nurkic was absolutely deadly from the field , shooting 12 - of - 15 from the field and 9 - of - 11 at the free - throw line .
McCollum , meanwhile , shot 15 - of - 24 for a game - high 39 points .
The 2 were the centers of a red - hot Blazers offense , as the team shot over 49 percent from the field and reached the line 33 times on the night .
Denver ( 35 - 39 ) , meanwhile , saw slightly more balanced production from their scorers .
Sophomore center Nikola_Jokic cleaned up , recording 17 points , 8 rebounds , and 8 assists .
However , the team simply could not slow down the 2 hot scorers for Portland .
Foul trouble proved problematic as well , as the Nuggets got to the line 20 times but gave up 33 free - throws to Portland .
The Los_Angeles_Clippers ( 3 - 1 ) defeated the Utah_Jazz ( 1 - 3 ) 107 - 101 on Monday .
Chris_Paul recorded the NBA 's first triple - double of the 2014 - 15 season , putting up 13 points , 10 rebounds , and 12 assists in 36 minutes .
Teammate Blake_Griffin helped Paul convert some of those assists , shooting 14 - of - 21 from the field and finishing with 31 points in 38 minutes .
J.J. Redick started at shooting guard but played a season - low 16 minutes as coach Doc Rivers opted to go with Jamal_Crawford most of the night .
Crawford missed the Clippers 's last game with a rib injury but returned to put up 19 points off the bench in 34 minutes .
Gordon_Hayward put up a LeBron_James -esque line of 27 points , 7 rebounds , and 5 assists in 36 minutes .
He was aided in keeping the game close by starting power forward Enes_Kanter who put up 17 points and 9 rebounds in 27 minutes .
The Jazz were relatively efficient with their shooting , but they committed 17 turnovers in contrast to the Clippers 's 10 , giving away the game in some respects .
Chicago dominated from the opening whistle , as they held a double - digit lead for the final 40 - plus minutes .
The first half is when it got ugly , as the Bulls shot 73 percent from the field and took a 35 - point lead into the locker room .
The rebounding and assisting numbers were lopsided as well , with Chicago winning the rebounding battle , 46 - 32 and the assists , 34 - 19 .
All the starters on Detroit struggled , as none of the surpassed 10 points , 4 rebounds or 3 assists .
Jon_Leuer led the team in scoring off the bench , as he dropped 16 points on 7 - of - 9 shooting .
Jimmy_Butler led the Bulls in scoring , as he tallied 19 points , 3 rebounds and 6 assists in the win .
Rajon_Rondo flirted with a triple - double , as he accumulated 10 points , 8 rebounds and 14 assists .
The Houston_Rockets ( 3 - 3 ) stunned the Los_Angeles_Clippers ( 3 - 3 ) Thursday in Game 6 at the Staples Center , winning 119 - 107 to force Game 7 .
The Clippers took a commanding 19 - point lead late in the third quarter and appeared to be on their way to clinching the first Western Conference Finals berth in franchise history .
The Clippers 's offense stagnated and could n't create the shots they were finding with ease through the first 36 minutes .
Josh_Smith , who was 2 - of - 12 from three point range in the series coming into Game 6 , canned 4 out of 7 threes Thursday and finished with 19 points .
The series will move back to Houston for the decisive Game 7 on Sunday .
Time appeared to be winding down on Houston 's season in the third quarter with Los_Angeles 's Blake_Griffin making 360 degree layups and Chris_Paul imposing his will .
The Rockets never wavered , however , and fought their way back to send the series back to their home floor for Game 7 .
In addition to Smith and Brewer 's strong play , Dwight_Howard worked his way to a 20 - point , 21 - rebound performance over 40 minutes on the floor .
After routing the Rockets in the other 2 games at Staples Center this series , the Clippers seemingly lost their way late on Thursday .
Despite holding Houston to 17 points in the third quarter , Los_Angeles collapsed on the defensive end and allowed 40 points in the fourth .
The Clippers missed their last 14 field goals before Paul 's three pointer at the buzzer when the outcome had already been decided .
Los_Angeles will have 2 full days to regroup before taking the floor in Houston for Game 7 .
Isaiah_Thomas dished out a career - best 15 assists , while also scoring a game - high 29 points .
His standout effort led to a stellar shooting night for Boston , which posted respective success rates of 55 and 55 percent from the field and three - point range .
Al_Horford and Jae_Crowder had matching 21 - point efforts .
Avery_Bradley compiled 14 points , Jaylen_Brown led the second unit with 10 , and Marcus_Smart went for 9 points over 28 minutes despite coming in questionable with an illness .
Gordon_Hayward 's 23 points led Utah , and Derrick_Favors had 12 points over 29 minutes .
Rodney_Hood supplied 9 points , while Rudy_Gobert brought down 13 rebounds .
Joe_Johnson and Boris_Diaw went for 17 and 15 points off the bench , respectively , with the latter impressively compiling his total in just 15 minutes .
The Oklahoma_City_Thunder ( 11 - 13 ) defeated the Phoenix_Suns ( 12 - 13 ) 112 - 88 on Sunday .
Oklahoma_City has won 6 straight games , making a defining run following the return of their stars Kevin_Durant and Russell_Westbrook to the lineup 2 weeks ago .
Oklahoma_City shot 48 percent from the field , but where they truly dominated the game was on the glass , collecting 63 rebounds compared to the Suns 's 40 rebounds .
The Suns also could n't keep the Thunder off the free - throw line , allowing them to put up 30 free points at the charity stripe .
Oklahoma_City will start a 3 - game road trip in Sacramento on Tuesday against the Kings .
Phoenix has dropped 5 straight games and appear to be in a tailspin , but that could correct itself as they embark on an Eastern Conference road trip this week that could allow them to get back in the win column .
While the Suns had Isaiah_Thomas return to action Friday in their 105 - 103 loss to the Detroit_Pistons , the team also played without Goran_Dragic on Sunday , as he was forced to sit out with a lower - back strain .
Gerald_Green earned the spot start in Dragic 's absence and finished with 15 points and 7 rebounds in 26 minutes .

Ariza has lived up to expectations thus far in the 4 games the Rockets have played , as he 's now averaging 15 points and 5 rebounds on the season .

Howard sat out Monday 's practice after a knee - to - knee collision during Saturday 's game against the Celtics but was able to play 36 minutes Monday , implying that the knee issue is not serious .

Howard finished with a season - high 30 points and added 16 rebounds , while Horford equaled him with a season - high 30 points and 14 rebounds .
Besides Horford 's outstanding effort , the Hawks also got a trio of 20 - point - plus efforts from some of their most dependable starters .
Kent_Bazemore , already a solid contributor in rebounds and assists , turned his scoring up several notches , collecting 26 points on the night along with 4 assists and 3 rebounds .
Stalwarts Jeff_Teague and Paul_Millsap contributed a pair of 22 - point tallies , with the latter making it a double - double by hauling in 13 boards as well .
The veteran power forward also added a season - high 5 blocks as he dominated a Houston defense that has been one of the league 's weakest against opposing fours .
The Hawks improved to 21 - 13 and remain atop the Eastern Conference 's Southeast Division .

The Rockets fell to 16 - 17 and remain in fourth place in the Western Conference 's Southwest Division .

The 2 combined to shoot 6 - of - 10 from the 3 - point line , while as a team , the Jazz won the game with their long range shooting , hitting 12 of their 25 shots from long range .

The Atlanta_Hawks ( 49 - 12 ) asserted their dominance as the top team in the East on Friday by beating the fourth - place Cleveland_Cavaliers ( 39 - 25 ) 106 - 97 on Friday .
As usual , it was a team effort that gave the Hawks the win , with 7 players finishing in double digits , including Dennis_Schroder 's 15 points and 8 assists in 24 minutes off the bench .
Despite playing a somewhat limited role off the bench , Schroder has averaged 16 points and 9 assists in just 29 minutes per game over his last 3 outings .
They have an 11 - game lead on the second - place Chicago_Bulls , and they 're the only team in the NBA to already have a playoff spot secured .
The Cavaliers are no slouches , but they 've struggled a little lately , winning just 2 of their last 5 games .
They had trouble protecting the ball Friday , as Kyrie_Irving coughed up the ball 5 times , and LeBron_James tied his career high for turnovers in regulation by losing the ball 9 times .
The Hawks forced a lot of those turnovers with great pressure defense to force the ball out of the Cavs 's playmakers 's hands , and they scored 20 easy points off the Cavs 's 18 turnovers .
Defense carried the Spurs , as they held the Pelicans to 39 percent shooting , while committing 16 turnovers .
San_Antonio 's bench was huge as well , outscoring New_Orleans 's bench , 35 - 16 .
Kawhi_Leonard carried the Spurs , as he accumulated 31 points , 7 rebounds , 6 assists and 3 steals .
LaMarcus_Aldridge finished second on the team with 21 points , 15 rebounds and 3 blocks .
Patty_Mills provided 15 points , 2 rebounds , 2 assists and 2 steals off the bench , while Pau_Gasol amassed 12 points and 8 rebounds off the pine as well .
Anthony_Davis led the Pelicans with 29 points , 9 rebounds and 3 assists .
Jrue_Holiday finished second on the team with 26 points , 7 rebounds and 5 assists .
DeMarcus_Cousins totaled 19 points , 23 rebounds and 4 assists .
The Dallas_Mavericks ( 31 - 28 ) defeated the visiting Denver_Nuggets ( 23 - 36 ) 122 - 116 , on Friday night at American Airlines Center .
This was a much needed win for the Mavericks , who came into this one losers of 6 of their last 8 games and in danger of slipping out of the top 8 in the West with another loss .
Meanwhile , Denver was coming off a win against the Clippers but have now lost 5 of 6 .
It took overtime to solve this one thanks to a huge rally by Dallas that overcame a 14 - point deficit in the fourth quarter to tie the game with 10 seconds left .
With the game tied at 108 after 4 quarters Dallas exploded for 14 points in overtime , led by Raymond_Felton , who went off for 8 points in the period .
Felton finished the game with 16 points ( 7 - 12 FG , 0 - 2 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) , 6 assists and 4 rebounds , in 40 minutes off the bench .

The Chicago_Bulls defeated the visiting Sacramento_Kings 102 - 99 , at United Center on Saturday evening .
The Bulls literally stole 1 from the Kings , as Dwyane_Wade came up with 2 huge steals in the last minute to seal the deal for Chicago .
First Wade stole the ball then raced down floor but missed a dunk to go ahead by 2 , however 1 foul was called against DeMarcus_Cousins on the play to put Wade at the line .
Wade missed the first of 2 free throws but hit the second to put his squad up 100 - 99 .
The Kings then took a timeout with 14 seconds on the clock .
The Bulls ( 22 - 23 ) really needed this one , as they were coming off 2 ugly losses .
Wade had a rough start to the game but ended up coming through , with a team - high 30 points , to go along with 6 rebounds , 4 assists , 4 blocks and 3 steals .

Meanwhile , the Kings ( 18 - 27 ) were dealt a heartbreaker , as the foul on Wade 's would - be go - ahead dunk was a questionable 1 , and will likely be mentioned in Sunday 's L2M report .
Cousins finished with a game - high 42 points , to go along with 14 rebounds , 3 assists , 2 blocks and 1 steal , in 35 minutes .
The Kings will have to put the past behind them as they move on to Detroit , where they will face the third game of their current 8 - game road trip .

Defense was key for the Hawks , as they held the Heat to 42 percent shooting and forced them to commit 16 turnovers .

Miami ( 7 - 15 ) are as beat - up as anyone right now and it 's taking a toll on the heavily used starters .

The Hawks ( 36 - 8 ) rolled to their 15th straight victory Friday , handling the Thunder 103 - 93 at Phillips Arena .

The Hawks carried a 4 - point lead into the fourth quarter , when they would break the game open behind an 80 run spurred by Dennis_Schroder .
Schroder scored 6 points and assisted on an Al_Horford layup , as the run put Atlanta up 87 - 76 with 8 minutes to play .
The Thunder never got within 8 points the rest of the way , and a Horford three - pointer with 2 minutes to play put the exclamation point on a signature win for the East-leading Hawks .

The Atlanta_Hawks ( 44 - 12 ) defeated the Milwaukee_Bucks ( 31 - 24 ) 97 - 86 on Sunday at the BMO Harris Bradley Center in Milwaukee .
The Hawks came out firing in this game and built an early lead , out - scoring the Bucks 48 - 35 in the first half alone .
The Bucks made a run in the third to bring themselves within 2 , but the Hawks took off in the fourth quarter and finished with an 11 - point victory on the road .
With the win , the Hawks ended the Bucks 's 4 game winstreak , while also getting back in the winning column after losing their last 2 in a row .
It was a relatively sloppy game , with each team committing at least 20 turnovers , but the Hawks were able to overcome and keep themselves positioned atop the Eastern Conference standings .
The Hawks had 6 players reach double figures , including all 5 starters .
Paul_Millsap was especially effective , as he went off for 23 points ( 10 - 21 FG , 1 - 3 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) , 16 rebounds and 2 blocked shots .
Center Al_Horford also had an impressive showing , posting 15 points ( 5 - 12 FG , 0 - 1 3Pt , 5 - 6 FT ) , 8 rebounds and 2 blocked shots .

It was his second straight start with Michael_Carter-Williams still injured , as he 's combined for 24 points , 10 rebounds and 11 assists over that span , while posing as the replacement point guard in the starting lineup .
The Magic were routed at home by the Detroit_Pistons on Tuesday by a score of 109 - 86 .
Detroit 's Jodie_Meeks stole the show by putting on a three - point clinic , shooting 9 - of - 11 from deep on his way to scoring a season - high 34 points .
Meeks began taking over in the second quarter , where he scored 11 consecutive points for the Pistons to help them take a 9 - point lead late in the first half .
Drummond put up a double - double of 17 points and 22 rebounds in 31 minutes .
The Pistons have now won their last 3 games by a combined 56 points , which is all the more impressive considering that they had lost 4 in a row prior to this current win streak .
They entered the fourth quarter down by just 10 points , but mustered only 3 points in the first 4 minutes of the period while Detroit extended its lead to 19 points .
The Detroit_Pistons defeated the Portland Trail_Blazers in overtime , 120 - 113 , at Palace of Auburn Hills on Tuesday .
Portland actually led for the majority of the game , as Detroit outscored them by 11 in the fourth quarter and overtime .
Turnovers were the glaring difference in the game , as the Pistons committed just 7 turnovers , while forcing 24 from the Trail_Blazers .
Portland dominated the shooting strangely enough , as they shot 52 percent to Detroit 's 43 percent .
The Blazers ( 23 - 35 ) are battling for the 8 - seed in the west and overtime losses like this are devastating for that pursuit .
Damian_Lillard did all he could for Portland , as he led the team with 34 points , 11 rebounds and 9 assists .
McCollum tallied 25 points , 4 rebounds and 2 assists .
Jusuf_Nurkic continued his good form with Portland , as he accrued 19 points , 7 rebounds and 5 assists .
Those 3 did combine for 14 turnovers though , which was double the total of the Pistons .
The Pistons ( 29 - 31 ) are slowly climbing back to .500 , as they 've now won 3 of their last 4 games .

The Brooklyn_Nets ( 14 - 39 ) won a thriller Monday night at Barclays Center over the Denver_Nuggets ( 21 - 32 ) , 105 - 104 .
Joe_Johnson 's 27 - foot three - point basket off 1 leg as time expired snatched victory from the jaws of defeat for the Nets .
The Nuggets tied the game 95 - 95 on a Danilo_Gallinari free throw with 5:33 to go in the game , and neither team would build more than a 2 - point lead at any point the rest of the way .
Johnson finished with 12 points and 8 assists , but the Nets were led by Thaddeus_Young 's 20 points ( 9 - 15 FG ) , 7 rebounds , 3 blocks , and 2 assists as he stuffed the stat sheet all night .
Markel_Brown made a big impact off the bench , as he scored a career high 19 points on sharp 6 - 10 shooting , including 2 - 4 from three - point land .
The Nets shot a cool 47 percent ( 9 - 19 ) from 3 as a team .
Gallinari 's 24 was a game - high as he sank 4 three - pointers ; he also dished 7 assists , grabbed 3 rebounds and nabbed 2 steals .
Kenneth_Faried scored 22 and added 13 rebounds for his third double - double in the past 4 games .
Gary_Harris added 17 points on an efficient 8 - 12 night from the floor , but Denver was outshot both overall ( 52 percent to 47 percent ) and from 3 ( 47 percent to 36 percent ) .
The Warriors finished with 52 percent from behind the arc and 58 percent from the field as a unit .
Kevin_Durant , Stephen_Curry and Klay_Thompson all finished with 20 - plus points .
Durant led the way with 28 points , to go along with 10 rebounds , while Thompson busted out of his shooting slump with 20 points on 8 - of - 13 shooting .
Warriors rookie Patrick_McCaw saw 20 minutes of action in the win , and finished with 5 points , 3 assists and 2 rebounds .
The bench was quiet overall for Golden_State , with no 1 player finishing in double figures , but the second unit had no pressure to score given the heavy minutes seen from starters Durant and Draymond_Green .

Al-Farouq_Aminu had to leave the game with an apparent left knee injury after playing only 9 minutes .
The Golden_State_Warriors ( 90 ) handled the Memphis_Grizzlies ( 3 - 6 ) yet again in a 100 - 84 victory on Wednesday .
After a 50 - point loss just 9 days ago , the Grizzlies put in another poor performance against the Warriors on Wednesday as they lost by 17 .
It all started with a 26 - 15 first quarter and the Warriors did n't look back after that .
The Golden_State defense absolutely stifled Memphis in this game , as the Grizzlies shot just 34 percent , while shooting just 3 - of - 15 from three - point range .
The Warriors were once again led by MVP Steph Curry , as he recorded 28 points , 5 rebounds , 5 assists and 5 steals in the victory .
Golden_State also got another nice performance from Harrison_Barnes , who tallied 19 points , 4 rebounds , 3 assists and 3 steals .
The Grizzlies offense continues to be putrid , as they nearly matched their turnover total ( 21 ) with the amount of baskets they made ( 24 ) in this game .
One bright spot in the loss has to be center Marc_Gasol , who scored a season - high 26 points while grabbing 7 boards in the defeat .
The Grizzlies also made 33 - of - 36 free - throws in the loss , which is an impressive feat in its own right .
The Portland Trail_Blazers ( 3 - 2 ) defeated the Utah_Jazz ( 2 - 2 ) on Wednesday by a score of 108 - 92 at EnergySolutions Arena in Salt Lake City .
McCollum , who combined for 62 of the team 's 108 points .
Lillard led the way , scoring 35 points ( 14 - 27 FG , 5 - 11 3Pt ) on top of 4 rebounds and 3 assists in 40 minutes .
McCollum added 27 points on an efficient 10 - of - 13 shooting from the field in 35 minutes .
Mason_Plumlee recorded his first double - double of the season , recording 12 points and a game - high 16 rebounds in 35 minutes , while Maurice_Harkless ( 15 ) and Al-Farouq_Aminu ( 13 ) rounded out the 5 Portland players who scored in double figures .
The Jazz 's offensive was abysmal Wednesday , as the team shot 38 percent from the field and hit on just 21 percent of their attempts from behind the arc .
Alec_Burks still managed to stay effective coming off the bench , finishing with a team - high 21 points ( 5 - 13 FG , 11 - 15 FT ) in 32 minutes .
While Gordon_Hayward 's shooting struggles continued Wednesday ( he went 7 - of - 20 from the field ) , he still managed a season - high 19 points .

Trey_Burke had his best outing of the season , scoring 17 points in 26 minutes off the bench .
The Portland Trail_Blazers climbed back into the Western Conference first - round playoffs against the visiting Los_Angeles_Clippers on Saturday with a 96 - 88 win in Game 3 at Moda Center .
The Clippers lead the series , 2 - 1 .
The Portland backcourt was partially the reason for the dropped 2 games against the Clippers in Los_Angeles , but Damian_Lillard and C.J .
McCollum were lights out in the first of 2 home games for the Blazers .
The duo combined for 59 points 21 - of - 42 shooting , while Mason_Plumlee was dominant on the glass to the tune of 21 rebounds .
Chris_Paul boasted his leadership and skillset as a floor general on the road , but remained the 1 Clippers player to be composed in the contest .
Lillards finished with 32 points , to go with 5 rebounds and 2 assists and added 3 buckets from behind the arc to stave off Los_Angeles down the stretch .
As for the Clippers , Paul finished with 26 points , 3 rebounds and 9 assists on 10 - of - 21 shooting .
Jamal_Crawford added some needed offense off the bench , and contributed 19 points on 9 - of - 18 shooting , but DeAndre_Jordan was not able to get enough looks under the rim to be the presence that can prove to be the difference maker in Clippers wins .
Jordan finished with 11 points , but added 16 rebounds , including 7 on the offensive end of the floor .
Los_Angeles shot just 57 percent from the charity stripe , which fell roughly 15 percent below the Portland mark .
The Grizzlies moved to 60 on Friday , surviving a late run to knock off the depleted Thunder ( 1 - 5 ) 91 - 89 .
Oklahoma_City , which got 12 fourth - quarter points from Reggie_Jackson , dropped its third straight since losing Russell_Westbrook ( knee ) , in addition to Kevin_Durant ( leg ) , who has not played this season .
The Thunder traded baskets with Memphis throughout the fourth quarter but did not lead until the final minute , when a Jackson 3 - pointe put the home team ahead 89 - 87 .
Mike_Conley answered with a 3 of his own not the other end , putting the Grizzlies back up 1 with 38 seconds to play .
With a chance to re - take the lead , Nick_Collison failed to inbound the ball , drawing a 5 - second violation .
Courtney_Lee , who was fouled on the other end , made 1 - of - 2 attempts , leaving the Thunder with 1 final chance to win .
Down by 2 , Serge_Ibaka misfired on a three - pointer from the top of the key as time expired .
Jackson 's 22 points , 7 rebounds and 8 assists led the way for the Thunder , who shot nearly 47 percent from the field .
Ibaka chipped in 16 points , while Jeremy_Lamb added 17 .

Mason_Plumlee had the hot hand off the bench where he scored 16 points on 8 - of - 10 shooting , while Denver shot just 38 percent from the field in the loss .
Detroit shot a superb 57 percent from the field but Miami countered by going 53 percent from the floor and 50 percent from three - point range .
Four Heat players drained multiple threes , and 7 players shot 50 percent or better .

The Portland Trail_Blazers defeated the Boston_Celtics , 127 - 123 , in overtime at TD Garden on Saturday afternoon .
The Blazers ( 19 - 27 ) checked in to Saturday with only 7 road wins in 25 tries this season , and appeared to be facing particularly long odds against a Celtics ( 26 - 17 ) squad that had won 7 of their past 9 contests .
However , a strong third quarter helped Portland catch Boston after they 'd faced a 65 - 56 deficit at the half , and they appeared poised for a hard - fought victory when Damian_Lillard drained a pair of free throws with 10 seconds remaining .
Terry_Rozier turned the tables just 2 seconds later , though , making a 27 - foot three - point jumper off a Marcus_Smart assist to knot matters up at 113 .
Following a Lillard missed step - back jumper as time expired , the 2 teams headed to an extra period .
The Celtics gained a temporary 118 - 117 advantage with 1:23 remaining in overtime after an Isaiah_Thomas three - pointer , but another pair of Lillard free throws with a second left sealed the victory .
McCollum led the way for Portland with 35 points , 3 assists , 2 rebounds and 3 steals .
Lillard provided 28 points , 7 assists , 1 rebound and 1 block .
Meyers_Leonard led the bench with 17 points , 4 boards and 1 steal .
Evan_Turner filled out the stat sheet with 12 points , 4 rebounds , 4 assists , 2 blocks and 1 steal .
Mason_Plumlee generated 10 - point , 11 - rebound double - double that also included 8 assists and 1 steal .
Al-Farouq_Aminu was productive in a reserve role as well , tallying 11 points , 7 boards , 1 steal and 1 block .
The Celtics saw Thomas score a game - high 41 points , which he supplemented with 6 assists and 3 rebounds .
Al_Horford and Marcus_Smart posted matching 17 - point efforts , with the former adding 9 rebounds and 5 assists , and the latter supplying 6 rebounds , 6 assists and 2 steals .
Jae_Crowder totaled 16 points , 4 rebounds , 2 assists and 1 steal .
Rozier led the second unit with 15 points , 3 boards and 3 assists , while Kelly_Olynyk was also productive in a reserve role with 10 points , 8 rebounds and 1 assist .
The Toronto_Raptors ( 16 - 5 ) defeated the Denver_Nuggets ( 9 - 12 ) 112 - 107 on Monday at the Air Canada Centre in Toronto .
The Raptors were able to get out to a 62 - 52 lead after the first half , but the Nuggets turned in a big third quarter and evened it back up going into the fourth .
After ending regulation tied 102 - 102 , they went into overtime where the Raptors held the Nuggets to only 5 points , therefore securing the victory .
Louis Williams led all scorers with 26 points ( 7 - 16 FG , 3 - 10 3Pt , 9 - 10 FT ) , while also grabbing 3 rebounds .
It was a nice bounce back game for him , after scoring only 5 points on Friday against the Cavaliers .
Patrick_Patterson was the other big bench presence , as he went 7 - for - 11 from the field and 5 - for - 7 from the three - point line to score 19 points .
Starting at center , Jonas_Valanciunas recorded his fifth double - double of the year , finishing with 18 points and 12 rebounds .
Kyle_Lowry and Terrence_Ross had 13 and 16 points respectively , with Lowry handing out 13 assists .
Arron_Afflalo went 9 - for - 14 from the field and 4 - for - 7 from the three - point line to score a team - high of 25 points , while adding 6 rebounds .
Ty_Lawson also had a big game and recorded 22 points ( 8 - 19 FG , 2 - 8 3Pt , 4 - 6 FT ) and 12 assists .
Wilson_Chandler got off a team - high of 21 shots , but only converted on 7 , giving him 18 points on the night .
Both J.J. Hickson and Timofey_Mozgov reached double - figures , scoring 10 and 15 points respectively .
Mozgov contributed 12 rebounds to go along with his 15 points , giving him his second double - double in a row .
The Toronto_Raptors defeated the visiting Indiana_Pacers , 89 - 84 , in Game 7 of the Eastern Conference first - round playoffs Sunday , advancing to the second - round for the first time in 15 years and only the second time in franchise history .
The Raptors started strong and took a 6 - point lead into half time .
They were able to stay on top and push it to a 16 - point lead with 7:30 left in the fourth quarter , but Indiana was not done .
The Pacers went on a 15 - 2 run in the next 5 minutes to make it a 1 - possession game with 2 and a half minutes left ; however , the Raptors managed to hang on thanks to solid defense and a couple of clutch baskets .
Rookie , second - round pick , Norman_Powell stepped up big time as he came off the bench on fire , shooting 5 - 6 from the field , including 3 - 4 from long range , to finish with 13 points , in 23 minutes .
Kyle_Lowry finished with 11 points , 9 assists , 4 rebounds and 1 steal , while Jonas_Valanciunas tallied a double - double with 10 points and 15 rebounds .
The Raptors dished 21 assists in the game and hauled in a monstrous 18 offensive rebounds to earn the edge against the relentless Pacers .
Paul_George led the Pacers in scoring and rebounding , with 26 points ( 8 - 18 FG , 4 - 7 3Pt , 6 - 6 FT ) and 12 rebounds , along with 3 steals and 1 assist , but also had 7 turnovers , in 46 minutes .
George_Hill followed up with 19 points ( 8 - 11 FG , 3 - 4 3Pt ) , 2 assists , 1 rebound and 1 steal , while Monta_Ellis chipped in 15 points , 7 assists and 4 rebounds .
The Pacers held the Raptors to 38 percent shooting from the field , but gave up 15 turnovers as they fell just short .
The Charlotte_Hornets defeated the Atlanta_Hawks , 100 - 96 , at Spectrum Center on Friday .
The battle of Southeastern Division rivals lived up to its billing , with the Hornets ( 8 - 3 ) pulling away in the fourth quarter of what was an exciting nip - and - tuck contest .
Nicolas_Batum , Kemba_Walker and Cody_Zeller ripped off a trio of 20 - point efforts to spearhead the win , which helped overcome a collective 41 percent field - goal percentage .
In contrast , the Hawks ( 9 - 3 ) tallied a superior 46 percent success rate , but did turn the ball over 16 times , 5 more than Charlotte .
Despite the defeat , Atlanta can take solace in the effort put in by the returning Dwight_Howard , who hauled in 18 boards and also contributed 10 points , 2 assists , 3 steals and 2 blocks .
The Hawks were led by Paul_Millsap , who posted a 22 - point , 13 - rebound double - double that also included 1 assist and 1 block .
Kent_Bazemore followed with 19 points , 2 rebounds , 2 assists , 3 steals and 2 blocks .
Dennis_Schroder contributed 11 points , 5 assists , 1 rebound and 1 steal .
Mike_Muscala , who turned in a strong performance in Howard 's stead on Wednesday , was productive off the bench , totaling 11 points , 5 rebounds , 2 assists and 1 block .
Batum paced the Hornets with 24 points , 10 rebounds , 4 assists and a pair of steals .
Zeller was outstanding in compiling a season - high 23 points , as he shot 9 - of - 10 from the field and also hauled in 3 boards , 1 assist , 3 blocks and 2 steals .
Walker , who totaled 21 points , 6 assists , 5 rebounds and 2 steals , helped seal the victory with a go - ahead jumper with 4:3 remaining that he followed up with an acrobatic highlight - reel layup and three - point jumper shortly thereafter .
While Marvin_Williams was only able to muster 8 points , he did haul in 11 rebounds and dished out 3 assists .
Houston 's offense was especially easy , as they shot 63 percent from the field and 51 percent from three - point range .
Russell_Westbrook carried the Thunder , as he collected 39 points , 11 rebounds and 13 assists .
Enes_Kanter played well off the bench , totaling 24 points and 4 rebounds .
Victor_Oladipo accrued 15 points , 4 rebounds and 4 assists .
Lou_Williams led the way for Houston , as he dropped 31 points , 3 rebounds and 4 assists on 11 - of - 15 shooting off the Rockets bench .
James_Harden accrued 22 points , 5 rebounds and 12 assists .
Trevor_Ariza shot 9 - of - 11 to total 24 points , 6 rebounds , 6 assists and 3 steals ,
Chris_Paul stepped up his offense as the starting 5 found points relatively hard to come by for a second straight game .
Paul 's 27 points and 6 steals equaled season highs , while his 11 dimes represented a new high - water mark .
The All-Star guard almost outscored his other 4 teammates on the first unit , who only combined for 36 points , a total that was matched by the 5 players on the Clippers bench .
The Grizzlies received a combined 51 points from Mike_Conley and Marc_Gasol , but only 37 points from 10 other players who logged minutes .
They managed just a 37 percent success rate from the field , while their 19 turnovers led to 30 points for the Clippers .

With Bosh out , the Heat struggled to get anything working on offense and shot a woeful 35 percent from the field and 18 percent from beyond the arc .

Shooting was the key difference in this game , with San_Antonio shooting 57 percent , while holding Denver to under 45 percent from the field .

The Memphis_Grizzlies ( 17 - 16 ) defeated the Los_Angeles_Lakers ( 5 - 26 ) 112 - 96 on Sunday .
Coach Dave Joerger moved veteran Zach_Randolph to the bench 9 games ago , promoting Matt_Barnes and Jeff_Green to the starting lineup in the process .
Since the personnel shift , Randolph has tallied 6 double - digit scoring performances , while receiving a few extra minutes of valuable rest each night .
Sunday provided a tangible example of the positive results the rotation has brought , with Randolph producing 16 points , 3 rebounds and 1 steal over just 20 minutes .
Green amassed 17 points and 4 rebounds himself , while Barnes only managed a modest 5 points , but hauled in 8 boards .
The Grizzlies also outscored the Lakers in the paint by the comfortable margin of 44 - 28 , and outrebounded them on the defensive glass , 34 - 28 .
The visitors also received solid efforts from 3 other members of their starting 5 , Marc_Gasol , Mike_Conley and Courtney_Lee .
Gasol pitched in 16 points and added 6 rebounds and 1 steal , while the pair of guards combined for 32 points , 6 rebounds , 8 assists and 5 swipes .
Randolph 's aforementioned 16 points paced the Memphis bench , and Mario_Chalmers joined him as the other double - digit scoring reserve with 11 points .
The Grizzlies improved their record to 17 - 16 and currently reside in third place in the Western Conference 's Southwest Division .
Kobe_Bryant did continue his stretch of considerably improved play by leading the Lakers with a 19 - point tally on 6 of 15 shooting .
Rookie Larry Nance , Jr. turned in a notable performance of his own , contributing a career - high 17 points and hauling in 11 boards for his first career double - double .
Jordan_Clarkson was the only other starter with double - digit points , pouring in 12 and adding 3 assists and a pair of rebounds .
2015 first - round pick D'Angelo_Russell paced the Lakers 's reserves with 10 points , 3 assists and 1 steal , his third consecutive double - digit scoring effort .
Los_Angeles fell to 5 - 26 and remains in last place in the Western Conference 's Pacific Division .
The Toronto_Raptors defeated the New_York_Knicks , 116 - 101 , at Air Canada Centre on Sunday .
The Knicks ( 18 - 23 ) found themselves without star power forward Kristaps_Porzingis for a second consecutive game due to his sore Achilles , and his absence seemed to make a considerable difference , particularly in the middle portion of the game .
After hanging tough with the Raptors ( 27 - 13 ) through the first period , New_York saw their hosts outscore them by a whopping 69 - 38 margin over the second and third quarters .
Toronto was particularly dominant coming out of the halftime locker room , as they blasted their visitors by a 27 - 8 spread in the third quarter .
The Raptors were able to shoot an impressive 49 percent from the field overall , while seeing 3 players eclipse the 20 - point mark .
The Knicks were led by Carmelo_Anthony 's 18 points , although he was only able to add 1 rebound and 1 assist to his stat line .
Justin_Holiday was the second - leading scorer for the Knicks and accomplished the distinction from the bench , as he totaled 17 points , 3 rebounds , 1 assist and 1 steal over 26 minutes .
Derrick_Rose was next with 16 points , 3 assists , 2 rebounds and 1 block .
Joakim_Noah notably contributed just 1 point but did haul in 8 boards .
Lance_Thomas had to exit the contest after just 2 minutes as a result of an elbow to the face .

The visiting Minnesota_Timberwolves demolished the Utah_Jazz on Wednesday , 107 - 80 .
Minnesota ( 25 - 36 ) saw one of its most convincing wins of the season , as sophomore phenom Karl-Anthony_Towns continued his stretch of dominance .
Towns took his game to another level in February , averaging over 28 points and 13 rebounds per game while shooting over 60 percent .
Five Timberwolves finished with at least 11 points in what was a well - rounded team effort on offense .
Third-year wing Andrew_Wiggins scored 20 points for the 18th straight game , while Shabazz_Muhammad had 18 in just 23 minutes of play .
Utah ( 37 - 24 ) has now dropped 2 straight games in what has been a minor slide in an otherwise great season .
Wednesday 's game certainly marked a low - point for the Jazz , who shot under 39 percent and made only 4 three - pointers en route to only 80 points on the night .
The team 's high scorer was third - year Australian point guard Dante_Exum , who had 15 points in 28 minutes off the bench .
The game quickly got out of hand for Utah , leading no member of the starting 5 to play more than 26 minutes on the night .
Free-throws killed the Cavs , as they made the same amount of free - throws as the Spurs , but took 8 more attempts .
They also dominated the assist - to - turnover ratio , with San_Antonio recording 7 more assists and 5 less turnovers .
Kawhi_Leonard was the player of the game , dropping a career - high 41 points in the win .
LeBron_James and Kyrie_Irving tied the team - lead for Cleveland , scoring 29 points a piece .
James added 6 rebounds and 7 assists , while irving provided 3 rebounds and 9 assists .

The Toronto_Raptors ( 47 - 32 ) defeated the Orlando_Magic ( 25 - 54 ) 101 - 99 on Friday in Orlando .
DeMar_DeRozan put the Raptors up 2 with 18 seconds left , but then Victor_Oladipo countered with a three - point bomb of his own to put the Magic up 1 point with 13 seconds remaining .
Finally , it was Lou_Williams who hit a 3 of his own with 9 seconds left to give Toronto their 2 - point lead back .
With 4 seconds left , down 2 points , the Magic had an opportunity to tie it or win the game , but Oladipo 's jumper at the buzzer was just off , giving the Raptors the victory .
DeRozan led the way for Toronto , recording a game - high 29 points ( 10 - 21 FG , 3 - 5 3Pt , 6 - 6 FT ) , 5 assists and 3 rebounds in 37 minutes .
Tyler_Hansbrough also filled in nicely once again for the injured Amir_Johnson ( ankle ) , scoring 16 points ( 7 - 12 FG ) and grabbing 7 rebounds in 36 minutes .
The win moves the Raptors into a tie for third place in the East , where they currently hold the tiebreaker over the Bulls with just 3 games left to play in the regular season .
Oladipo led the way for the Magic in the losing effort , posting 19 points ( 8 - 18 FG ) , 5 rebounds and 4 assists in 43 minutes .
Tobias_Harris and Nikola_Vucevic each scored 16 points , while Evan_Fournier ( 18 ) and Aaron_Gordon ( 13 ) combined to score 31 points off the bench .
The Cleveland_Cavaliers ( 38 - 24 ) defeated the Boston_Celtics ( 23 - 35 ) 110 - 79 on Tuesday at Quicken Loans Arena in Cleveland .
The Cavaliers got out to an extremely quick start , out - scoring the Celtics 29 - 16 in the first quarter , while grabbing a 61 - 36 lead by half .
They did n't slow down coming out of the half either , out - scoring the Celtics 34 - 17 in the third quarter , therefore setting them up to pull off an impressive 31 - point win in front of their home crowd .
The Cavaliers were the superior shooting team in this game , going 48 percent from the field and 36 percent from the three - point line , while the Celtics finished at 35 percent from the floor and just 25 percent from deep .
It also did n't help that the Celtics turned the ball over 16 times , while forcing the Cavs into just 11 .

Returning to the starting lineup after missing 2 games with a strained left shoulder , Kyrie_Irving showed no signs of still being affected by the injury .

Tristan_Thompson added 10 points on 4 - of - 4 shooting from the field , to go along with 7 rebounds as well .
Since joining the Celtics just 6 games ago , he 's been arguably their best source of scoring , averaging 20 points over that 6 game span .
Also off the bench , rookie James_Young posted 9 points ( 2 - 5 FG , 2 - 5 3Pt , 3 - 3 FT ) in just 17 minutes .
Other than Bass , the Celtics starters combined for just 19 points , which will n't win any team very many ball games .

The Memphis_Grizzlies defeated the Houston_Rockets , 115 - 109 , at FedEx Forum on Friday .
The Grizzlies ( 20 - 12 ) hold a reputation as one of the true grinding , defensive - minded squads in the NBA , and rightfully so .
However , Memphis flashed the ability to give the scoreboard operator a workout Friday , as they broke out for a season - high 115 points to secure their 12th home victory of the season .
Mike_Conley , recently recovered from a serious back injury , led the way with 24 points , and the Grizzlies impressively shot 51 percent from the field and 52 percent from three - point range .
On the defensive end , they were able to contain the prolific Rockets to 43 percent and 39 percent success rates , respectively .
Houston was led by Ryan_Anderson 's season - high 31 points , which he supplemented with 7 rebounds and 2 blocks .
James_Harden provided a modest 16 points while only taking 13 shot attempts , but served as a master facilitator , handing out 17 dimes .
Montrezl_Harrell compiled 16 points and provided 8 rebounds and 1 assist while drawing another start center .
Patrick_Beverley went for 13 points , 6 rebounds , 1 assist and 2 steals .
Eric_Gordon got his money 's worth out of his 32 minutes on the floor , posting 17 points , 4 assists , 2 rebounds , 1 steal and 1 block while taking a whopping 16 of his 19 shot attempts from three - point range .
Conley complemented his aforementioned team - high scoring total with 5 assists , 3 rebounds and 1 steal .
Marc_Gasol was next with 16 points , 5 rebounds , 4 assists , 2 blocks and 1 steal .
Tony_Allen filled out the stat sheet with 9 points , 4 rebounds , 2 assists , 2 steals and 1 block .
Chandler_Parsons played a scant 15 minutes as he continues to build up his conditioning following a long absence , and he managed 4 points , 3 rebounds , 2 assists and 1 steal .
Zach_Randolph led the bench with 16 points , 5 rebounds , 4 assists and 1 steal , while Vince_Carter ( 14 points ) and James Ennis ( 13 points ) were productive in reserve roles as well .
The Cleveland_Cavaliers ( 12 - 7 ) defeated the Brooklyn_Nets ( 8 - 11 ) 110 - 88 on Monday at the Barclays Center in Brooklyn .
Despite the Cavaliers leading only 50 - 49 going into halftime , they came out on fire in the second half and out - scored the Nets 60 - 39 , allowing them to coast to a 22 - point victory on the road .
The Cavaliers severely out - rebounded the Nets as well , grabbing 55 compared to only 33 recorded by Brooklyn .
The Cavaliers got a huge boost off the bench in this one , with 3 players scoring at least 12 points .
Dion_Waiters recorded a season and game - high of 26 points ( 11 - 21 FG , 1 - 6 3Pt , 3 - 3 FT ) , while also handing out 4 assists .
Tristan_Thompson was also a big contributor off the bench and recorded his second double - double in a row , finishing with 14 points and 12 rebounds .
James finished with 18 points ( 8 - 17 FG , 1 - 3 3Pt , 1 - 2 FT ) and 7 assists , while Love recorded 19 points ( 7 - 14 FG , 2 - 5 3Pt , 3 - 6 FT ) and 14 rebounds .
Garnett finished with 14 points ( 6 - 9 FG , 2 - 3 FT ) and 7 rebounds .
Williams also added 11 assists , giving him his second double - double of the year .
Mirza_Teletovic was the other starter to reach double - digit points , as he finished with 11 .
The Phoenix_Suns ( 3 - 2 ) defeated the Sacramento_Kings ( 1 - 4 ) Wednesday by a score of 118 - 97 at the Talking Stick Resort Arena in Phoenix .
The Suns maintained control of the game from the opening tip , outscoring the Kings 28 - 18 in the first quarter and never looking back .
The effort was led by Eric_Bledsoe , who stuffed the stat sheet on his way to a game - high 19 points ( 8 - 19 FG , 2 - 4 3Pt ) , 8 assists , 6 rebounds , and 4 steals in 33 minutes .
His running mate in the backcourt Brandon_Knight was n't too far behind , accumulating 17 points and 7 assists in 33 minutes of his own .
As a team , the Suns maintained a scorching - hot shooting effort throughout the night , hitting on 54 percent of their attempts from the field and an incredible 61 percent from behind the arc .
Sacramento was unable to be as effective on offense , as their starters combined to score just 46 out of the team 's 97 points .
Koufos scored 16 points on 8 - of - 11 shooting and grabbed 7 rebounds in 28 minutes off the bench .
Marco_Belinelli and James_Anderson added 15 points of their own , while Darren_Collison racked up 13 points and 6 assists in 32 minutes .
The Indiana_Pacers ( 24 - 22 ) picked up a key Eastern Conference home win Thursday night at Bankers Life Fieldhouse over the Atlanta_Hawks ( 27 - 21 ) , 111 - 92 .
The Pacers led for over 30 straight minutes , from 23 - 20 with 1:44 left in the first quarter all the way until the Hawks took a 90 - 88 lead off an Al_Horford dunk with 5:55 to remain in the game .
But the Pacers were n't fazed , as they would allow just 1 more basket for the rest of the game as they stepped on the gas and pulled away for good with a 23 - 2 run to close the game .
Monta_Ellis was on fire from three - point land , as he knocked down 5 of his 7 shots from deep and finished with 25 points , 6 assists and 5 steals to lead the Pacers .
George_Hill knocked down 3 three - pointers to fuel an 18 - point , 8 - rebound night , and Myles_Turner notched an efficient 20 points in 26 minutes to help hide a rare off night from Paul_George ( 2 - 11 FG , 11 points ) .
Jeff_Teague led the Hawks with 20 points and dished a team - high 5 assists , but he was one of the rare bright spots for a stagnant Hawks offense that managed just 40 percent from the field .
Al_Horford scored 14 on 6 - 12 shooting and Thabo_Sefolosha had a sharp 13 points on 4 - 7 shooting off the bench , but the Hawks just could not connect from deep .
Kyle_Korver managed just 1 - 7 from three - point land , and the team finished a brutal 7 - 28 ( 25 percent ) .
The Atlanta_Hawks ( 47 - 32 ) earned a home win over the Toronto_Raptors ( 52 - 26 ) Thursday night at Philips Arena , 95 - 87 .
Atlanta won this one with defense , as they blocked 12 shots and held the Raptors to just 38 percent shooting from the field .
Toronto 's biggest lead came at 11 - 7 with 8:26 to go in the first quarter .
The Hawks immediately rattled off a 60 run to take the lead , and the Raptors never led again , as Toronto 's offense could n't generate the big run necessary to turn things around .
Jeff_Teague led all scorers with 23 points ( 7 - 13 FG , 2 - 3 3PT , 7 - 9 FT ) to go with 5 assists .
Paul_Millsap turned in a double - double with 13 points and 14 rebounds to go with 5 blocked shots , and Kyle_Korver knocked down 4 of 8 three - point attempts as he finished with 14 points .
Atlanta shot a mediocre 43 percent from the floor but shot a nifty 12 - 32 ( 38 percent ) from three - point land to keep their offense moving .
DeMar_DeRozan ( 7 - 24 FG ) and Kyle_Lowry ( 6 - 15 FG , 2 - 6 3PT ) led the Raptors with 16 points apiece .
Jonas_Valanciunas scored 13 points and added 8 rebounds , and Bismack_Biyombo came off the bench to score 10 points and grab 9 rebounds in just 21 minutes .
But the Raptors just could n't generate offense , and they managed just 8 offensive rebounds on 52 missed shots , a meager 15 percent offensive rebound rate , leaving them without the critical second chance opportunities teams need when first shots are n't falling .
The New_Orleans_Pelicans ( 42 - 35 ) defeated the Golden_State_Warriors ( 63 - 15 ) 103 - 100 on Tuesday at the Smoothie King Center in New_Orleans .
The Thunder took a tough loss to the Spurs on Tuesday as well , so the Pelicans now hold a half game lead over the Thunder with just 5 games left on their schedule .
This marked just the second time all season that Pondexter reached the 20 - point mark , so it came at the right time for the Pelicans during their intense battle with the Thunder for that final playoff spot .
Curry missed a few big shots late in the game , but he still surpassed the 20 - point mark for the ninth time over his last 10 outings .
He shot just 3 - of - 11 from the field in Sunday 's game against the Spurs , so he needs to get locked back in before the playoffs start next week .
The Boston_Celtics defeated the Orlando_Magic , 117 - 87 , at Amway Center on Wednesday .
Boston really put their foot down in the second half , outscoring the Magic , 68 - 37 , after trailing by 1 headed into halftime .
Shooting was the key difference , with Boston shooting 52 percent and Orlando shooting just 37 percent on their end .
Boston ( 13 - 9 ) had to play this game without Isaiah_Thomas , but they did n't miss a beat .
Avery_Bradley stepped up in his absence , tallying 23 points , 4 rebounds and 3 assists .
Al_Horford scored just 10 points on 3 - of - 9 shooting , but added 6 rebounds and 8 assists , as much of the offense was run through the big man .
Jae_Crowder recorded a double - double , accumulating 17 points and 10 rebounds .
Terry_Rozier and Marcus_Smart took all the point guard minutes and combined for 29 points , 8 rebounds , 5 assists and 3 steals in the win .
Orlando ( 10 - 13 ) has really struggled on offense this season and this 87 - point effort only adds to those deficiencies .
Nikola_Vucevic did record a double - double off the bench though , totaling 12 points and 10 rebounds on 5 - of - 14 shooting .
Augustin led the team in scoring , dropping 15 points on 4 - of - 7 from the field .
The forwards really struggled , as Serge_Ibaka and Aaron_Gordon combined for just 13 points and 11 rebounds on 5 - of - 19 shooting .
Evan_Fournier went just 4 - of - 14 from the field , but accrued 14 points , 3 rebounds and 5 assists .
Isaiah_Thomas missed 3 straight games just over a week ago with a groin injury , but in his 3 games since his return , he has n't skipped a beat .
In fact , after Tuesday night 's 44 - point performance against the Grizzlies , Thomas officially put together his highest scoring 3 - game stretch of the regular season thus far .
In his 3 games since returning from injury , Thomas has totaled 93 points .
His previous best 3 - game stretch this season came in mid - November , when Thomas scored 90 points over that stretch .
Most importantly , however , Thomas 's return is leading the Celtics to victories , as they have now won 3 straight with Thomas after losing 3 straight without him .
It 's important to note , however , that high scoring affairs from the point guard have not always to positive results , as Boston is just 3 - 3 this season when Thomas scores at least 30 points .
The Chicago_Bulls hung on to defeat the visiting New_Orleans_Pelicans , 107 - 99 , at United Center on Saturday evening .
Jimmy_Butler scored 18 points in the first half , to lead the Bulls to a 55 - 45 lead at halftime .
They extended their lead to as many as 15 points in the third quarter but the Pelicans were able to battle back to make it a 1 - point game with 10:53 left in the fourth quarter .
However , Dwyane_Wade exploded for 17 points in the fourth quarter , where he went 7 - of - 10 from the field to lead Chicago to the win .
The Bulls ( 20 - 21 ) took a staggering 101 shots from the field , hitting 43 percent , including 8 - of - 20 from long range .
Jimmy_Butler was the high - point man for Chicago , with 28 points on 9 - of - 16 shooting , to go along with 8 rebounds , 6 assists , 4 steals and 2 blocks , in 39 minutes .
Dwyane_Wade finished the game 9 - of - 24 from the field but came up big when it counted , finishing with 22 points , to go along with 5 rebounds , 5 assists and 2 steals , in 32 minutes .
Taj_Gibson complimented his guards with a solid night of his own , as he tallied 15 points , 16 rebounds and 2 blocks , in 32 minutes .
The Bulls are now 13 - 8 at home but will have to switch gears , as their next game takes place in Memphis on Sunday .
Meanwhile , Anthony_Davis did all he could to save his Pelicans ( 16 - 25 ) , as he poured in a game - high 36 points , to go along with 14 rebounds , 3 blocks , 2 assists and 1 steal , in 39 minutes .
The only other starter to score in double digits for New_Orleans was Solomon_Hill who finished with 10 , while E'Twaun_Moore added 16 points and Tyreke_Evans chipped in 14 points off the bench .
Despite having one of the league 's top rebounders and inside players , the Pelicans were out - rebounded by 21 and out - scored in the paint .
They fall to 6 - 14 on the road and are now 1 more game away from the eighth spot in the West .
The Pelicans will wrap up a 5 - game road trip as they take on the Pacers in Indiana on Monday .
The Oklahoma_City_Thunder ( 13 - 8 ) ran circles around the Memphis_Grizzlies ( 12 - 10 ) on Tuesday , winning 125 - 88 .
After getting off to a 59 - 47 lead in the first half , the Thunder ran away with the game in the third quarter , dominating the Grizzlies 39 - 16 .
Durant shot the lights out , hitting 11 of 14 from the floor en route to a game - high 32 points .

It seemed that no 1 on Memphis could get their shots to fall , as the Grizzlies shot just 41 percent from the field and knocked down only 3 three - pointers .
Things look brighter for the third - seed Thunder , as they have 2 superstars both playing at a high level .
LeBron_James and Kyrie_Irving helped build a 58 - 45 halftime lead , despite the fact Kevin_Love exited after 12 minutes with back spasms .
Irving paced Cleveland with a 29 - point , 10 - assist double - double , and James supplied a 25 - point , 14 - rebound effort .

The Knicks ( 6 - 36 ) thwarted a late comeback and held on to beat the shorthanded Pelicans ( 20 - 21 ) 99 - 92 on Monday evening .
New_York led by 13 points entering the fourth quarter but allowed the Pelicans , playing without Anthony_Davis and Jrue_Holiday , to slowly creep back into the game .
With just over 6 minutes to play , Quincy_Pondexter connected on a three - pointer to bring New_Orleans within 6 , and a Tyreke_Evans layup a few minutes later trimmed the deficit to just 3 with 3:13 to play .
Following a Carmelo_Anthony layup , Evans knocked down 2 free throws and hit a jumper to bring the Pelicans within 1 with 1:55 to play .
After Anthony was called for a charge , the Pelicans could not convert 2 opportunities on the other end , and New_York retained possession up 1 point with 42 seconds remaining .
On the ensuing possession , Anthony kicked the ball out to Jose_Calderon , who drilled a three - pointer with 32 seconds left .
After Anderson misfired on a 3 , the Knicks secured the rebound and Anthony hit 3 straight free throws to ice the game .
Anthony 's 24 points led the way for the Knicks , who shot nearly 49 percent from the floor as a team .
Langston_Galloway added 21 points and 5 rebounds , while Jason_Smith chipped in 12 points .
Amar'e_Stoudemire added 14 points in 21 minutes off the bench .
The Pelicans got 23 points from Evans and 20 from Eric_Gordon but were simply unable to compensate for the losses of Holiday and , especially , Davis .
While New_Orleans out - rebounded New_York by a 16 - board margin , they blocked just 1 shot as a team and had just 6 fast break points .
New_Orleans has now dropped 2 of its last 3 after falling to Philadelphia on Friday and beating the Raptors in Toronto on Sunday .
The Memphis_Grizzlies ( 38 - 13 ) defeated the Atlanta Hakws ( 42 - 10 ) 94 - 88 on Sunday at Fed Ex Forum Arena in Memphis .
Despite securing the 6 - point victory , the Grizzlies did n't have as much success shooting the ball as the Hawks did .
The Hawks went 41 percent from the field and 40 percent from the three - point line , while the Grizzlies finished at 39 percent from the floor and a meager 23 percent from beyond the arc .
While they may not have had the shooting advantage , the Grizzlies did it elsewhere , as they out - rebounded the Hawks 55 - 37 and forced them into 14 turnovers , while committing only 11 of their own .
Conley went 7 - for - 12 from the field and 2 - for - 4 from the three - point line to finish with a team - high of 21 points , while also adding 6 assists .
Gasol , on the other hand , recorded 16 points ( 6 - 14 FG , 0 - 1 3Pt , 4 - 4 FT ) , 10 rebounds and 2 blocked shots .
Zach_Randolph did n't have his best night shooting the ball , but still finished with 11 points ( 5 - 16 FG , 1 - 2 FT ) , to go along with 15 rebounds and 2 steals .
Jeff_Green added 11 points ( 3 - 10 FG , 1 - 3 3Pt , 4 - 4 FT ) and 6 rebounds .
DeMare Carroll was the only other starter in double figures for points , recording 10 points ( 3 - 9 FG , 2 - 6 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) and 5 rebounds in 29 minutes .
Coming off the bench , Kent_Bazemore had the most success , posting 14 points ( 5 - 11 FG , 2 - 4 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) , 5 rebounds and 2 steals in 29 minutes .
Considering he 's averaging only 4 points per game on the season , it was a nice surprise for the Hawks .
Both Mike_Scott and Dennis_Schroder added 11 points each .
The Washington_Wizards defeated the Atlanta_Hawks 104 - 100 Wednesday at Verizon Center .
Ultimately , Washington managed to push their lead to 12 points with just over 3 minutes to go , and while Atlanta was able to chip away in the closing moments , they eventually just ran out of time .
It was n't a great shooting night for John_Wall , who shot just 6 - of - 21 from the field , but he still managed to finished with a double - double of 22 points and 10 assists in 34 minutes .

The team shot a subpar 40 percent from the field en route to their fifth straight loss , and they remain just 1 game ahead of the Pacers for fifth place in the Eastern Conference .
The Memphis_Grizzlies defeated the Phoenix_Suns , 115 - 96 , at Talking Stick Resort Arena on Monday .
Memphis went into the half with an 11 - point lead , and built that into a 20 - point blowout by midway through the third quarter , where Conley sank all 3 free throws that came on 1 foul behind the three point line .

Zach_Randolph led the bench with 18 points , while the Grizzlies shot a remarkable 57 percent from three - point land .
Phoenix got 2 20 - plus point performances from Devin_Booker and Chriss , but the scoring was far from efficient , which has been a trend for most opponents of Memphis this season , given their strength on the defensive end of the floor .
Memphis stole the ball 13 times from the Suns , and had no problem putting the Suns on the charity stripe given their comfortable lead early in the second half .

The Phoenix_Suns defeated the San_Antonio_Spurs , 108 - 105 , in the Suns 's second straight game at Mexico City Arena , on Saturday evening .
The Suns gave the Spurs trouble right from the start , matching the top - tier squad in the first quarter , but fell back to trail by 7 by halftime .
However , the Suns came out of the locker room to win both the third and fourth quarters , out - scoring the Spurs 57 - 47 in the second half .
Devin_Booker seems to really like playing in Mexico City , as he followed his 39 - point performance on Thursday , with another 39 points on Saturday , to lead his squad past the Spurs .
The Suns ( 13 - 27 ) shot 46 percent from the field in the contest , while Booker helped boost those numbers , as he went 12 - of - 22 from the field .
The only other players to score in double digits for the Suns were Eric_Bledsoe , who finished with 17 points , to go along with 10 assists and 6 rebounds , and T.J. Warren who finished with 12 points .
Phoenix won the battle on the glass by 12 and was plus - 7 in fast break points , as it 's youthful hustle came in handy .
The Suns are now 3 - 2 in their last 5 games but still remain right at the bottom of the West .
Kawhi_Leonard led the way for the Spurs ( 31 - 9 ) with 38 points on 12 - of - 20 shooting , in 32 minutes .
The next highest scorer was Manu_Ginobili , who finished with 16 points , in 25 minutes off the bench .
Tony_Parker added 14 points , while the only other player to score in double digits for the Spurs was LaMarcus_Aldridge , who finished with 13 points on 6 - of - 14 shooting , to go along with 4 rebounds and 2 assists , in 34 minutes .
The Spurs struggled early , to the point where Gregg Popovic pulled all 5 of his starters early in the first quarter , but the subs who came in did a good job of getting San_Antonio back in the game .

The Sacramento_Kings ( 1 - 1 ) blew out the Los_Angeles_Lakers ( 0 - 2 ) 132 - 114 in Sacramento on Friday night .

Washington is on a 3 - game win streak , which included wins against the Indiana_Pacers , Detroit_Pistons , and Orlando .

The Houston_Rockets ( 31 - 32 ) defeated the Toronto_Raptors ( 41 - 20 ) 113 - 107 on Sunday .
The importance of the rather unlikely road victory for Houston can not be underscored , as the Rockets had come in to the contest having dropped 3 of their previous 4 games and in tangible danger of losing their grip on the eighth seed in the conference .
Further dampening their prospects was the Raptors 's formidable defense , as well as the 12 - game home winning streak they carried into the Sunday night affair .
Despite the rather long odds and a 61 - 51 halftime deficit , the visitors rallied on the strength of a typically remarkable effort from James_Harden , who collected at least 40 points for the third time in the last 6 games .
Corey_Brewer also played a pivotal role off the bench with a 23 - point tally , and the oft - maligned Houston defense was able to elicit 15 turnovers from Toronto .
The superior second - half performance was enough to earn the Rockets their first win north of the border since the 2006 - 2007 campaign .
Harden added 14 assists , 5 rebounds and 1 steal to his game - high 40 - point total , and made a whopping 19 visits to the charity stripe .
Brewer paced the Rockets reserves with his aforementioned 23 points , and supplemented it with 4 rebounds and a trio of assists .
Dwight_Howard was right behind with a 21 - point , 11 - rebound double - double that also included 1 assist , 1 steal and 2 blocks .
Trevor_Ariza followed with 13 points , 2 assists , 1 rebound and 3 steals .
Although he could n't quite get into double digits in scoring , Patrick_Beverley generally held his own against Kyle_Lowry and filled out the stat sheet with 7 points , 8 rebounds , 3 assists and 3 steals .
The Rockets are currently in fourth place in the Western Conference 's Southwest Division , and they retain a rather tenuous hold on the eighth seed in the conference by 1 - and - 1 - half games over the Utah_Jazz .
Luis_Scola surprisingly led the way for Toronto , as he capitalized on his matchup against the Rockets 's woeful power forward defense to post 21 points , 3 rebounds and 1 steal .
DeRozan did follow close behind with 19 points , 7 assists , 6 rebounds and 2 steals .
Lowry was next with 17 points , 9 assists , 4 rebounds and 3 steals .
Jonas_Valanciunas put in a full day 's work against Dwight_Howard , posting a 12 - point , 10 - rebound double - double that also included a trio of blocks .
Corey Joseph ( 9 points , 5 rebounds and 3 assists ) and Terrence_Ross ( 9 points , 2 rebounds , 1 assist and 1 steal ) co - led the Toronto bench .

Having gone blank on the scoreboard over the preceding 3:40 of the fourth quarter , Orlando stole the victory with an 18 - foot shot from Nikola_Vucevic off an inbounds pass from Elfrid_Payton as the clock hit triple zeroes .
However , the Magic were still able to outperform the Hawks from the field , tallying a 46 percent success rate as compared to Atlanta 's 39 percent tally .
Both teams enjoyed double - digit scoring afternoons from all members of their respective starting fives , and the Magic also saw 2 of their young stars post double - doubles .

The host Denver_Nuggets beat the Utah_Jazz on Tuesday , 103 - 93 .
Denver ( 19 - 25 ) has now won 4 in a row at home and has become one of the hottest teams in the West , due largely to the emergence of sophomore Nikola_Jokic .
The 21 - year - old center has been dominant since the start of the new year , and was effective once again on Tuesday despite Utah 's tough defensive frontcourt .
Jokic scored 23 points and pulled down 11 rebounds and made a surprising impact on defense with 2 steals and 3 blocks .
Utah ( 29 - 18 ) , on the other hand , was not quite as hot on the offensive end .
Hayward scored only 9 points , while Hill went just 6 - of - 18 from the field .
Favors , who has seen his season plagued by injuries thus far , led the Jazz with 18 points on 8 - of - 11 shooting and was responsible for a handful of key plays on defense .
That said , Tuesday 's outing was likely 1 that Utah will be eager to forget ; the Jazz shot just 41 percent from the field as a team and were out - rebounded .
The Chicago_Bulls ( 21 - 9 ) defeated the Indiana_Pacers ( 11 - 20 ) 92 - 90 on Monday .
The Bulls led by 16 points going into the fourth quarter , but Indiana managed to make it close by outscoring the Bulls 25 - 11 in the final period .
Chicago was lead Jimmy_Butler with 27 points ( 8 - 20 FG ) , 9 rebounds and 4 steals in 44 minutes of play .
Derrick_Rose shot just 5 - of - 20 from the field , finishing with 17 points , 6 assists and 2 blocks .
Indiana was 4 - 3 over their previous 7 games coming into Monday 's contest with the Bulls .
Rodney_Stuckey sobered up from his near - triple - double performance from Saturday , finishing Monday 's game with just 5 points , 2 rebounds and 2 steals .
In fact , Charlotte won the third quarter , 35 - 13 , en route to a 19 - point win .
Rebounding was the biggest difference for Charlotte , as they won that battle , 46 - 34 .
Serge_Ibaka was the only Orlando starter to play well , as he scored all of his 20 points in the first half .
Nikola_Vucevic led the Magic in scoring , as he dropped 21 points on 10 - of - 13 shooting .
Nicolas_Batum was the catalyst for Charlotte , as he accumulated 20 points , 9 rebounds and 8 assists .
Kemba_Walker led the Hornets in scoring , collecting 21 points , 5 rebounds and 3 assists of his own .
The Phoenix_Suns defeated the Atlanta_Hawks 109 - 107 at Talking Stick Resort Arena on Wednesday .
The Suns ( 6 - 13 ) staved off a hungry Hawks ( 10 - 9 ) squad that was being led by Dennis_Schroder down the stretch .
The Atlanta point guard had one of his best games of the season after scoring 31 points to lead all scorers in the contest , and drew a needed foul from behind the three point line with just 1 second left remaining in the fourth quarter .
Eric_Bledsoe drained the free throws on the other end of the court to extend the lead to 5 points , which rendered Kent_Bazemore 's buzzer beating three pointer useless , as the Suns came away with the home win .
Phoenix followed up a 36 point first quarter with a lowly 14 points in the second , which kept the Hawks within striking distance after they had multiple opportunities to put the game away early .
Brandon_Knight was the most effective player on the floor for the Suns , evidenced by his 23 points in 31 minutes off the bench , to go along with 5 rebounds , 2 assists and 2 steals .
Tucker led the starters with 17 points , while Devin_Booker finished with 13 points on 5 - of - 13 shooting .
Schroder added 4 rebounds , 9 assists and 1 block to his 13 - of - 23 shooting performance , while Bazemore scored 22 points to round out the starters for Atlanta .
Tim Hardaway Jr. was the effective bench performer in 26 minutes of play , as he scored 21 points on 9 - of - 17 shooting .
The Wizards eaked out a tight road win to begin the season over the Magic , behind Bradley_Beal 's game high 24 points .
Tobias_Harris had a running field goal attempt with 4 seconds left that hung on the rim and appeared to be goaltended by Marcin_Gortat , which would have given the Magic a 1 - point lead .
Washington was led by John_Wall who put up 22 points , 7 rebounds , 6 assists , 3 steals , and an eye - popping 5 blocks .
The Wizards will head into Milwaukee Friday night and look to open the season 20 .
Victor_Oladipo led the way with 17 points and 11 rebounds , while Elfrid_Payton neared a triple - double with 11 points , 10 rebounds , and 8 assists .
The Chicago_Bulls ( 45 - 29 ) scored more points before the fourth quarter than the New_York_Knicks ( 14 - 60 ) tallied the entire game , winning 111 - 80 .
The Knicks failed to score 20 points in any of the first 3 quarters , falling behind 84 - 53 heading into the final period .
Potential Rookie of the Year Nikola_Mirotic scored a game - high 24 points off the bench , supplemented by 6 rebounds , 2 assists , 1 steal , 1 block and 3 three - pointers in 26 minutes .
Pau_Gasol notched his league - leading 48th double with 19 points and 12 rebounds in a team - high 28 minutes , throwing his name into the Comeback Player of the Year conversation .
Jimmy_Butler secured 5 steals to match his total post - All - Star break .
The win moved the Bulls 1 and half games ahead of the 4 seed Toronto_Raptors with 8 games remaining .
The Knicks broke a record by losing their 60th game , most losses in a single season of the franchise 's 69 - year history .
It 's the ninth time in 16 March games the Knicks failed to shoot 40 percent from the field .
They 've lost 7 games in a row and hold a 3 - game edge over the Minnesota_Timberwolves for worst record in the league .
Andrea_Bargnani scored a team - high 14 points .
Langston_Galloway played a team - high 36 minutes and shot 5 - of - 14 from the floor , possessing a team - low negative 28 plus/minus .
Ricky_Ledo may have played his final game with the Knicks as his 10 - day contract expires Sunday .
He joined Bargnani and Galloway as the only Knicks to score at least 10 points , contributing 11 points , 3 rebounds , 2 steals , 1 assist and 1 three - pointer in 29 minutes .
The Bulls have 3 days off before facing the Milwaukee_Bucks .
The Nets ( 1 - 7 ) finally managed to win a game , defeating the Rockets ( 4 - 4 ) 106 - 98 at Toyota Center on Wednesday .
Brooklyn outscored Houston 25 - 17 in the fourth quarter en route to its first win of the season .
The unsung hero of the night was Bojan_Bogdanovic , who scored a team - high 22 points ( 10 - 20 FG , 2 - 5 3Pt ) in 34 minutes off the bench .
James_Harden had an off night , struggling from beyond the arc ( 3 - 10 ) and failing to get to the line enough ( 4 - 5 ) .
The Nets woes from downtown had been documented thoroughly up until tonight when they finally posted a solid percentage from distance ( 47 percent , 8 - 17 ) .
Brook_Lopez ( foot ) had a tough time dealing with Dwight_Howard in the paint , but came alive late in the game to finish with 14 points , 12 rebounds and 5 blocks .
Joe_Johnson turned into a distributor for the night , dishing out 10 assists while adding 16 points on 4 - of - 13 shooting from the field .
Rockets coach Kevin McHale rode his starters in this one , as nobody off the bench played more than 16 minutes ( Terrence_Jones ) .
Marcus_Thornton also chipped in 21 points , hitting 3 from beyond the arc with 7 assists and 4 steals .
Brooklyn will head to Sacramento Friday to face the Kings in the third game of a 4 - game road trip ; Houston will try and bounce back against the Nuggets in Denver .
The Bulls ( 4 - 1 ) knocked off the Bucks ( 2 - 3 ) 95 - 86 at the BMO Harris Bradley Center on Wednesday night .
After scoring 16 points in Tuesday 's win over Orlando , Gibson hung 23 points and 10 rebounds on the Bucks in a game - high 44 minutes .
Pau_Gasol added 22 points and 14 boards , and Jimmy_Butler chipped in 13 points , 6 rebounds and 7 assists .
Derrick_Rose , who missed Tuesday 's contest , scored just 13 points to go with 7 assists and 4 turnovers .
The Bulls shot 47 percent from the field and 73 percent ( 22 - of - 30 ) at the free throw line .
Milwaukee , looking for its first winning streak since the 2012 - 13 season , led by 4 at halftime but came out flat in the third quarter , allowing Chicago to regain the lead entering the final period .
The teams traded baskets for most of the fourth , and a Giannis_Antetokounmpo dunk - his third of the quarter - brought the Bucks to within 1 with 5:31 remaining .
The Bulls would make a run , however , capped by a Kirk_Hinrich corner three - pointer with 2:15 remaining that put Chicago up 88 - 80 .
The Bucks would never get back to within 6 , and the Bulls were able to salt the game away at the free throw line .
Antetokounmpo , affectionately known as  The Greek Freak ,  led the way for Milwaukee , scoring 13 points ( 6 - 11 FG ) in 27 minutes off the bench to go with 8 boards .
Khris_Middleton added 11 points in 23 minutes , and Brandon_Knight chipped in 10 points , 9 rebounds and 7 assists as the only other Bucks player in double - figures .
Milwaukee shot a paltry 37 percent from the floor and converted only 3 - of - 15 three - point attempts .
Second overall pick Jabari_Parker struggled from the floor ( 4 - 12 FG ) , scoring only 8 points in 25 minutes .
All 11 Bucks who entered the game saw at least 12 minutes of playing time .
In a battle between 2 elite backcourts , the Wizards showed who the better team was .
It was a wire - to - wire win for Washington , as they led by 16 points after the first quarter and 25 points at the half .
Three-point shooting was the decisive statistic , with the Wizards going 13 - of - 23 , while the Blazers hit just 8 - of - 26 .
Damian_Lillard was the only Blazer with more than 14 points , as he tallied 22 points , 7 rebounds and 3 assists .
Bradley_Beal led the Wizards , as he scored a game - high 25 points to go along with 5 assists and 3 steals .
John_Wall finished with 24 points , 4 rebounds and 7 assists .
Markieff_Morris accrued 17 points , 13 rebounds and 5 assists .
Kelly Oubre Jr. led the bench with 18 points , while Tomas_Satoransky provided a double - double off the bench as well .
The Utah_Jazz ( 30 - 35 ) defeated the Washington_Wizards ( 30 - 34 ) 114 - 93 on Friday .
The game was the tale of 2 starting units , with Utah 's first group generating a balanced and productive effort , while Washington 's offense was decidedly top - heavy .
Meanwhile , Utah was able to tally outstanding 57 and 56 percent success rates from the field and three - point range , respectively , while also outrebounding the visitors 42 - 29 .
Wall 's 24 points paced Washington , and he also dished out 9 assists , 4 rebounds and 1 steal .
Morris supplied 16 points , and added 4 boards , 2 assists and 1 steal .
Marcin_Gortat endured a tough night versus the defense of Rudy_Gobert , totaling a modest 8 points , 4 rebounds , 1 assist and 1 block .
Nene Hilario paced the reserves with 12 points , 3 rebounds , 1 assist and 2 steals .
The Wizards remain in fourth place in the Eastern Conference 's Southeast Division , and 3 games behind the eighth - seeded Detroit_Pistons .
Utah was spearheaded by Shelvin_Mack , who amassed a career - high 27 points , and complemented it with 4 assists and 3 rebounds .
Gordon_Hayward was next , posting 18 points , 3 assists , 2 rebounds and 1 steal .
Derrick_Favors managed a near double - double , collecting 14 points , 9 boards , 1 assist and 2 steals .
Rodney_Hood matched Favors 's point total , and added 1 rebound , 1 assist and 4 steals .
Raul_Neto paced the reserves with 12 points , 2 rebounds and 2 assists , although he did turn the ball over 5 times over just 14 minutes on the floor .
The Jazz remains in third place in the Western Conference 's Northwest Division , and are 3 games behind the eighth - seeded Dallas_Mavericks .
The Denver_Nuggets defeated the host Indiana_Pacers , 125 - 117 , at Bankers Life Fieldhouse on Friday .
Free-throw shooting was a glaring difference , with Denver going 40 - of - 43 from the free - throw line , while Indiana went just 8 - of - 11 .
Rebounding was crucial for the Nuggets as well , with Denver winning that battle , 46 - 39 .
The Nuggets ( 35 - 37 ) are holding on to the 8 - seed in the west by a fingernail , as this was a crucial road win for that pursuit .
Wilson_Chandler finished second on the team , totaling 24 points , 4 rebounds , 2 assists and 2 blocks .
