However , Mike_Conley , who led the way with a game - high 31 points , scored 13 in the final 12 minutes to seal the win .

The host Los_Angeles_Clippers defeated the New_York_Knicks on Monday , 114 - 105 .
Los_Angeles ( 42 - 29 ) has now won 2 games in a row after hitting a bit of a late - season slide after the All-Star break .
Superstar point guard Chris_Paul helped lead the team to Monday 's victory , as he dished out a team - high 13 assists to go along with 13 points .
On top of Paul , fellow All-Star Blake_Griffin had a major scoring burst , delivering a team - high 30 points .
As a team , LA shot over 49 percent and hit 10 three - pointers on the night while holding the Knicks to just 45 percent and 6 made threes .
The Knicks ( 27 - 43 ) appear to have given up on their playoff push as they continue to slide at the end of the season .
Perhaps the team 's top performer was sophomore big man Kristaps_Porzingis , who impressed with a team - high 18 points and 11 rebounds to go along with 2 steals .
One of the only advantages the Knicks managed to hold in the game was in the rebounding column , where they out - rebounded the Clippers 48 - 42 .
The shorthanded Chicago_Bulls ( 30 - 26 ) defeated the Washington_Wizards ( 26 - 30 ) 109 - 104 on Wednesday .
Chicago had to play this game without 3 of their top - 4 scorers and still prevailed with an impressive team - win .
The Bulls shot 50 percent from the field in the victory , while holding the Wizards to just 42 percent on their end .
The rebounding was key , as Chicago snatched down 50 rebounds to the Wizards 42 .
Bradley_Beal led the team with 19 points and Ramon_Sessions played well off the bench as well , providing 16 points of his own .
Garrett_Temple also had a nice game , as he hit 4 three - pointer en route to an 18 - point outing .
Seven Chicago players scored in double figures with E'Twaun_Moore and Gibson tying the team lead with 17 points .
The Pacers ( 4 - 4 ) pulled away in the fourth quarter for a 97 - 84 win over the Magic ( 3 - 5 ) at Bankers Life Fieldhouse on Monday .
In a back - and - forth contest , Indiana was able to outscore Orlando 25 - 14 in the final frame to draw even at .500 on the season .
Paul_George scored 19 of his 27 points in the first half and added 7 assists and 4 rebounds in 36 minutes .
With 2 important forwards on the skids , Orlando employed Channing_Frye , who finished 4 - of - 9 from distance with 14 points and 8 rebounds in 23 minutes .
Evan_Fournier has gotten back on track after struggling against Toronto last Friday , pouring in 21 points with 4 treys in 40 minutes .
George_Hill remained one of the hottest shooters in the NBA , scoring 23 points and hitting 4 from downtown to provide Indiana with plenty of secondary scoring behind George .
Guard Rodney_Stuckey briefly left the game due to an ankle injury , but was able to return finishing with just 6 points in 18 minutes .
The Golden_State_Warriors ( 68 - 7 ) defeated the host Utah_Jazz ( 37 - 38 ) in overtime , 103 - 96 , Wednesday at Vivint Smart Home Arena .
Utah led by 8 points with 7 minutes left in regulation but the Warriors turned it up late , in order to earn an important victory in their quest for NBA history .
Klay_Thompson managed to sink a desperation three - pointer with only 15 seconds left , to tie the game and ultimately send it to overtime , where the Warriors dominated .
Meanwhile , this comes as a devastating loss for the Jazz , who came into this game only half a game ahead of eighth and ninth place in the Western Conference standings , as they are now at risk of falling outside the top - 8 .
Stephen_Curry was business as usual as he dropped 31 points ( 11 - 23 FG , 5 - 10 3Pt , 4 - 5 FT ) , along with 7 rebounds , 4 assists and 2 steals , in 42 minutes .
Klay_Thompson chipped in 18 points , while Harrison_Barnes added 15 points and 11 rebounds .
Draymond_Green impacted all facets of the game , with 13 points , 8 rebounds , 6 assists and 3 blocked shots , in 43 minutes .
The Warriors gave up an ugly 18 turnovers but managed to overcome that by rebounding well and holding the Jazz to only 40 percent shooting from the field .
All 5 starters scored in double figures for Utah .
Gordon_Hayward led the way with 21 points , although he struggled shooting , going 7 - 20 from the field .
Rudy_Gobert chipped in 11 points along with a monstrous 18 rebounds , while Rodney_Hood contributed 20 points and 6 rebounds .
Shelvin_Mack was solid at the point , with 12 points , 9 assists , 6 rebounds and 2 steals , in 41 minutes .
The Jazz struggled from deep , as they shot 9 - 32 from long range , and also struggled from the free throw line , where they went 13 - 29 .
Devin_Booker tied the game twice in the final 20 seconds , as his 38 points were a career - high .
Many of the statistics were lopsided , but the biggest differential was in the blocks department , as the Pelicans swatted away 14 shots to the Suns 2 .
New_Orleans also dominated the assist - to - turnover ratio , as they assisted on 28 made baskets with 9 turnovers , while the Suns assisted on 18 buckets with 15 turnovers .
The rebounding is what won the game for Phoenix though , as they brought down 58 boards to the Pelicans 45 .
The 18 rebounds for Tyson_Chandler may look like an outlying number , but he 's now had 18 rebounds in 3 games this season and has had at least 10 boards in all but 1 game .
The Golden_State_Warriors ( 58 - 6 ) rolled over the Portland Trail_Blazers ( 34 - 32 ) 128 - 112 on Friday .
The Last time these 2 teams squared off , the Blazers put it to the Warriors in a 32 - point blowout .
In fact , the Warriors scored 81 first half points to take a 20 - point lead .
The rebounding was key , as Golden_State snatched down 56 boards , while holding the Blazers to just 39 on their end .
Portland is starting to hit a bit of a wall , as they have now lost 4 of their last 5 .
After dropping a career - high 52 points on Golden_State in their last matchup , Damian_Lillard could only muster up 17 points here .
Lillard went just 5 - for - 19 from the field and scored his lowest point total since February 2 .
Meyers_Leonard played well off the bench though , as he tallied 10 points , 13 rebounds and 3 assists in the defeat .
Klay_Thompson led the team with 37 points and also snatched down 6 rebounds .
Steph Curry accumulated 34 points , 3 rebounds and 4 assists despite playing under 30 minutes of action .
Draymond_Green was the only other player in double - figures , as he amassed 17 points , 13 rebounds and 7 assists .
The Chicago_Bulls ( 40 - 40 ) defeated the Cleveland_Cavaliers ( 56 - 24 ) 105 - 102 on Saturday .
The big difference in the game were the benches , as Chicago got 44 points from their bench , while the Cavaliers got just 11 bench points .
The free - throw shooting was a big differ as well , with Chicago going 17 - for - 21 and Cleveland going just 11 - for - 18 .
This win could have guaranteed the Cavaliers with the 1 - seed in the east , but they simply were n't motivated enough to win this game .
LeBron_James was though , as he tallied 33 points and 7 rebounds in the loss .
Kevin_Love recorded another double - double in a 20 - point , 13 - rebound outing .
J.R. Smith provided 24 points , 6 rebounds and 4 assists of his own .
Jimmy_Butler was the player of the game , as he amassed 21 points , 6 assists and 3 steals in the win .
Cristiano_Felicio was a huge surprise off the bench , as he scored 16 points and grabbed 5 rebounds .
Pau_Gasol scored 11 points of his own and grabbed 12 rebounds in yet another double - double .
The Boston_Celtics came into Milwaukee and knocked out the Bucks 99 - 83 to improve to a 3 - 3 record .
Boston snapped Milwaukee 's 4 game winning streak to start a 2 game winning streak of their own .
Entering the third quarter , Milwaukee trailed by 4 in a tightly conested ball game .
However , Boston dominated the third 30 - 17 to take control of the contest .
It was an all - around team game for the Celtics who had 6 players reach double figures and 10 players score overall .
Isaiah_Thomas led the way for Boston with 20 points , while Jared_Sullinger provided the only double - double for the Celtics .
Along with Sullinger 's 11 points and 10 rebounds , he provided 3 assists , 1 steal , and 1 triple .
Boston will attempt to improve on their 3 - 3 record Wednesday versus the Pacers .
Jabari_Parker continued his comeback from an ACL injury with an efficient 8 pioints , 8 rebounds , 1 assist , and 2 steals in 24 minutes .
Khris_Middleton and Jerryd_Bayless also scored in double figures with 13 and 12 points a piece .
DeMarcus_Cousins was to blame for both the Kings surge in the first half , and their falter in the second half , allowing the Los_Angeles_Lakers to come away with a 10 point victory .
Cousins box score numbers are prettier than the game implied , as he finished with 28 points , 9 rebounds and 4 assists , to go along with 2 steals .
The Kentucky big man only got to the foul line 8 times , although there was a handful of calls that could have gone his way , the result was they did not and it affected the mood that Cousins was playing with .
The Brooklyn_Nets defeated the New_York_Knicks , 120 - 112 , at Barclays Center on Sunday evening .
The Nets ( 12 - 53 ) had come in to Saturday 's game on somewhat of a high note by their standards , as they 'd notched 2 of their 11 victories on the season within the previous 6 games .
However , the Knicks ( 26 - 41 ) regrouped at halftime and came out firing in the third , outscoring their hosts by a 31 - 24 margin during the period .
New_York made 1 last surge by getting to within 118 - 112 after a Derrick_Rose basket with 1:8 remaining but would go scoreless the rest of the way .
The Nets emerged victorious thanks in large part to their marksmanship , as they shot 46 percent from the field and 50 percent from three - point range , while also seeing 7 players tally double digits in the scoring column .
Carmelo_Anthony led the way for the Knicks with 27 points , which he supplemented with 7 rebounds , 3 assists and 1 block .
Kristaps_Porzingis contributed a 19 - point , 10 - rebound double - double that also included 4 assists and 5 blocks .
Derrick_Rose provided 17 points , 5 boards , 2 assists and 2 steals .
Courtney_Lee went for 15 points , 2 rebounds , 1 assist and 1 steal .
Lance_Thomas led the bench with 13 points , 5 rebounds , 4 assists and 1 block .
Brook_Lopez paced the Nets in his return from a 1 - game absence with 25 points , 6 rebounds , 2 assists , 1 steal and 1 block .
Rondae_Hollis-Jefferson posted a 14 - point , 11 - rebound double - double that also included 1 block .
Trevor_Booker matched Hollis-Jefferson 's point total off the bench and added 9 rebounds .
Lin and LaVert supplied matching 13 - point efforts , with the former adding 5 assists , 4 rebounds and 1 steal , and the latter registering 4 rebounds , 4 assists and a pair of steals .
Quincy_Acy ( 12 points , 6 boards , 1 assist ) and Isaiah_Whitehead ( 10 points , 3 rebounds , 2 assists , 2 steals ) were productive in reserve roles as well .
The Washington_Wizards defeated the Milwaukee_Bucks , 107 - 101 , at BMO Harris Bradley Center on Sunday .
The Wizards ( 18 - 18 ) caught a break when Giannis_Antetokounmpo was ruled out of Sunday 's contest with an illness , but they still encountered a game Bucks ( 18 - 18 ) squad that was eager to defend their home court .
Jabari_Parker stepped up in his teammate 's absence by scoring a game - high 28 points , which he supplemented with 8 rebounds , 7 assists , 2 steals and 1 block .
However , Bradley_Beal practically countered Parker point - for - point , totaling a team - high 26 to help the Wizards stay a step ahead .
The 2 teams 's propensity for handing the ball to the opposition also played a pivotal part in neither being able to pull away from the other , as Washington was guilty of 19 turnovers , while Milwaukee committed 16 of their own .
Beal supplemented his aforementioned scoring total with 4 rebounds , 2 assists and 1 block .
Markieff_Morris followed with 20 points , 10 rebounds , 1 assist and 3 steals , one of his most complete performances of the season .
John_Wall supplied 16 points , 7 assists , 3 boards and 1 steal .
Otto_Porter turned in a typically full stat line of 13 points , 7 rebounds , 7 assists , 2 blocks and 1 steal .
Kelly Oubre , Jr. led the second unit with 17 points , 5 boards , 1 assist and 1 steal .
Impressive rookie Malcolm_Brogdon complemented Parker 's effort with 22 points of his own , along with 5 assists , 1 rebound , 3 steals and 1 block .
Tony_Snell provided a modest 7 points , while Mirza_Teletovic , in the starting lineup as a result of Antetokounmpo 's absence , registered just 5 points , 4 rebounds , 2 assists and 1 steal .
Michael_Beasley paced the bench with 18 points , 1 rebound and 1 steal , while Greg_Monroe provided another stellar performance off the bench , posting a 12 - point , 12 - rebound double - double that also included 3 assists , 4 steals and 1 block .
The Golden_State_Warriors ( 2 - 2 ) tied up the NBA Final with a 103 - 82 win over the Cleveland_Cavaliers ( 2 - 2 ) in Game 4 .
Coach Steve Kerr promoted Andre_Iguodala to the starting lineup , shifted Draymond_Green to center , and decided to bring Andrew_Bogut off the bench in a move that altered the NBA Finals to a best - of - 3 series .
James was one of 3 Cavaliers to record a double - double , joined by Tristan_Thompson and Timofey_Mozgov .
Unable to meet his lofty Finals 's scoring average , James ended the night with 20 points , 12 rebounds and 8 assists .
Mozgov scored a career - high 28 points and grabbed 10 rebounds , and Thompson notched 12 points and 13 rebounds in 38 minutes .
The Cavaliers suffered their second home loss this postseason and shot 29 percent from the floor in the second half , culminating in a 12 - point fourth quarter .
Iguodala responded in his first start all season with a season - high 22 points and stellar defense on LeBron_James .
As a reserve , Bogut entered the game midway through second quarter , racked up 3 fouls in a 3 - minute span , and never reentered the ballgame .
The Warriors improved to 570 when building at least a 15 - point lead this season and hit their 215th three - pointer in the 2015 playoffs , a postseason record .
MVP Stephen_Curry matched Iguodala 's point output and added 6 assists and 4 three - pointers in 41 minutes .

The Pistons pulled to within 2 and half games of the final playoff seed in the Eastern Conference and avoided the season sweep at the hands of the Nets .

The Nets square off against the Houston_Rockets on Monday , and the Pistons travel north of the border to compete with the Toronto_Raptors after 1 day off .

The Houston_Rockets defeated the Milwaukee_Bucks 111 - 92 Wednesday at Toyota Center .

Harden finished the game with 38 points , 8 assists and and 6 rebounds in 37 minutes .
Meanwhile , Eric_Gordon , who was coming off a brutal 3 - of - 17 shooting performance in Tuesday 's loss to the Heat , bounced back in a huge way .

For the Bucks ( 20 - 21 ) , Antetokounmpo scored a team - high 32 points on top of 11 rebounds , 6 assists and 3 blocks as the team dropped below .500 once again .
Unfortunately for the Bucks , Wednesday ended up being a 1 - man show , with the rest of the Bucks 's starters struggling mightily to get the ball in the hoop .
While Antetokounmpo went an impressive 13 - of - 20 from the field , the other 4 starters went just 13 - of - 36 ( 36 percent ) .
Overall as a team , Milwaukee managed to shoot just 40 percent from the field and a poor 25 percent from long range in the losing effort .
Up next , the Rockets will look to continue their winning ways Friday in a big - time matchup with the Warriors , while the Bucks will look to end their 3 - game losing streak Friday in Orlando .

Oklahoma_City has now dropped 4 of its last 5 , leaving the door open for New_Orleans to move within a half game of it should the Pelicans win Friday .

The Miami_Heat defeated the visiting Minnesota_Timberwolves , 123 - 105 , at American Airlines Arena on Friday evening .
The Heat owned a significant 64 - 49 lead at halftime , however the Timberwolves came back with a 32 - point third quarter to cut the deficit to 9 heading into the fourth .
The Heat got right back to business in the fourth though , led by Goran_Dragic , who poured in 12 points in the quarter , to help seal the win and keep Miami 's playoff hopes alive .
The Heat ( 34 - 35 ) dished 29 assists and shot a blistering 59 percent from the field , to earn their 20th home win of the season .
Hassan_Whiteside led the way for Miami with 23 points on 10 - of - 11 shooting and 14 rebounds , in 33 minutes .
Tyler_Johnson also poured in 23 points , while James_Johnson chipped in 17 points , as they continued to provide the Heat with a huge spark off the bench .
Goran_Dragic added 19 points and dished 10 assists , in 33 minutes of action .
With the Pistons and the Bulls both taking loses on Friday night , this win is extremely valuable for Miami 's playoff aspirations , as it puts them 1 game ahead of the ninth - place Pistons and 2 games ahead of the tenth - place Bulls .
Meanwhile , Karl-Anthony_Towns led the Timberwolves ( 28 - 40 ) with 31 points and 11 rebounds , while Andrew_Wiggins followed up with 26 points and Ricky_Rubio added 20 .
The only other player to score in double digits for the T-Wolves was Shabazz_Muhammad , who chipped in 15 on 7 - of - 10 shooting , in 28 minutes off the bench .
The Timberwolves now sit 5 games out of eighth in the West , and will continue to battle , as they visit New_Orleans to take on the Pelicans on Sunday .

The 25 - year - old guard collected 18 of his 23 second - half points in the fourth quarter , helping Charlotte pull away from the Lakers by a 10 - point margin at game 's end .

The Washington_Wizards ( 10 - 12 ) outlasted the Dallas_Mavericks ( 13 - 11 ) 114 - 111 on Saturday .
Washington found out before the game that starting shooting guard Bradley_Beal will miss a minimum of 2 weeks with what is being termed as an initial - stage stress reaction in his lower right fibula .
The development thrust Garrett_Temple into the starting lineup in Beal 's stead , a situation that the 6 - year pro had played well in earlier this season .
Both responded in fine fashion Saturday , with Wall posting his fourth consecutive 26 - point outing and adding a season - high 16 assists .
Meanwhile , Porter managed a career - high 28 points and 4 three - pointers , also a high - water mark .
The visitors also benefited from Marcin_Gortat 's fifth double - double in 6 games , with the 9 - year pro tallying 14 points and 12 rebounds .
Jared_Dudley also pitched in with 13 points , and Ramon_Sessions paced the Washington bench with 17 points and 6 assists .
Overall , the Wizards outplayed the normally fast - paced Mavericks at their own game , amassing 31 fast - break points to Dallas 's 14 .
Washington improved to 11 - 12 but remains in last place in the Eastern Conference 's Southeast Division .
The Mavericks received another outstanding effort from the resurgent Wesley_Matthews , who continues to round back into form after the Achilles surgery that cut short his 2014 - 15 campaign in Portland .
Matthews poured in 28 points and was 6 - for - 11 from beyond the arc , his second - best total from long range this season .
J.J._Barea was actually the second - highest scorer for Dallas and accomplished it in a reserve role , amassing 21 points over 29 minutes in his second game back after an ankle injury .
Zaza_Pachulia and Raymond_Felton posted a double - double and triple - double , respectively , with the former collecting 10 points and 12 rebounds and the latter tallying 10 points , 11 rebounds and 11 assists .
Dirk_Nowitzki pitched in with 13 points , 6 rebounds and a pair of assists .
Dallas dropped to 13 - 11 and is currently in a second - place tie with Memphis in the Western Conference 's Southwest Division .
Center DeAndre_Jordan recorded a team - high 20 rebounds and also had 2 steals and 3 blocks .

Forward Aaron_Gordon had 4 of those threes while leading the team with 28 points .
Center Nikola_Vucevic also made a big impact for the Magic in his return to the starting lineup , recording a 16 - point , 12 - rebound double - double .
The Dallas_Mavericks ( 33 - 28 ) handled the Orlando_Magic ( 26 - 33 ) in a 121 - 108 win on Tuesday .
The shooting was incredible , as the Mavericks shot 56 percent from the field , 84 percent from the free - throw line and 47 percent from long distance .
The starters were the difference , as Dallas 's starters scored 81 points to Orlando 's 45 .
Orlando had to lean on their bench heavily in this game , with only 1 starter scoring more than 12 points .
That was Nikola_Vucevic , as he finished with 18 points and 7 rebounds in just 23 minutes of action .
Ersan_Ilyasova had his best game in a Magic uniform , as he amassed a team - high 22 points and 10 rebounds in the loss .
Dallas has been playing some incredible offense as of late , as they are averaging 120 points a game across their last 7 games .
Five different players scored at least 17 points in the win , with Wesley_Matthews leading the team with 21 points .
Zaza_Pachulia had a nice game , as he double - doubled in a 17 - point , 10 - rebound performance .
The Golden_State_Warriors ( 23 - 3 ) defeated the Sacramento_Kings ( 12 - 16 ) 128 - 108 on Monday at Oracle Arena in Oakland .
The Warriors got up quickly in this one , out - scoring the Kings 36 - 20 in the first quarter and 64 - 50 by the end of the second quarter .
The Warriors finished the game shooting 54 percent from the field and 36 percent from the three - point line , as the Kings did n't have enough of a defensive presence to keep them in check .
The Warriors also out - rebounded the Kings 45 - 39 , giving them even more of an edge .
Stephen_Curry was n't his usual self on the offensive side of the ball , scoring only 12 points , but was still able to hand out 11 assists , getting his team involved despite his struggles .
Klay_Thompson on the other hand picked up the slack , shooting 10 - for - 16 from the field and 2 - for - 4 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 25 points .
In only 17 minutes , Festus_Ezeli was extremely efficient and scored 15 points ( 7 - 11 FG , 1 - 2 FT ) , while grabbing 6 rebounds .
Also , in a surprise performance off the bench , Justin_Holiday went 7 - for - 12 from the field and 3 - for - 7 from beyond the arc to score 18 points .
As usual , the Kings were led by DeMarcus_Cousins who scored 22 points ( 9 - 19 FG , 4 - 6 FT ) , while also adding 8 rebounds and 6 assists .
Coming off the bench , Omri_Casspi shot well , going 7 - for - 10 from the field and 2 - for - 4 from the free throw line to record 16 points and 8 rebounds .
Averaging only 8 points this season , it was a nice surprise for the Kings .
Rudy_Gay finished with 13 points and 9 rebounds .
Steph Curry and Klay_Thompson were the biggest part of that , as each backcourt sharpshooter poured in 7 three - pointers .
The duo combined for 14 of Golden_State 's 15 three - pointers and 57 of their 111 points .
Curry , despite turning the ball over 5 times , added 6 assists .
As a whole , the Warriors hit over 48 percent of their shots from the field and dished out 28 team assists .
Westbrook shot just 4 - of - 16 for 15 points and had 5 turnovers on the night .
The Nets ( 33 - 40 ) took down the lowly Knicks ( 14 - 60 ) in a 100 - 98 thriller at Madison Square Garden on Wednesday .
The Nets went into halftime up 5 points , a lead they extended to 14 by the end of the third quarter .
But the Knicks came to life in the fourth , outscoring the Nets 27 - 15 .
Cleanthony_Early caught fire , scoring all 14 of his points in the fourth quarter .
Brooklyn 's Brook_Lopez grabbed his own rebound and scored with only 2 seconds left on the clock , giving the Nets a 2 - point lead .
Cleanthony_Early was unable to hit a 26 - foot desperation three - pointer as time expired .
Deron_Williams was the Nets 's leading scorer with 26 points ( 11 - 21 FG , 4 - 7 3Pt ) , to go with 7 rebounds , 7 assists and 1 steal in 34 minutes .
Brook_Lopez had 18 points ( 9 - 15 FG ) , 7 rebounds , 1 assist and 5 blocks in 34 minutes .
Wednesday marks the first time Lopez has failed to score at least 20 points in his last 8 games .
Thaddeus_Young ( knee ) contributed 12 points ( 5 - 9 FG , 0 - 1 3Pt ) , 9 rebounds , 2 assists and 1 block in 34 minutes .
Andrea_Bargnani was the Knicks 's leading scorer with 22 points ( 9 - 16 FG , 2 - 3 3Pt ) , to go with 5 rebounds and 1 block in 27 minutes .
Langston_Galloway contributed 13 points ( 5 - 12 FG , 2 - 6 3Pt ) , 5 rebounds , 4 assists and 3 steals in 32 minutes .
Cleanthony_Early came off the bench to score 14 points ( 6 - 11 FG , 2 - 5 3Pt ) , to go with 6 rebounds , 1 assist , 1 steal and 2 blocks in 27 minutes .
The Nets have extended their winning streak to 5 games .
Brooklyn is currently the 8 seed in the Eastern Conference , 1 game ahead of the ninth place Celtics .
With Wednesday 's victory , the Nets have completed the season series sweep of the Knicks , 40 .
The Miami_Heat defeated the Houston_Rockets , 109 - 103 , at American Airlines Arena on Tuesday .
A 20 - 3 run in the fourth quarter was the decisive stretch for the Heat , as that gave Miami their largest lead of the game .
Shooting was the key difference , with Miami hitting 47 percent of their shots , while Houston were held to just 40 percent .
The Heat also did work in the paint , winning that battle , 64 - 50 .
The Rockets ( 32 - 12 ) are in a bit of a rut right now , as this marks their third loss in their last 4 games .
James_Harden picked up yet another triple - double though , accumulating 40 points , 12 rebounds and 10 assists .
Patrick_Beverley was second among starters , totaling 12 points , 7 rebounds , 3 assists and 2 steals .

The Heat ( 12 - 30 ) have been unlucky in terms of results this season and a win over the Rockets shows just how good they can be .

Tyler_Johnson and Wayne_Ellington were also great off the bench , combining for 34 points and 6 rebounds .
The Wizards saw 96 of their 107 points come from their starting 5 .

Shooting guard Bradley_Beal , meanwhile , poured in a team - high 27 points .

Davis added 3 steals and 2 blocks .
Point guard Jrue_Holiday , meanwhile , scored 26 and dished out 11 assists on the night .
The Nets led by 12 points early in the third quarter , but trailed heading into the fourth .
In fact , the Nets had a 57 - 47 lead with 10 minutes left in the third and allowed the Hornets to go on a 19 - 3 run to lead by 6 points with 3 minutes left in the third .
Seven players had at least 8 points for Brooklyn , with all of them providing at least 2 rebounds and 1 assist .

The Nuggets would go on to outscore Miami by 17 in the period , essentially sealing the victory with 12 minutes to play .

The Blazers shot a horrendous 6 - of - 22 from three - point range , but made up for it with their interior shooting , as the team finished having it over 49 percent of its shots .
Center Mason_Plumlee had an efficient 18 points on 6 - of - 9 shooting .

Star center Karl-Anthony_Towns struggled to find his shot , going just 3 - of - 15 from the floor .
The Philadelphia_76ers ( 0 - 17 ) came very close to humiliating the Houston_Rockets ( 6 - 10 ) in Houston Friday night but fell short by 2 as Houston came out on top 116 - 114 .
The Rockets were up most of the way but Phili came up with a big fourth quarter and actually had the lead 104 - 97 with 6:41 left .
Philadelphia 's Robert_Covington had his best game of the season so far as he finished with a career high 28 points on 7 - 12 shooting , including 6 - 9 from deep , 7 rebounds , 5 assists , along with a whopping 8 steals .
Isaiah_Canaan also had a great game with 23 points on 9 - 17 shooting , 2 rebounds and 2 assists .
Jerami_Grant chipped in 18 points , 3 rebounds 1 assist and 1 steal .
T.J._McConnell scored 6 points on 3 - 4 shooting and filled the stat sheet with 6 assists , 5 rebounds and 2 steals , in 25 minutes off the bench .
James_Harden made sure his team did not suffer humilation on Friday night as he put up a giant 50 points on 14 - 28 shooting , 6 - 12 from deep , along with 8 assists and 9 rebounds .
Despite his great game Harden gave up an ugly 9 turnovers .
Dwight_Howard did his job in the paint , scoring a double double with 14 points and 13 rebounds , he also dished 4 assists .
Clint_Capela also tallied a double double for the Rockets , with 13 points and 10 rebounds .
The Rockets absolutely cleaned the glass , with a team total 49 rebounds .
Russell_Westbrook will live on in NBA history with his box scores across the 2016 - 2017 season , as the Thunder point guard contributed his 20th triple - double of the season , which is good for leading the league and his average for the season .
Westbrook finished with 36 points , 10 assists , 11 rebounds , 4 steals and 7 turnovers on 11 - of - 21 shooting .
DeMarcus_Cousins deserves credit for the performance he added in trying to carry the Kings to victory , as he contributed 31 points , 11 rebounds , 7 assists , 3 steals and 1 block across 34 minutes .
Rudy_Gay attempted to bring the Kings back to life late , and went on to score 22 points , while Darren_Collison added 21 points .
Enes_Kanter was a valuable difference maker , especially rotating with Steven_Adams , evidenced by his big 29 points and 12 rebounds in 32 minute off the bench .
Thomas has been the Celtics 's top scorer in both games since returning from injury , scoring a team - high 23 in Sunday 's win against the Heat .
Center Al_Horford had a well - rounded game , scoring 17 points , dishing out 8 assists , and pulling down 7 rebounds .
Guard Avery_Bradley had 20 points , and forward Jae_Crowder scored 15 while grabbing 5 steals .

The Golden_State_Warriors ( 12 - 2 ) defeated the Orlando_Magic ( 6 - 11 ) 111 - 96 on Wednesday at the Amway Center in Orlando .
The Warriors got off to a hot start , totaling 65 points in the first half alone , to open an insurmountable 13 point lead at the break .
The Warriors hit 52 percent of their field goal attempts , compared with the Magic hitting just 41 percent .
Once again , Steph Curry led the way , scoring 28 points on 9 - for - 13 shooting , including 6 - for - 8 from beyond the three - point line .
Curry also added 8 assists and 5 boards in another virtuoso performance , in just 24 minutes .
Due to the blowout nature of the game , Shaun_Livingston was able to play a season - high 27 minutes , scoring 15 points ( 7 - 10 FG , 1 - 2 FT ) with 3 rebounds and 5 assists .
Andrew_Bogut , although not scoring heavily with just 6 points , stuffed the rest of the stat sheet , adding 12 rebounds , 7 assists , 2 steals and 2 blocks in his 24 minutes .
Both Marreese_Speights ( 11 points ) and Andre_Iguodala ( 13 points ) contributed off the bench , joining Harrison_Barnes ( 16 points ) , Draymond_Green ( 10 points ) , and Klay_Thompson ( 12 points ) in reaching double figures .
Nikola_Vucevic also had a double - double , his seventh in succession , scoring 11 points ( 4 - 15 FG , 3 - 4 FT ) with 13 rebounds , including 7 on the offensive glass .
Victor_Oladipo continued to struggle to find his shot after returning from a facial fracture , going 4 - for - 17 from the field to register 12 points .
Both Ben_Gordon and Elfrid_Payton scored 13 points off the bench , with Payton also putting up 5 assists in his 20 minutes .

Offensively he has become one of the best big men in 2015 - 2016 , but his defensive flaws opened the door for Brook_Lopez to score key points down the stretch .

The Washington_Wizards defeated the visiting Phoenix_Suns , 106 - 101 , at Verizon Center on Monday .
John_Wall and Bradley_Beal combined for 60 points , 8 rebounds and 15 assists , while the Suns 's backcourt of Devin_Booker and Eric_Bledsoe combined for 59 points , 11 rebounds and 8 assists of their own .
Washington took care of business when it mattered most , as they outscored Phoenix 31 - 21 in the fourth quarter .
The biggest difference in the game were the turnovers , as the Wizards forced 21 from the Suns , while committing just 11 on their end .
The fastbreak points were decisive as well , with Washington winning that battle 25 - 6 .
Phoenix ( 4 - 11 ) put in a strong effort in this loss , but could n't hold off a hungry Wizards bunch .

Bradley_Beal dropped a career - high in the win , as he scored 42 points on 14 - of - 22 shooting .

Cleveland outshot Detroit 47 percent to 44 percent , but the Pistons scored 27 more points from the three - point line and 11 more from the free throw line , too much for Cleveland to overcome in the end .

The Los_Angeles_Clippers ( 27 - 14 ) defeated the Houston_Rockets ( 22 - 21 ) 140 - 132 in overtime at Staples Center on Monday .
The Rockets clawed their way back from a 20 - point deficit to begin the fourth quarter by ripping off a 24 - 10 run to end the game , peaking when Marcus_Thornton dropped in a game - tying three - pointer with 7 seconds remaining in regulation .
While Houston took advantage of what was a far too relaxed Clippers squad late in the second half , Thornton 's bench performance was a major spark plug , as he added 23 points on 5 - of - 9 shooting from behind the arc in 22 minutes .
Dwight_Howard led all Rockets scorers with 36 points , grabbed an absurd 26 rebounds and out muscled DeAndre_Jordan ( illness ) , who was overcoming pneumonia in his first game back .
James_Harden played more to the point guard position than his standard score first mentality , and finished with 20 points and 8 assists on only 12 shots in 40 minutes of action .
The Rockets will get a day off before hosting the Detroit_Pistons ( 22 - 19 ) on Wednesday .
The Clippers set a franchise record with 22 3 - point shots made , spearheaded by JJ Reddick , who set career highs of 40 points and 9 treys .
Without Reddick 's clutch free throws down the stretch , Thornton 's game tying 3 - pointer towards the end of regulation may have been enough to complete the comeback .
DeAndre_Jordan 's return came with a double - double to the tune of 16 points and 15 rebounds , although he did not seem strong enough to prevent Dwight_Howard from almost doubling his own stats .
Chris_Paul failed to convert the game winning shot as time expired in the 4th quarter , but knocked down clutch baskets in overtime , and contributed 28 points and 12 assists in the win . The Clippers will visit LeBron_James and the Cleveland_Cavaliers ( 28 - 12 ) on Thursday .
Frazier finished with 21 points , 14 assists and 5 rebounds in 35 minutes .
Tuesday night was the fifth time this season that Frazier has recorded at least 15 points , 8 assists and 5 rebounds and his fifth double - double of the season .

The Magic got out to a great start , with a 33 - 25 first quarter , and managed to hold the lead going into half time .
They then out - scored the Heat by 5 in the third quarter , behind 12 points in the quarter from Nikola_Vucevic , and were able to hang on to close it out at home .
With this win the Magic take the season series 3 - 1 .
The Magic ( 23 - 39 ) are now 2 - 2 in their 4 games since trading Serge_Ibaka and running with Terrence_Ross as their starting small forward .

This marks the second loss in the 3 games for the Heat , as they teeter on the edge of the top 8 in the East .

Miami actually led by 8 points with 6 minutes left , but they allowed New_Orleans to finish the game on a 24 - 10 run to win by 4 .
Both offenses really struggled , as the Heat shot 41 percent from the field to the Pelicans 37 percent .
Despite the Heat winning the shooting , assisting and rebounding differentials , the Pelicans were able to prevail thanks to 8 steals and 9 blocks recorded by their defense .
Miami ( 10 - 21 ) has lost 19 games this season by 12 points or less and this tough defeat adds to that total .
Goran_Dragic led the team in scoring , as he tallied 23 points , 4 rebounds and 5 assists .
Hassan_Whiteside struggled with his shot , as he totaled 10 points and 18 rebounds on 4 - of - 10 shooting from the field and 2 - of - 6 from the free - throw line .
Justise_Winslow was second on the team , as he accrued 12 points , 7 rebounds and 3 assists .
Tyler_Johnson and James_Johnson each scored 11 points a piece off the bench .
New_Orleans ( 11 - 21 ) has riden the back the back of Anthony_Davis all season long and they did that yet again here .
Davis finished the game with 28 points , 22 rebounds and 4 blocks on 10 - of - 17 shooting .
Jrue_Holiday was second on the team , as he accrued 22 points , 2 rebounds and 6 assists in 26 minutes of action .
The only other Pelicans player in double figures was Langston_Galloway , who scored 11 points off the bench .
The Detroit_Pistons ( 19 - 30 ) picked up the win over the Miami_Heat ( 21 - 27 ) 108 - 91 on Tuesday at the Palace of Auburn Hills .
D.J Augustin 's resurgence continued Tuesday as he lit Miami up for 25 points and 13 assists to help the Pistons to their 19th win on the season .
Detroit built a comfortable lead in the early going and withstood a 21 - point outburst from Chris_Bosh in the third quarter to secure its second straight win .
Miami is one of the East 's better road teams and was 13 - 11 away from home entering Tuesday 's tilt , but was unable to notch a win against a rested Detroit club .
Chris_Bosh erupted for 34 points , with 21 of them coming in a 9 - for - 9 shooting performance in the third quarter .
Hassan_Whiteside had 11 points and 10 rebounds to notch his fourth double - double in 5 games .
Detroit 's win puts the Pistons 2 3 games out of the final playoff spot in the Eastern Conference .

Lucas had 3 points , 1 rebound , and 1 assist in 6 minutes of action .

The Miami_Heat ( 32 - 17 ) came back in the second half to beat the Denver_Nuggets ( 15 - 25 ) 98 - 95 on Friday .
The Nuggets got out to a great start on Friday by recording 2 31 - point quarters in the first half to take a 16 - point lead , but collapsed in the second half .
The Heat outscored the Nuggets 52 - 33 in the second half in an impressive comeback win .
The key for Miami was their stellar defense , as they held Denver to 41 percent shooting while recording 13 blocks .
Chris_Bosh was efficient in this game as well , as he scored 24 points on just 13 shot attempts .
The darkhorse hero was Beno_Udrih though , as he collected 11 points and 11 assists while filing in for Dragic in the victory .
Denver was coming off 2 of their biggest wins of the season and really should have had their third - straight here .
The offense fell apart in the second half and all the momentum was in Miami 's favor for the final 15 minutes of this game .
Danilo_Gallinari and Will_Barton have been carrying this team all year long , but they combined for just 20 points and 12 rebounds while going 4 - for - 18 from the field .
Darrell_Arthur got a rare start in the absence of Jusuf_Nurkic and had the best game for Denver , as he finished with 18 points and 8 rebounds in the loss .
Rookie Emmanuel_Mudiay also had a nice game off the bench , as he scored 16 points .
The Nuggets will continue their 8 - game homestand on Sunday when they host the Indiana_Pacers in their next fixture .
The Toronto_Raptors ( 28 - 15 ) held onto second place in the turbulent Eastern Conference with a 101 - 81 home win over the Miami_Heat ( 23 - 21 ) on Friday .

The Raptors were red - hot from behind the three - point arc , shooting 52 percent on attempts from deep .
Miami , meanwhile , hit just 4 of 17 attempts from beyond the arc .
Wade recorded 22 points while fellow star Chris_Bosh posted 26 , but no other Miami player reached double - digits .
The Heat bench contributed just 12 points , and outside of Wade and Bosh , the team shot a paltry 33 percent from the field .
Miami will have 2 days of rest before traveling to Chicago on Monday .

This game started off tight , with the Thunder leading by 1 after the first quarter , however the Cavs blew the game wide open as they outscored the Thunder 68 - 45 in the second and third quarters .
Cleveland then cruised to victory after entering the final quarter already up by 22 .
This was an impressive victory for the Cavs as they were against Oklahoma_City 's strong home record , which is now 25 - 7 .
The season series is now 20 for Cleveland , despite being without Irving both times .
Of those players active for Cleveland , 6 scored in double digits and 3 logged double - doubles .

The Toronto_Raptors defeated the Cleveland_Cavaliers , 99 - 84 , on Saturday at Air Canada Centre , whittling the Cavs 's lead in the Eastern Conference Finals to 2 - 1 .
Toronto 's first home Conference Finals game in franchise history was a big 1 , as the the team was able to hand the red - hot Cavaliers their first loss of this postseason .
Leading the charge was center Bismack_Biyombo , who crashed the boards relentlessly , pulling down 26 rebounds on the night .
Biyombo also tallied 4 big blocks on the defensive end .
Biyombo 's rebounding effort helped contribute to a 54 - 40 rebounding advantage for the Raptors , while Biyombo was also able to hold the Cavs 's big man duo of Tristan_Thompson and Kevin_Love to a combined 3 points on the night .
Offensively , DeMar_DeRozan led the way for the Raptors , scoring 32 points on the night .
All-Star Kyle_Lowry also tallied 20 points .

A major part of the teams offensive struggles stemmed from All-Stars Kyrie_Irving and Kevin_Love , who combined for just 16 points on 4 - for - 28 shooting from the field .
Love also struggled in the low post , recording just 4 rebounds on the night .
LeBron 's 24 could only do so much for the struggling Cavs , however , as the team finished just 28 - for - 79 from the field on the night .

He currently sits at second in the league in scoring behind reigning MVP Steph Curry , and Tuesday 's performance served to close the narrowing gap between the 2 .

The Philadelphia_76ers defeated the Milwaukee_Bucks 114 - 109 Wednesday at BMO Harris Bradley Center .
One night after the Bucks ( 21 - 24 ) get a much - needed win at home against the Rockets , the 76ers ( 17 - 27 ) come to town and play spoiler .
On the second night of a back - to - back set without both Joel_Embiid and Jahlil_Okafor , Philadelphia managed to find a way to pull away late and end Milwaukee 's win streak at 1 game .
Meanwhile , the 76ers themselves extended their win streak to 2 games and have now won 5 of their last 6 games .
Wednesday 's win came on the shoulders off an excellent performance from Gerald_Henderson off the bench , as the shooting guard scored a team - high 20 points on 7 - of - 11 shooting from the field .
Additionally , Nerlens_Noel , who was filling the shoes of both Embiid and Okafor , came up with a double - double of 16 points and 13 rebounds in just 28 minutes .
As a team , it was a very strong shooting night for Philadelphia , as they shot 53 percent from the field overall and 46 percent from behind the arc .
For the Bucks , they continue to struggle , as they have now lost 6 of their last 7 games - - 2 of which have now come at home to the 76ers .
This was despite a terrific performance off the bench from Greg_Monroe , who posted 28 points and 9 rebounds in 30 minutes off the bench .
Jabari_Parker added 20 points of his own , while Giannis_Antetokounmpo had a solid overall game of 17 points , 12 rebounds , 5 assists and 4 steals , but ultimately it was n't enough , as the other 3 Milwaukee starters managed to score just 22 combined points .
On top of it all , the Bucks ending the game on 2 consecutive turnovers was indicative of the night they had taking care of the ball , as they finished the game with a total of 19 .
For the Rockets top 2 scorers , MVP-candidate James_Harden and Sixth Man of the Year-candidate Eric_Gordon , it was an uncharacteristically bad shooting night .
The shooting performances from the backcourt were contagious in the end , as the Rockets finished the game making just 6 of their 38 attempts from long range .
His line of 18 points , 10 rebounds , 1 assist and 1 steal paced the team , with only reserves Austin_Rivers and Jamal_Crawford joining him with double digits in the scoring column .
Chris_Paul 's 9 assists and 4 steals were pivotal non - scoring contributions , as well , helping the Clippers to prevail despite 41 and 22 percent success rates from the field and three - point range , respectively .
With George_Hill and Dante_Exum the only 2 players to tally double - digit scoring , the Jazz struggled offensively throughout the afternoon .
Rodney_Hood and Joe_Johnson , dependable sources of scoring in the early going , mustered a combined 12 points on just 5 - for - 19 shooting .

The Golden_State_Warriors defeated the San_Antonio_Spurs 110 - 98 Wednesday at AT & T Center .
In fact , it was an awful 1 , as the Warriors ( 61 - 14 ) found themselves down 23 - 3 to the Spurs ( 57 - 17 ) before they could blink .
That sort of beat down carried on throughout the remainder of the first quarter , as the Spurs held a 33 - 17 advantage after the first 12 minutes , and the game seemed all but over .
Golden_State had other plans , however , and they elected to dominate the ball game over the final 36 minutes .
In the end , they outscored the home team by 28 points over the next 3 quarters , which ended in a seemingly effortless victory from Golden_State .

The Brooklyn_Nets defeated the Sacramento_Kings 109 - 100 Wednesday at Golden 1 Center .
After 16 straight losses and losing 27 of their last 28 games , the Nets ( 10 - 49 ) finally were on the winning side Wednesday night , and they did so in fairly convincing fashion .
Brooklyn opened up the game with a 14 - 4 lead and never looked back , as they managed to hold onto the lead for all 48 minutes against Sacramento .
Brook_Lopez led the way offensively for the Nets , scoring a game - high 24 points on 9 - of - 17 shooting from the field and grabbing 8 rebounds in 30 minutes .
Jeremy_Lin added an efficient 17 points in 20 minutes , while his backup , Isaiah_Whitehead , came off the bench to shoot 7 - of - 7 shooting from the free throw line en route to scoring 14 points in just 18 minutes .
As a team , Brooklyn managed to get to the line at their own will and convert , hitting 30 - of - 36 foul shots Wednesday .
As for the Kings ( 25 - 35 ) , Wednesday 's loss marked their third straight and brought their record to 1 - 3 in the post - DeMarcus_Cousins era of the franchise .
It was the performance from their bench players that kept Sacramento in the game , with the team 's 3 top scorers all being reserves .
Sacramento as a team overall was actually had a solid shooting performance from the outside , hitting 11 of their 22 three - pointers , but in the end , it was n't enough .

Cleveland , which has now dropped 4 straight games , continues to struggle offensively and looked completely out of sorts yet again Saturday .
A 13 - point first quarter lead quickly evaporated in the second period , and the Raptors took a 2 - point lead by halftime .
Kevin_Love paced the Cavaliers with 23 points and 7 rebounds , while LeBron_James added 15 points ( 6 - 12 FG ) and 10 assists to go with a game - high 5 turnovers .
Kyrie_Irving finished with 21 points , and Anderson_Varejao had a 13 - point , 12 - rebound double - double .
Cleveland committed 18 turnovers and shot 3 - of - 16 as a team from beyond the arc .
The host Golden_State_Warriors took down the visiting Oklahoma_City_Thunder on Wednesday , 121 - 100 .
The Warriors ( 36 - 6 ) have now won 5 straight and 9 of their last 10 .
Durant 's play indicated a special level of effort , as the former MVP scored 40 points and shot 13 - of - 16 while pulling down 12 rebounds .
Reigning MVP Steph Curry also impressed , scoring 24 points to go with 8 assists and 3 steals .
The Thunder ( 25 - 19 ) saw strong play from a handful of players but could not get the job done as a team .
Westbrook scored 27 points to go with 15 rebounds and 13 assists .
Sixth man Enes_Kanter delivered 22 points and 9 rebounds off the bench .
The team had issues keeping up with the Warriors 's star power on defense and had a problem crashing the glass , finishing with a 10 rebound deficit .
The Memphis_Grizzlies ( 7 - 6 ) defeated the Houston_Rockets ( 5 - 8 ) 96 - 84 thanks to a Gasol triple - double on Friday .
In a battle of 2 struggling Western Conference teams , the Grizzlies prevailed thanks to a triple - double from Marc_Gasol .
This was the good old Memphis defense of the past , as they held the Rockets to under 38 percent shooting and won the turnover battle 23 - 11 .
The Grizzlies also outassisted the Rockets 26 - 15 in what ended up being a lopsided game .
The team was led by James_Harden , who tallied 22 points , 6 rebounds and 5 assists in the loss .
Dwight_Howard had another solid game as well , as he totaled 12 points and 15 boards in the defeat .
Memphis were led by a career - performance from Marc_Gasol , who tallied 16 points , 11 rebounds , 11 assists and 4 steals in a spectacular game .
Mike_Conley was also very good , as he collected 26 points , 5 assists , 3 rebounds and 3 steals in the win .
The All-Star led the team in scoring , rebounding , and assists , posting a line of 24 points , 13 rebounds , and 6 assists in the team 's win over the Pistons .
Cousins added 1 steal and 1 block .
As a team , Sacramento shot impeccably from beyond the arc , going 13 - of - 24 from deep .
Seven of those turnovers came from forward Rudy_Gay , who also shot just 3 - of - 11 on the night .
While Andre_Drummond scored only 9 points , he made a big impact on the defensive end , blocking 7 shots and coming away with 3 steals .
Drummond also pulled down a team - high 12 rebounds .
The Pistons had trouble moving the ball on Tuesday , recording just 14 team assists .
The Spurs ( 41 - 24 ) trounced the Timberwolves ( 14 - 51 ) 123 - 97 in San_Antonio on Sunday .
Coming off a 125 - point performance against Cleveland on Thursday , San_Antonio posted its second - highest point total of the season against the Timberwolves .
San_Antonio had 8 players score in double digits .
Kawhi_Leonard led the team in scoring with 15 points ( 6 - 13 FG , 2 - 2 3Pt ) , to go along with 6 rebounds , 1 assist , 5 steals and 1 block in 25 minutes .
Manu_Ginobili left the game with what appeared to be a right ankle injury in the third quarter , but still finished with 11 points ( 4 - 5 FG , 3 - 4 FT ) and 3 rebounds over 18 minutes .
Facing a litany of injuries , the Timberwolves were short - handed on Sunday with only 8 healthy players .
Minnesota had trouble holding onto the basketball , turning the ball over 15 times .
Those turnovers translated into 33 points for the Spurs .
Kevin_Martin led the team in scoring with 19 points ( 7 - 18 FG , 2 - 3 3Pt ) , to go with 5 rebounds , 2 assists and 1 steal .
San_Antonio is currently fifth in the Western Conference , 11 games behind the West-leading Warriors .
Cousins finished with 28 points , 14 rebounds , 7 assists , 2 steals and 1 block on 7 - of - 14 shooting .
Darren_Collison also put forth a supreme box score contest with 20 points , 8 assists , 6 rebounds and 3 steals on 7 - of - 16 shooting .
Aaron Afflalo and Ben_McLemore started in the backcourt alongside Collison and and combined for 21 points on 14 shots .
The Pelicans saw their best effort from Anthony_Davis , who registered 40 minutes of action and scored 32 points to go with 10 rebounds and 3 assists .
New_Orleans struggled from the field as a unit , but was effective behind the arc , as they finished 13 - of - 31 from deep .
The Kings were more dominant on the rebounding , evidenced by the 46 - 36 effort on the glass .
The visiting Milwaukee_Bucks took down the Los_Angeles_Clippers on Wednesday , 97 - 96 .
Milwaukee ( 33 - 34 ) has come alive of late and has now won 8 of its last 10 games .
Six Bucks scored in double digits , but no single player scored more than 16 points in the game .
The high man was wing Khris_Middleton , who had 16 points to go along with 7 rebounds .
Los_Angeles ( 40 - 28 ) has hit a bit of a rough patch in its season .
The Clippers are now just 5 - 6 in their last 11 games .

Star forward Blake_Griffin , meanwhile , had 18 points to go with 7 rebounds and 4 assists .
Paul , however , struggled mightily , committing 6 turnovers and scoring only 6 points .
The San_Antonio_Spurs ( 20 - 5 ) defeated the Atlanta_Hawks ( 14 - 11 ) by the convincing score of 103 - 78 , Saturday in Atlanta .
The Spurs came out in domination mode , amassing a 47 - 25 lead by half - time .
The Spurs shot a steaming 50 percent from deep , while the Hawks only managed 20 percent .

LaMarcus_Aldridge tallied 13 points , 6 rebounds and 1 assist in 27 minutes .

Efficiency was key , as the Jazz recorded 25 assists , while shooting 51 percent from the field .

The Milwaukee_Bucks ( 27 - 38 ) defeated the visiting Miami_Heat ( 37 - 27 ) 114 - 108 , Wednesday evening at BMO Harris Bradley Center .
The Bucks improved to 19 - 12 at home as they protected their court against the Miami_Heat .
The Heat came in winners of their last 5 games and seated fourth place in the East , 2 games ahead of Atlanta , but could not improve on their season - high win streak .
Milwaukee got out to a quick 70 start and held the lead until Miami fought back late in the third to gain its first lead .
The Heat led by 5 to start the final quarter but the Bucks did not give in and reclaimed the lead with 7 minutes to go .
Finally , Khris_Middleton hit a floater to put the Bucks up by 5 with 27 seconds left , before the teams exchanged free throws to close it out .
Milwaukee saw another great game from its budding stars , as Giannis_Antetokounmpo , Jabari_Parker and Khris_Middleton all dropped more than 20 points .
Khris_Middleton filled up the stat sheet with 22 points ( 8 - 15 FG , 1 - 3 3Pt , 5 - 5 FT ) , 8 assists , 7 rebounds and 1 steal , in 40 minutes .
In total the Bucks shot a very strong 52 percent from the field and tallied 27 assists as a team .
Miami fell just short of winning a season - high sixth straight game , as they dropped the first game of a 3 - game road trip .
Dwyane_Wade contributed 18 points , 6 assists , 3 rebounds and 2 steals , but turned the ball over 6 times in his 34 minutes on the floor .
Hassan_Whiteside was big in 29 minutes off the bench with 23 points ( 9 - 13 FG , 5 - 5 FT ) , 13 rebounds and 3 blocked shots .
Miami also shot 52 percent from the field but gave up a few too many turnovers , with 17 .
The New_Orleans_Pelicans ( 26 - 43 ) defeated the Los_Angeles_Clippers ( 43 - 26 ) 109 - 105 on Sunday .
The Pelicans led 102 - 88 with 2 minutes left and barely held on for a much needed win .
The key for New_Orleans was the rebounding , as they brought down 54 boards to the Clippers 35 .
That marks the 10tth - straight game that the Clippers have been outrebounded , with 9 of those being by at least 12 boards .
The Pelicans shot 49 percent from the field , while holding Los_Angeles to just 40 percent in their victory .
Chris_Paul had yet another superb outing though , as he tallied 24 points , 13 assists , 6 rebounds and 4 assists .
J.J. Redick scored 24 of his own on 9 - for - 11 shooting .

The Sacramento_Kings ( 8 - 15 ) defeated the Utah_Jazz ( 9 - 10 ) 114 - 106 on Tuesday night .
The Kings were at full force tonight , as they shot an amazing 56 percent from the field in their victory .
The Jazz continue to play poor defense without Rudy_Gobert and that can be exemplified by the fact that they failed to record 1 block in this game .
They are now allowing nearly 115 points a game without Gobert in the lineup and they simply can n't score enough to win those types of games .
Utah actually got off 15 more shots than the Kings , but were outshot by 15 percent .
Utah 's best player on this night was Gordon_Hayward yet again , as he tallied 18 points , 8 rebounds and 6 assists in the defeat .
The bench also played well , as Trevor_Booker , Trey_Burke and Alec_Burks combined for 42 points .
This win ended a 3 - game skid for the Kings and it came with a great team performance .
Rudy_Gay and DeMarcus_Cousins both led the team with 23 points and Omri_Casspi and Rajon_Rondo pitched in with some nice double - doubles .
This is the George Karl offense at its finest , as the starters combined for 26 assists and made great passes 1 after another .
McCollum and Damian_Lillard scored 31 and 36 respectively , with Lillard also dishing out a team - high 7 assists .
McCollum grabbed 4 steals on defense , and the pair combined for 7 of Portland 's 13 three - pointers as a team .
The duo shot well over 50 percent , with Lillard hitting 12 - of - 19 shots from the filed , and McCollum hitting 13 - of - 24 .
Cousins led the team with 33 points , while also pulling down 9 rebounds and blocking 2 shots .
Gay , meanwhile , scored 29 and helped establish Sacramento 's dominance on the boards , pulling down 14 rebounds on the night .
The Houston_Rockets ( 41 - 41 ) defeated the Sacramento_Kings ( 34 - 48 ) 116 - 81 on Wednesday .
The outcome was seemingly never in question , as Houston jumped out to a 34 - 18 lead after 1 quarter .
The veteran trio of James_Harden , Patrick_Beverley and Dwight_Howard stepped up when it mattered most , tallying 61 of the Rockets 's 116 points on the night .
The victory allowed Houston to finish the season with 3 straight wins , even their record at .500 and most important , grab the eighth seed in the conference .
Sacramento played without the resting DeMarcus_Cousins , Rudy_Gay and Rajon_Rondo , so it was Ben_McLemore who led the way with 24 points , 5 rebounds , 3 assists and 2 steals .
James_Anderson was next with 13 points , 5 assists , 4 rebounds and 3 steals .
Kosta_Koufos turned in his second consecutive double - double , tallying 12 points , 11 rebounds , 1 assist , 2 blocks and 1 steal .
Seth_Curry pitched in with 10 points , 6 rebounds and 5 assists .
Quincy_Acy paced the reserves with 10 points , 8 rebounds , 2 assists , 2 steals and 1 block .
The Kings finish with a 33 - 49 record and third in the Western Conference 's Pacific Division .
The Rockets were spearheaded by Harden , who supplied 38 points , 4 rebounds and 4 assists .
Howard was a distant second with 14 points , 10 rebounds and 1 block in just 25 minutes .
Beverley stuffed the stat sheet with 9 points , 12 assists , 4 rebounds and an outstanding 6 steals .
McDaniels and Michael_Beasley were both productive off the bench , with respective point totals of 11 and 10 points .
McDaniels supplemented his scoring with 4 rebounds , while Beasley pitched in with 5 rebounds , 2 assists , 1 steal and 1 block .
Houston finishes with a 41 - 41 record and in fourth place in the Western Conference 's Southwest Division .

The Golden_State_Warriors ( 70 - 9 ) defeated the San_Antonio_Spurs ( 65 - 13 ) 112 - 101 on Thursday .
The Warriors came in to Thursday 's game out for redemption , having not only lost 2 of the last 3 games , but incredibly , having endured both defeats at home .
However , Golden_State looked prepared from early on , and won each of the first 3 periods to help set up the eventual double - digit victory .
They also regained their shooting stroke against a stalwart Spurs defense , managing a 54 percent success rate from the field , and 48 percent figure from three - point range .
San_Antonio was led by Kawhi_Leonard , who managed 23 points , 3 rebounds , 2 assists and 1 steal .

The Washington_Wizards defeated the Toronto_Raptors , 105 - 96 , at Air Canada Centre on Wednesday evening .
The Raptors ( 36 - 25 ) have put up valiant efforts thus far in the absence of All-Star point guard Kyle_Lowry , with DeMar_DeRozan particularly taking on an elevated role .
Such was the case Wednesday , as the Wizards ( 36 - 23 ) leveraged superb efforts from trade - deadline acquisition Bojan_Bogdanovic and trusted shooting guard Bradley_Beal to pull out the tough road win .
The pair combined for nearly half of Washington 's point total , and the visitors made a game - changing statement in the second quarter by outscoring their hosts by a whopping 26 - 1 in the first 5:54 of the period .
On the defensive end , the Wizards stymied Toronto to the tune of sub - 40 percent success rates from both the field and three - point range overall .
Bogdanovic paced the Wizards overall with 27 points , his best scoring haul since donning his new team 's uniform .
Beal followed with 23 points , 3 assists , 1 rebound , 2 steals and 1 block .
Markieff_Morris was next with a productive stat line of 13 points , 8 rebounds and 5 assists .
John_Wall generated a 12 - point , 13 - assist double - double that also included 4 rebounds and 1 block .
Marcin_Gortat matched Wall 's scoring total and added 8 boards and 1 assist .
Otto_Porter , Jr. surprisingly went scoreless over 19 minutes , contributing only 3 rebounds and 1 steal .
As customary , DeMar_DeRozan led Toronto , totaling 24 points , 4 rebounds and 2 assists .
Serge_Ibaka , whose offensive presence has been especially valued in the wake of Lowry 's injury , provided 22 points , 12 rebounds , 2 blocks and 1 steal .
Norman_Powell was next with a bench - leading 17 points , which he supplemented 2 boards and 2 assists .
Cory_Joseph provided 11 points , 4 rebounds , 1 assist and 1 steal .
Jonas_Valanciunas mustered a modest 7 points but did haul in 11 boards and dish out 1 assist .
The host Los_Angeles_Clippers demolished the Brooklyn_Nets , 127 - 95 , at Staples Center on Monday night .
The Clippers ( 10 - 1 ) became the first team to reach 10 wins on the season with Monday 's victory , and have made quick work of most teams on their run .
The Clippers held their opponents to 44 percent shooting and forced 21 turnovers on the night .
Big man Mo Speights provided an extra defensive boost for LA , recording 2 steals and 3 blocks off the bench .
Defense was n't the only story , however , as the Clippers were able to score a ridiculous 127 points on 53 percent shooting .
Point guard Chris_Paul led the offense with 21 points and 9 assists , while All-Star power forward Blake_Griffin trailed not far behind with 20 points and 6 assists .
Los_Angeles was able to score seemingly at will from beyond the three - point line , as the team shot 56 percent from three - point range .
Brooklyn ( 4 - 6 ) , meanwhile , was bitten with the injury bug prior to the contest .
1 overall pick turned D-League call - up , Anthony_Bennett was forced to play 26 minutes , shooting just 2 - of - 8 during that stretch .
The game was put out of reach for Brooklyn almost immediately , as Los_Angeles took a 39 - 14 lead in the first quarter .
The visiting Minnesota_Timberwolves took down the Phoenix_Suns in dramatic fashion on Tuesday , 112 - 111 .
The end result was a thriller , as Minnesota ( 17 - 28 ) managed to come away with the win following a contested buzzer - beater from small forward Andrew_Wiggins .
Wiggins finished the night as the game 's leading scorer with 31 points and came up clutch on the defensive end with 2 steals .
Reigning Rookie of the Year and star Karl-Anthony_Towns also played a big part in the Wolves 's win , as he came away with 18 points and 10 rebounds on the night .
While Minnesota made plenty of mistakes , including sending Phoenix to the free - throw line 32 times , the Wolves were ultimately able to capitalize on their 52 percent shooting from the field to earn the victory .
Phoenix ( 15 - 30 ) , meanwhile , sits near the bottom of the league but had won 2 straight before hosting Minny on Tuesday .
Booker scored 26 against the Timberwolves to lead the team and extend his 20 - point game streak to 10 .
The Atlanta_Hawks ( 29 - 22 ) defeated the Philadelphia_76ers ( 7 - 42 ) 124 - 86 on Wednesday .
The Hawks already had a double - digit lead after 1 quarter , and gradually pulled away from an overmatched Sixers squad that was coming off 3 full days of rest following a near upset of the reigning NBA champion Warriors last Saturday .
Atlanta shot 52 percent from the field and 50 percent from beyond the arc , and with a comfortable lead throughout the second half , was able to give their bench players extended playing time .
Five members of the second unit tallied double - digit scoring , and the Hawks enjoyed a lead as large as 43 points at 1 point in the fourth quarter .
Atlanta was led by a pair of 13 - point efforts from Tim Hardaway , Jr. and Mike_Scott .
Hardway added 7 rebounds , 4 assists and 1 steal , while Scott contributed a near double - double , hauling in 9 boards , dishing out 1 assist and recording 1 steal .
Three additional reserves - - Dennis_Schroder , Thabo_Sefolosha and Mike_Muscala - - pitched in with 12 points apiece .
Among the starters , Kent_Bazemore led the way with his own 12 - point tally , which he complemented with 3 rebounds , 2 assists , 1 steal and 1 block .
Paul_Millsap and Jeff_Teague followed with matching 10 - point performances , with the former also registering 4 rebounds , 3 assists , 1 steal and 2 blocks , and the latter amassing 3 rebounds , 3 assists and 3 steals .
The Sixers predictably had little to celebrate on the stat sheet , with a 17 - point outing by Nik_Stauskas leading the way .
The frontcourt duo of Jahlil_Okafor and Nerlens_Noel were next in line with 10 points apiece , along with 5 and 7 rebounds , respectively .
Okafor also had 3 assists , 1 steal and 1 block , but turned the ball over 5 times as well .
Noel dished out 5 assists of his own , along with 2 steals and 1 block .
Isaiah_Canaan paced the reserves with 11 points , 2 rebounds and 1 assist .
The Cleveland_Cavaliers defeated the Toronto_Raptors , 116 - 112 , at Air Canada Centre on Monday .
However , as has been the case during their time together , Cleveland 's Big Three of Kyrie_Irving , LeBron_James and Kevin_Love stepped up their collective game , combining for 86 of Cleveland 's 116 points .
Fittingly , it was James , the elder statesmen of the group , who led the way , tallying 34 points , 8 rebounds and 7 assists .
Love was equally spectacular to James in many respects , posting a 28 - point , 14 - rebound double - double .
Irving totaled 24 points , 7 assists and 2 rebounds .
Tristan_Thompson contributed a modest 6 points , but did also bring down 14 rebounds and also recorded 1 assist and posted a pair of blocks .
Channing_Frye led the bench with 10 points , 5 rebounds and 2 assists .
The Raptors ( 14 - 7 ) saw their dynamic duo of Kyle_Lowry and DeMar_DeRozan step up with their own impressive performances , with the latter 's 31 points , which were supplemented with 5 assists , 4 rebounds and 3 steals , pacing the offense .
Lowry managed a near double - double with 24 points , 9 assists , 3 rebounds and 1 steal .
Jonas_Valanciunas continued to battle a sore ankle to total 4 points and 10 rebounds .
DeMarre_Carroll and Pascal_Siakam were only able to combine for 14 points , but Terrence_Ross ( 14 points , 1 rebound , 1 assist and 4 blocks ) and Patrick_Patterson ( 12 points , 9 boards ) helped make up for the scoring void off the bench .
The Mavericks ( 7 - 4 ) held on to defeat the 76ers ( 0 - 11 ) 92 - 86 at Wells Fargo Center on Monday .
Dirk_Nowitzki scored 12 of his 21 points in the fourth quarter , hitting a handful of clutch free throws along with Deron_Williams to ice the game .
Philadelphia had the advantage on the glass , outrebounding the Mavericks 46 - 39 , but too many turnovers led to the 76ers demise .
The Mavericks struggled from the field , shooting a lowly 40 percent , with Nowitzki , Williams and Wesley_Matthews all having off nights shooting the basketball .
The Los_Angeles_Clippers ( 35 - 17 ) defeated the Philadelphia_76ers ( 8 - 44 ) in overtime for a 98 - 92 win on Monday .
The Sixers carried a double - digit lead into the half , but just could n't hold off the Clippers for the full 48 minutes .
The overtime got off to an ugly start as well , with Los_Angeles scoring the first 8 points .
The turnovers were the difference , as Philadelphia committed 20 turnovers to the Clippers 12 .

Karl-Anthony_Towns played well too , as he accumulated 25 points and 10 rebounds on 12 - of - 18 shooting .

In fact , that 's the seventh game this season that Covington has shot below 22 percent from the field , while taking at least 6 shots .
Joel_Embiid did finish with a 10 - point , 10 - rebound double - double , but most of that production came in meaningless minutes .
The Milwaukee_Bucks ( 26 - 22 ) defeated the Toronto_Raptors ( 33 - 16 ) 82 - 75 on Monday at the Air Canada Centre in Toronto .
Coming out of the third quarter , the Bucks had built a 73 - 60 lead and looked to be on the verge of coasting to an easy win .
The Raptors made a run in the fourth quarter though , out - scoring the Bucks 15 - 9 , but their comeback came up just short , as the Bucks secured the 7 - point victory and ended the Raptors win streak at 6 .
The Bucks were the superior shooters in this matchup , going 41 percent from the field and 44 percent from the three - point line , while the Raptors went just 32 percent from the floor and a meager 26 percent from beyond the arc .
Giannis_Antetokounmpo added a double - double , finishing with 12 points ( 4 - 9 FG , 0 - 1 3Pt , 4 - 8 FT ) and 12 rebounds .
Also reaching double figures in points was Jared_Dudley , who scored 14 points ( 5 - 12 FG , 3 - 7 3Pt , 1 - 4 FT ) and handed out 5 assists .
John_Henson also pitched in with 12 points ( 5 - 8 FG , 2 - 2 FT ) and 4 rebounds .
In limited playing time , DeMar_DeRozan did everything he could to keep the Raptors alive in this game , finishing with 16 points ( 5 - 16 FG , 0 - 2 3Pt , 6 - 8 FT ) and 2 assists in only 25 minutes .
Recording a double - double , Jonas_Valanciunas recorded 12 points ( 6 - 9 FG ) and 13 rebounds in 25 minutes .
He was dealing with an ankle injury during Saturday 's win over the Wizards and played only 17 minutes in that game , so it was good to see get some extended time on the court .
Williams had 12 points ( 1 - 12 FG , 1 - 7 3Pt , 9 - 10 FT ) and 1 rebound , while Ross finished with 10 points ( 4 - 12 FG , 2 - 5 3Pt ) and 4 rebounds .
The San_Antonio_Spurs defeated the host Memphis_Grizzlies , 96 - 87 , to take a 30 lead Friday in the Western Conference first - round playoffs at FedEx Forum .
The short - handed Grizzlies simply did n't have enough offense to overcome an already - dominant Spurs defense , and now face the seemingly impossible task of trying to steal Game 4 on Sunday to salvage their season .
Friday , the Spurs were able to hold the Grizzlies to a paltry 22 percent success rate from three - point range , while also causing 14 turnovers .
Kawhi_Leonard led the way for San_Antonio with a game - high 32 points , which he complemented with 7 rebounds , 2 assists , 5 blocks and 4 steals .
LaMarcus_Aldridge supported him with a 16 - point , 10 - rebound double - double that also included 1 assist and 1 block .
Danny_Green stepped up with 11 points , 4 rebounds , 3 blocks and 1 steal .
Manu Ginobli paced the reserves with 11 points , 5 assists , 3 rebounds and 1 steal .
Zach_Randolph spearheaded Memphis 's attack with 20 points , 11 rebounds and 1 assist .
Matt_Barnes was next with 17 points , 11 boards , 4 assists and 2 steals .
Vince_Carter drew the start and tallied 11 points and 8 rebounds .
JaMychal_Green led the second unit with 10 points , 4 rebounds , 2 assists and 2 blocks .
A Spurs victory will give them a first - round sweep , while a Grizzlies upset will send the series back to San_Antonio for Game 5 .
The Portland Trail_Blazers ( 13 - 4 ) defeated the Minnesota_Timberwolves ( 4 - 11 ) 107 - 93 on Sunday at the Moda Center in Oregon .
They were able to hold the Timberwolves to only 14 points , while also scoring 26 of their own .
The Blazers were able to take a 54 - 43 rebounding advantage , which may have also given them exactly what they needed to pull out the victory at home Monday .
Aldridge went an efficient 11 - for - 17 from the floor to score 26 points , while also grabbing 15 rebounds .
Matthews on the other hand shot 8 - for - 13 from the field and 6 - for - 10 from beyond the arc to score 23 points combined with 6 rebounds .
Nicolas_Batum was the only other Blazer to reach double - digit points with 10 .
Williams also had a big game and finished with 21 points and 11 assists .
Thaddeus_Young and Gorgui_Dieng had 14 points and 11 points respectively in the loss .
Chicago got out to a hot start by leading by 12 after the first quarter , but Detroit dominated from there .
In fact , Detroit outscored Chicago by 26 from that point and won the fourth quarter , 30 - 16 .
Rebounding was key , as the Pistons won that battle , 48 - 37 .
Detroit also dominated scoring in the paint in addition to the rebounding , as they outscored Chicago , 58 - 32 in the paint .
Jimmy_Butler led the way for Chicago , as he tallied 27 points , 9 rebounds and 4 assists .
Robin_Lopez finished with 18 points and 4 rebounds .
Cameron_Payne came off the bench to provide 14 points , 3 rebounds and 3 assists .

The San_Antonio_Spurs took care of the visiting New_Orleans_Pelicans in a 98 - 79 win at AT & T Center on Saturday .
San_Antonio ( 30 ) came into this game as a huge favorite and they did n't disappoint against a struggling New_Orleans ( 0 - 3 ) team .
The Spurs led by 10 at the half and extended that lead to 23 headed into the fourth quarter .
Defense was key for San_Antonio , as they held New_Orleans to 37 percent from the field and 17 percent from three - point range .
The Pelicans were held to just 34 points in the second half , as they had to play this game in the back end of a back - to - back set .
Anthony_Davis was averaging nearly 50 points and 15 rebounds in his first 2 games , but struggled against an elite Spurs defense .
Davis was held to 18 points and 5 rebounds on 6 - for - 15 shooting in the loss .
E'Twaun_Moore tied the team - lead with 18 points of his own .
No other player scored in double figures for the Pelicans , as the other 3 starters combined for just 10 points .
Kawhi_Leonard continued his torrid start , as he scored 22 points in just 27 minutes of play .
He actually scored 16 of those points in the third quarter , which is a career - high for a single quarter for Leonard .
Patty_Mills started for Tony_Parker and finished second on the team with 18 points and 5 assists .
The only other starter in double figures was LaMarcus_Aldridge , who totaled 12 points and 6 boards .

The Wizards shot just 32 percent in this loss and it was a downright ugly performance .

The only Washington player who showed up was Jared_Dudley , who dropped 19 points off the bench .
The Celtics were clicking on all cylinders , but their defense was the key , as they held the Wizards to 32 percent shooting .
Jared_Sullinger was especially good , as he tallied 18 points , 15 rebounds , 3 assists and 2 blocks in the win .

The Cleveland_Cavaliers ( 14 - 7 ) defeated the Portland Trail_Blazers ( 9 - 14 ) 105 - 100 on Tuesday .
The Cavs entered the night trying to not only end a rare 3 - game losing streak , but also get back on track at home after dropping their first game in Quicken Loans Arena last Thursday versus the Wizards .
Things were n't exactly looking up for the home team at the half , as Cleveland faced a 56 - 47 deficit by intermission .
A resurgent and resolute Cavs squad took the floor in the third quarter however , handily outscoring the visitors 30 - 19 during the period on the back of Kevin_Love 's 9 points .
Then it was LeBron_James 's turn in the fourth quarter , during which he tallied 12 of his 33 points on the night to help Cleveland escape with the victory .
Portland received typically outstanding performances from their dynamic backcourt duo of Damian_Lillard ( 33 points , 6 rebounds , 6 assists ) and C.J .
McCollum ( 24 points , 5 assists , 3 rebounds and a pair of steals ) .
However , it was the insufficient production from their other 3 starters that played a crucial part in Portland coming up just short of handing Cleveland a second straight home loss .
Mason_Plumlee , slumping as of late , contributed a modest 10 points , 4 rebounds , 4 assists and 1 block against the Cavs 's top - 5 ranked defense versus centers .
Al-Farouq_Aminu had one of his worst games since donning a Blazers uniform this offseason , tallying only 4 points , 5 rebounds and 1 block .
Meanwhile , Noah_Vonleh contributed next to nothing in a start at power forward , only pitching in 2 points and 4 rebounds .
The Trail_Blazers fell to 9 - 14 and currently reside in fourth place in the Western Conference 's Northwest Division .
James complemented his game - high 33 points with 10 rebounds , 3 assists , 2 steals and 3 blocks .
Love 's aforementioned third - period tally of 9 points represented half of his scoring on the night , as he totaled 18 points , along with 4 rebounds , 4 assists and 4 steals .
Matthew Delladedova received another start in place of Mo_Williams , and responded with a strong 17 - point effort .
Williams was active as well , and paced the Cleveland bench with 13 points , a pair of rebounds and a pair of assists over a highly efficient 21 minutes .
Cleveland improved to 14 - 7 and remains in first place in the Eastern Conference 's Central Division .

San_Antonio slowly chipped away at the lead over the next 3 quarters .

Leonard finished with a team - high 39 points on an impressive 12 - of - 18 shooting from the field to go along with 6 rebounds and 5 assists in 39 minutes .
Additionally , what was key for the Spurs was Tony_Parker 's ability to slip out of a funk , as after 3 straight games in single digits , Parker finished with 19 points , 6 rebounds and 3 assists .
As for Houston , James_Harden was once again sensational , scoring 39 points on 12 - of - 20 shooting from the field and dishing out a game - high 12 assists in 36 minutes .
In the end , 5 Rockets players managed to score in double figures , but it was n't enough to end the Spurs 's 7 - game win streak .
