The Chicago_Bulls ( 29 - 26 ) defeated the Los_Angeles_Lakers ( 11 - 46 ) 126 - 115 at United Center on Sunday .
Chicago entered the game riddled with injuries to 2 of their key players , Jimmy_Butler ( knee ) and Nikola MIrotic ( appendectomy ) , and will remain without them for another 2 - 3 weeks .
While the Bulls are a different team without Butler and Mirotic , they continue to run a similar offense , 1 that was able to handle one of the league 's worst teams in the Lakers .
It was a nostalgic night for Kobe_Bryant , as this marked his last game in Chicago , 1 that brought up multiple montages of the Michael Jordan-Kobe Bryant days .
The Lakers hung with the Bulls in the first half , playing competitively and physically behind Julius_Randle , who strung together another strong performance to the tune of 22 points and 12 rebounds on 10 - of - 19 shooting .
The Lakers put together a 18 - 4 scoring run midway through the fourth quarter , which pulled the game within 5 points , but Derrick_Rose drained multiple clutch shots down the stretch which kept the Lakers out of reach .
D'Angelo_Russell got the start in favor of Lou_Williams , a decision that we do not know is permanent yet , but it was Randle 's first start since December 12 .
The rookie point guard totaled 15 points and 6 assists in 34 minutes , while Williams pitched in 11 points off the bench .
Bryant scored 22 points on 8 - of - 20 shooting in his farewell game to Chicago .
The Bulls combination of Derrick_Rose , E'Twaun_Moore and Pau_Gasol was nearly unstoppable , as each player exploded for a 20 - plus point performance .
The third quarter exploited the Lakers defensive issues , where Chicago extended a small halftime lead to 15 points by the end of that quarter .
Rose and Moore both finished with 24 points , and the backcourt shot a combined 18 - of - 29 from the field .
Gasol added 21 points , 7 rebounds and 5 assists to round out the box score , and pitched in a needed midrange bucket within 2 minutes of regulation .
The Bulls bench was lead by Bobby_Portis and Doug_McDermott , who combined for 35 points , as both exceeded 20 minutes of playing time .
The Lakers will visit the Milwaukee_Bucks ( 23 - 33 ) for a second game of a back - to - back on Monday , while the Bulls host the Washington_Wizards ( 25 - 29 ) on Wednesday .
The Philadelphia_76ers defeated the Brooklyn_Nets , 105 - 95 , at Barclays Center on Sunday .
The Sixers ( 10 - 25 ) checked in to Sunday 's game with only 3 road victories in 14 tries , but a balanced offensive effort and opportunistic defense helped them improve that mark at the expense of the Nets ( 8 - 28 ) .
Joel_Embiid , who 'd tallied a career - high 33 points in the previous meeting between the 2 clubs , led the way once again with 20 points , while Robert_Covington produced a 15 - point , 11 - rebound double - double .
Meanwhile , the Philadelphia defense elicited 22 turnovers from the NBA 's most mistake - prone team , which also played a pivotal part in the rare double - digit road win .
Embiid added 5 rebounds , 4 assists and 2 blocks .
Covington also dished out 1 assist and recorded a game - high 5 steals , along with 1 block .
Nik_Stauskas totaled 15 points , 5 rebounds , 2 assists and 1 block .
Ersan_Ilyasova went for 14 points , 7 rebounds , 2 assists and 1 block .
Dario_Saric paced the second unit with 18 points , 5 boards and 1 steal .
Brook_Lopez paced the Nets with a game - high 26 points , which he supplemented with 2 rebounds , 2 assists , 1 steal and 1 block .
Bojan_Bogdanovic provided 12 points , 8 boards , 3 assists and 1 steal .
Isaiah_Whitehead , Trevor_Booker and Joe_Harris combined for only 9 points , but Justin_Hamilton helped make up for it with 16 points , 5 rebounds and 2 blocks off the bench .
Meanwhile , Sean_Kilpatrick was productive again on the second unit , registering 10 points , 3 rebounds , 3 assists and 1 steal .
The Toronto_Raptors defeated the host Milwaukee_Bucks , 105 - 99 , at BMO Harris Bradley Center on Friday .
With that said , Toronto led for nearly the entirety of the game , with the Bucks never leading by more than 2 points .
A big factor for Milwaukee was their poor free - throw shooting , as they shot 58 percent on 12 attempts , to 79 percent on 19 attempts for Toronto .
Toronto ( 10 - 6 ) was dominated in many of the statistics , but they won the 1 that mattered most .
DeMar_DeRozan continued his scoring exhibition , as he tallied 26 points , 7 rebounds and 4 assists on 9 - of - 18 shooting .
Kyle_Lowry was second on the team , accumulating 19 points , 5 rebounds , 6 assists and 2 steals in the victory .
Jonas_Valanciunas finished with 12 points , while DeMarre_Carroll scored 14 .
Strangely , no player on Toronto finished with more than 7 rebounds , 6 assists or 2 steals in their win .
Milwaukee ( 6 - 8 ) played a better game than Toronto , but they simply could n't escape with a much needed win .
Giannis_Antetokounmpo carried the load , accruing a game - high 29 points , 6 rebounds and 11 assists .
Tony_Snell was second on the team , scoring 16 points on 6 - of - 12 shooting .
Mathew Dellavedova tallied 11 points , 3 rebounds and 8 assists .
Greg_Monroe finally got some run off the bench , totaling 8 points and 10 rebounds in 18 minutes .
The Houston_Rockets ( 37 - 38 ) came back to defeat the Cleveland_Cavaliers ( 52 - 22 ) 106 - 100 on Tuesday .
The Cavaliers carried a 19 - point lead at half , but allowed the Rockets to make a huge comeback in their home building .
In fact , the Rockets outscored the Cavaliers 64 to 41 in the second half .
Houston 's defense was key , as they held Cleveland to 36 percent shooting and outrebounded them 55 to 38 .
This win put Houston solely in the 8 - seed and it may be their biggest win of the season .
James_Harden really stepped up in the fourth quarter , as he scored 16 of his 27 points in the final 12 minutes .
Dwight_Howard double - doubled in an 11 - point , 11 - rebound outing , despite shooting 7 - for - 22 from the free - throw line .
Michael_Beasley was a nice spark off the bench , as he scored 17 , while grabbing 8 boards .
Kyrie_Irving did step up in his absence though , as he accumulated 31 points and 8 assists .
Tristan_Thompson recorded a double - double off the bench as well , as he totaled 16 points and 10 rebounds .
The Raptors ( 22 - 6 ) got 22 points and 9 assists from Kyle_Lowry en route to a 118 - 108 win over the Knicks ( 5 - 25 ) on Sunday .
Toronto jumped out to an 8 - point first quarter lead and never looked back , maintaining a 7 - point advantage at the half .
The Raptors turned it on in the third quarter , beginning the period on a 17 - 7 run and extending the lead to 16 points entering the fourth .
Lowry 's 22 led the way for Toronto , and the point guard was serenaded with  MVP  chants from fans while at the free throw line in the fourth quarter .
Jonas_Valanciunas added 10 points , and Terrence_Ross finished with 18 , including 4 three - pointers .
Lou_Williams contributed 22 points off the bench , and Greivis_Vasquez had 21 to go with 5 assists .
The Raptors shot nearly 49 percent from the floor and knocked down 14 three - pointers as a team .
The Knicks were led by 28 points ( 12 - 26 FG ) and 5 rebounds from Carmelo_Anthony .
Jose_Calderon added 15 , and Cole_Aldrich , who started at center with Amare Stoudemire resting , finished with 11 points and 7 rebounds .
Jason_Smith was the high man off the bench with 16 points in 21 minutes .
Samuel_Dalembert , who finished with 2 points , was ejected in the third quarter for elbowing Valanciunas .
Harden recorded his third straight triple - double , scoring 23 points to go with 10 rebounds and 10 assists .
It was not Harden 's best outing , however , as the superstar shot just 6 - of - 24 and had 6 turnovers .
Sixth man Eric_Gordon , meanwhile , had a team - high 31 points and knocked down 6 three - pointers .
The Rockets as a whole had 12 three - pointers but shot just 43 percent from the field .
Wall had a double - double , scoring 18 and dishing out 12 assists .
Beal , meanwhile , led the team with 27 points on 9 - of - 18 shooting .
John_Wall has been one of the most consistent ball distributors in the NBA this season , as his 11 assists per game are second - best in the league this season behind James_Harden 's 11 per game .
Tuesday was yet another example of Wall being at his best as 1 point guard , and when he 's at his best , his team typically is as well .
In Tuesday 's win over the Suns , Wall dished out 14 assists to go along with his 25 points , and this season , when Wall shares the ball as effectively as he did against Phoenix , the Wizards are almost impossible to beat .
In the 19 games where Wall has recorded at least 13 assists this season , Washington is 15 - 4 , with 3 of those losses - - against the Grizzlies , Thunder and Spurs - - coming in the first 18 games of the regular season .
The New_Orleans_Pelicans ( 17 - 16 ) defeated the Houston_Rockets ( 24 - 10 ) 111 - 83 on Friday at the Smoothie King Center in New_Orleans .
To begin with , they were the superior shooters , going 53 percent from the field and 47 percent from the three - point line compared to the Rockets who went 40 percent from the floor and only 21 percent from beyond the arc .
The Pelicans also established a hefty rebounding advantage , finishing with 49 compared to the 38 recorded by the Rockets .
The Pelicans also got to the free throw line 9 more times , converting on 16 - of - 20 at the line .
Evans had a very impressive night , going 10 - for - 15 from the field to score 21 points , while also adding 5 assists and 4 rebounds .
Anderson on the other hand came off the bench to shoot 9 - for - 14 from the field and 3 - for - 6 from beyond the arc while scoring 22 points in 24 minutes .
Also coming off the bench , both Dante_Cunningham and Jimmer_Fredette had 13 and 10 points respectively .
Harden had only 11 points ( 5 - 13 FG , 1 - 6 3Pt ) and 3 assists , marking his worst game offensively since mid - November .
Considering he 's averaging 27 points per game this year , it was a very dissapointing day for Rockets 's fans .
Ariza on the other hand shot only 1 - for - 5 from the field and 0 - for - 2 from the three - point line to finish with a meager 2 points .
Dwight_Howard and Corey_Brewer led the team in points with 12 points each .
The only other Rocket to reach double figures was Donatas_Motiejunas , who contributed 10 points and 6 rebounds .
The key for Cleveland was their three - point shooting , as they went 19 - of - 38 , while Washington went just 12 - of - 29 from long distance .
LeBron_James did foul out in overtime , but finished with 32 points , 7 rebounds and 17 assists .
Kevin_Love led the team in scoring , totaling 39 points , while also adding 12 rebounds and 3 steals .
Kyrie_Irving scored 11 of his 23 points in overtime to carry the Cavs to victory .
Bradley_Beal was Washington 's best player , as he accumulated 41 points , 5 rebounds and 8 assists .
John_Wall amassed 22 points , 4 rebounds and 12 assists .
Otto_Porter was second on the team in scoring , collecting 25 points and 6 rebounds .
The All-Star center had a stat line reminiscent of Dennis Rodman , scoring only 3 points on 1 - of - 3 shooting , but pulling down a monstrous 17 rebounds to lead the team .
The Pistons finished with a 50 - 30 advantage in the rebounding column .
Point guard Reggie_Jackson led the team in scoring , pouring in 20 points to go along with 6 assists .
Meanwhile , bench forward Jon_Leuer made a contribution of 19 points and 5 rebounds on 8 - of - 9 shooting .
It was an overall efficient night for the Pistons , as the team shot over 50 percent from the field .
Forward Harrison_Barnes led the team with 19 points , while point guard Deron_Williams had 13 points and 5 assists .
The Washington_Wizards ( 8 - 9 ) defeated the Phoenix_Suns ( 8 - 12 ) 109 - 106 on Friday .
The Suns dropped their seventh game in 8 tries in rather improbable fashion .
Bradley_Beal led the way for the home team with a season - high 34 points , which he accomplished on 12 - of - 23 shooting .
The Washington guard also equaled his season high with 5 three - pointers , after shooting only 14 percent ( 2 - for - 14 ) from beyond the arc the previous 2 games .
Spearheaded by Beal 's outstanding efforts , the Wizards won the final period 31 - 21 , and also dominated down low , outscoring the visitors in the paint 50 - 40 .
Phoenix was led by Eric_Bledsoe , who managed 22 points , 7 assists and 4 rebounds , along with a pair of steals .
His backourt mate and partner - in - crime Brandon_Knight was second with 19 points , 5 rebounds , 5 assists , 1 steal and 1 block .
Jon_Leuer received a second consecutive start in place of Markieff_Morris , and although he could n't replicate his 20 - point outing from Wednesday , he did post a second straight double - digit scoring effort with 13 points over 23 minutes .
Morris did play , albeit off the bench , but ended up outpacing Leuer with 28 minutes on the floor , posting 10 points over that span .
T.J. Warren led the reserves with 11 points .
The Suns fell to 8 - 12 and currently reside in third place in the Western Conference 's Pacific Division .
John_Wall supported Beal 's performance with 17 points , 9 assists , 5 rebounds and a pair of steals .
However , the Wizards 's bench supplied the majority of the rest of the offense on this night , as Otto_Porter , Jr. was the only other Washington starter with double - digit scoring ( 13 ) .
Ramon_Sessions was second on the team in scoring with 18 points , his second - highest total of the season , and added a pair of assists and 1 steal .
Gary_Neal also kicked in 12 points , a season - high 6 rebounds , and 1 assist .
The Wizards improved to 8 - 9 but remain in last place in the Eastern Conference 's Southeast Division .
John_Wall had a triple - double in the Washington_Wizards 's ( 22 - 26 ) 106 - 94 win over the Philadelphia_76ers ( 7 - 43 ) .
Wall exploded for 18 points , 13 rebounds , and 10 assists as Washington rolled past their Eastern Conference opponent .
All 5 starters scored in double digits for the Wizards , as Bradley_Beal led the way with 22 .
Center Marcin_Gortat , meanwhile , posted a double - double with 22 points and 13 rebounds .
The win comes on the heels of a loss to the powerhouse Golden_State_Warriors in which Wall led the team with 41 points .
Midseason acquisition Ish_Smith led the team with 22 points to go along with 5 rebounds and 5 assists .
Promising sophomore center Nerlens_Noel also had a strong showing , blocking 4 shots , grabbing 1 steal , and pulling down 8 rebounds .
The Miami_Heat ( 13 - 9 ) defeated the Memphis_Grizzlies ( 13 - 12 ) 100 - 97 on Sunday .
Green played nearly 45 minutes , adding 26 points , 2 rebounds and 3 assists , and led all scorers in the losing effort .
Gasol contributed 12 points , 7 rebounds and 4 assists , while Randolph completed 66 percent of his shots for 12 points , 6 rebounds and 4 assists in 26 minutes .
Matt_Barnes added a double - double with 13 points and 13 rebounds .
Memphis had a chance to tie the game on the final possession , but a mistimed pass from Mike_Conley to Marc_Gasol resulted in 1 turnover , eventually sending Justise_Winslow to the free throw line where he extended the lead to 3 points .
Mike_Conley came a few inches away on a 55 foot hail mary with 1 left , but the miracle did not come to fruition .
Dwyane_Wade turned in a vintage performance with 5 minutes left in the game , where the 3 time NBA champion drove the lane for a clutch layup and followed up with the go ahead midrange jumper to put the Heat up 98 - 97 with under 24 seconds left .
Wade finished with 14 points , 4 rebounds and 2 assists on 7 - of - 16 shooting .
Hassan_Whiteside , the NBA 's leader in blocks , was unable to register a stat in that category , but still added 9 points and 11 rebounds in 28 minutes .
Chris_Bosh led all Miami scorers with 22 points and shot lights out from the floor ( 7 - of - 10 ) , to go along with 4 rebounds and 2 assists .
The Heat continue to dominate on their home court , where they are now 11 - 4 on the year .
Both teams play the second game of a back - to - back on Monday , with the Heat visiting the Atlanta_Hawks ( 14 - 11 ) and the Grizzlies hosting the Washington_Wizards ( 10 - 12 ) .
The Dallas_Mavericks ( 13 - 5 ) defeated the Philadelphia_76ers ( 0 - 16 ) 110 - 103 at the Wells Fargo Center on Saturday .

McDaniels , had an absolutely marvelous performance as he had 21 points ( 8 - 17 FG , 2 - 3 3Pt , 3 - 3 FT ) and 13 rebounds ( 10 offensive ) .
The Los_Angeles_Clippers ( 50 - 28 ) defeated the Los_Angeles_Lakers ( 16 - 61 ) 91 - 81 at Staples Center on Wednesday .
The 20 year veteran shot more efficiently from the field as compared to Tuesday 's performance against the same Clippers squad , and finished with 17 points on 6 - of - 19 shooting .
Jordan_Clarkson and D'Angelo_Russell also bounced back a bit , and combined for 26 points on 10 - of - 28 shooting .
When the backcourt duo clicks , it provides the Lakers with enough offense to contend against the bottom half opponents in the league , but the Clippers proved too much to handle throughout the all 4 quarters .
Four Clippers starters finished in low double figures , but the best sign came from Blake_Griffin , who looked more like his usual self with 13 points , 8 rebounds and 3 assists in 24 minutes .
Chris_Paul rounded out the box score with 13 points also , in addition to 5 rebounds and 8 assists .
Both teams play on Friday , as the Clippers visit the Utah_Jazz ( 39 - 39 ) , while the Lakers visit the New_Orleans_Pelicans ( 29 - 49 ) .
The Detroit_Pistons ( 5 - 1 ) defeated the Portland Trail_Blazers ( 4 - 3 ) 120 - 103 on Sunday .
The Pistons continued their fantastic start to the season on Sunday in a matchup of the 2 surprise teams in the NBA .
The game seemed to be in Portland 's hands going into the fourth quarter , but the Pistons really turned it on over the final 12 minutes , outscoring Portland 41 - 11 .
Amazingly , Detroit somehow prevailed while allowing 54 percent shooting from the Blazers , while shooting 49 percent on their own end .
The key to the loss for Portland was their propensity to turn the ball over , as they committed 22 turnovers in the loss .
Drummond put together another ridiculous line , as he tallied 29 points , 27 rebounds , 2 steals and 3 blocks in the victory .
Point guard Reggie_Jackson also had another spectacular performance , accumulating a career - high 40 points , 5 rebounds and 5 assists in the win .
These 2 are simply on a different level right now and it 's easy to see why Detroit has started off so well .
The Blazers completely fell apart in the fourth quarter , as they shot 4 - for - 18 from the field in an 11 - point quarter , while allowing 41 points on the defensive end .
This is a very tough loss for this young Portland team , but they have to be satisfied with the 4 - 3 start .
Damian_Lillard put in yet another fine effort on Sunday , totaling 26 points and 11 assists in the loss .
The Blazers got 15 points off the bench from Allen_Crabbe , but the rest of the bench combined for only 11 points .
The Golden_State_Warriors ( 150 ) beat the Denver_Nuggets ( 6 - 8 ) 118 - 105 on Sunday .
The Warriors extended their winning streak to 15 games , tying the 1993 - 1994 Houston_Rockets for most consecutive wins to open a NBA season .
The Warriors shot 53 percent from the field as a unit , led by Klay_Thompson , as he finished with 21 points , 3 rebounds and 7 assists on 7 - for - 16 shooting .
Curry was not far behind his backcourt partner and tallied 19 points , 4 rebounds and 7 assists on 8 - for - 16 shooting in 27 minutes played .
Harrison_Barnes is improving on a nightly basis and his impact on the floor is garnering more attention from defenders , as the forward contributed 17 points , 3 rebounds , 4 assists and 3 steals .
The Warriors bench went 7 players deep , including the return of Marreese_Speights , who added 4 points and 6 rebounds in 6 minutes of work .
The Nuggets were without Kenneth_Faried ( coach decision ) , but received double figures from all 5 of their starters .
Emmanuel_Mudiay tallied 17 points and 8 assists , but shot 25 percent from the field and could not get into any sort of rhythm down the stretch .
Will_Barton continues to improve upon a strong start to the season and finished with 19 points , 6 rebounds and 3 assists on 7 - for - 10 shooting in 27 minutes off the bench .
Both teams play at home on Tuesday , as the Warriors look to make history against the Los_Angeles_Lakers ( 2 - 10 ) , while the Nuggets face the Los_Angeles_Clippers ( 6 - 7 ) .
The San_Antonio_Spurs ( 16 - 4 ) dominated the Memphis_Grizzlies ( 11 - 9 ) on Thursday , winning 103 - 83 .
Spurs star Kawhi_Leonard continued his dominant breakout season , torching the Grizzlies for 27 points on extremely efficient 9 - for - 13 shooting , including 7 - for - 9 from beyond the three - point line .
Leonard paired the impressive scoring outburst with his well - known lockdown defense , recording 2 steals and 1 block and playing a stellar game on both sides of the ball .
On a less positive note , shooting guard Danny_Green 's woes from the field continued , as he shot 0 - for - 5 and recorded just 2 points on the game .
The whole Grizzlies squad , meanwhile , struggled from the field , shooting a paltry 38 percent including just 2 - for - 16 from deep .
The visiting Toronto_Raptors squeaked by the Portland Trail_Blazers on Monday , winning 95 - 91 .
Toronto ( 22 - 8 ) holds one of the league 's top records , having now won 9 of its last 11 games .
On Monday , Toronto saw stellar play from star point guard Kyle_Lowry , who led the team with 27 points .
Lowry added 7 rebounds and 4 assists .
Shooting guard DeMar_DeRozan , meanwhile , had 20 points , 10 rebounds , and 7 assists .
However , the Raptors did have 12 three - pointers and reached the line 24 times in the game .
Five of those threes came off the bench , as forward Patrick_Patterson hit 5 - of - 11 from beyond the arc .
Meanwhile , Portland ( 13 - 20 ) is currently in the midst of the league 's biggest slide .
The Blazers also committed a whopping 18 turnovers .
McCollum impressed with 29 points and 7 assists .
The Cleveland_Cavaliers ( 11 - 2 ) defeated the Atlanta ( 8 - 7 ) 114 - 111 in overtime of Game 3 of the Eastern Conference finals on Sunday in Cleveland and now lead the series 30 .
LeBron_James and the Cavaliers did not get off to the best start , as James missed his first 10 shots in the first quarter and found he and his team down 24 - 21 after the first quarter .
Nevertheless , James was able to bounce back and he ended up carrying his team all the way down to the final buzzer , hitting 14 of his next 27 shot attempts .
Cleveland still found themselves down by 2 in the final minute of overtime , but with 45 seconds left , James hit a huge corner 3 to put his team up by 1 .
Then , after the Hawks came up empty on the next possession , James took it all the way to the rim and put them up 3 .
Atlanta 's Shelvin_Mack got 2 shots to tie the game but missed them both , and the Cavaliers are now 1 game away from the NBA Finals .
James finished the game with 37 points , 18 rebounds and 13 assists in 47 minutes , which has never been done in NBA playoff history .
Kyrie_Irving ( knee ) was out once again , but Matthew_Dellavedova was spectacular on both ends of the floor in his place , finishing with 17 points ( 5 - 15 FG , 4 - 9 3Pt ) in 45 minutes .
J.R. Smith came off the bench and matched Dellavedova 's total , scoring 17 points ( 6 - 14 FG , 3 - 9 3Pt ) and grabbing 10 rebounds in 38 minutes and hitting a couple huge outside shots for his team .
As for Atlanta , they came into the game after losing Kyler Korver ( ankle ) for the rest of the playoffs and they also lost Al_Horford after he committed a flagrant 2 foul on Dellavedova .
Horford was ejected after playing just 19 minutes , but still had an efficient 14 points in that time .
Regardless , they still fought to the very end on the back of Jeff_Teague , who finished with a team - high 30 points ( 9 - 23 FG ) to along with 6 rebounds and 7 assists in 43 minutes .
Paul Milsap was n't too far behind in his effort , scoring 22 points ( 5 - 11 FG , 11 - 11 FT ) and grabbing 9 rebounds in 46 minutes .
Kent_Bazemore ( 14 ) and DeMarre_Carroll ( 10 ) round out all 5 starters who scored double figures , while Mack played 28 minutes off the bench and was able to score 13 points .
The Hawks now have their backs up against the wall , as no team in NBA playoff history has ever come back from being down 30 .
The Cavaliers will look to complete the sweep in Game 4 on Tuesday .
The Cleveland_Cavaliers ( 41 - 25 ) routed the Dallas_Mavericks ( 41 - 25 ) 127 - 94 on Tuesday at the American Airlines Center .
After being outscored 31 - 26 in the first quarter , Cleveland dominated the final 3 frames to notch a convincing win over a Western Conference opponent .
Four out of Cleveland 's 5 starters reached 20 points on the night , led by LeBron_James 's 27 .
Dallas was held to 41 points in the second half as Cleveland avenged it 's January loss at home to the Mavericks .
Cleveland has gotten back on track after Friday 's loss in Atlanta with 2 straight wins over Western Conference opponents .
Kyrie_Irving finished with 22 points and J.R Smith hit 5 of his 8 attempts from beyond the arc on his way to scoring 21 points .
The Cavaliers have 3 games left on its current 4 - game road trip , with their next game coming Thursday against the Spurs .
The Mavericks did n't get much production from their starters , with Dirk_Nowitzki going 3 - of - 10 from the field and Rajon_Rondo managing just 4 points and 3 assists over 24 minutes .
John_Wall spearheaded a balanced effort for the Wizards that saw all 5 members of their starting 5 tally double - digit scoring .
Otto_Porter turned in a solid 19 points , while Bradley_Beal checked in with 14 .

In what was a historic night for superstar LeBron_James , the Cleveland_Cavaliers ( 54 - 22 ) defeated the Atlanta_Hawks ( 45 - 32 ) 110 - 108 in overtime Friday .
With a team - leading 29 points , James surapssed Oscar Robertson for 11th on the all - time scoring list .
Scoring was n't the focus on Friday for James , however , as the star also snagged a season - high 16 rebounds and dished out 9 assists .

The Toronto_Raptors defeated the Charlotte_Hornets , 90 - 85 , at Air Canada Centre on Wednesday evening .
The game came down to starkly contrasting third and fourth quarters , with the Raptors ( 33 - 24 ) catching fire at the right time and making a memorable comeback for the victory .
Toronto got things off on the right foot , building a 31 - 20 lead after 1 quarter .
However , the Hornets ( 24 - 32 ) put together a stellar defensive effort over the middle periods , limiting their hosts to just 27 points in the second and third quarters combined , while scoring 34 themselves in the third quarter alone .
That surge gave them a seemingly dominant 75 - 58 edge heading into the final period , but the light went on for the Raptors at that point .
They turned the tables on their visitors by limiting Charlotte to just 10 points in the fourth quarter and putting up 32 themselves , allowing them to escape with an improbable home victory and snap a 3 - game skid .
The Hornets were led by a spectacular 27 - point tally from Frank_Kaminsky , which he supplemented with 5 rebounds , 3 assists , 1 steal and 1 block .
Kemba_Walker was next with a near double - double of 24 points , 9 assists , 4 boards and 2 steals .
Nicolas_Batum turned in 10 points , 5 assists , 4 rebounds , 2 steals and 1 block .
Michael_Kidd-Gilchrist posted 6 points but also hauled in 14 rebounds , dished out 2 assists , recorded 2 steals and registered a pair of blocks .
Jeremy_Lamb led the second unit with a modest 6 points .
Kyle_Lowry 's 21 points paced the Raptors , and he added 6 rebounds , 6 assists and 1 steal .
Norman_Powell drew the start and managed 17 points , 2 rebounds and 3 steals .
DeMarre_Carroll produced a 13 - point , 11 - rebound double - double while drawing the start at power forward with the newly acquired Serge_Ibaka not suiting up .
DeMar_DeRozan endured a nightmarish evening from the field , shooting just 5 - of - 19 on the way to a 10 - point tally , which he complemented with 3 rebounds and 2 assists .
Jonas_Valanciunas matched DeRozan 's scoring total and hauled in 11 boards , dished out 1 assist and recorded 1 steal .
Delon_Wright led the bench with 11 points , 2 assists , 1 rebound , 2 steals and 1 block .
The Atlanta_Hawks defeated the Dallas_Mavericks , 100 - 95 , at Phillips Arena on Wednesday evening .
The 2 teams came in to Wednesday 's contest with well - earned reputations as solid defensive squads , and the Mavericks ( 24 - 36 ) particularly had built an impressive track record of taking care of the basketball this season .
The Hawks ( 34 - 26 ) were guilty of 22 of those , but overcame their mistakes with 56 percent shooting overall , including 48 percent from three - point range .
All 5 members of Atlanta 's first unit shot 50 percent or better , and 4 of them posted double digits in the scoring column .
The Hawks built up a solid 63 - 52 halftime lead and were able to hang on despite being outscored 43 - 37 in the second half .
Harrison_Barnes continued to serve as the offensive linchpin for the Mavericks , posting a team - high 25 points that he supplemented with 4 rebounds , 4 assists and 2 steals .
Seth_Curry was once again his trusty wingman , providing 21 points , 4 rebounds , 3 assists and 2 steals .

Dennis_Schroder was next with 17 points , 6 assists , 2 rebounds , 1 steal and 1 block .

Washington then saw Otto_Porter , Jr. and Markieff_Morris drain 2 free throws apiece , and Klay_Thompson miss a 26 - foot three - point jumper as time expired to seal the win .

The Houston_Rockets ( 41 - 18 ) defeated the Cleveland_Cavaliers ( 37 - 24 ) 105 - 103 on Sunday at the Toyota Center in Houston .
After a fourth quarter comeback , where the Cavaliers out - scored the Rockets 24 - 16 , LeBron_James had a chance to end the game , but missed a step back jump shot with just under 2 seconds left in regulation , pushing it to overtime .
The Rockets then were able to build a 2 - point lead by the end of overtime .
James_Jones had a chance to win the game for the Cavaliers with a 3 at the buzzer , but had it blocked , therefore giving the Rockets their fifth win in a row .
The Rockets were the superior shooters in this one , going 46 percent from the field and 37 percent from the three - point line , while the Cavaliers went 41 percent from the floor and just 30 percent from deep .
After shooting just 27 percent ( 4 - 15 FG ) in Friday 's game against the Nets , it was a much better showing for the guard from the field Sunday .
Terrence_Jones was also a huge factor in the win , posting 19 points ( 6 - 10 FG , 1 - 2 3Pt , 6 - 9 FT ) and 7 rebounds .
Getting hot from the field , Donatas_Motiejunas went 7 - for - 14 from the field and 2 - for - 4 from the three - point line to score 16 points , while adding 2 rebounds .
James went 15 - for - 35 from the field and 4 - for - 12 from the three - point line to score 37 points , to go along with 8 rebounds , 4 assists and 3 steals .
Love , on the other hand , finished with 21 points ( 8 - 19 FG , 3 - 8 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) , 6 rebounds and 3 assists in 35 minutes .
The Milwaukee_Bucks defeated the Brooklyn_Nets , 110 - 108 , at Bradley Center on Saturday .
A nip - and - tuck fourth quarter appeared to reach a crescendo when Bojan_Bogdanovic nailed a clutch three - pointer with 11 seconds remaining to knot the score at 108 - 108 , capping a pivotal 60 Brooklyn run that began with 58 seconds remaining .
However , it would all prove to be for naught when John_Henson grabbed an offensive rebound off 1 blocked shot by Justin_Hamilton on Jabari_Parker and tipped it in for the victory as the clock turned to double zeros .
The Nets ( 1 - 2 ) were led by Bogdanovic , who tallied 26 points and added 8 rebounds and 2 assists .
Trevor_Booker helped make for the absence of Brook_Lopez ( rest ) in the frontcourt by turning in a 14 - point , 14 - rebound double - double that also included 1 assist , 2 blocks and 1 steal .
Jeremy_Lin continued his solid start to his Nets career by turning the trick as well , collecting 12 points and dishing out 10 assists .
Sean_Kilpatrick and Luis_Scola were key contributors off the bench , notching 15 and 14 points , respectively , with the latter also notably hauling in 8 rebounds over just 18 minutes .
Milwaukee ( 1 - 1 ) saw Rashad_Vaughn surprisingly lead the team in scoring while coming off the bench , collecting 22 points and adding a pair of rebounds , 1 steal and 1 block over 27 minutes .
Giannis_Antetokounmpo led the starters with 21 points , 11 rebounds , 3 assists , 2 steals and 2 blocks .
Parker supplied 14 points , 8 boards , 4 assists and 1 steal , while Greg_Monroe , coming off the bench and outpacing starter Miles_Plumlee by 11 minutes overall , registered 11 points , 3 rebounds , 3 assists and 4 steals .
The Phoenix_Suns ( 17 - 14 ) defeated the Sacramento_Kings ( 12 - 17 ) 115 - 106 on Friday at Sleep Train Arena in Sacramento .
Phoenix ended the third quarter riding a close 94 - 90 lead , but were able to out - score the Kings 21 - 16 in the final quarter to secure the 9 - point win on the road .
The Suns were the superior shooting team in this one , going 49 percent from the field and 42 percent from the three - point line , while the Kings went 44 percent from the floor and 35 percent from beyond the arc .
The Suns were led by the Morris twins , who combined for 37 points .
Marcus_Morris came off the bench , going 7 - for - 12 from the field and 6 - for - 7 from the three - point line to score a team - leading 20 points , while also recording a near double - double with 9 rebounds .
The 9 rebounds matched a season - high for Marcus , as he notched one of his most well - rounded games of the year .
Markieff_Morris on the other hand was just as efficient , shooting 8 - for - 11 from the field and 1 - 1 from beyond the arc .
Eric_Bledsoe stuffed the stat sheet again , scoring 18 points ( 7 - 11 FG , 1 - 3 3Pt , 3 - 5 FT ) , while also contributing 5 rebounds and 6 assists .
Both Goran_Dragic and Isaiah_Thomas scored 16 and 17 points respectively .
Collison had a team - high of 19 points ( 5 - 12 FG , 4 - 7 3Pt , 5 - 6 FT ) , while Gay finished with 16 ( 7 - 15 FG , 0 - 1 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) .
The Cleveland_Cavaliers ( 3 - 2 ) defeated the Chicago_Bulls ( 2 - 3 ) , 106 - 101 , in Game 5 on Tuesday at the Quicken Loans Arena .
Chicago got off to a fast start and led by as many as 10 points in the early going , but long scoring droughts allowed Cleveland to get back into the game .
At that point , Chicago trailed by 10 points and had just lost one of its last effective front court players .
The Bulls charged back and cut their deficit to 2 points , but Cleveland 's Iman_Shumpert saved the game with an offensive rebound with less than 20 seconds remaining .
The Cavaliers went on to seal the game and the series will now move back to Chicago for Game 6 on Thursday with Cleveland holding a 3 - 2 advantage .
Taj_Gibson made the start in place of Gasol and was effective prior to be ejected , with 10 points and 5 rebounds over 26 minutes .
Jimmy_Butler had a very strong outing as well with 29 points , including the three pointer that pulled the Bulls within 2 points late .
Chicago will have a chance to even the series Thursday and send it to a Game 7 , which would take place on Sunday .
Cleveland came into Game 5 looking to sustain the momentum from Sunday 's buzzer - beating win in Chicago and was able to do just that .
LeBron_James turned in another tremendous performance with 38 points , 12 rebounds , 6 assists , 3 blocks , and 3 steals .
Kyrie_Irving , who has been battling tendinitis in his left knee , gritted out 39 minutes Tuesday and posted 25 points .
History is on Cleveland 's side for the rest of the series , as the teams that have won Game 5 in a tied best - of - 7 series have won the series 82 % of the time .
While it is difficult to look at the box score and ignore Anthony_Davis 's 50 - point night , what may be even more glaring is the lack of production from the rest of his Pelican teammates as New_Orleans lost to the Denver_Nuggets .
Davis 's fellow starters in the frontcourt , Solomon_Hill and Omer_Asik , played a combined 44 minutes and scored a combined 4 points , while Dante_Cunningham and Alexis_Ajinca each played over 9 minutes off the bench and had zero points to show for it .
The bench unit as a whole managed to contribute just 23 points total for the Pelicans on Wednesday night .
The Golden_State_Warriors ( 69 - 8 ) defeated the Portland Trail_Blazers ( 41 - 37 ) 136 - 111 at Oracle Arena on Sunday .
The Warriors bounced back after their first home loss since January of 2015 against the Boston_Celtics on Friday , and made a statement in the process .
The final score reflected Golden_State 's tremendous shooting from behind the arc ( 60 percent ) , but downplays the Blazers who fought until the very end .
Curry finished with 39 points to lead all scorers , and added 6 rebounds , 7 assists and 2 steals on 13 - of - 21 shooting , which included 9 treys .
Draymond_Green picked up his 13th triple - double , which is good for second in the league behind Russell_Westbrook , and rounded out the box score with 22 points , 10 rebounds , 10 assists and 3 blocks .
Klay_Thompson pitched in 21 points to round out the Warriors big 3 , while LeAndro Barbosa led the bench in scoring with 13 points , to go along with 4 rebounds and 1 assist .
Damian_Lillard dropped 38 points on 13 - of - 27 shooting , as he sliced through his matchup with Curry and was unafraid to show off his range as well .
McCollum contributed 18 points , but was also overpowered by his matchup with Klay_Thompson .
Ed_Davis was the standout bench player for Portland , as he filled the stat sheet with 6 points , 8 rebounds , 3 assists and 3 blocks in 21 minutes .
Both teams play on Tuesday , as the Warriors will host the Minnesota_Timberwolves ( 25 - 52 ) , while the Blazers will visit the Sacramento_Kings ( 31 - 46 ) .
The Chicago_Bulls ( 43 - 29 ) defeated the Charlotte_Hornets ( 30 - 39 ) 98 - 86 on Monday at the United Center in Chicago .
With a strong finish to the season , they 'll have the opportunity to pass up the Raptors , but they could be passed up themselves , as the Washington_Wizards are trailing the Bulls by just 2 games .
Nikola_Mirotic continued to have a huge presence for the Bulls , recording over 20 points for the fourth time over his last 5 games .
Pau_Gasol was also a force in this game , posting 27 points ( 11 - 19 FG , 1 - 1 3Pt , 4 - 6 FT ) of his own , to go along with 12 rebounds and 4 blocked shots .
On the season , Gasol is now averaging 19 points and 12 rebounds as the clear leader of this team .
The biggest news for the Bulls though , was seeing Jimmy_Butler return to the starting lineup after missing 12 games with an elbow injury .
Aaron_Brooks added a double - double as well , finishing with 13 points ( 6 - 10 FG , 0 - 2 3Pt , 1 - 1 FT ) and 10 assists .
Kemba_Walker was one of the few exceptions , going off for a game - high of 29 points ( 11 - 24 FG , 2 - 7 3Pt , 5 - 5 FT ) with 2 assists in 34 minutes .

The only other Hornet in double figures was Gerald_Henderson , who chipped in with 11 points ( 3 - 12 FG , 0 - 1 3Pt , 5 - 6 FT ) and 9 rebounds , despite having a tough night shooting the ball .
Al_Jefferson had to leave the game after just 24 minutes with soreness in his right knee , so the Hornets can only hope it does n't continue to keep him out moving forward .

Dallas 's Rajon_Rondo took the ball up the floor with the Mavericks losing by 9 early in the third quarter .
Coach Rick Carlisle took a timeout and Rondo never got back on the floor after the 2 appeared to have a heated exchange .
After Rondo 's exit , the Mavericks outscored 46 - 30 to close out the Raptors and notch their 39th win of the season .
Toronto mustered just 15 points in the fourth quarter as its losing streak extended to 3 games .

The Mavericks shot 48 percent from the field as a team on their way to their third straight game .

The Sixers ( 25 - 43 ) have been rightfully lauded for their considerable improvement this season , which has persisted even after the season - ending knee injury to star center Joel_Embiid .
Philadelphia 's ongoing transformation to a winning team has not been as evident all season as it was Friday , when they thoroughly dominated a team that still has postseason aspirations in the Mavericks ( 29 - 39 ) .
Only 1 member of the Dallas starting 5 managed to post double - digit scoring , and just barely , as Dirk_Nowitzki tallied just 10 points .
Dwight_Powell actually led the Mavs off the bench with 14 points , which he supplemented with 1 assist .

Jahlil_Okafor was productive as a reserve as well with 10 points , 3 rebounds , 1 assist and 1 block .

The Cleveland_Cavaliers defeated the Golden_State_Warriors , 120 - 90 , on Wednesday night at Quicken Loans Arena in Game 3 of the NBA Finals .
The victory reduced the Warriors 's series lead to 2 - 1 .
With their backs already against the wall , the Cavs received the news earlier Wednesday that starting power forward Kevin_Love would not be medically cleared to play in Game 3 due to the concussion he suffered in the first half of Game 2 on Sunday .
His absence prompted a personnel shift that saw LeBron_James start at power forward , with veteran Richard_Jefferson coming in to the starting 5 at James 's usual spot at small forward .
Cleveland appeared unfazed by the lineup change early , as they ambushed Golden_State out of the gate with a 90 run to start the game .
Curry 's 19 - point total did pace the Warriors , and he added 3 assists , 1 rebound and 2 steals .
Harrison_Barnes was right behind him with 18 points , 8 rebounds and a trio of assists .
Thompson contributed 10 points , 2 rebounds , 1 assist and 1 steal , giving him only 36 points over the series 's first 3 contests .
Draymond_Green notably managed a modest 6 points , 7 rebounds , 7 assists and 1 block .
Andre_Iguodala paced the reserves with 11 points and 2 rebounds .
Cleveland 's attack was spearheaded by James , who supplied a game - high 32 points and added 11 rebounds , 6 assists , 2 blocks and 1 steal .
Kyrie_Irving stepped up in Love 's absence as well , posting 30 points , 8 assists , 4 rebounds and 1 steal .
J.R. Smith came alive at just the right time after 2 subpar games to open the series , as he registered 20 points , 4 rebounds , 1 assist and a trio of steals .
Tristan_Thompson managed a 14 - point , 13 - rebound double - double that he supplemented with a pair of assists .
Jefferson turned in a workmanlike effort with 9 points , 8 rebounds , 2 assists and 2 steals .

Brooklyn jumped out to a 10 - point first quarter lead , but the Pistons responded with a run in the second quarter that trimmed the deficit to just 2 at halftime .
The teams traded baskets for most of the third quarter , and the Nets were able to create some distance mid - way through the fourth , as a Mason_Plumlee lay - in gave Brooklyn a 12 - point advantage with 4:24 to play .
Detroit would battle back , however , with back - to - back baskets from Andre_Drummond cutting Brooklyn 's lead to just 2 points with 40 seconds to play .
Trailing 104 - 102 with less than 30 seconds to play , Detroit had a chance to take the lead , but a Jodie_Meeks three - pointer rimmed out with 15 seconds remaining .
From there , the Nets were able to salt the game away at the line , as Joe_Johnson knocked down 4 straight free throws .
Brooklyn , which scorched the nets to the tune of 53 percent shooting , got 21 points and 12 rebounds from Plumlee and 16 points from Johnson .

After scoring 30 points in Wednesday 's loss , DeRozan has now recorded back - to - back 30 - point games in his return to the floor on 49 percent shooting .
Wednesday 's performance marked the 21st time this season that DeRozan has scored at least 30 points as he works to regain his spot in the company of the NBA 's scoring leaders .

The Golden_State_Warriors ( 48 - 4 ) defeated the Phoenix_Suns ( 14 - 40 ) 112 - 104 at Talking Stick Resort Arena on Wednesday .
The Warriors extended their NBA best record and will enter all star weekend with the greatest start of all time , passing the Chicago_Bulls historic 1995 - 96 season .

In the first game of NBA action since teams took a break for All-Star weekend , the Washington_Wizards ( 24 - 28 ) emerged victorious with a 103 - 89 win over the Utah_Jazz ( 26 - 27 ) .
The Wizards , a second - round playoff team in 2014 - 15 , have disappointed thus far , currently holding tenth place in the Eastern Conference .
The turbulent team was one of just a few franchises around the league to make a move before Thursday 's trade deadline , dealing a top - 9 protected 2016 first - rounder as well as Kris_Humphries and Dejuan Blair for Suns power forward Markieff_Morris .
Center Marcin_Gortat led the way for the Wiz with 22 points , which he complemented with 10 rebounds and a big 5 blocked shots .
All-Star John_Wall , meanwhile , notched a double - double with 17 points and 11 assists .
As a whole , the Wizards posed a problem for Utah on offense , as the team stole the ball an impressive 14 times in total .
The Jazz , meanwhile , entered the All-Star break with momentum , having won 7 of their previous 8 .
Star small forward Gordon_Hayward led the team in scoring , per usual , with 19 .
Breakout contributor Rodney_Hood , meanwhile , pitched in 18 .
Turnovers , however , killed the Jazz , as the team coughed the ball up 23 times in total .
The Orlando_Magic ( 1 - 3 ) defeated the New_Orleans_Pelicans ( 0 - 4 ) 103 - 94 on Tuesday .
The Pelicans defense was especially lackluster , as they allowed an ugly 56 points in the paint .
Orlando has been better than their 0 - 3 record would indicate coming into the game , as they lost the first 3 games by a combined 9 points .
The Magic were led by Evan_Fournier in this game , as he tallied 30 points , 5 rebounds , 4 assists , and 2 steals across 42 minutes of play .
Center Nikola_Vucevic also had a nice game , recording 22 points and 13 rebounds in the victory .
The Magic shot 12 - for - 12 from the free - throw line , and that 's a great sign after shooting just 59 percent from the charity stripe in their loss to the Bulls on Sunday .
The Magic will look to build on this win in the final half of a back - to - back against the Houston_Rockets ( 1 - 3 ) on Wednesday .
Offensively , the Pelicans were led by Eric_Gordon , who scored 21 points and recorded 4 assists in 38 minutes .
Superstar Anthony_Davis continued to struggle with his stroke though , as he went just 3 - for - 12 from the field to bring his field - goal percentage down below 40 percent on the season .
The Pelicans will look to grab that first elusive win against the Atlanta_Hawks ( 4 - 1 ) on Friday .
The Boston_Celtics defeated the Memphis_Grizzlies , 113 - 103 , at TD Garden on Tuesday .
The Celtics gave the Grizzlies a tough overtime loss less than 2 weeks ago and they inflicted more pain on them here .
Rebounding was the biggest factor for Boston , as they won that battle , 47 - 37 .
The Grizzlies were really let down by their shooting , as they went 42 percent from the field , 30 percent from three - point range and 69 percent from the free - throw line .
The Celtics did a great job of closing things out at the charity stripe themselves , going 19 - of - 21 from the free - throw line .
Memphis ( 20 - 14 ) had to play this game without Mike_Conley ( toe ) and they simply could n't overcome his absence .
Marc_Gasol did all he could to carry the offense though , as he led the team with 26 points , 4 rebounds , 9 assists , 2 steals and 3 blocks in a fantastic performance .
Zach_Randolph recorded a double - double off the bench , totaling 16 points and 10 rebounds .
Tony_Allen was second on the team with 17 points and 8 rebounds on 6 - of - 9 shooting .
Andrew_Harrison filled - in for Conley to accrue 12 points , 5 rebounds and 6 assists as the starting point guard .
Boston ( 19 - 13 ) has now handed Memphis 2 tough losses in the past couple weeks , as they continue to rise up the standings .
Avery_Bradley was the catalyst in this win , as he led the team with 23 points , 7 rebounds and 4 assists .
Isaiah_Thomas was n't far behind , as he accrued 21 points and 7 assists of his own .
Jae_Crowder had one of his best scoring games of the year , dropping 17 points and 7 rebounds .
Gerald_Green and Marcus_Smart were huge off the bench , as Green provided 19 points and 5 rebounds , while Smart collected 13 points , 4 rebounds and 6 assists .
The Brooklyn_Nets ( 20 - 28 ) defeated the Toronto_Raptors ( 33 - 17 ) 109 - 93 on Wednesday at the Air Canada Centre in Toronto .
Despite being down 51 - 49 after the second quarter , the Nets went off in the second half , out - scoring the Raptors 60 - 42 to close out the game and secure the 16 - point victory on the road .
The Nets were the superior shooters in this game , going 49 percent from the field and 47 percent from the three - point line , while the Raptors went 44 percent from the floor and just 30 percent from beyond the arc .
Starting at point guard , Jarrett_Jack led the Nets , going 9 - for - 13 from the field and 2 - for - 4 from the three - point line to score 24 points , while also adding 6 assists as well .
He struggled to only 6 points on 3 - of - 11 shooting during Monday 's game against the Clippers , so it was good to see him get things pointed back in the right direction .
Getting the start at shooting guard , Alan_Anderson also had a nice showing , finishing with 22 points ( 7 - 9 FG , 3 - 5 3Pt , 5 - 5 FT ) and 5 rebounds .
It was a season - high in points for Anderson and also a welcomed surprise from the Nets , as he 's only averaging 6 points per game on the season .
Deron_Williams continued to come off the bench and posted 11 points ( 4 - 12 FG , 0 - 2 3Pt , 3 - 4 FT ) and 6 assists in 32 minutes .
Joe_Johnson and Bojan_Bogdanovic reached double figures as well with 12 and 11 points respectively .
The Raptors were led by Terrence_Ross , who came off the bench to score a team - high of 23 points ( 9 - 16 FG , 5 - 11 3Pt ) , while adding 3 rebounds .
Kyle_Lowry was able to post a double - double , finishing with 13 points ( 5 - 13 FG , 1 - 3 3Pt , 2 - 4 FT ) , 6 rebounds and 10 assists .
DeMar_DeRozan recorded 13 points ( 5 - 13 FG , 0 - 2 3Pt , 3 - 3 FT ) , 5 rebounds and 6 assists in 34 minutes .
The only other Raptor to reach double figures in points was Patrick_Patterson , who added 11 points ( 5 - 10 FG , 1 - 5 3Pt ) and 8 rebounds off the bench .
The Dallas_Mavericks ( 12 - 9 ) defeated the Washington_Wizards ( 8 - 10 ) 116 - 104 on Sunday .
Matthews added 6 rebounds and 5 assists to his stellar afternoon and is now seeing a healthy share of minutes , compared to the limited usage seen in the first 15 games .
The Mavericks played well as a unit and moved the ball well around the arc , totalling 25 assists to compliment 52 percent 3 - point shooting .
Dirk_Nowitzki is quietly shooting 50 percent from the floor in 2015 - 16 , and added to his supreme shot selection by finishing with 19 points on 5 - of - 8 shooting , to go along with 6 rebounds and 4 assists .
Raymond_Felton fell short of triple - double , completing 11 points , 10 rebounds and 6 assists , while his backcourt counterpart , Deron_Williams , added 11 points , 7 rebounds and 9 assists .
All 5 Mavericks starters finished in double figures , as the team pulled away from the Wizards early in the 4th quarter and coasted to their 12th win of the season .
The Wizards were unable to compete under the rim after losing the rebound battle , 50 - 31 , in their own arena .

John_Wall led all Wizards scorers with 28 points , 4 rebounds and 10 assists .

The Wizards visit the Miami_Heat ( 12 - 6 ) , while the Mavericks head to Madison Square Garden to face the New_York_Knicks ( 10 - 11 ) .

The Hawks have been strong at home this season and continued that trend by outlasting the Pacers and improving their record at Philips Arena to 17 - 8 .
The season series between these teams now stands at 2 - 1 for Indiana but the Hawks are the ones currently enjoying more success .
Atlanta sits third in the East and is riding a 3 - game winning streak , while Indiana is sitting at the bottom of the top 8 and is 4 - 6 in its last 10 games .
Atlanta shot 51 percent from the field as a team and assisted on 29 of its 39 field goal attempts .
The Hawks gave up 15 turnovers but countered that poor stat by forcing 20 turnovers out of the Pacers .

The Washington_Wizards defeated the Sacramento_Kings , 101 - 95 , in overtime at Verizon Center on Monday .
The Wizards ( 6 - 10 ) checked in the matchup against the Kings with an unsightly 5 - 10 record , but 4 of those victories had come at home .
Sacramento ( 7 - 11 ) gave them a run for their money Monday , however , as DeMarcus_Cousins exploded for a massive 36 - point , 20 - rebound double - double that also included 4 assists , 2 steals and 1 block .
His driving layup with 10 seconds remaining in regulation knotted the score up at 92 , and John_Wall could n't get what would have been a game - winning 19 - foot jumper to go in with 2 seconds on the clock .
Washington then dominated the extra period by a 9 - 3 margin , and Cousins missed a 26 - foot three - point jumper with 8 seconds left in overtime that essentially represented the Kings 's last opportunity to get within striking distance .
Rudy_Gay was next behind Cousins with 18 points , 5 rebounds , 2 assists , 2 steals and 1 block .
The rest of the starting 5 was woefully unproductive , with Darren_Collison , Arron_Afflalo and Kosta_Koufos combining for just 13 points .
Ty_Lawson paced the bench with the only other double - digit scoring performance on the team , posting 12 points , 3 assists and 3 steals .
Bradley_Beal contributed 31 points , 6 rebounds , 3 assists and 1 block to lead Washington on a 12 - of - 24 tally from the field and 4 - of - 7 from three - point range .

Otto_Porter , Jr. registered 15 points , 8 rebounds and 3 steals .
Marcin_Gortat collected 10 points , 7 boards , 3 blocks and 1 steal .
Kelly Oubre , Jr. posted a 10 - point , 10 - rebound double - double that also included 2 assists and 2 steals .
The Los_Angeles_Clippers rallied behind all - star point guard Chris_Paul , who posted an impressive stat line of 15 points , 9 assists and 11 rebounds , nearing a triple - double .
Russell_Westbrook , on the other end of the floor , posted 35 points on 14 - of - 30 shooting , to go along with 6 rebounds and 5 assists .
The Thunder , as a unit , shot just 41 percent from the field , which would have been bad , save for the Los_Angeles_Clippers , who shot worse .
The Clippers posted a 39 percent from the field as a unit and shot themselves out of many opportunities to take the lead on their home court .
Only 1 team was able to walk away with a perfect record , and the Westbrook led Thunder made that happen on their way to a 40 start to the season .

In fact , San_Antonio held Minnesota to just 28 points in the second half and outscored them , 14 - 7 in overtime .

Kawhi_Leonard was the player of the game , as he collected 34 points , 11 rebounds , 5 assists and 6 steals .
LaMarcus_Aldridge finished second on the team , amassing 18 points and 10 rebounds , Pau_Gasol came off the bench to provide 17 points and 8 rebounds .

Following a pair of Tyus_Jones free throws , Jameer_Nelson answered for Denver with a driving layup to bring the score within 1 point .

The Oklahoma_City_Thunder ( 17 - 17 ) defeated the Washington_Wizards ( 22 - 10 ) 109 - 102 on Friday at Chesapeake Energy Arena in Oklahoma_City .
The Thunder took it upon themselves and were able to out - score the Wizards by 7 in the final quarter to seal the victory in front of their home crowd .
They shot 53 percent from the field , while the Wizards shot 46 percent from the field , which was just enough of an advantage to secure the victory .
Durant went 12 - for - 18 from the field and 4 - for - 7 from the three - point line to score 34 points , while also adding 8 rebounds .
Durant has been scoring at an insane rate over his last 3 games , as he 's averaging 36 points per game over that span .
Westbrook finished with 22 points and 6 assists , giving him new season averages of 27 points and 7 assists per game on the year .
Despite his scoring opportunities going down with both Durant and Westbrook healthy , he 's also able to feed off the extra defensive attention given to those 2 .
The only other Thunder player to reach double figures in points was Nick_Collison , who came off the bench to score 10 points in 16 minutes .
Beal went 7 - for - 15 from the field and 3 - for - 5 from the three - point line to score 21 points .
the 10 rebounds were a season - high for Beal , as it was also his first double - double of the season .

After averaging only 4 points per game up until this point , it was a nice surprise for the Wizards .
Both Paul_Pierce and Nene Hilario finished with 12 points each .

The Oklahoma_City_Thunder ( 20 - 20 ) defeated the Orlando_Magic ( 15 - 29 ) 127 - 99 on Sunday at the Amway Center in Orlando .
The Thunder got off to a really quick start in this game , out - scoring the Magic 79 - 45 in the first half alone .
The Thunder were the superior shooters in this game , going 58 percent from the field and 36 percent from the three - point line , while the Magic went only 40 percent from the field and 35 percent from beyond the arc .
Only furthering their advantage , the Thunder also out - rebounded the Magic 54 - 33 .
The Thunder were led by Kevin_Durant , who nearly recorded a triple - double with 21 points ( 7 - 10 FG , 0 - 1 3Pt , 7 - 7 FT ) , 11 rebounds and 8 assists .
Russell_Westbrook had a solid showing as well , scoring 17 points ( 7 - 12 FG , 0 - 3 3Pt , 3 - 6 FT ) and handing out 6 assists .
He was well under his season scoring average of 25 points per game , but he only played 24 minutes , as the Thunder had a comfortable lead for most of the game .
The Thunder received a big contribution from their bench , as 3 players reached double figures in points .
Dion_Waiters was the best of those 3 , going 7 - for - 9 from the field and 1 - or - 2 from the three - point line to score 16 points in 20 minutes .
He 's started to heat up lately for the Thunder , combining for 37 points and 5 steals over his last 2 games .

The Los_Angeles_Lakers ( 19 - 51 ) defeated the Minnesota_Timberwolves ( 16 - 55 ) 101 - 99 in overtime on Wednesday at the Target Center in Minneapolis .
Despite being down 7 points coming out of the third quarter , the Timberwolves came back with a big fourth , out - scoring the Lakers 24 - 17 to even the score .
It was Chase_Budinger who forced this game into overtime , as he hit a three - pointer with just 6 seconds left in regulation .
Including the clutch free throws , Clarkson also recorded a team - high of 20 points ( 6 - 16 FG , 0 - 1 3Pt , 8 - 8 FT ) , to go along with 5 rebounds , 5 assists and 2 steals .
He just had a 30 - point , 7 - assist performance against the Oklahoma_City_Thunder on Tuesday , so it was another impressive showing for the rookie , who continues to display a lot of potential for the future .
Starting alongside Clarkson , Jeremy_Lin also played a factor in the win , finishing with 19 points ( 6 - 14 FG , 1 - 5 3Pt , 6 - 6 FT ) and 5 assists in 29 minutes .
Lin has really picked up his game of late , and is averaging 17 points , 5 assists and 1 steals over his last 3 games .

Including the three - pointer that sent this game to overtime , Budinger posted 22 points , while shooting 9 - for - 14 from the field and 3 - for - 6 from the three - point line .
Budinger has been a solid source of scoring for this team recently and is averaging 14 points , 5 rebounds and 1 steals over his last 5 games .
Rookie Zach_LaVine continued to show his potential as well , finishing with 18 points ( 5 - 18 FG , 1 - 5 3Pt , 7 - 8 FT ) , 6 rebounds and 5 assists .
During his last 2 games , he 's combined for 45 points , 9 rebounds and 9 assists , as he 's stepped up with injuries to Ricky_Rubio ( ankle ) and Kevin_Martin ( hamstring ) .

He went on to miss it though , and Dahntay_Jones sealed off the victory with 2 free throws on the other end for the Clippers .
The Clippers were the superior shooters in this one , going 48 percent from the field and 36 percent from the three - point line , while the Timberwolves finished at 44 percent from the floor and just 27 percent from deep .

The Golden_State_Warriors ( 46 - 4 ) defeated the Oklahoma_City_Thunder ( 38 - 14 ) 116 - 108 at Oracle Arena on Saturday .
In the thrilling matchup between 2 of the game 's best teams , containing 3 of the top 5 scorers in the league ( Stephen_Curry , Russell_Westbrook and Kevin_Durant ) , it took until the final minute for the Warriors to stop Oklahoma_City 's late comeback .
Oklahoma_City clawed their way back behind their stuper stars , and with 3:36 left in the fourth quarter , Enes_Kanter finished a turnaround shot at the rim to tie the game 104 - 104 .
Curry and Thompson scored on the following possessions , while Westbrook and Durant sank their free throws after earning tough fouls with under 1 minute to play .
A wild Curry rebound and full court toss to a streaking Andre_Iguodala ended the Thunder 's last chance after a missed Durant jumper , and the Warriors walked away with their 41st straight home win dating back to 2014 - 2015 .
Durant led all scorers with 40 points , to go along with 14 rebounds and 5 assists on 12 - of - 25 shooting , while Westbrook added 27 points , 3 rebounds and 12 assists on 8 - of - 22 shooting .
Curry led the Warriors with 26 points , 6 rebounds and 10 assists , despite only shooting 1 - of - 8 from the three - point line .
Marreese_Speights and Livingston combined for 25 points off the bench , while Harrison_Barnes delivered a clutch performance with 19 points , including multiple needed baskets from behind the arc and at the rim .
The Warriors will host the Houston_Rockets ( 27 - 26 ) on Tuesday , while the Thunder will visit the Phoenix_Suns ( 14 - 38 ) on Monday .
The Detroit_Pistons ( 28 - 29 ) defeated the Cleveland_Cavaliers ( 40 - 15 ) 96 - 88 on Monday .
It was a night of improbabilities , with the Pistons coming into the contest looking to snap a 5 - game losing streak at Quicken Loans Arena of all places , where Cleveland had only dropped 4 games all season .
Detroit was also coming off an absolute trampling at the hands of Anthony_Davis on Sunday , who generated a historic 59 - point , 20 - rebound performance .
However , the Pistons accomplished the highly unlikely feat Monday on the strength of suffocating defense against one of the game 's best players , and a highly balanced offensive effort from their starting 5 .
Detroit frustrated LeBron_James with their typically stellar play against small forwards , holding him to only 12 points on 5 - for - 18 shooting from the field , and forcing him into an uncharacteristic 6 turnovers .
They also notably shut out starting center Tristan_Thompson on the scoreboard , and held sharpshooter J.R. Smith to 7 points .
The Pistons were sperheaded by Reggie_Jackson 's 23 - point outing , which he supplemented with 4 assists , 3 rebounds and 3 steals .
Kentavious_Caldwell-Pope followed with his first productive performance since returning from a groin injury , totaling 19 points , 4 rebounds and 2 steals .
Andre_Drummond was next with one of his trademark double - doubles , in which he collected 16 points , 15 boards , 1 assist , 2 steals and 1 block .
Tobias_Harris and Marcus_Morris rounded matters out for the starting 5 with a pair of 14 - point outings .
The former also pitched in 5 rebounds , 3 assists and 3 steals in his first start in a Pistons uniform , while Morris supplied 4 assists and a pair of rebounds in addition to his outstanding defensive work on James .
Stanley_Johnson paced the reserves with 10 points , 4 rebounds , 1 assist and 1 block .
Detroit remains in fourth place in the Eastern Conference 's Central Division , and is currently 2 games back of the eighth - seeded Chicago_Bulls .
Kyrie_Irving was a bright spot on the night for Cleveland , as he managed 30 points , 5 assists , 1 rebound and a pair of steals after having to exit the Cavs 's last game with an illness .
Kevin_Love followed with 24 points , 7 rebounds and 3 assists .
James managed to complement his modest scoring total with 8 boards , 5 assists and 3 steals .
The bench was led by a modest 7 points from Matthew_Dellavedova , who also added 3 assists and 1 rebound .
The Phoenix_Suns ( 6 - 5 ) defeated the Boston_Celtics ( 3 - 6 ) 118 - 114 on Monday at TD Garden Arena in Boston .
Despite only shooting a total of 16 free throws compared to the 31 that the Celtics shot , the Suns were still able to hold off the second - half charge by the Celtics to secure the win after dropping their last 2 .
The Celtics are now riding a 3 - game losing streak , after losing by less than 5 points in their previous 2 games .
Markieff_Morris went off Monday , shooting 14 - for - 21 from the field and 1 - for - 3 from the three - point line to score 30 points , while also grabbing 7 rebounds .
This was a season - high for Morris , who scored only 5 points in their previous game against the Clippers .
Like Morris , this was a season - high for Dragic , who 's now combined for 41 points in his last 2 games .
For the second game in a row , Alex_Len performed well of the bench , as he scored 19 points ( 8 - 10 FG , 3 - 3 FT ) , and added 7 rebounds .
After reaching double figures only once in the first 9 games of the season , Len has now scored 17 and 19 points in consecutive games .
Marcus_Morris shot a solid 5 - for - 8 from the field and 3 - for - 5 from beyond the arc for 13 points and 7 assists .
The Celtics were led by Jeff_Green , who shot 59 percent from the field to score 28 points ( 10 - 17 FG , 0 - 4 3Pt , 8 - 9 FT ) , while also recording 2 steals .
Rajon_Rondo came 1 assist shy of his second triple - double , as he finished with 14 points , 10 rebounds and 9 assists .
Coming off the bench , Tyler_Zeller had a season - high 19 points , and pulled down 7 rebounds .
Jared_Sullinger also came up 2 rebounds shy of a double - double , as he posted 18 points and 8 rebounds .
The Charlotte_Hornets defeated the visiting New_York_Knicks , 107 - 102 , at Spectrum Center on Saturday .
Charlotte got out to a hot start , as they led 38 - 22 after the first quarter .
Defense was key for Charlotte , as they held New_York to 38 percent from the field and 37 percent from three - point range .
The Hornets also took advantage of the whistle , taking 21 more free - throw attempts than the Knicks .
New_York ( 8 - 8 ) had the tough task of winning both games of a home - and - home set and they did all they could to hang around in this tight loss .
Kristaps_Porzingis led the team in scoring , dropping 25 points and grabbing 6 boards .
Derrick_Rose fell just shy of a triple - double , accumulating 18 points , 8 rebounds and 8 assists .
Carmelo_Anthony also scored 18 points , adding 8 rebounds on an ugly 7 - of - 25 shooting .
Charlotte ( 9 - 7 ) had to play this game extremely shorthanded , but they got some huge performances from unexpected sources .
Jeremy_Lamb was the biggest surprise , as he scored a season - high 18 points and grabbed a career - high 17 rebounds in his first start with the Hornets .
Kemba_Walker led the team in scoring , tallying 28 points , 3 assists and 3 blocks in the win .
Cody_Zeller recorded a double - double , totaling 11 points and 10 rebounds .
Al_Horford finished with a monstrous 6 blocks , while leading the Celtics in scoring with 26 points , and also added 8 rebounds , 3 assists and 2 steals .
Isaiah_Thomas finished with 20 points , but struggled shooting , going 6 - of - 21 from the field , including 0 - of - 5 from long range , along with 7 assists , 3 rebounds , and 2 steals , in 34 minutes .
The Celtics bench struggled as 7 players combined for only 12 points .
Jae_Crowder shot 3 - of - 5 from long range on his was to 16 points in 37 minutes .
DeMarcus_Cousins led the way for the Kings , with 28 points , 9 rebounds , 4 blocks , 3 assists and 1 steal in 34 minutes .
The next highest scorers for Sacramento were Darren_Collison and Rudy_Gay , who both finished with 13 points .
Matt_Barnes finished with 12 points , 16 rebounds , 5 assists , 2 steals and 1 block in 31 minutes off the bench .
The Charlotte_Hornets ( 26 - 33 ) beat the Brooklyn_Nets ( 25 - 34 ) 115 - 91 on Wednesday .
The Hornets put the Nets in an early hole , outscoring them 35 - 15 in the first quarter .
Gerald_Henderson and Al_Jefferson each had 19 points to lead Charlotte , but it was Mo_Williams passing display that led them to victory .
Williams dished out 14 assists while committing just 1 turnover in 31 minutes .
Charlotte is now 30 in March and have won 4 of their last 5 games overall .
The Nets were coming off a 110 - 108 victory over the Western Conference leading Golden_State_Warriors on Monday .
They could n't find anywhere near the same success against Charlotte , who they are currently battling with for 1 the Eastern Conference 's final playoff spots .
Deron_Williams led his team with 12 points and 6 assists in what was also a team - high 27 minutes .
The returning Mike_Conley scored a team - high 22 points on 8 - of - 11 shooting , including 3 - of - 5 from three - point range .

DeMarcus_Cousins 's game - high 26 points paced the Kings .
Matt_Barnes ( 20 points ) and Darren_Collison ( 16 points ) were also productive , while Anthony_Tolliver registered 16 points off the bench .
The Atlanta_Hawks ( 50 - 13 ) defeated the Sacramento_Kings ( 21 - 42 ) 130 - 105 on Monday at Philips Arena in Atlanta .
In an all - around dominant effort from the Hawks , they built an early lead , gathering a 76 - 54 advantage by half .
The Hawks shot extremely well in this game , going 60 percent from the field and 56 percent from the three - point line , while the Kings went 48 percent from the floor and 40 percent from deep .
The Hawks also forced the Kings into 16 turnovers , while committing just 13 of their own .
Al_Horford led the way , scoring 20 points ( 9 - 13 FG ) , to go along with 4 rebounds and 3 blocked shots .
Kyle_Korver also had his shot dialed in , going 7 - for - 9 from the field and 6 - for - 8 from the three - point line to score 20 points in 31 minutes .

DeMarre_Carroll added 20 points ( 8 - 16 FG , 4 - 9 3Pt , 0 - 1 FT ) and 5 rebounds as well .
Gay went 10 - for - 15 from the field and 3 - for - 4 from the three - point line to score 23 points , while adding 4 rebounds and 1 blocked shot as well .
During the Kings 's 4 - game losing streak , he 's been one of the few bright spots , as he 's averaged 30 points and 7 rebounds per game over his last 3 outings .
Recording somewhat of an off game , DeMarcus_Cousins finished with just 12 points ( 3 - 9 FG , 6 - 6 FT ) , but still grabbed 14 rebounds and 6 assists .
After shooting just 30 percent ( 3 - 10 FG ) in Saturday 's game against the Heat , it was good to see him get things turned around .
Ben_McLemore added 12 points ( 4 - 16 FG , 2 - 8 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) and 3 assists as well .

After going into halftime down by 1 , Atlanta came out strong and took care of business against the Hornets .

The Orlando_Magic ( 8 - 8 ) destroyed the Milwaukee_Bucks ( 6 - 10 ) 114 - 90 on Friday .
Orlando outscored Milwaukee by 21 points in the second and third quarters and the result was decided well before the final whistle .
The key to the Magic 's success was their three - point shooting , as they went 12 - for - 27 from long distance .
The assist - differential was huge as well , as Orlando recorded 30 to the Bucks 20 .
They were led by a fantastic performance from Elfrid_Payton , who tallied 22 points and 10 assists in the win .

The Cleveland_Cavaliers ( 10 ) defeated the Atlanta_Hawks ( 0 - 1 ) 97 - 89 on Tuesday at Philips Arena in Atlanta .
The Hawks got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Cavaliers by 6 in the first quarter .
The Cavaliers heated up in the second though , pulling the score even at 51 before heading into the break .
The Cavaliers then extended their lead to 14 during the third and looked as if they had control of this game , but the Hawks fought back in the fourth and came within 4 points with just under 1 minute left in the game .
The Cavaliers were the superior shooters , going 44 percent from the field and 39 percent from the three - point line , while the Hawks finished at 44 percent from the floor but just 17 percent from deep .
Along with the strong showing from the floor , the Cavaliers also secured a 49 - 37 rebounding advantage .
James went 12 - for - 26 from the field and 7 - for - 8 from the free throw line to score a game - high of 31 points , while also adding 8 rebounds and 6 assists .
So far this postseason , James is averaging 27 points , 10 rebounds , 8 assists and 2 steals per game .
Over 35 mintues , Smith went a ridiculous 10 - for - 16 from the field and 8 - for - 12 from deep to score 28 points , to go along with 8 rebounds and 3 assists .
Tristan_Thompson added 14 points ( 5 - 7 FG , 4 - 7 FT ) , 10 rebounds and 2 blocked shots , while Timofey_Mozgov chipped in with 10 points ( 5 - 9 FG ) and 11 rebounds .
Teague has been extremely effective over his last 4 games , shooting 45 percent or higher from the field in each of those outings .
During that span he 's averaging 22 points and 6 assists per game , but he did n't received enough help from the rest of his team Wednesday , so the Hawks took the loss and were stripped of homecourt advantage .

The Nuggets went into the fourth quarter with an 85 - 78 point lead , looking as if they could knock off the outstanding Trail_Blazers .
But the Nuggets were unable to get enough scoring production in the final quarter and were out - scored 27 - 18 to suffer a tough 2 - point defeat .
Aldridge went off for 39 points ( 16 - 30 FG , 0 - 1 3Pt , 7 - 9 FT ) and 11 rebounds , giving him his fifth double - double in the last 6 games .
He 's also combined for 83 points in the previous 3 outings , exemplifying just how hot Aldridge is at the moment .

He scored 17 points and 6 assists , as he did n't have to do much else with the production Aldridge had .
Wes Matthews also could n't seem to find his three - point stroke , as he went a dismal 1 - for - 10 from deep , but still contributed 15 points .
Steve_Blake , who 's been a big contributor off the bench all season , continued to play well and went a perfect 5 - for - 5 from the field and 3 - for - 3 from beyond the arc to score 13 points in the comeback victory .
Lawson shot well on Tuesday , going 9 - for - 16 from the floor and 3 - for - 4 from the three - point line to score 24 points .

Chandler recorded 10 rebounds as well , notching his second double - double of the season , while Afflalo added 4 assists .
J.J. Hickson was the only other Nuggets 's player to reach double figures , as he had 11 points in 30 minutes .
Despite the contract extension in the offseason , Kenneth_Faried has yet to make a big impact and had only 8 points and 5 rebounds against the Blazers .

Houston ( 18 - 7 ) is one of the league 's hottest teams , having won 12 of its last 14 contests .

This seemed to be a theme for the entire team on Monday , as the Rockets hit only 58 percent from the line .
Brooklyn ( 6 - 17 ) , meanwhile , finds itself in the opposite situation of Houston , having lost 12 of its last 14 games .
Lin saw 20 minutes of play time and had 10 points and 7 assists .
The Nets shot over 52 percent from the field as a team , but had turnover issues , committing 19 by the game 's end .
Big man Brook_Lopez led the team in scoring with 26 .

Utah forced Miami to shoot 30 percent from three - point range and held them to just 80 shot attempts .

Miami 's bench was the only thing keeping them around in this game , as they outscored the Utah bench 49 - 32 .

The Atlanta_Hawks defeated the Chicago_Bulls 115 - 107 at Phillips Arena on Wednesday .
The Hawks ( 6 - 2 ) had their full starting lineup back on Wednesday after Kyle_Korver ( personal ) missed their victory over the undefeated Cavaliers on Tuesday .
Of the 5 players that saw time off the bench for the Hawks , 4 of them scored in double figures with Thabo_Sefolosha 's season - high 20 points leading not just the reserves , but the entire team .
For the starters , the frontcourt consisting of Paul_Millsap and Dwight_Howard each had a double - double and combined to record 34 points and 21 rebounds .
The Bulls ( 4 - 4 ) , on the other hand , have now lost 4 of their last 5 games after starting the season 30 .
Butler finished with a game - high 39 points , 7 assists , 4 rebounds and 6 steals , while Wade scored 25 points managed 5 steals of his own .
So , while Butler and Wade combined the score 64 , the rest of the team managed to score a lowly 43 points with the next highest scoring total being Taj_Gibson 's 43 .
And despite the hot shooting nights form Butler and Wade , the team still managed to shoot just 45 percent from the field .
Joel_Embiid 's 25 points paced the Sixers , but a 2 - point basket by Robert_Covington as time expired offset a Ricky_Rubio three - pointer only a second earlier that had tied the game at 91 .
Covington generated a 13 - point , 10 - rebound double - double , while Ersan_Ilyasova registered 19 points .
Nerlens_Noel and Saric led the second unit with matching 8 - point tallies , with the latter contributing 7 boards and the game - winning assist .
