The Sacramento_Kings ( 15 - 20 ) defeated the Oklahoma_City_Thunder ( 17 - 19 ) 104 - 83 on Wednesday at Sleep Train Arena in Sacramento .
The Kings came out hot right from the start , out - scoring the Thunder 28 - 16 in the first quarter .
They had superior shooting all night , going 39 percent from the field and 53 percent from the three - point line as a team , compared to the Thunder who went 33 percent from the floor and only 30 percent from beyond the arc .
Sacramento was also able to force the Thunder into 24 turnovers , while giving it up only 16 times themselves .
DeMarcus_Cousins also reached the 20 - point mark , as he double - doubled with 23 points ( 6 - 23 FG ) and 15 rebounds .
Starting at point guard , Darren_Collison went 9 - for - 19 from the field and 5 - for - 10 from beyond the arc to score 24 points , while adding 7 assists to go along with it .
Ben_McLemore and Carl_Landry had 11 and 10 points respectively .
Kevin_Durant led the Thunder with 24 points ( 8 - 20 FG , 3 - 7 3Pt , 5 - 7 FG ) and 9 rebounds .
Serge_Ibaka nearly recorded a triple - double , with 11 points ( 5 - 10 FG , 1 - 2 3Pt ) , 10 rebounds and 8 blocked shots .
The 8 blocked shots were a season - high for him , but it did n't help the Thunder enough , as their offense was too poor in this one to overcome their large deficit .
In his Thunder debut , Dion_Waiters got 22 minutes of game action , but struggled with his shot and went just 1 - for - 9 from the field and 0 - for - 3 from deep to score 4 points .
The Utah_Jazz ( 30 - 36 ) defeated the Charlotte_Hornets ( 29 - 36 ) 94 - 66 on Monday in Salt Lake City .
Rodney_Hood led the way , putting in a career - best effort of 24 points on 9 - of - 11 shooting in just 22 minutes .
Hood has been in a groove as of late , averaging 18 points in his last 4 outings .
Rudy_Gobert continues to be dominant on the glass , recording his second 22 - rebound game in his last 3 outings , to go along with 9 points .

Al_Jefferson recorded 10 points and 7 rebounds and was the only other Charlotte player in double figures .
Charlotte shot a woeful 30 percent from the field and recorded just 9 assists on 23 made field goals .
The Atlanta_Hawks ( 27 - 19 ) defeated the Denver_Nuggets ( 17 - 28 ) 119 - 105 on Monday night .
The Hawks won nearly every battle in the stat sheet , as they outassisted the Nuggets by 10 and held them to under 40 percent shooting in the win .
A 35 - 20 second quarter was a big difference in the game as well , as the Hawks never let the Nuggets get much closer after that .
The point guards were fantastic for the Hawks tonight as well , as Jeff_Teague and Dennis_Schroder combined for 27 points , 8 rebounds and 15 assists in the win .
This capped off an 8 - game homestand for the Nuggets , and the 4 - 4 record is nothing to be disappointed about .
Will_Barton was the lone bright spot in the defeat , as he scored 21 points and snatched down 8 boards in the loss .
Danilo_Gallinari has been carrying this team on his back over recent weeks , but he went just 3 - for - 9 from the field in a 15 - point outing .
The shooting is bad , but 9 shots is simply not enough out of a player like Gallinari for the Nuggets to succeed .
The Hornets 's dynamic duo of Kemba_Walker and Nicolas_Batum combined for 39 points and 18 rebounds ( 14 of which came from Batum ) , which overcame Andre_Drummond 's 26 - point , 20 - rebound double - double for Detroit .

Kentavious_Caldwell-Pope and Marcus_Morris supplied a pair of 7 - point efforts , and the latter also hauled in 10 rebounds .
The Orlando_Magic defeated the Atlanta_Hawks , 105 - 86 , at Amway Center on Saturday night .
The Magic ( 22 - 38 ) made 1 major move at the trade deadline , sending Serge_Ibaka to the Raptors for swingman Terrence_Ross .
Ross particularly shined Saturday , tallying 24 points , 4 rebounds , 2 assists , 2 steals and 1 block to lead the offense .
The Magic also stymied the Hawks ( 32 - 26 ) on the other end of the floor , limiting them to respective 38 and 32 percent success rates from the floor and three - point range and also goading them into 17 turnovers .
Tim Hardaway , Jr. spearheaded the Hawks 's attack with a modest 15 points that he complemented with 3 rebounds and 1 steal .
A quartet of 11 - point efforts from Dwight_Howard , Paul_Millsap , Taurean_Prince and Dennis_Schroder followed .
Newly-acquired Ersan_Ilyasova mustered only 5 points but posted 10 rebounds in 25 minutes off the bench .
Ross was seconded by Aaron_Gordon , who went for 18 points , 3 rebounds , 3 assists and 2 steals .

Augustin led the bench with 8 points and 2 assists .

The Timberwolves are enjoying their best month of the season , with a record of 5 - 4 in February .

This was a tight 1 the whole way , as no team built a lead greater than 5 points at any point in the second half or overtime until the Thunder 's final free throws of the game with 6 seconds to go in the extra period .
Both teams shot lights out from three - point land - - 11 of 20 for Oklahoma_City and 11 of 21 for New_York - - as both teams put on an offensive show .
Kevin_Durant took over the game for the Thunder , as he poured in 44 points , grabbed 4 rebounds and distributed 5 assists .

The Thunder won the rebounding battle 59 - 43 , including a 16 - 9 advantage on the offensive glass .

The Pacers now have a 3 - game win streak going , due in large part to the elite play of George .

Stephen_Curry carried the Warriors with 34 point Sunday , while 3 of their bench players finished in double figures to help make up for some of the lack of scoring out of the team 's starters .
Golden_State shot 51 percent from the field and 46 percent from beyond the arc to seal the win .
The Warriors will wrap up their 3 - game road trip in a battle of titans on Tuesday when they visit Memphis to take on the Grizzlies .

The host Sacramento_Kings took down the Detroit_Pistons on Tuesday , 100 - 94 , at Golden 1 Center .
Sacramento ( 16 - 22 ) trailed by double - digits at points in the second half , but mounted a major comeback with a 32 - 17 scoring advantage in the fourth quarter .
Cousins led the team with 24 points , 13 rebounds , and 6 assists , while also adding 1 steal and 1 block .
The Kings were able to hold a substantial advantage on the glass , out - rebounding Detroit 46 - 35 .
The Kings hit 54 percent of their shots from beyond the arc .
Detroit ( 18 - 22 ) was not as careless with the ball but struggled in multiple areas on Tuesday .
The Pistons recorded just 14 assists on the night , relying heavily on transition offense and ISO ball to lead to scoring .
This was largely due to strong play from All-Star center Andre_Drummond , who recorded a whopping 7 blocks to go with 2 steals and 12 rebounds .
The Pistons were not as effective covering the perimeter , however , as the team allowed 13 three - pointers on the night .
The Chicago_Bulls ( 12 - 8 ) resisted a late surge by the Los_Angeles_Clippers ( 13 - 10 ) to hang onto a much - needed win .
Chicago 's victory snapped a 3 - game losing streak and came on the second half of a back - to - back following the team 's loss to the Boston_Celtics on Wednesday .
Despite a lackluster shooting night ( 4 - 14 FGM , 0 - 2 3PM ) , Bulls star Jimmy_Butler was able to control the game in other ways , distributing the ball well for 8 assists and recording both 2 steals and 2 blocks .
Chicago 's other reigning All-Star , Pau_Gasol , matched Butler 's defensive stats while leading the way with a big 24 points on offense .
The Clippers , who had won 3 straight headed into their matchup against Chicago , saw questionable offensive efficiency throughout the game .
The team shot just 34 percent from the field , including a dismal 2 - for - 11 night from starter J.J. Redick .
On a more positive note , star power forward Blake_Griffin continued his campaign to establish himself as one of the league 's premier players , scoring 18 points on solid 7 - for - 14 shooting and pulling down 11 rebounds .
While Thursday 's game snapped their winning streak , the Clippers should hope to bounce back as they take on the 7 - 15 Nets in Brooklyn on Saturday .
This marks the Pelicans fourth win in 5 games , while the Clippers have now lost 4 - straight .
The biggest difference in this matchup was transition defense , as New_Orleans won the fastbreak differential , 29 - 2 .
Chris_Paul made his return from a 2 - game absence to tally 21 points , 8 rebounds and 6 assists in the defeat .
Austin_Rivers led the team in scoring , as he dropped 22 points .
DeAndre_Jordan was a beast down low for Los_Angeles , finishing with 13 points and 25 rebounds .
Anthony_Davis led the Pelicans in scoring , as he accrued 20 points , 5 rebounds and 3 steals .
Buddy_Hield was second on the team , as he scored 17 points on 7 - of - 11 shooting .
New_Orleans bench has been one of the worst in the league , but they had Langston_Galloway , Terrence_Jones , Tyreke_Evans and E'Twaun_Moore combine for 43 points off the bench in this win .
The Cleveland_Cavaliers beat the visiting Detroit_Pistons , 107 - 90 , on Wednesday at Quicken Loans Arena to take a 20 series lead in the Eastern Conference first - round playoffs .
In an unsurprising turn of events , superstar LeBron_James led the scoring charge for Cleveland , recording 27 points on the night .
James was highly efficient , converting 12 of 18 shots from the field and hitting a pair of three - pointers .
Wednesday also marked a significant individual milestone for James , as he passed Michael Jordan in terms of career playoff games played with 180 .
Forward Kevin_Love posted a 16 - point , 10 - rebound double - double , while point guard Kyrie_Irving scored 22 points and also dished 4 assists .
All-Star center and NBA rebounding leader Andre_Drummond had just 7 boards in the contest while also going a dismal 4 - for - 16 from the free - throw line .
Things were n't much better for frontcourt partner Tobias_Harris , who shot just 3 - for - 11 from the field on Wednesday .
Perhaps the biggest issue for Detroit , however , was the gap in perimeter shooting ; the Pistons hit just 4 three - pointers while allowing a whopping 20 for Cleveland .
Game 3 will take place in Detroit .
While the final score may indicate that Tuesday 's game between the Thunder and Jazz went wire - to - wire , Oklahoma_City actually had control of the game through the first 3 quarter thanks in large part to their impressive shooting from behind the arc .
The Thunder opened Tuesday 's contest hitting 12 of their first 12 three - point attempts .
Russell_Westbrook and Doug_McDermott each opened the game shooting 4 - of - 4 from behind the arc , while Alex_Abrines was 2 - of - 2 , and both Jerami_Grant and Andre_Roberson hit 1 from downtown .
Westbrook ended up missing the team 's first 3 with just 32 seconds left in the first half , but overall , Oklahoma_City managed to hit 14 of their first 15 shots from behind the arc .
The New_Orleans_Pelicans ( 20 - 20 ) defeated the Toronto_Raptors ( 26 - 14 ) 95 - 93 on Sunday .
New_Orleans found a way to knock off the Raptors despite being without 2 of their starters for a second straight game .
Anthony_Davis has missed 2 straight games with a turf toe injury , and Jrue_Holiday has missed 3 straight games dealing with inflamation in his right ankle , the same ankle that caused Holiday to sit out most of last season with a stress fracture .
Evans was aided by superb play off the bench from Alexis_Ajinca , who put up 22 points and 6 rebounds in 34 minutes .
They remain 3 games behind the Phoenix_Suns for the final playoff spot in the Western Conference .
Toronto has dropped 2 straight games , falling to the Atlanta_Hawks 110 - 89 on Friday before losing Sunday 's game as well .
After losing the first 2 quarters Sunday , the Raptors moved Terrence_Ross to the bench for the second half and started Greivis_Vasquez in his place .
After sitting atop the Eastern Conference standings for the better part of the first 2 months of the season , Toronto has started to fall in the standings .
They 've dropped 7 of their last 9 games to fall 7 games behind the East-leading Atlanta_Hawks .
DeMar_DeRozan returned to action 3 games ago , but he has n't brought the Raptors back to their elite level , yet .
The Utah_Jazz rallied back to defeat the host Minnesota_Timberwolves 94 - 92 , at Target Center on Saturday evening .
The Jazz used an 110 run late in the fourth quarter to come back and steal 1 from the Timberwolves .
Utah ( 23 - 15 ) snapped their short 2 - game losing streak with an impressive come back win , thanks to a solid team performance .
Five players scored in double digits for the Jazz , led by George_Hill , who finished with 19 points , along with 7 assists and 5 rebounds , in 33 minutes .
This was Hill 's first game back after missing 3 games due to concussion protocol , but he did not look like he missed a beat , as he led the way for the Jazz .
Gordon_Hayward followed up with 16 points , while Rudy_Gobert continued his dominance in the paint , as he finished with 12 points , 13 rebounds and 4 blocks , in 31 minutes .
The Jazz move to 11 - 8 on the road and will be right back in action on Sunday , as they face the fifth and final game of their current road trip , when they visit Memphis .
Meanwhile , the Timberwolves ( 11 - 26 ) completely fell apart , as they went scoreless in the final 4:40 of the fourth quarter , leading to their fourth straight loss .
All 5 starters scored in double digits for the T-Wolves , led by Zach_LaVine , who finished with 24 points , to go along with 9 rebounds , 4 assists and 1 steal , in 38 minutes .
Karl-Anthony_Towns was solid , with 18 points and 15 rebounds , while Andrew_Wiggins chipped in 16 points .
Minnesota 's bench was very quiet , adding only 11 points to the cause .
The Timberwolves fall to 6 - 13 at home and can only look ahead to their next contest , when they play host to the Mavericks on Monday , for a chance to get back on track .

The New_Orleans_Pelicans defeated the Los_Angeles_Clippers , 102 - 98 , at Smoothie King Center on Wednesday .
Despite the Clippers leading by 8 after the first quarter , the Pelicans fought back and took control in the fourth .

Defense was key for the Pelicans , as they held the Clippers to 39 percent from the field and 30 percent from three - point range .
The Pelicans were very efficient on offense too , as they shot 46 percent and committed just 6 turnovers .
Fastbreak points was the most decisive statistic though , as New_Orleans won that category , 29 - 2 .

Brook_Lopez was able to tie the game at 88 with 25 seconds to go , but Nerlens_Noel came back with a clutch jumper of his own , giving the Sixers the go - ahead bucket with just 3 seconds left in the game .
The Sixers secured a large three - point advantage in this game , going 47 percent from beyond the arc , while the Nets went just 19 percent from deep .

Joseph countered with 2 more baskets , putting the Spurs up for good with 3:55 remaining .
The teams traded baskets down the stretch , but the San_Antonio lead never shrunk to lower than 3 points .

The Dallas_Mavericks defeated the Los_Angeles_Clippers , 97 - 95 , at American Airlines Center on Thursday .
Dallas have now beat Los_Angeles twice this season in 3 games , as they clearly match up well with this Clipper team .
The assist - to - turnover ratio was decisive , as Dallas recorded 26 assists to 9 turnovers , while Los_Angeles committed 17 turnovers to just 18 assists .
The Clippers ( 43 - 30 ) had a tough task here against a desperate Mavs team and they fell just short in this tight battle .
Blake_Griffin led the way for Los_Angeles , as he tallied 21 points , 5 rebounds and 2 assists .
DeAndre_Jordan recorded a double - double , totaling 14 points , 18 rebounds and 2 blocks .
Chris_Paul finished with 15 points , 6 rebounds , 6 assists and 3 steals .
The Mavericks ( 31 - 40 ) are trying to keep their playoffs hope alive and this win can only help that pursuit .
Seth_Curry scored a game - high 23 points to lead Dallas , as he also added 3 rebounds and 4 assists to his tally .
Harrison_Barnes was the hero , as he scored 21 points in addition to hitting the go - ahead jumper with 1 minute left , following that up with a crucial steal .
Dirk_Nowitzki accrued 14 points , 4 rebounds , 4 assists and 2 steals .
Nerlens_Noel got the start and collected 8 points , 12 rebounds , 3 assists , 2 steals and 2 blocks .
The Milwaukee_Bucks ( 32 - 25 ) beat the Philadelphia_76ers ( 12 - 45 ) 104 - 88 on Wednesday .
Jerryd_Bayless moved back to a bench role with the availability of Carter-Williams , but the former still scored 13 points in 30 minutes .
He came off the bench and led Milwaukee in scoring with 21 points to go along with 9 rebounds , 3 blocks , 2 assists and 2 steals in 29 minutes .
Playing in just his third game of the season , Jason_Richardson ( knee ) started at shooting guard and led the Sixers in scoring with 16 points in 25 minutes .
Thomas_Robinson , who was acquired of waivers this week , played 13 minutes and finished with 7 points and 6 rebounds .
However , Philadelphia has lost 5 straight games and have n't beat a team that is currently over .500 since defeating the New_Orleans_Pelicans on Jan. 16 .
Meanwhile , the Bucks will begin a 4 - game West Coast road trip Friday against the Los_Angeles_Lakers .
Aaron_Gordon 's season - high 20 points Gordon keyed a season - high point total for the Magic .
Evan_Fournier and Serge_Ibaka had a pair of 16 - point efforts , and D.J .
Augustin supplied 9 points , 4 assists and 3 rebounds in another start at point guard .
Bismack_Biyombo and Nicola Vucevic continue to make for an effective 1 - 2 punch , combining for 24 rebounds .
Jeff_Green led the reserves with a 16 - point effort .
Joel_Embiid celebrated the raising of his minutes limit with a 25 - point , 10 - rebound double - double for the Sixers .
However , the remaining members of the first unit - - Gerald_Henderson , Robert_Covington , Sergio_Rodriguez and Ersan_Ilyasova - - combined for just 33 points overall , Jahlil_Okafor 's 16 - point , 13 - rebound double - double led the second unit .
The Philadelphia_76ers defeated the host Chicago_Bulls , 117 - 107 , at United Center on Friday .
They did most of their damage in the middle quarters , as they outscored the Bulls , 69 - 43 , in the second and third quarter .
Shooting was the glaring difference , with the Sixers shooting 55 percent to the Bulls 41 percent .
Philadelphia also took care of the glass , winning the rebounding battle , 46 - 39 .
It was n't just the rebounding , as the Sixers outscored the Bulls , 70 - 30 , in the paint .
Dario_Saric led the way , as he collected 32 points and 10 rebounds .
T.J._McConnell was the only other starter in double figures , as he accrued 10 points , 5 rebounds , 8 assists and 3 steals .
Philly 's bench was huge , with Gerald_Henderson , Shawn_Long and Sergio_Rodriguez all scoring in double figures , Rodriguez finished with 12 points , 4 rebounds and 7 assists , while Long amassed 18 points and 7 rebounds .
The Bulls ( 34 - 39 ) have just 3 wins in their last 12 games , with this being one of the low points of the season .
Jimmy_Butler did all he could though , leading the team with 36 points , 7 rebounds , 11 assists and 3 steals .
Nikola_Mirotic was the only other starter with more than 4 points , as he totaled 15 points , 4 rebounds and 2 assists .
Bobby_Portis played well off the bench , amassing 17 points and 11 rebounds on 8 - of - 11 from the field .
Rajon_Rondo accumulated 4 points , 4 rebounds , 5 assists and 4 steals .
The Orlando_Magic ( 3 - 6 ) traveled to Madison Square Garden and took down the New_York_Knicks ( 2 - 7 ) 97 - 95 on Wednesday night .
The Magic showed up when it mattered most on Wednesday night , outscoring the Knicks by 4 in the fourth quarter to get the 2 point victory .
Evan_Fournier led the scoring output for Orlando , as he finished with 28 points ( 8 - 14 FG , 2 - 4 3Pt , 10 - 14 FT ) , 4 steals , 2 assists and 2 rebounds as well .
Nikola_Vucevic added an impressive double - double with 20 points ( 8 - 15 FG , 4 - 4 FT ) and 13 rebounds .
The Magic snapped a 2 game losing streak with this win , and now head back home to take on the Milwaukee_Bucks on Friday night .
It 's been a painful start to the 2014 season for Carmelo_Anthony and company , and this loss had to be tough to swallow .
Anthony led the way with 27 points ( 10 - 17 FG , 2 - 4 3Pt , 5 - 6 FT ) , to go along with 5 rebounds , 1 assist , 1 steal and 1 block .
New_York is still trying to find their identity , and this was their sixth loss in a row , after a promising 2 - 1 start to the year .
The Pelicans ( 13 - 12 ) got 30 points and 14 rebounds from Anthony_Davis and knocked off the Rockets ( 19 - 6 ) 99 - 90 in Houston on Thursday .
Davis shot 10 - of - 17 from the field and 10 - of - 12 from the line and added blocks to go with only 1 turnover in 41 minutes .
Jrue_Holiday added 16 points for New_Orleans , while Austin_Rivers , starting in place of Tyreke_Evans , finished with 10 points and 6 assists .
Ryan_Anderson added 15 points off the bench , and Dante_Cunningham contributed 11 ( 6 - 10 FG ) .
The Pelicans trailed entering the fourth quarter but outscored Houston 34 - 22 in the final period .
The Rockets were led by 17 points and 13 rebounds from Dwight_Howard in his second game back from a knee injury .
James_Harden added 21 points but shot a miserable 8 - of - 23 from the field .
Trevor_Ariza finished with 10 points ( 4 - 12 FG ) and Patrick_Beverley and Donatas_Motiejunas each contributed 9 .
The Rockets shot a paltry 38 percent from the floor and just 6 - of - 25 from beyond the arc .
They outscored New_Orleans 48 - 38 in the paint but were out - rebounded by a 2 - board margin , an unusual statistic from one of the league 's better rebounding teams .
The Utah_Jazz ( 21 - 25 ) defeated the Minnesota_Timberwolves ( 14 - 34 ) 103 - 90 on Friday .
It was Favors 's first start after having missed 16 games with a back injury , given that he 'd come off the bench in the first pair of contests since his return .
Minnesota was spearheaded by Towns , who posted a career - high 32 points , 12 boards , 1 assist , 1 steal and 1 block .
Dieng tallied 20 points and 15 rebounds of his own , along with a pair of assists and a pair of steals .
No other starter managed to get into double digits , but Zach_LaVine did contribute 19 points to pace the Minnesota reserves .
Shabazz_Muhammad was productive off the bench as well , amassing 11 points , 4 rebounds , 1 assist and 1 steal .
Utah was led by Rodney_Hood 's 22 point - effort , which he complemented with 4 assists , 1 rebound and 1 steal .
Favors poured in 20 points of his own , while also hauling in 9 rebounds , dishing out 1 assist and recording 1 block .
Gobert was next with a 14 - point , 12 - rebound double - double , which also included a pair of assists , a pair of steals and a pair of blocks .
With Favors back in the starting 5 and Hood having another strong shooting night , Gordon_Hayward had a relatively quiet game by his lofty standards , totaling 12 points , 5 rebounds and 2 assists .
The bench was led by Trey_Burke 's 12 points , which were complemented by 1 rebound , 1 assist and 2 steals .
Trevor_Booker also contributed a near double - double in a reserve role , pouring in 11 points and hauling down 8 boards .
The host Los_Angeles_Lakers handily defeated the Golden_State_Warriors on Friday , 117 - 97 .
It was Lakers ( 3 - 3 ) coach Luke Walton 's first game against the Warriors since leaving the organization over the offseason .
Walton coached the Warriors for the beginning of their historic 2015 - 16 regular season in place of an injured Steve Kerr , but later left to pursue the head coaching job in Los_Angeles .
Third-year forward Julius_Randle led the team with 20 points and was a monster on the boards , pulling down 14 rebounds .
The Lakers also saw success from the line , hitting over 90 percent of their free - throws .
For the Warriors ( 4 - 2 ) , it was a tough night from beyond the arc .
After showing dominant offensive flow on Thursday in a rout of the Thunder , the Warriors shot just 5 - for - 32 from 3 in Friday 's contest .
This included 0 - for - 10 for Steph Curry , whose NBA-record streak of 157 games with a three - point make finally came to an end .
The results were n't much better for Klay_Thompson , who went just 2 - for - 10 .
Kevin_Durant , meanwhile , continued to perform with his new team , leading the game with 27 points .
The New_York_Knicks ( 22 - 22 ) needed overtime to pick up a home win Wednesday night at Madison Square Garden over the Utah_Jazz ( 18 - 24 ) , 118 - 111 .
The Knicks came back from deficits of 11 at halftime and 8 heading into the fourth quarter to take an 87 - 86 lead with 3:54 to play on a Kristaps_Porzingis three - pointer .
It looked like that lead would hold up until Porzingis fouled Gordon_Hayward on a three - point shot up 99 - 96 with just 2 seconds left on the clock .
Hayward hit the free throws and forced overtime , but the Knicks shot a scorching 6 - 9 from the field in the extra period to seal the win .
Carmelo_Anthony led all scorers with 30 points on an efficient 13 - 20 shooting from the field , and he filled up the stat sheet with 9 assists and 7 rebounds .
The rest of the Knicks front court stepped up as well , as Robin_Lopez dropped 22 points , grabbed 12 rebounds and blocked 3 shots and Porzingis added 16 points , 5 rebounds , and 3 blocks .
Derrick_Williams added 19 off the bench as the Knicks won the points in the paint battle 50 - 30 .
The Jazz knocked down 12 three - pointers to keep pace with New_York 's big men , including 5 from Rodney_Hood , who led the Jazz with 29 points and added 6 rebounds and 5 assists .
Gordon_Hayward poured in 27 points ( 8 - 19 FG , 10 - 10 FT ) , but nobody else managed more than 13 .
The Jazz actually shot worse from 2 ( 25 - 59 , 42 percent ) than 3 ( 12 - 27 , 44 percent ) , and it was their inability to capitalize inside despite 14 offensive rebounds that cost them .
The struggling Milwaukee_Bucks ( 16 - 24 ) topped the visiting Chicago_Bulls ( 22 - 15 ) on Tuesday , 106 - 101 .
Forward Giannis_Antetokounmpo had a career night for the Bucks , who had lost 3 of their last 4 games .
Antetokounmpo scored 29 points on 10 - for - 14 shooting with 10 rebounds , 5 assists , 1 block and 1 steal .
Center Greg_Monroe complimented Antetekoumpo 's stellar outing with a strong performance of his own , scoring 17 points and pulling down 12 rebounds .
Monroe has now reached double - digit rebounds in 4 straight games and has double - doubles in 3 of his last 4 outings .
Overall , the Bucks were able to win the game on the glass , out - rebounding Chicago 57 - 40 .
Tuesday was no exception , as Butler led the way with 30 points , 8 rebounds , and 6 assists against Milwaukee .
Wing Tony_Snell complemented Butler 's performance with a 17 - point , 7 - rebound outburst off the bench .
While Chicago was able to score at will on the perimeter ( shooting 41 percent from three - point range ) , the team saw a huge deficit on the boards and in the paint , where they were outscored 62 - 32 .
Four of the 5 starters for Dallas scored in double digits , led by Harrison_Barnes , who finished with 21 points and 7 rebounds , in 37 minutes .
Seth_Curry followed up with 18 points , 5 rebounds and 4 assists , in 32 minutes , while Yogi_Ferrell added 17 points , 2 assists , 2 rebounds and 1 steal , in 34 minutes .

Meanwhile , Isaiah_Whitehead led the Nets with 24 points on 8 - of - 12 shooting , in only 25 minutes off the bench .
Jeremy_Lin finished with 18 points , 5 rebounds , 3 assists and 2 steals , in 27 minutes , while Quincy_Acy chipped in 12 points and 4 rebounds .
The only other player to score in double digits for the Nets was Trevor_Booker , who finished with 15 points .
The Houston_Rockets ( 35 - 34 ) defeated the Minnesota_Timberwolves ( 22 - 47 ) 116 - 111 on Friday .
The 2 teams also saw all 5 members of their respective starting fives manage double - digit point totals , and the Rockets received another standout performance from reserve forward Michael_Beasley , who 's proven to be a spectacular signing so far .

Kyrie_Irving 's shot has been red - hot over the first 2 games .
On Friday , he combined with LeBron_James and Kevin_Love for 65 of Cleveland 's 94 points , while Tristan_Thompson posted an 11 - point , 10 - rebound effort .
Much like Irving , DeMar_DeRozan has been the linchpin of his offense over the first 2 contests , posting 72 combined points and leading the Raptors in scoring in both games .
Jonas_Valanciunas has also gotten the season off to an impressive start , with an average of 14 rebounds over the first 2 contests , including a game - high 17 on Friday .
Terrence_Ross 's 24 points , his best to date in a Magic uniform , led the way .

Newly-acquired Ersan_Ilyasova mustered only 5 points but posted 10 rebounds in 25 minutes off the bench .
The New_Orleans_Pelicans ( 22 - 33 ) defeated the host Detroit_Pistons ( 27 - 29 ) 111 - 106 , on Sunday at Palace of Auburn Hills .
With the Pistons on the fringe of the top - 8 in the East and the Pelicans looking to make a run in the second half of the season , both teams came out and laid it all on the line .
The story in this game however was taken over by Anthony_Davis who went off for a league season - high , career - high and franchise record 59 points .
Davis also hauled in 20 rebounds , making him only the third player to score 50 + points and grab 20 rebounds , since the 1963/64 season .
The other 2 players to achieve such a feat since then were Shaquille O'Neal and Chris Webber .
Davis 's 59 points also set a record for most points scored by a player at Palace of Auburn Hills .
Davis was not entirely alone as he turned in 59 points ( 24 - 34 FG , 2 - 2 3Pt , 9 - 10 FT ) , along with 20 rebounds and 4 assists .
Jrue_Holiday put together a complete game , nearing a triple - double with 20 points ( 6 - 14 FG , 0 - 4 3Pt , 8 - 9 FT ) , 9 assists and 7 rebounds , in 32 minutes off the bench .
The only other player to score more than 5 points for the Pelicans was Ryan_Anderson , who finished with 6 points ( 1 - 12 FG , 0 - 6 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) , albeit on horrendous shooting .
The Pelicans are now 6 games out of eighth in the West and have won 2 in a row .
Reggie_Jackson did his best to keep up with Anthony_Davis , but only managed to pour in 34 points ( 11 - 20 FG , 4 - 7 3Pt , 8 - 8 FT ) of his own , along with 4 rebounds and 4 assists , in 31 minutes .
Andre_Drummond logged a double - double with 21 points ( 9 - 13 FG , 3 - 10 FT ) and 14 rebounds , along with 2 steals and 3 blocked shots , in 35 minutes .
All together the Pistons only managed 18 assists and missed 12 free throws .
That was the case too , as no player scored more than 23 points , but 16 players scored at least 7 in the 105 - 99 Boston win .
Avery_Bradley 's 13 points , 8 rebounds and 5 assists continues a rare feat , as Bradley currently leads the Celtics in rebounding out of the shooting guard position .
While Isaiah_Thomas struggled with his shot ( 4 - of - 13 ) , he made 14 - of - 15 free - throws to finish with 23 points .
Kelly_Olynyk started for Horford and finished with 16 points , 6 rebounds and 4 assists in his best game of the season .
Three-point shooting really killed Indiana , as they went just 6 - of - 27 in the loss .
With George out of the lineup , no player on the Pacers finished with more than 8 rebounds or 4 assists .
Myles_Turner 's 4 steals and 3 blocks kept the Pacers hanging around , as he put on a defensive showcase .
These 2 teams will have a rematch on December 22 in Indiana .
The Chicago_Bulls defeated the Indiana_Pacers , 90 - 85 , at United Center on Monday .
The Bulls ( 15 - 16 ) jumped on their visitors early in a battle of division rivals , building a 28 - 19 advantage after 1 quarter .
Save for a 20 - 12 edge by the Pacers ( 15 - 17 ) in the third quarter , Chicago had control of the contest for the most part , despite being outperformed on the offensive end by Indiana .
The visitors posted a 42 percent success rate from the field and 36 percent from three - point range , which was notably superior to the Bulls 's respective 39 and 24 percent tallies .
On a night when Jeff_Teague significantly struggled with his shot , it was backup point guard Aaron_Brooks who led the Pacers off the bench with 19 points , 7 assists , 4 rebounds and 1 block .
Myles_Turner was next with 16 points and 8 boards , while Paul_George turned in 14 points , 8 assists , 3 rebounds and 1 steal .
Thaddeus_Young chipped in with 12 points , 6 boards and a trio of steals .

Golden_State also dominated in the stat sheet defensively , recording 14 steals and 13 blocks .

The host Cleveland_Cavaliers defeated the visiting Boston_Celtics on Thursday , 124 - 118 .
Cleveland ( 24 - 7 ) remains the Eastern Conference 's top team , having now won 5 of its last 6 games .
The Cavs saw a fantastic performance from their big 3 on Thursday , with Kyrie_Irving scoring a team - high 32 points .
Irving added 12 assists and 3 steals and shot a ridiculous 12 - of - 17 in what was a truly tremendous performance .
Not far behind Irving was Kevin_Love , who scored 30 points and pulled down a team - high 15 rebounds .
LeBron_James , meanwhile , scored 23 points , dished out 11 assists , and pulled down 8 rebounds .
As a whole , Cleveland had an impressive night , shooting over 51 percent and draining 14 three - pointers .
The Celtics ( 19 - 14 ) , meanwhile , had an impressive offensive night of their own .
After trailing by 20 , Boston went on a 23 - 7 run and eventually pulled within 1 point of the defending champions .
All-Star point guard Isaiah_Thomas led the team with 31 points and dished out 9 assists .
Forward Jonas_Jerebko , meanwhile , played an instrumental role off the bench , chipping in 12 points and 7 rebounds in 17 minutes of play .
The Chicago_Bulls ( 6 - 3 ) grinded out a win on Friday night , defeating the Charlotte_Hornets ( 4 - 5 ) 102 - 97 .
Chicago had some good balanced scoring with 5 players scoring in double digits and not to mention Joakim_Noah , who did not score in double digits but notched 18 rebounds , 6 assists , 1 steal and 1 block , in 22 minutes off the bench .

Batum scored 28 points on 10 - 17 shooting , grabbed 8 rebounds , 2 steals and 2 assists , in 34 minutes .

Kemba_Walker filled the stat sheet with 13 points , 9 rebounds , 7 assists , 3 steals and 2 blocks in 36 minutes .
Walker could have made the difference in this one for his team as he shot a sloppy 5 - 18 from the field .
Charlotte will be hosting Portland on Sunday , in a match - up of 2 mid tier teams .
Kemba_Walker and Nicolas_Batum combined for 48 of Charlotte 's 112 points , posting a 9 - for - 15 tally from three - point range that led to a superb 59 percent success rate from long distance for the Hornets overall .
Walker 's 27 points led the way , while Batum went for 21 points after shooting 18 percent the 2 games prior .

The Memphis_Grizzlies took down the visiting Washington_Wizards on Friday , 112 - 103 .
The Grizzlies held their opponents to just 3 points in OT , scoring 12 for themselves .
The bench provided energy for the Grizzlies throughout , as veterans Vince_Carter and Zach_Randolph combined for 40 points and led the second unit push to the win .
The Wizards ( 0 - 2 ) , meanwhile , kept the game competitive despite a tough performance behind the arc .
The team shot just 20 percent from long range , including 2 of 8 from beyond the arc for shooting guard Bradley_Beal .
Washington also saw limited bench contributions , with multiple starters pushing 40 minutes and no member of the second unit scoring in double digits .
The Knicks ( 12 - 14 ) defeated the Timberwolves ( 9 - 16 ) by a score of 107 - 102 at Madison Square Garden on Wednesday .
Minnesota was able to cut New_York 's lead to 3 with 11 seconds remaining , but too many fouls earlier on in the fourth quarter put the game out of reach .
Timberwolves point guard Ricky_Rubio came 1 point and 2 steals away from making history .
Karl-Anthony_Towns got the best of his rookie counterpart Kristaps Porzingus , scoring a team - high 25 points ( 11 - 21 FG , 2 - 4 3Pt , 1 - 1 FT ) while pulling down 10 rebounds for his 11th double - double of the season .
Andrew_Wiggins also chipped in 23 points .
Overshadowed by Anthony 's big performance was Aaron Afflalo 's game - high 29 points ( 9 - 14 FG , 3 - 5 3Pt , 8 - 9 FT ) .
The Knicks still need to stay more consistent on the offensive end and barely escaped with a victory after blowing a 20 - point lead at halftime .
The visiting Oklahoma_City_Thunder pulled out a win over the New_Orleans_Pelicans on Wednesday , 114 - 105 .
The Thunder ( 27 - 19 ) capped off a 6 - game road trip on Wednesday , finishing 3 - 3 during the stretch thanks to the win in New_Orleans .
Point guard Russell_Westbrook recorded what has become an almost routine triple - double in the victory , scoring 27 points to go with 12 rebounds and 10 assists .
The triple - double , Westbrook 's 24th of the season , keeps the All-Star on pace to eclipse Wilt Chamberlain 's ridiculous record of 41 triple - doubles in 1 season .
The team held an 8 - rebound advantage and both Steven_Adams and Enes_Kanter posted double - doubles in the win .
Due in part to the departure of Davis , New_Orleans ( 18 - 28 ) relied heavily on bench production to keep the game close .
Guard E'Twaun_Moore came off the bench for 18 points , a team high , and pulled down 8 rebounds .
Three members of the second unit finished with double digit points totals , and sixth man Tyreke_Evans provided help facilitating the offense as he dished out 9 assists .
In addition to the rebounding deficit , New_Orleans saw 11 of its shots blocked on the night .
The Denver_Nuggets ( 25 - 38 ) defeated the Dallas_Mavericks ( 33 - 30 ) 116 - 114 in an overtime thriller on Sunday .
In a game where Dallas came in as a 4 - point favorite , these 2 teams battled in an extremely competitive game .
The rebounding was key , as Denver snatched down 58 rebounds , while allowing Dallas to grab just 46 .
Augustin was the hero , as he sneakily drew 1 foul with less than a second left and sinked the 2 free - throws to win the game .
Dallas had won 3 of their last 4 coming into this , but could n't hold a late lead on the road against a struggling Nuggets team .
Dirk_Nowitzki led all scorers , as he finished with 30 points in the loss .
David_Lee gave the team a nice spark off the bench , as he tallied 18 points , 12 rebounds and 4 blocks in the defeat .
Kenneth_Faried was a monster , as he finished with 25 points and 20 rebounds in the win .
Rookie Emmanuel_Mudiay continued his good form , as he accumulated 16 points , 8 assists , 4 rebounds , 2 steals and 2 blocks in the victory .
The visiting Oklahoma_City_Thunder defeated the Denver_Nuggets , 132 - 127 , in overtime Friday at Pepsi Center .
Russell_Westbrook led the Thunder ( 9 - 8 ) to victory with his sixth triple - double of the season on Friday .
Westbrook continues to lead the Thunder in scoring , rebounds , and assists 17 games into the season .
The Thunder badly needed Friday 's win after losing 7 of their previous 9 games .
In addition to Westbrook , guard Victor_Oladipo delivered an impressive 26 points on 11 - of - 19 shooting .

Denver held a 51 - 40 advantage on the glass in the game .
The Washington_Wizards defeated the Milwaukee_Bucks , 107 - 102 , at Verizon Center on Monday .
The Wizards ( 14 - 16 ) have most frequently relied on their dynamic backcourt duo of John_Wall and Bradley_Beal for offensive production this season , but they are n't the only members of Washington 's first unit that has the ability to light up the scoreboard .
Otto_Porter , Jr. went through a rough stretch on offense earlier in December , but has been coming on as of late , and his resurgence culminated Monday in explosive fashion against the Bucks ( 14 - 15 ) .
Capitalizing on one of the most generous defenses in the NBA against small forwards , Porter posted a game - high 32 points , while also compiling 13 rebounds , 1 assist and 1 block .
Combined with strong efforts from Wall , Beal and Markieff_Morris , the Wizards shot 51 percent overall , which helped them overcome 16 turnovers .
The Bucks were led once again by Giannis_Antetokounmpo , who managed 22 points , 12 rebounds , 7 assists and 1 block .
Tony_Snell chipped in with a season - high 20 points , which he supplemented with 4 rebounds , 1 assist and a pair of steals .
Jabari_Parker supplied 14 points , 6 rebounds , 4 assists and 1 block .
Matthew_Dellavedova registered a modest 8 points , but dished out 11 dimes , brought in 3 rebounds and recorded 2 steals .
Greg_Monroe led the second unit with 16 points , 5 rebounds , 1 assist and 1 steal .
Beal checked in second on the Wizards with 22 points , 5 assists , 4 rebounds and 2 steals .
Wall put together an 18 - point , 16 - assist double - double that also included 3 rebounds , 2 steals and 2 blocks .
Morris offered 18 points as well , which he complemented with 4 rebounds , 2 steals and 1 block .
Marcin_Gortat mustered 4 points but did record 12 rebounds , along with 3 assists and 1 block .
The Toronto_Raptors ( 24 - 15 ) defeated the host Philadelphia_76ers ( 4 - 35 ) 108 - 95 on Saturday night .
The 76ers jumped out to an early 120 lead on the Raptors who were coming in on the second night of a back - to - back .
The Raptors woke up though responding to the 120 run by outscoring the 76ers 57 - 32 during the rest of the first half .
Ish_Smith scored 18 points in the third quarter and helped Philly bring it to a 4 - point game early in the fourth but it was not enough as the Raptors cruised to victory .
Toronto has now won its last 11 games against Philadelphia .

Defense was key for the Jazz , as they held the Suns to 41 percent shooting and just 9 assists .

Coming into Saturday 's contest , Griffin was posting season averages of 26 points , 9 rebounds , and 4 assists per game .

Saturday 's game brought Drummond to a total of 173 rebounds through his first 9 games , making him the first player to do so since Kareem Abdul-Jabar .
The Pistons were outscored 50 - 36 in the second half and were , at 1 point , kept from the basket for a full 12 minutes .

Dennis_Schroder led the way for Atlanta with a solid all - around performance of 23 points , 7 rebounds and 4 assists in 33 minutes .

Up next , the Hawks will look to extend their win streak to 6 against the Mavericks in Dallas on Saturday , while Pelicans will head to Boston on Saturday to take on the Celtics .
The Oklahoma_City_Thunder ( 23 - 10 ) outlasted the Phoenix_Suns ( 12 - 23 ) Thursday night at the Chesapeake Energy Arena , 110 - 106 .
The Suns made a hard charge late in the game , using a 70 run to force a 100 - 100 tie with 3:43 to go .

Tucker poured in 22 on an ultra - efficient 10 - 14 shooting night .

However , Matthew_Dellavedova stepped to the line and knocked down 2 free throws , and Chris_Paul missed a 3 on the other end to seal the victory for Cleveland .

In fact , Ricky_Rubio hit 3 free - throws with 2 seconds left to turn a 2 - point deficit into a 1 - point lead and eventually the win .
The only true advantage Minnesota had was in three - point shooting , as they went 9 - of - 21 from long distance , while Indiana went 5 - of - 18 .

The Charlotte_Hornets ( 20 - 23 ) defeated the Orlando_Magic ( 20 - 22 ) 120 - 116 in overtime on Friday .
With starting center Cody_Zeller , who in turn has been filling in for the sidelined Al_Jefferson ( knee ) , on the bench for the night with a shoulder strain , Spencer_Hawes received the starting nod at the 5 position .
Unsurprisingly , it was the healthier Magic who appeared to have the game well in hand through 3 quarters , carrying a 94 - 79 advantage into the final period .
However , a furious rally by the Hornets , spearheaded by Kemba_Walker , allowed Charlotte to double up Orlando 30 - 15 in the fourth and almost walk away with the victory in regulation .
Victor_Oladipo managed to send the game into overtime with a crucial three - pointer with 5 seconds remaining , before the Hornets overcame some more heroics from the 3 - year pro to edge out the Magic .
Walker tallied 40 points , including 2 key free throws in the final seconds of overtime , along with 9 assists , 7 rebounds , 4 steals and 1 block .
One of his 2 turnovers almost helped erase his outstanding performance , as Oladipo managed to steal the ball from the Hornets 's point guard with 28 seconds remaining in overtime and slam it home on the other end to give the Magic a temporary 116 - 115 lead .
Hawes turned in a solid effort in Zeller 's stead , tallying 16 points , 10 rebounds , 3 assists and 1 block .
His final 3 points , a long - range bomb from the left corner , were particularly crucial , as they erased the aforementioned 1 - point Magic lead in overtime and gave Charlotte a 118 - 116 advantage they would n't relinquish .
Marvin_Williams made it 2 double - doubles in the frontcourt on the evening for the Hornets , compiling 11 points , 14 rebounds , 2 assists , 2 steals and 1 block .
Troy_Daniels paced the Charlotte reserves with 17 points , 3 rebounds , 2 assists and 1 block .
Oladipo 's return sparked the Orlando offense , as he led the team with 29 points , 4 rebounds , 3 assists and the key steal from Walker .
Tobias_Harris was next in line with 22 points , 5 rebounds , 2 assists and 2 blocks .
Nikola_Vucevic tallied a double - double , posting 15 points , 12 rebounds , 4 assists , 2 steals and 6 blocks .
Elfrid_Payton got in on the act as well , registering 11 points , 10 assists and 1 steal .
Gordon was productive across the stat sheet in his start , amassing 10 points , 7 rebounds and 4 assists , including a key three - pointer in overtime off an Oladipo assist .
Fournier contributed off the bench , leading the reserves with 15 points , 2 rebounds , 2 assists and 1 block .
Five players scored in double figures for Indiana , including 2 who had double - doubles .
Paul_George finished with 25 points and 13 rebounds , while Jeff_Teague totaled 19 points and 11 assists .
Myles_Turner had a solid outing with 20 points on 7 - of - 11 shooting , including 3 - of - 4 from long range .
Al_Jefferson was solid in 19 minutes off the bench , shooting 5 - of - 7 on his way to 15 points .
Meanwhile , 6 players scored in double figures for the Suns , but the high - point man , Eric_Bledsoe , only had 15 .
Tyson_Chandler finished with 10 points and 10 rebounds , while Devin_Booker finished with 13 points , 5 assists and 4 rebounds .
The Suns gave up 21 turnovers , while the Pacers gave up 18 .
Both teams shot under 45 percent from the field , but the Pacers out - scored the Suns 32 - 17 at the foul line .
The Oklahoma_City_Thunder defeated the San_Antonio_Spurs , 102 - 92 , Thursday at Chesapeake Energy Arena .
The Spurs ( 50 - 14 ) were able to keep it close for a quarter before the Thunder ( 36 - 29 ) managed to slowly build up their lead , quarter by quarter , on their home floor .

Victor_Oladipo added 20 points of his own on 8 - of - 14 shooting , while the team 's bench showed up in an impressive way , accounting for 44 of the team 's 92 points .
For San_Antonio , it was a sluggish performance for them as they were playing their third game in 4 days , and they saw their 9 - game win streak come to an end as a result .
Kawhi_Leonard led the way offensively for the Spurs , although he shot just 6 - of - 15 from the field en route to scoring 19 points .

The Spurs shot 47 percent from the field as a unit and flashed their brilliant ball movement to continuously open up the floor , a staple of Gregg Popovich 's supreme coaching and unselfish basketball .
The Spurs host the Phoenix_Suns ( 7 - 5 ) on Monday , while the Grizzlies host the Dallas_Mavericks ( 9 - 4 ) on Tuesday .

It looked like Golden_State was going to escape after Steph Curry swished a 3 to take a 1 - point lead with 8 seconds to go , but Eric_Bledsoe answered with a crafty move at the basket to give Phoenix the lead .
The Suns have now lost 5 games on buzzer beating shots , but this one may have ended their playoff hopes for good .
Phoenix desperately needed a win Thursday , having lost 4 straight coming into its matchup with Golden_State .
Every starter scored in double - figures , led by Eric_Bledsoe with 18 points .

The Minnesota_Timberwolves defeated the Dallas_Mavericks , 101 - 92 , at Target Center on Monday .
The Timberwolves ( 12 - 26 ) put an end to a 4 - game losing streak with Monday 's victory , and it was thanks in large part to the monster performance put on by Karl-Anthony_Towns .
After scoring 20 points in the first quarter and outscoring the entire Mavericks ( 11 - 27 ) team by himself , Towns finished with a game - high 34 points , 11 rebounds , 4 assists and 3 blocks in 37 minutes .
The big man 's night was made even easier with Ricky_Rubio shining as a facilitator , notching a double - double of his own with 13 points and 15 assists on top of 5 rebounds and 5 steals .
The 2 helped the Timberwolves lead wire - to - wire Thursday , as the team overall shot a very impressive 56 percent from the field .
Harrison_Barnes led the way with a team - high 30 points , while veteran Dirk Nowtizki posted 26 points , 5 rebounds and 4 assists in 31 minutes .
Unfortunately for Dallas , they failed to get any other significant contributions elsewhere , with the other 10 Mavericks players who played combining to score just 36 points .
And while Dallas managed to shoot an impressive 46 percent from behind the arc , their inability to get to the free throw line ended up hurting them , as they shot just 7 - of - 9 from the charity stripe .
The Indiana_Pacers ( 10 - 19 ) defeated the New_Orleans_Pelicans ( 14 - 14 ) 96 - 84 on Tuesday at Bankers Life Fieldhouse .
While the Pacers took only a 4 - point lead into halftime , they came out strong in the third quarter and ended up out - scoring the Pelicans 52 - 44 in the second half to secure the victory at home .
The Pacers were able to shoot 50 percent from the field and 33 percent from the three - point line , while the Pelicans shot only 40 percent from the field and 20 percent from beyond the arc .

CJ_Miles also had 11 points off the bench .
Davis went 8 - for - 18 from the field and 5 - for - 6 from the free throw line to score 21 points , while also recording 9 rebounds .
Tyreke_Evans was able to contribute 14 points and 11 rebounds .

The Cleveland_Cavaliers ( 20 - 20 ) defeated the Los_Angeles_Lakers ( 12 - 28 ) 109 - 102 on Thursday at the Staples Center .
LeBron_James is showing no rust after sitting out for 2 weeks with knee and back issues .

Cleveland 's 6 - game losing streak finally came to an end Thursday as the Cavaliers improved to 9 - 11 away from home and got back to .500 overall .

The Miami_Heat ( 29 - 35 ) defeated the Brooklyn_Nets ( 25 - 38 ) 104 - 98 on Wednesday at American Airlines Arena in Miami .
The Heat got out to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Nets 34 - 23 right away in the first quarter .
The Nets made a fourth quarter push to bring it within 5 , but the Heat had established too large of a lead early in the game that the Nets came up just short .
The Heat finished at 46 percent from the field and 29 percent from the three - point line , while the Nets shot 44 percent from the floor and 35 percent from deep .
The Heat forced the Nets into 21 turnovers , while committing just 11 of their own .
Dwyane_Wade did the bulk of the shooting in this one , going 10 - for - 25 from the field and 8 - for - 11 from the free throw line for a game - high of 28 points , while also adding 9 assists and 2 steals .
Also playing a big factor in the win was Goran_Dragic , who made his return to the court after missing 2 games with a back injury .
In 35 minutes , Dragic posted 17 points ( 5 - 9 FG , 1 - 3 3Pt , 6 - 9 FT ) , 3 assists and 2 steals .
Despite coming off the bench , Jack has remained quite effective and has now combined for 33 points and 7 assists over his last 2 games .
Starting at center , Brook_Lopez recorded 15 points ( 6 - 11 FG , 0 - 1 3Pt , 3 - 4 FT ) and 14 rebounds in 32 minutes .
Coming close to a double - double of his own , Thaddeus_Young finished with 15 points ( 6 - 11 FG , 1 - 2 3Pt , 2 - 4 FT ) , 7 rebounds and 2 steals .
Since joining the Nets 11 games ago , Young has averaged 13 points and 5 rebounds , but he 's starting to get more and more comfortable , so we could see his numbers on the rise again soon .
Giannis_Antetokounmpo , a first - time All-Star at 22 years old , scored 26 points on 11 - of - 16 shooting to go with 8 rebounds , 5 assists , and 2 blocks .
Antetokounmpo , known by many as ' The Greek Freak , ' is the first player ever to rank in the top 20 in the NBA in scoring , assists , rebounds , steals , and blocks in the same season .
Meanwhile , wing man Khris_Middleton scored a team - high 30 points .
Middleton shot 11 - of - 18 from the field and 8 - of - 9 from the free - throw line .
The Detroit_Pistons ( 17 - 12 ) defeated the Miami_Heat ( 16 - 11 ) 93 - 92 on Tuesday .
The game was a testament to the perseverance and marksmanship of the visiting Pistons , who shook off a 34 - 18 first - quarter explosion by the Heat that had the home crowd buzzing .
Detroit returned the favor by incredibly doubling up Miami in the second period , 36 - 18 , on the strength of a barrage of three - point shots .
Somewhat surprisingly , it was the likes of reserves Stanley_Johnson , Anthony_Tolliver and Steve_Blake that led the way in the three - point department , helping propel the visitors to a tally of 10 long - range buckets in the first half .
Overall , Detroit posted a stellar 52 percent figure from beyond the arc , outscoring Miami 45 - 12 in that category .
Reggie_Jackson paced Detroit with 18 points , 5 rebounds , 3 assists and 1 steal , while Kentavious_Caldwell-Pope had a slow first half before draining some crucial buckets when it mattered most .
The shooting guard 's three - pointer with 2 minutes left helped give Detroit a 91 - 89 lead , and his jumper with 56 seconds remaining put the Pistons ahead to stay .
Meanwhile , Drummond shook off the aforementioned slow start to tally an 11 - point , 12 - rebound double - double , his fourth straight .
Detroit improved to 17 - 12 and is currently in a second - place tie with Indiana in the Eastern Conference 's Central Division .
The Heat received a mammoth double - double from Hassan_Whiteside ( 16 points , 16 rebounds ) , who outplayed Drummond after the latter had hauled in 20 rebounds in their initial meeting this season .
Chris_Bosh posted a game - high 20 points , and added 3 rebounds and 2 assists , while fellow veteran Dwyane_Wade had a fourth straight strong performance with 19 points , 5 rebounds , 1 assist and 1 steal .
Beno_Udrih , acquired earlier in the season from the Grizzlies , turned in a highly productive performance in his first Miami start , managing 14 points , 6 assists and 3 rebounds .
Gerald_Green paced the Heat bench , but did so with a modest 8 points .
As a team , Miami was considerably less aggressive and effective than Detroit from long range , sinking only 4 of their 18 three - point attempts .
The Heat fell to 16 - 11 and are now in second place in the Eastern Conference 's Southeast Division .
It took a monster second half to get there though , as the Spurs won the second half , 61 - 34 .
They dominated in the paint , as they outrebounded the Suns , 46 - 33 and scored 64 points in the paint in total .

The teams came into this game tied in the standings , while they both have 2 games remaining ; therefore there is still opportunity for the Celtics to overtake that third spot .
The Hawks managed to overcome 18 turnovers with good shooting , as they hit 52 percent from the field , 51 percent from long range and 9 - 11 from the foul line .

The Oklahoma_City_Thunder defeated the Dallas_Mavericks , 118 - 104 , Monday night at Chesapeake Energy Arena to win their Western Conference first - round playoff series , 4 - 1 .
The Thunder led from wire - to - wire in this one thanks to an 11 - point lead they built behind a 35 - point first quarter .
Dallas managed to get it as close as 4 points in the fourth quarter , but up 107 - 103 with 4:8 to go , the Thunder rattled off an 110 run to seal the deal .
Kevin_Durant and Russell_Westbrook dominated this one to win Oklahoma_City 's fifth consecutive first round series , as the Thunder 's superstars each poured in over 30 points in the victory .
Westbrook finished 1 assist shy of a triple - double and scored 36 points ( 13 - 23 FG , 3 - 8 3PT , 7 - 8 FT ) with 12 rebounds , both game highs .
Durant added 33 points ( 11 - 24 FG , 3 - 11 3PT , 8 - 8 FT ) to finish an up - and - down series in which he shot just 37 percent ( 43 - 117 ) from the floor .
Oklahoma_City also got a double - double from center Steven_Adams , who notched 15 points ( 5 - 8 FG , 5 - 9 FT ) and 10 rebounds .
The Thunder shot 51 percent from the floor and won both the rebounding ( 42 - 35 ) and free throw battles ( 26 - 20 ) .
Dirk_Nowitzki led the Mavericks with 24 points ( 8 - 16 FG , 3 - 6 3PT , 5 - 5 FT ) to close the series with consecutive 20 - point games .
The Mavericks shot just 8 - 24 ( 33 percent ) from the three - point line and needed more from downtown if they were going to compete against Oklahoma_City .

For the Pistons ( 22 - 27 ) , Kentavious_Caldwell-Pope put on a show , as the team got a much - needed victory after dropping their last 3 .
Caldwell-Pope finished with a game - high 38 points on 12 - of - 18 shooting from the field and an incredible 8 - of - 11 from behind the arc .
Andre_Drummond 's 17 points made him the only over Detroit player to score in double figures , with the Pistons 's bench coming up huge in the winning effort .
Led my Tobias_Harris 's 19 points and Ish_Smith 's 15 , the bench ended up scoring a total of 48 points Wednesday .
8 seed in the Eastern Conference standings , The Pelicans ( 19 - 31 ) , on the other hand , did not benefit from a cast of contributors like their counterparts managed to .
Anthony_Davis led the way with 31 points and 12 rebounds , while Jrue_Holiday had a double - double of his own with 22 points and 11 assists .
Beyond that pairing , however , Terrence_Jones was the the only 1 who was able to reach double - digit scoring with 11 points in 27 minutes .
In fact , besides Davis and Holiday , who combined to shoot 56 percent from the field , the team shot a poor 18 - of - 41 ( 44 percent ) from the field overall .
The Indiana_Pacers upset the Toronto_Raptors , 100 - 90 , in Game 1 of the Eastern Conference first - round playoffs Saturday at the Air Canada Centre .
Facing a Raptors squad that sported a stellar 32 - 9 record at home during the regular season , and owners of a 19 - 22 road mark themselves , the Pacers pulled off an improbable upset .
The Pacers long - distance shooting was pivotal as well , as they managed to drain 21 of their 29 shots from beyond the arc .
George and Monta_Ellis combined to shoot 77 percent ( 7 - for - 9 ) from long distance .
George 's 33 points led the visitors , and he added 6 assists , 4 rebounds and 2 blocks .
Ellis was a distant second with 15 points , 5 assists , 3 rebounds and 3 steals .
George_Hill pitched in with 10 points , 3 rebounds and 1 steal .
Solomon_Hill led the reserves with 13 points and 2 rebounds , continuing his stretch of strong play from the final days of the regular season .
Myles_Turner was productive in a reserve role as well , tallying 10 points , 5 rebounds and 5 blocks .
Toronto was led by Corey Joseph 's 18 - point effort in 24 minutes off the bench .
DeMar_DeRozan led the starting 5 with 14 points , 4 assists , 2 rebounds and 2 steals .
Kyle_Lowry was outperformed by Joseph , as he was only able to manage 11 points , 7 assists , 2 rebounds , 2 steals and 1 block over a game - high 41 minutes .
Jonas_Valanciunas was a force down low , scoring 12 points , hauling in 19 rebounds and recording 1 block in just 21 minutes .
The Washington_Wizards ( 20 ) defeated the Milwaukee_Bucks ( 0 - 2 ) 118 - 113 Friday .
Giannis_Antetokounmpo returned to the court after serving his 1 - game suspension stemming from last postseason , and did so with a vengeance .
Antetokounmpo led all scorers with 27 points and came within 1 rebound of a double - double , tallying 9 boards .
The Wizards were paced by a 26 - point outburst from Bradley_Beal , while backcourt mate John_Wall chipped in with a 19 - point , 10 - assist double - double .
While the rest of the Wizards starters struggled offensively , Ramon_Sessions came off the bench to post a highly efficient 23 points on 8 - of - 12 shooting over just 26 minutes on the court .
Veteran offseason acquisition Gary_Neal poured in 13 points of his own to help supplement the efforts of his fellow trio of guards .
Monroe matched his 22 points from the opener on excellent 72 percent shooting , but managed only 5 boards , a steep drop from the 14 he hauled in Wednesday .
The victory keeps the Wizards perfect at 20 and in first place in the Eastern Conference 's Southeast Division .
The loss drops the Bucks to 0 - 2 and keeps them in last place in the Eastern Conference 's Central Division .
The Portland Trail_Blazers ( 50 - 26 ) defeated the New_Orleans_Pelicans ( 41 - 35 ) , 99 - 90 , on Saturday at the Moda Center .
However , the Trail_Blazers are battling with the Clippers for a top - 4 seed in the Western Conference , so they deployed their regular starting lineup against a Pelicans team that is fighting for the eighth seed .
The Trail_Blazers dominated the Pelicans on the boards , out - rebounding them 51 - 35 .
The Pelicans had a chance to grab sole possession of the eighth spot in the West with a win , but they mustered just 18 points in the fourth quarter to fall to the Trail_Blazers for the third time this season .
New_Orleans had won 4 straight coming into Saturday 's contest , but a 2 - minute scoring drought in the fourth quarter cost it a fifth consecutive victory .
Anthony_Davis was held in check by LaMarcus_Aldridge , finishing with 19 points on 8 - of - 20 shooting to go with 9 rebounds .
Davis had n't been held to less than 20 points or 10 rebounds since March 10 against Brooklyn .
Portland has now won 6 of its last 7 games to move to 50 - 26 on the season with 6 games remaining .
LaMarcus_Aldridge had another productive night with 21 points and 12 rebounds over 37 minutes of action .
Chris_Kaman provided a spark off the bench with 16 points and 11 rebounds .
The Sacramento_Kings defeated the Utah_Jazz 94 - 93 Wednesday at Vivint Smart Home Arena .
The Kings ( 12 - 17 ) looked sluggish for the first 3 quarters of Wednesday 's game , and rightfully so after a hard - fought home victory over the Trail_Blazers the night before .
Cousins finished with a team - high 21 points and 8 rebounds in 31 minutes as the only starter to reach double figures .
Meanwhile , the reserve backcourt pairing of Ty_Lawson and Garrett_Temple combined for 30 points to help make up for a lackluster performance from the starters .
For the Jazz ( 18 - 12 ) , they came into the game undermanned in the backcourt , with George_Hill ( toe ) , Dante_Exum ( knee ) and Rodney_Hood ( illness ) all ruled out prior to Wednesday 's matchup .
As a result , it was on Gordon_Hayward to carry the load offensively , and he did not disappoint , scoring a game - high 28 points on 9 - of - 18 shooting from the field on top of 10 rebounds .
Rudy_Gobert also made his presence felt down low , as not only did he give Cousins 's problems from start to finish , but he also managed to record 17 points and 14 rebounds .
The New_Orleans_Pelicans ( 23 - 34 ) defeated the Oklahoma_City_Thunder ( 41 - 17 ) 123 - 119 on Thursday .
The key for New_Orleans was their lights - out shooting , as they shot 52 percent from the field , 94 percent from the free - throw line and 60 percent from three - point range .
The bench differential was huge as well , with the Pelicans bench scoring 60 points to the Thunder 's 20 .
The 1 criticism with Oklahoma_City is that they are a 2 - man team and that became the issue on Thursday .
Durant finished with 32 points , 14 rebounds and 7 assists , while Westbrook tallied 44 points , 9 assists and 4 rebounds .
Only 1 other player scored in double - digits , as Serge_Ibaka scored 15 in the loss .
New_Orleans came into this game as a 6 - point underdog and rode their bench to a win .
Ryan_Anderson scored 26 points off the bench , with Jrue_Holiday providing 22 points and 9 assists of his own .
Anthony_Davis led the team with 30 points and also swatted away 4 shots in the win .
Norris_Cole put in a all - around great performance , as he accumulated 21 points , 6 rebounds and 8 assists in the victory .
The Utah_Jazz ( 26 - 25 ) defeated the Dallas_Mavericks ( 29 - 26 ) 121 - 119 in overtime at American Airlines Center on Tuesday thanks to a long buzzer - beating 2 - pointer from Gordon_Hayward .
Over the course of the win streak , the Jazz have owned the NBA 's best defense , holding opponents to an average of under 87 points per game .
The win against Dallas , however , improves Utah 's record to just 2 - 18 when their opponents score 100 or more points .
Rising star Rodney_Hood led the Jazz with 29 points .
Hood led the team with 26 field goal attempts against Dallas in 43 minutes , while also pulling down 5 rebounds and dishing 5 assists .
Despite being the offensive center of attention , Hood did not commit 1 turnover .
Small forward Gordon_Hayward also came up huge for Utah , scoring 20 points including a game - winning fadeaway .
Hayward has led Utah with an average of 20 points per game in 2015 - 16 .
Despite the extended playing time , the normally prolific shot - blocking Jazz frontcourt only managed to send back 2 shots , while Dallas recorded just 1 block as a team in 53 minutes .
The Mavericks have now lost 4 of their last 5 , and are increasingly in danger of losing ground to Utah and Portland in the Western Conference playoff race .
Small forward Chandler_Parsons led the team with 24 points on 8 - for - 16 shooting while also recording 1 block and 1 steal .
Point guard Deron_Williams , meanwhile , had a strong outing , going for 23 points and hitting 11 of 13 at the free - throw line .
Dallas poured in 11 team three - pointers , edging out the Jazz , but could simply not score as efficiently as their opponents on Tuesday .
Dallas , on the other hand , will not return to action until they take on the Magic on Feb. 19 .
The Nets ( 38 - 44 ) took care of business Wednesday , defeating the Magic ( 25 - 57 ) 101 - 88 .
Orlando led by 2 points at halftime .
But , by the end of the quarter , the Nets had closed the gap , tying the game 75 - 75 .
The fourth quarter was all Brooklyn , as they outscored the Magic 26 - 13 .
Bojan_Bogdanovic had 28 points ( 12 - 17 FG , 4 - 8 3Pt ) , 3 rebounds and 2 assists in 34 minutes .
Thaddeus_Young had 16 points ( 5 - 13 FG , 0 - 1 3Pt ) , 9 rebounds , 3 assists , 2 steals and 1 block in 37 minutes .
Joe_Johnson also scored 16 points ( 7 - 15 FG , 2 - 4 3Pt ) , to go with 7 rebounds , 6 assists and 1 steal in 41 minutes .
Brook_Lopez had a relatively quiet game , recording 14 points ( 4 - 8 FG ) , 7 rebounds , 1 assist , 4 steals and 3 blocks in 33 minutes .
Nikola_Vucevic was the Magic 's leading scorer with 26 points ( 12 - 21 FG , 0 - 1 3Pt ) , to go with 11 rebounds , 5 assists , 1 steal and 1 block in 40 minutes .
Victor_Oladipo had 19 points ( 7 - 17 FG , 3 - 7 3Pt ) , 2 rebounds , 3 assists and 1 block in 44 minutes .
Andrew_Nicholson contributed 18 points ( 8 - 10 FG , 2 - 3 3Pt ) , 9 rebounds , 1 assist and 1 block in 28 minutes .
With the victory , the Nets completed the season series sweep of the Magic 30 .
The Golden_State_Warriors ( 50 ) remained undefeated Wednesday , as they vanquished the Los_Angeles_Clippers ( 4 - 1 ) Wednesday by a score of 112 - 108 at ORACLE Arena in Oakland .
Midway through the third quarter , it looked like the Warriors were going to run away with the game , maintaining a double - digit lead through the first 6 or so minutes .
However , the Clippers were able to make a run late in the quarter to take a 1 - point lead into final period .
While Los_Angeles managed to keep it close through the final 12 minutes , they simply had no answer for last year 's MVP .
Curry scored 13 points in the fourth quarter and finished with 31 points ( 8 - 17 FG , 7 - 11 3Pt ) for the game in 33 minutes .
Harrison_Barnes also came up big in the fourth quarter , scoring 10 straight points at 1 point and finishing with a team - high 9 rebounds in 36 minutes .
Griffin stuffed the stat sheet , scoring 23 points , grabbing 10 rebounds and dishing out 6 assists in 38 minutes , while Paul managed a team - high 24 points and 9 assists in 29 minutes .
DeAndre_Jordan recorded a double - double of 11 points and 13 rebounds .
The Milwaukee_Bucks defeated the Charlotte_Hornets , 118 - 108 , at Spectrum Center on Tuesday evening .
Milwaukee got off to a fast start with a 35 - point first quarter added another 37 in the second period to build a 72 - 50 halftime lead .
Their stellar 62 percent shooting helped them stave off a second - half comeback from the Hornets ( 33 - 41 ) , which outscored them by a 58 - 46 margin over the third and fourth quarters .
The rebounding battle was also key , as Milwaukee hauled in 42 boards to Charlotte 's 31 .
Tony_Snell led the Bucks on the night with 26 points , 3 rebounds and 1 assist .
Giannis_Antetokounmpo provided 20 points , 8 boards , 2 assists and 1 block .
Malcolm_Brogdon posted a 14 - point , 10 - assist double - double that also included 3 rebounds and 1 steal .
Khris_Middleton matched Brogdon 's scoring total and added 5 rebounds and 1 assist .
Greg_Monroe led the second unit with 13 points , 8 rebounds and 5 assists .
Kemba_Walker 's 26 points led the Hornets , a total he supplemented with 5 assists and 3 rebounds .
Michael_Kidd-Gilchrist managed 12 points , 6 rebounds , 1 assist and 1 steal .
Cody_Zeller supplied 8 points , 1 rebound and 2 steals .
Frank_Kaminsky III led the bench with 20 points , 4 rebounds and 3 assists and Jeremy_Lamb was productive as a reserve as well with 16 points , 3 rebounds , 2 assists and 1 steal .
The Denver_Nuggets ( 6 - 5 ) defeated the New_Orleans_Pelicans ( 1 - 10 ) 115 - 98 on Tuesday .
Denver shot 53 percent from the field and hit 15 - of - 30 threes to go 50 percent from long distance .
The Nuggets also rebounded the Pelicans 43 - 33 in the win and scored over 30 points in 3 of 4 quarters .
Denver was led by a fantastic performance from Danilo_Gallinari , who scored a season - high 32 points to go along with 8 rebounds and 8 assists .
They also got another great bench performance from Will_Barton , who totaled 17 points and 7 rebounds .
Gary_Harris also scored a career - high 16 points and provided 4 rebounds , 3 assists and 2 steals in the win .
This was one of Denver 's best games of the season , as they recorded a impressive 27 assists in the win .
The Pelicans were led by Ryan_Anderson , who tallied 24 points and 6 rebounds while replacing Davis .
Bradley_Beal stood above the rest , as he scored a career - high 42 points on 14 - of - 22 shooting .
John_Wall went just 6 - of - 24 from the field , but accumulated 18 points , 4 rebounds , 15 assists , 4 steals and 3 blocks in an effort - filled performance .
The Suns backcourt did all they could too , with Devin_Booker scoring 30 points and Eric_Bledsoe dropping 29 points of his own .
The host Oklahoma_City_Thunder defeated the visiting Los_Angeles_Lakers on Sunday , 113 - 96 .
Thunder ( 30 ) point guard Russell_Westbrook earned his 39th career triple - double and his second in a row , notching game - highs in points ( 33 ) , rebounds ( 12 ) , and assists ( 16 ) .
The impressive performance comes on the tails of a 51 - point triple - double from Westbrook in Friday 's win against the Suns .
The Thunder hit 47 percent of shots from the floor , while LA hit just 40 .
For the Lakers ( 1 - 2 ) , meanwhile , recent second - overall pick Brandon_Ingram saw limited minutes after suffering a knee injury in the team 's most recent outing .
In his time on the floor , Ingram was one of many Lakers who experienced shooting woes , going just 3 of 10 from the field .
Teammate D'Angelo_Russell , also a second - overall pick , hit just 7 of 20 shot attempts .
It was n't just shooting that caused troubles for the Lakers offense , however ; the team committed 21 turnovers on the night .
The Golden_State_Warriors ( 130 ) did it again on Thursday night , getting the 124 - 117 win over the Los_Angeles_Clippers ( 6 - 5 ) , this time at the Staples Center .
The Clippers had control most of the way , holding a 10 point lead for most of the game .
The Warriors cut the lead to 1 point early in the fourth but the Clippers quickly regained a 10 point lead with about 5 minutes to go .
The Warriors however turned it up 1 more notch and went on a 25 - 8 point run in the last 5 minutes , including 5 made three pointers , to close out the game in decisive fashion .
Paul finished with 35 points on 13 - 22 shooting , 8 assists , 4 rebounds and 3 steals .
Blake_Griffin put up solid numbers with 27 points , 5 assists and 6 rebounds .
Jamal_Crawford , who started in place of J.J. Redick ( back spasms ) , finished with 15 points on 6 - 16 shooting , along with 5 rebounds and 2 assists .
Curry finished with 40 points , 11 rebounds , 4 assists and 3 steals .
Curry did however have an alarming 7 turnovers .
Klay_Thompson backed his Splash-Bro up , adding 25 points , 3 rebounds and 2 assists .
Draymond_Green was yet again flirting with a triple - double as he finished with 19 points , 9 assists , and 6 rebounds .
The only other player to score double digits for the Warriors was Harrison_Barnes , who contributed a big 21 points and 7 rebounds .
The Miami_Heat defeated the visiting Charlotte_Hornets , 123 - 91 , in Game 1 of the Eastern Conference first - round playoffs Sunday at AmericanAirlines Arena .
The Heat scored 41 points in the first quarter , their highest output in a single quarter in franchise history .
That effort earned them a 19 - point lead , and Charlotte was n't able to narrow it below 10 points at any point in the final 3 quarters .
The Heat shot a brilliant 58 percent from the field and made 9 of their 18 three - point attempts as the Hornets put up little defensive resistance .
Luol_Deng 's 31 points led all scorers as he caught fire from the floor , shooting 11 - 13 overall and a brilliant 4 - 6 from 3 .
Hassan_Whiteside added adouble - double with 21 points ( 9 - 11 FG ) and 11 rebounds and Dwyane_Wade contributed 16 points ( 8 - 16 FG ) and 7 assists .
The Heat starting front court of Whiteside , Deng and Joe_Johnson combined to shoot 25 - 32 ( 78 percent ) from the field , good for 63 points between the trio .
Nicolas_Batum 's 24 points led the Hornets as he shot 7 - 14 from the field and 3 - 7 from three - point land .
Kemba_Walker was the only other Hornets starter to finish in double figures with 19 points ( 6 - 13 FG , 2 - 5 3PT , 5 - 5 FT ) .
Al_Jefferson 's 13 points led all Hornets reserves .
The Hornets just could n't get their offense flowing , as they only managed 11 assists , equaling their number of turnovers on the night .
Game 2 is scheduled for 7:0 PM Eastern Time on Wednesday in Miami .
The Minnesota_Timberwolves snapped a 3 - game losing streak as they defeated the host Phoenix_Suns , 98 - 85 , at Talking Stick Resort Arena on Friday .
Minnesota led 29 - 27 after the first quarter but squandered the lead with a poor second quarter , only to come back and earn a much - needed win .
All 5 starters scored in double digits for the Timberwolves , led by Andrew_Wiggins who snapped - out of a 3 - game scoring slump by pouring in 25 points , including going 10 - of - 11 from the foul line .
Karl-Anthony_Towns followed - up with 22 points , 10 rebounds , 4 assists , 1 steal and 1 block , in 35 minutes .
The Timberwolves will face the second night of a back - to - back as they wind - up a 3 - game road trip in Golden_State on Saturday .
The Suns ( 5 - 12 ) were leading 75 - 67 after 3 quarters , but fell apart in the fourth , with their lowest scoring quarter of the season , with 10 points on 13 percent shooting from field .
Tyson_Chandler was back in the line - up after missing 8 of the last 9 games and was solid in 11 minutes off the bench , with 6 points and 7 rebounds .
Meanwhile , Eric_Bledsoe notched his eighth 20 - point game of the season as he led the way for Phoenix with 23 points , 10 assists , 6 rebounds and 3 steals .
The Suns went 6 - of - 26 from long range and 15 - of - 21 from the free throw line as their offense hit a rough patch .
The Detroit_Pistons ( 42 - 37 ) defeated the Orlando_Magic ( 33 - 45 ) on Wednesday , 108 - 104 , moving to a half game from clinching the playoffs .
The Pistons have struggled on the road all season , going just 17 - 23 away from home , and Wednesday was no exception .
Big defensive playmaking was key for Detroit , as center Andre_Drummond delivered 4 huge blocked shots and guard Kentavious_Caldwell-Pope came up with a trio of steals .
Detroit sank 11 shots from behind the arc , while Orlando was held to just 4 - for - 15 from deep .
Things heated up a little too late for the Magic , as the team won 4 of its last 5 before Wednesday 's contest .
Center Nikola_Vucevic came off the bench on Wednesday , but still managed to contribute 15 points and 13 rebounds .
Breakout star Evan_Fournier , meanwhile , scored 19 despite going 0 - for - 5 from three - point territory .
The Dallas_Mavericks ( 32 - 17 ) defeated the Minnesota_Timberwolves ( 8 - 39 ) 100 - 94 on Monday at the American Airlines Center in Dallas .
The Mavericks came out and had a strong start in this one , out - scoring the Timberwolves 30 - 20 in the first quarter alone .
The Mavericks shot better as a team , going 46 percent from the field and 32 percent from the three - point line , while the Wolves went 42 percent from the floor and a meager 23 percent from beyond the arc .
The Timberwolves did secure a 47 - 43 rebounding advantage , but it was n't enough to take down the Mavericks .
Monta_Ellis had the most production for the Mavericks , finishing with 23 points ( 7 - 21 FG , 3 - 7 3Pt , 6 - 11 FT ) , 2 assists and 2 steals in 36 minutes .
Dirk_Nowitzki was very efficient in his time on the floor , scoring 16 points ( 7 - 10 FG , 2 - 3 3Pt , 0 - 1 FT ) and grabbing 7 rebounds .

Thaddeus_Young nearly recorded a double - double , posting 15 points ( 5 - 10 FG , 0 - 2 3Pt , 5 - 6 FT ) , 9 rebounds and 3 steals .
