The Philadelphia_76ers defeated the Orlando_Magic , 112 - 111 , Thursday at Amway Center .
With 2 minutes remaining and the 76ers ( 19 - 34 ) down 6 points , the game was in serious doubt for Philadelphia .
But , over the course of the next minute and a half , the 76ers hit 5 free throws before a Dario_Saric layup put the team up by 1 point with just 35 seconds remaining .
A short shot from Orlando 's Nikola_Vucevic put them back up 2 , but then T.J._McConnell ended up being the hero once again , hitting his second game - winning shot of the season as the 76ers ultimately walked away with the victory .
As for the Magic ( 20 - 35 ) , Vucevic recorded yet another double - double , posting 21 points on 10 - of - 13 shooting and 11 rebounds in 31 minutes .
Evan_Fournier came close to a triple - double , scoring a team - high 24 points to go along with 9 rebounds and 8 assists .
Fournier shot 3 - of - 6 from behind the arc , and his team for the most part followed , shooting 48 percent from long range .
Where the game was ultimately lost , however , was the Magic 's inability to take care of the basketball , as they recorded 21 total turnovers as a team .
Up next , the 76ers will look to keep up their winning ways Saturday against the Heat , while the Magic will look to end their 3 - game losing streak Saturday against the Mavericks .
The assist - to - turnover ratio was the difference , as the Suns doubled up the Thunder in assists , 28 - 14 , while committing 2 less turnovers .
The bench production was huge as well , with Phoenix winning that battle , 55 - 22 .
Russell Westrook did all he could for Oklahoma_City , as he led the team with 48 points , 17 rebounds , 9 assists and 3 steals .
Steven_Adams fell just shy of a double - double , totaling 9 points and 10 rebounds .
Eric_Bledsoe led the way for Phoenix , as he tallied 18 points , 3 rebounds , 5 assists and 4 steals .
Devin_Booker finished with 17 points , 7 rebounds and 3 assists .
Tyler_Ulis provided 14 points , 4 rebounds , 7 assists and 3 steals off the bench , while Williams recorded a 14 - point , 13 - rebound double - double .
The Bucks ( 6 - 5 ) held off the Knicks ( 3 - 9 ) 117 - 113 in Milwaukee on Tuesday .
Milwaukee , which led by 17 at halftime , extended the lead to as much as 26 points in the third quarter , but the Knicks came storming back to close the gap late in the fourth quarter .
Down 15 to begin the final period , the Knicks slowly chipped away at the lead , whittling it down to single digits with under 3 minutes to play .
A Tim Hardaway , Jr. layup followed by a thunderous Iman_Shumpert baseline slam cut the lead to just 4 with 1:51 remaining , but Khris_Middleton responded with a pair of free throws on the other end to extend it back to 6 .
After 2 J.R. Smith free throws , Milwaukee ran the shot clock down on its ensuing possession , ending in an Ersan_Ilyasova step - back jumper from the left corner .
Ilyasova knocked it down , returning the lead to 6 points .
While the Bucks allowed New_York to score 3 baskets in the final 30 seconds , Jerryd_Bayless was able to ice the game at the line , going 5 - of - 6 in the final 26 seconds .
The Bucks , who won their fourth game in 5 tries , placed 7 players in double - figures , led by 20 points from Ilyasova off the bench .
Brandon_Knight added 14 points and 9 assists , while Zaza_Pachulia , starting in place of the injured Larry_Sanders , added 14 points and 13 rebounds .
Jabari_Parker chipped in 12 points , and Giannis_Antetokounmpo had 13 points and 6 rebounds in 18 minutes .
Milwaukee out - rebounded New_York 44 - 28 and scored 14 more points in the paint .
The Knicks lost for the eighth time in their last 9 games despite shooting 55 percent from the field .
Carmelo_Anthony led the way with 26 points , 6 rebounds and 5 assists , and Hardaway added 24 points off the bench .
Shumpert finished with 21 points , 8 rebounds and 8 assists in 36 minutes , easily his best performance of the season .
The Portland Trail_Blazers ( 23 - 7 ) defeated the Oklahoma_City_Thunder ( 13 - 16 ) 115 - 111 on Tuesday at Chesapeake Energy Arena in Oklahoma_City .
In a game of runs , the Trail_Blazers and Thunder found themselves locked up following the fourth quarter , but in overtime the Trail_Blazers were able to use a team - effort to outlast the Thunder and steal the 4 - point victory on the road .
The Blazers used an outstanding three - point outing , going 55 percent from beyond the arc , while the Thunder shot only 32 percent from deep .
LaMarcus_Aldridge , Wesley_Matthews and Damian_Lillard provided 87 of the teams total of 115 points .
Lillard was unstoppable , going 11 - for - 21 from the field and a ridiculous 8 - for - 12 from the three - point line to score 40 points .
Aldridge was a force as well , scoring 25 points ( 9 - 28 FG , 0 - 1 3Pt , 7 - 8 FT ) and adding 9 rebounds .
Matthews was n't far behind either , going 8 - for - 15 from the field and 5 - for - 8 from the three - point line to score 22 points , with a few clutch buckets in overtime .
Not to be outdone by Lillard , Russell_Westbrook posted a 40 - point ( 16 - 34 FG , 1 - 5 3Pt , 7 - 9 FT ) , 10 - rebound game of his own .
Coming off the bench , Reggie_Jackson did his part , scoring 21 points ( 8 - 17 FG , 1 - 2 3Pt , 4 - 4 FT ) and grabbing 9 rebounds .
The Oklahoma_City_Thunder ( 44 - 20 ) took down the Los_Angeles_Clippers ( 41 - 22 ) in a potential Western Conference playoff preview Wednesday night at Chesapeake Energy Arena , 120 - 108 .
Oklahoma_City shot a sharp 53 percent from the floor and resoundingly won the rebounding battle 52 - 29 as they grinded out the victory .
The Clippers never held the lead , but they came back from a 12 - point second quarter lead to keep the game tied into the third quarter .
But after the last tie , at 75 - 75 , Oklahoma_City busted out an 18 - 8 run to close the quarter and led by double digits for the entire final period .
Kevin_Durant led all scorers with 30 points ( 11 - 20 FG , 5 - 8 3PT ) and added 12 rebounds and 7 assists .
Russell_Westbrook tied Draymond_Green for the NBA lead with his 11th triple - double as he scored 25 ( 9 - 15 FG , 7 - 7 FT ) , grabbed 11 rebounds and dished a season best 20 assists .
The Utah_Jazz ( 4 - 2 ) defeated the Memphis Grizzles ( 3 - 4 ) 89 - 79 on Saturday .
This was a battle of dominant frontcourts and the Jazz appeared to win the battle , as they out - rebounded Memphis 49 - 44 while out - blocking them 10 - 1 .
Trailing 77 - 57 after the end of the third quarter , Memphis decided to turn on the defensive jets and held Utah to just 12 points in the final 12 minutes .
This has been a scary trend for the Grizzlies this season , as their 4 losses have been by a combined 109 points .
Rudy_Gobert had 11 rebounds and 4 blocks in the game , while Derrick_Favors added 12 points , 16 rebounds and 3 steals in the victory .
The key to the win was a huge performance off the bench from Trey_Burke , who scored a game - high 24 points while going 6 - for - 8 from three - point range .

The Kings had a whopping 27 turnovers , while the Warriors contributed 22 of their own .

The Kings shot 31 percent from the field and 17 percent from beyond the arc .
Rudy_Gay contributed 14 points of his own and added 9 rebounds , 1 steal , and 1 blocked shot .
The New_York_Knicks ( 13 - 14 ) defeated the Philadelphia_76ers ( 1 - 27 ) by the score 107 - 97 , Friday night in Philly .
The 76ers played a strong first 3 minutes , getting up 11 - 9 but that would be the last lead they saw .
New_York went up 13 - 11 with 7:27 left in the first quarter and did not look back from there , maintaining close to a 20 point cushion for most of the second , third and fourth quarters .
With this win the Knicks have now won 3 in a row .
Afflalo finished with 22 points on efficient 9 - 13 shooting , including going 3 - 5 from deep , along with 7 rebounds , 1 assist and 1 block , in 26 minutes .
Carmelo_Anthony did not have his best shooting night , going 4 - 14 from the field , but still finished with 16 points , 5 rebounds , 4 assists and 2 steals , in 28 minutes .
Derrick_Williams chipped in 17 points on solid 7 - 11 shooting , along with 3 rebounds and 1 steal , in 22 minutes off the bench .
The 76ers had 5 players score in double digits and shot a respectable 48 percent from the field but only grabbed 36 rebounds , which severely affected their ability to get the score within striking distance .

For the Jazz , the high scorer was forward Derrick_Favors with just 13 points .
Only 2 other Jazz players scored in double figures .

Altogether , Utah shot an abysmal 33 percent from the field on the night .
The Orlando_Magic ( 12 - 21 ) defeated the Charlotte_Hornets ( 10 - 21 ) 102 - 94 on Saturday .
Orlando has won 2 of their last 3 games as they continue to experiment with their latest starting lineup that includes Elfrid_Payton at point guard and Kyle_O'Quinn at power forward .
After foul trouble held him to just 16 minutes Friday , he played just 14 minutes Saturday , though it appears his limited minutes Saturday were simply due to the Magic 's rotation and matchups against the Hornets .
Payton approached a triple - double , putting up 11 points , 7 rebounds and 8 assists in 35 minutes .
The Magic will wrap up their 2 - game road trip against the Miami_Heat on Monday .
Charlotte has dropped 2 straight as they try not to falter too much following their promising 4 - game win streak .
Since snapping his league - record three - point streak last week , Steph Curry has been lights out from beyond the arc , hitting 24 three - pointers in the past 3 games .
Curry dominated from the floor on Thursday , hitting 7 threes , shooting 10 - of - 17 overall , and leading the game with 33 points .
It was a stellar night for the other splash brother as well , as Klay_Thompson scored 19 points on 7 - of - 14 shooting .
Kevin_Durant , meanwhile , posted an impressive stat line of 18 points , 9 rebounds , and 5 assists , but disappointingly had his 20 - point game streak snapped at 72 games .
Overall , Golden_State shot an impressive 54 percent from the field , 46 percent from beyond the arc , and 95 percent from the free - throw line .
Multiple players hit fewer than 1 third of their shots , including sophomore guard Emmanuel_Mudiay ( 4 - of - 15 ) , forward Danilo_Gallinari ( 2 - of - 9 ) , and reigning All-Rookie First Team member Nikola_Jokic ( 1 - of - 5 ) .
The Nuggets finished having hit just 40 percent of their field goals and 70 percent of their free - throws .
The Los_Angeles_Clippers defeated the visiting Cleveland_Cavaliers , 108 - 78 , at Staples Center on Saturday evening .
The Cavaliers decided to rest their big - 3 , as LeBron_James , Kyrie_Irving and Kevin_Love all rode the benches , while their team floundered in one of the most lackluster performances of the season .
The Cavs actually led 16 - 14 after the first quarter , but the Clippers woke up and dominated the second quarter , to take a 47 - 31 lead into half time .
The Clippers shot 51 percent from the field and dished 27 assists , as they cruised to the win , ending a 3 - game losing streak .
Richard_Jefferson was the high - point man for Cleveland ( 45 - 23 ) with 12 points on 4 - of - 9 shooting , to go along with 6 rebounds , in 28 minutes off the bench .
Six other players scored in double digits for the Cavs , including Channing_Frye , J.R. Smith , Iman_Shumpert and DeAndre_Liggins , who chipped in 10 points each .
Meanwhile , Blake_Griffin poured in 23 points on 10 - of - 17 shooting , to go along with 8 rebounds and 4 assists , in 31 minutes , to lead the Clippers ( 41 - 29 ) to a much - needed win .
DeAndre_Jordan took care of the paint , gobbling up 17 rebounds , to compliment his 13 points , 2 assists and 1 steal , while J.J. Redick shot 6 - of - 11 from the field on his way to 16 points in only 19 minutes .
The Los_Angeles_Lakers ( 1 - 4 ) tallied their first victory of the season Friday on the road against the still - winless Brooklyn_Nets ( 0 - 6 ) .
The Lakers , having struggled mightily through their first 4 games , were able to turn things around by narrowly edging out the ailing Nets .
Second overall pick D'Angelo_Russell was able to help lead the way for the Lakers , posting 16 points and recording 3 steals in 23 minutes of play .
Developing forward Julius_Randle also contributed to the Los_Angeles cause , delivering totals of 14 points and 7 rebounds .

They limited the Hornets to a 44 percent success rate from the field and 36 percent from three - point range .

Brooklyn 's defense was on point , as they held the Hawks to 35 percent from the field , 19 percent from three - point range and 59 percent from the free - throw line .

The Houston_Rockets defeated the Dallas_Mavericks 93 - 92 at Toyota Center on Sunday .
The Rockets ( 2 - 1 ) maintained a lead throughout most of the Western Conference clash with the Mavericks ( 0 - 3 ) , which included a 10 point lead at the half .
Drama ensued down the stretch , started by Wesley_Matthews , who was able to cap of a 70 run with back - to - back baskets , which cut the Rockets 's lead to 2 points with 3:2 remaining in the fourth quarter .
Matthews 's heads up defense forced 1 turnover on Harden and transitioned the impressive scoring effort to give Dallas a chance to grab its first win of the season .
Harden went on to put up star numbers again , scoring 28 points to go along with 7 rebounds and 7 assists .

Boston shot just short 60 percent from the field while the Nets fell just shy of 40 percent .
The assisting differential was equally as lopsided , as the Celtics had 39 assists to the Nets 17 .
This sort of performance exemplifies which directions these 2 franchises are going right now and Brooklyn is in a lot of trouble right now .
One bright spot is the strong play of Thaddeus_Young though , as he tallied 14 points and 10 rebounds in yet another great performance .

The Chicago_Bulls ( 32 - 30 ) earned a win over the division rival Milwaukee_Bucks ( 26 - 38 ) Monday night at the United Center , 100 - 90 .
Other than a 2 - minute stretch in the first quarter , Chicago held the lead for the entire game .
They never managed to pull away , and the Bucks kept it within single digits throughout the fourth quarter and even pulled within 2 points 3 separate times .
But the Bulls sunk 2 three - pointers and shot 8 - 9 from the free throw line over the game 's final 4 minutes and did enough to hold off the Bucks .
The Bulls were powered by a Pau_Gasol triple - double , as the center scored 12 points ( 4 - 14 FG , 4 - 5 FT ) , grabbed 17 rebounds and dished 13 assists , with 5 blocks thrown in for good measure .
Derrick_Rose led all scorers with 22 points on 9 - 16 shooting and dished 7 assists .

The Hornets ( 6 - 6 ) were able to hold on for a 116 - 111 victory against the Nets ( 2 - 10 ) at Time Warner Cable Arena on Wednesday .
With the score tied 86 - 86 after the third quarter , Nets coach Lionel Hollins decided to roll with a small lineup featuring Shane_Larkin , Jarrett_Jack , Markel_Brown and Joe_Johnson .
It backfired , as the Hornets were able to take an 8 - point lead and would eventually hold on for the win .
Nic Batum led the way for Charlotte , scoring 24 points ( 7 - 12 FG , 3 - 6 3Pt , 7 - 7 FT ) while matching his season high of 8 assists .
Perhaps the difference in the game was the rebounding battle , which the Nets lost 49 to 37 while playing mediocre defense after holding the Hawks to 88 points in Tuesday 's win .
Brook_Lopez was limited to just 5 rebounds , shooting 8 - of - 19 from the floor before fouling out in the fourth quarter .
Thad Young , who posted a season - high 27 points ( 11 - 17 FG , 0 - 1 3Pt , 5 - 6 FT ) , scored 15 of his 27 in the third quarter to keep the Hornets from running away with the game .
Jack nearly finished with a triple - double , pouring in 16 points with 9 assists and 8 rebounds over 33 minutes .
Charlotte got contributions from everywhere Wednesday night , as 7 players finished with double - digit scoring .
The guard tandem of Kemba_Walker and Jeremy_Lin continues to work wonders for coach Steve Clifford , with Walker netting 18 points to go along with 7 assists and 7 rebounds .
Lin came off the bench and scored 13 points over a season - high 29 minutes , pulling down 9 rebounds and dishing out 4 assists for perhaps his most productive game of the season .
The Hornets clearly feed off the home crowd , improve to 4 - 1 at TWC Arena this season .
The Nets travel to Boston to face the Celtics on Friday ; the Hornets continue a 7 - game homestand against the 76ers .
John_Wall led all scorers with 36 points and posted the final 6 points for Washington on a layup and 2 sets of free throws to seal a hard - fought victory .

The Chicago_Bulls defeated the host Cleveland_Cavaliers , 117 - 99 , at Quicken Loans Arena on Saturday .
Chicago had been struggling prior to the break , but a road win over a 40 - win team is an impressive feat .
The third quarter was the decisive stretch , as Chicago outscored Cleveland , 34 - 20 .
The assist - to - turnover ratio was a huge factor as well , as the Bulls recorded 34 assists to 7 turnovers , while the Cavaliers committed 12 turnovers to 24 assists .
Chicago had one of their best three - point shooting games of the year too , going 15 - of - 30 from long distance , which marks a season - high in makes .
The Bulls ( 30 - 29 ) are now 20 out of the All-Star break and it appears that break is all they needed to get going .
Jimmy_Butler and Dwyane_Wade carried the load , as they combined for 38 points , 19 rebounds and 20 assists , while they each flirted with a triple - double .
Butler finished with a triple - double , totaling 18 points , 10 rebounds and 10 assists , while Wade accumulated 20 points , 9 rebounds and 10 assists of his own .
Nikola_Mirotic was a huge spark off the bench , as he provided 14 points and 10 rebounds .
Rajon_Rondo also played well off the bench , collecting 15 points and 5 assists .
The Cavaliers ( 40 - 17 ) had to play this game without LeBron_James ( sickness ) and it 's clear just how much he means to this team with a loss like this .
With Kevin_Love also out , Kyrie_Irving had to carry the load , as he led the team with 34 points , 9 rebounds and 7 assists .
Kyle_Korver and James_Jones were sharpshooting off the bench , as they scored 14 points a piece , while combining to go 8 - of - 12 from three - point range .
The Bulls are now 30 against the Cavaliers this season .

Tim Hardaway hit the game - winning three - pointer with 13 seconds remaining .
The Knicks won the quarter 8 - 7 .

He and rookie Langston_Galloway each shot 4 - of - 16 from the floor .

The Magic fell to 5 - 7 when wearing sleeved jerseys .
They have the fifth worst record in the league , 2 and half games behind the sixth worst team , the Sacramento_Kings .
Elfrid_Payton , Rookie of the Year candidate , snapped a streak of 10 consecutive made free throws , going 1 - of - 4 against the Knicks .

James finished with 37 points , 7 rebounds and 8 assists on 13 - of - 29 shooting , but was held scoreless in the overtime period .

Kevin_Love added 15 points and 10 rebounds , while Mozgov and Dellavedova contributed 8 points each .
Anthony_Davis provided an all - around dominant performance in front of his hometown fans at the Smoothie King Center , and finished with 31 points and 12 rebounds on 13 - of - 22 shooting .
Jrue_Holiday contributed clutch baskets down the stretch and in overtime , as he finished with 13 points , 7 rebounds and 5 assists in 25 minutes off the bench .
The Cavaliers will visit the Miami_Heat ( 11 - 6 ) on Saturday , while Pelicans host the Boston_Celtics ( 11 - 8 ) on Monday .
The game 's leading scorer , Chicago 's Jimmy_Butler , had 20 points , but shot just 7 - of - 19 .

Things did n't look much better for Utah , as star Gordon_Hayward shot just 3 - of - 15 on the night .

For the Bulls , Butler and Lopez had 12 each .
The Golden_State_Warriors ( 60 ) defeated the Denver_Nuggets ( 2 - 4 ) 119 - 104 on Friday .
After serving as one of Denver 's most consistent bench players over the Nuggets 's first 5 contests , Will_Barton entered the starting lineup Friday night .
Barton pitched in 19 points , 8 rebounds , and 5 assists over 39 minutes on the floor , and may have earned the right for more starts in the immediate future .
Danilo_Gallinari once again spearhead Denver 's offense , tallying 25 points against a tough Warriors defense .
Gary_Harris ( 16 points ) and Emmanuel_Mudiay ( 13 points ) supplemented Gallinari 's and Barton 's efforts , but the Nuggets simply were no match for the reigning champs from the start .
The Nuggets , losers of 2 straight , fall to 2 - 4 and remain in last place in the Western Conference 's Northwest Division .
Stephen_Curry continues to be the unquestioned linchpin of a prolific Warriors offense that tallied 74 points in the first half alone .
Curry led the way with 33 points on 12 - for - 22 shooting , including an astounding 8 three - pointers , which he drained at an excellent 50 percent rate .
Festus_Ezeli , starting once again at center for the inactive Andrew_Bogut ( concussion ) , chipped in with a season - best 15 points , while the rest of the Warriors starting 5 also scored in double digits .
The Warriors improved to 60 and remain atop the Western Conference 's Pacific Division and the conference overall .
The New_Orleans_Pelicans ( 20 - 32 ) defeated the Utah_Jazz ( 26 - 26 ) 100 - 96 on Wednesday .
The form of these 2 teams would have indicated a different result , but the Pelicans got a much needed win to keep slim hopes alive for the playoffs .
The Pelicans outscored the Jazz 29 - 19 in the fourth quarter for a comeback win .
The turnovers were the key difference , as Utah committed 17 turnovers to the Pelicans 9 .
This loss cracked a 7 - game winning streak for the Jazz , so losing in the second end of a back - to - back is nothing to be upset about .
Derrick_Favors was fantastic , as he amassed 29 points and 6 rebounds in the loss .
Gordon_Hayward got off to a terrible start , but finished strong by tallying 21 points , 4 rebounds and 4 assists in the defeat .
Rudy_Gobert finished with 12 points and 14 rebounds en route to a double - double as well .

The Los_Angeles_Lakers defeated the Los_Angeles_Clippers , 111 - 102 , at Staples Center on Sunday .
The 2 intra - city rivals met for the first time this season , and the reeling Lakers ( 12 - 22 ) caught the Clippers ( 22 - 10 ) in a somewhat weakened state .
The offensive proficiency led to a 48 percent success rate from the field , and their defense managed to elicit 15 turnovers from the Clippers .
The Clippers were co - led by a pair of 22 - point efforts from J.J. Redick and Jamal_Crawford , with the former adding 3 assists , 2 rebounds and 1 steal , and the latter recording 3 assists and 1 steal as well .
Raymond_Felton drew another start in Paul 's place and supplied 8 points , 10 rebounds , 6 assists , 2 steals and 2 blocks .
DeAndre_Jordan mustered a modest 7 points but did bring down 10 boards as well , while also dishing out 6 assists .
Mareese Speights was productive in a reserve role as well , posting 15 points , 4 rebounds , 1 assist and 1 steal .

Mozgov added 3 rebounds , while Young added 2 rebounds , 2 assists and 1 steal .
D'Angelo_Russell went for 14 points , 5 boards and 4 assists .

Lou_Williams paced the second unit with 14 points , 3 rebounds , 1 assist , 1 block and 1 steal .
Brandon_Ingram came off the bench to supply 10 points and 6 boards over 28 minutes .
The Los_Angeles_Clippers battled back from a 19 - point deficit to grind out a huge win against the visiting Chicago_Bulls , 102 - 95 , at Staples Center on Saturday .
The Bulls ( 8 - 5 ) got out to a fantastic start , with a 33 - 23 first quarter and were able to extend their lead to 19 mid - way though the second quarter .
However , the Clippers ( 12 - 2 ) battled back steadily over the final 3 quarters , but most definitively in the fourth , where they out - scored the Bulls 30 - 18 .
Chicago led 77 - 72 after 3 quarters but the Clippers kept chipping away and eventually took their first lead of the game since leading 4 - 2 , when they went up 84 - 82 with 7 minutes to go in the game .
The Clippers did not let up and held the lead for the rest of the way , ending Chicago 's 4 - game win streak and bolstering their own record to 9 - 1 in their last 10 games .
Blake_Griffin was the high - point man for the Clippers , finishing with 26 points , along with 13 rebounds , 5 assists and 1 steal , in 39 minutes .
Marreese_Speights had his best game in a Clippers uniform , with 16 points , including 11 in the fourth quarter and 3 - of - 4 shooting from long range .
The Clippers shot 41 percent as a team from distance and 47 percent overall .
Dwyane_Wade had a great game , leading the Bulls with 28 points on 9 - of - 20 shooting , including hitting 5 - of - 9 from long range .
Wade also tallied 8 rebounds , 3 assists , 2 blocks and 1 steal as he showed that he still has what it takes to compete against even the toughest of opponents .
Jimmy_Butler added 22 points , while Taj_Gibson chipped in 11 points on 5 - of - 8 shooting .

The Denver_Nuggets ( 13 - 23 ) defeated the host Minnesota_Timberwolves ( 12 - 24 ) 78 - 74 on Wednesday night at Target Center .
With this win Denver is 3 - 1 in the season series .
Denver snapped their 6 - game losing streak with this win , while Minnesota 's losing streak got extended to 4 games .
Denver was up by 1 heading into the fourth quarter 66 - 65 , but from then on only 21 more points were scored between the 2 teams , leading to one of the lowest scoring quarters in recent memory .
The Timberwolves failed to score in the last 4 minutes of the game , during which they had numerous chances to tie it up .
Denver also did not score in the last 4 minutes , other than 2 free throws with 5 seconds left that sealed the deal .
Danilo_Gallinari led the Nuggets with 20 points ( 6 - 15 FG , 2 - 2 3Pt , 6 - 7 FT ) , 7 rebounds and 4 assists , in 35 minutes .

Andrew_Wiggins was relatively quiet as he finished with 11 points ( 4 - 14 FG ) , 3 rebounds and 1 assist , in 31 minutes .
The Timberwolves shot a poor 38 percent from the field and are continuing to struggle on both ends of the floor .
It was the Orlando offense that proved to be more inefficient , as they hit just 36 percent of their shots on the way to 87 points .

The Cavaliers ( 11 - 3 ) defeated the Magic ( 6 - 8 ) 117 - 103 at Quicken Loans Arena on Monday for their third straight victory .
Orlando was able to stay in the game through the first half , but Cleveland jumped out to a commanding 16 - point lead after outscoring the Magic 33 - 21 in the third quarter .
Kevin_Love had another solid game , draining 6 3 - pointers and finishing with a game - high 34 points .
The Cavaliers had perhaps their best shooting performance of the season , hitting 51 percent of their attempts from downtown ( 18 - of - 35 ) .
It 's been an up - and - down season for Magic point guard Elfrid_Payton , who went 0 - for - 7 from the field and finished with zero points in 19 minutes .
With Payton the bench for most of the game , Shabazz_Napier posted a season - high 9 assists with 11 points over 29 minutes .
The silver lining for Orlando was the play of power forward Andrew_Nicholson , who scored a season - high 18 points off the bench .

Phoenix led by as many as 17 , but that comfortable lead quickly turned into a 6 point deficit midway through the fourth .
Eric_Bledsoe canned a deep 3 to cut Dallas 's lead to 1 .
From there , the Suns outscored the Mavericks 13 - 6 over the last 4 minutes to seal the win .
Dallas went 2 - 13 from the floor in the last 7:13 as it faltered to its second straight loss .
Felton hit a 3 to start the fourth but only logged 5 minutes for the whole game .
Monta_Ellis was a frigid 4 - for - 22 from the field and finished with 11 points .
The Mavericks have a chance to regain some ground this week with 2 games against the Spurs , who lead them by a game in the race for the West 's sixth seed .
However , the Suns still trail the streaking Thunder by 3 games for the West 's final playoff spot .
By losing LeBron_James , Chris_Bosh and Dwyane_Wade the last 2 offseasons , the Heat has seen a large chunk of offense head out the door .
However , Goran_Dragic , Dion_Waiters and Hassan_Whiteside are doing an impressive job filling the void in the first 4 games .
Gragic tallied a second straight 25 - point effort Tuesday , Waiters had his first 20 - point outing in a Heat uniform and Hassan_Whiteside tied a franchise record with a fourth consecutive double - double to open the season .

The Los_Angeles_Lakers ( 17 - 46 ) defeated the Detroit_Pistons ( 23 - 40 ) 93 - 85 on Monday at the Staples Center in Los_Angeles .
While they were down 1 after the first half , the Lakers went off in the second , out - scoring the Pistons 44 - 35 to finish the game and pull off the 8 - point victory in front of their home crowd .
While both teams struggled to just 23 percent from the three - point line , the Lakers grabbed the advantage from the field , finishing at 43 percent from the floor , while the Pistons went just 39 percent .
They went 26 - for - 30 from the line , while the Pistons made just 13 - of - 19 attempts .
Leading the way for the Lakers was Jordan_Hill , who went 7 - for - 15 from the field to score 16 points , while adding 3 rebounds as well .
It was his second start in a row at forward , but this game marked a much better result , as he posted just 8 points in Sunday 's start against the Mavericks .
Wesley_Johnson also played a factor in the win and finished with 13 points ( 2 - 6 FG , 1 - 3 3Pt , 8 - 8 FT ) and 2 steals in 33 minutes .
While he did n't do much offensively with just 4 points , Carlos_Boozer was a big help on the boards and finished with 10 rebounds .
Monroe finished with a team - high of 24 points ( 10 - 14 FG , 4 - 8 FT ) , while adding 9 rebounds and 2 blocked shots as well .
He 's been one of the few bright spots during the Pistons 's 7 - game losing streak , as he 's averaged 20 points and 9 rebounds over his last 3 games .
Drummond , on the other hand , recorded 14 points ( 7 - 11 FG ) and a game - high of 21 rebounds .
He 's been an animal on the boards for the Pistons , recording 18 or more rebounds in 3 of his last 4 games .
Caldwell-Pope went 5 - for - 14 from the field and 4 - for - 10 from the three - point line to score 15 points .
Reggie_Jackson struggled with his shot as well and finished with just 2 points ( 1 - 9 FG , 0 - 4 3Pt ) in 22 minutes .
The Golden_State_Warriors defeated the Charlotte_Hornets 113 - 103 Wednesday at Spectrum Center .
The game did n't come as easy to the Warriors ( 39 - 7 ) as the final score may indicate , as Golden_State was behind for a good chunk of the second half of Wednesday 's contest .
Kevin_Durant was dominant in the winning effort , scoring a game - high 33 points in 37 minutes , while Steph Curry added 28 points of his own while shooting 6 - of - 12 from behind the arc .
For the Hornets ( 23 - 23 ) , the loss is their second in a row and drops them back down to .500 on the season .
Kemba_Walker did all he could , as he continues to make his case for the All-Star game , scoring a team - high 26 points and dishing out 8 assists in 38 minutes .

Charlotte badly missed starting center Cody_Zeller ( quad ) , however , as the 3 centers who played Wednesday struggled mightily .
Roy_Hibbert , Frank_Kaminsky and Spencer_Hawes shot a combined 7 - of - 24 ( 29 percent ) from the field en route to scoring just 18 points .
The Jazz ( 13 - 23 ) went on the road and took care of the Bulls ( 25 - 11 ) 97 - 77 on Wednesday night .
The Jazz , who jumped out to a 6 - point first quarter lead , led by just 4 at halftime but came out strong in the third , outscoring Chicago 27 - 19 .

Utah also got 15 points and 8 boards from Trevor_Booker in 23 minutes off the bench .
The Bulls , meanwhile , stumbled to just 33 percent shooting .
Derrick_Rose had just 7 points on 3 - of - 15 shooting , and Jimmy_Butler scored 16 but shot 5 - of - 13 from the floor .
Joakim_Noah also struggled , scoring only 1 point in 27 minutes .
The Bulls shot 6 - of - 20 from 3 and had just 17 assists to go with 15 turnovers as a team .
The Minnesota_Timberwolves earned their third straight win , as they defeated the visiting Oklahoma_City_Thunder , 96 - 86 , at Target Center on Friday evening .
After the Timberwolves won the first quarter , the Thunder battled back to take a 50 - 45 lead into halftime .
This marks the third win in a row for the Timberwolves ( 14 - 26 ) , who have now knocked off 2 of the more dangerous teams in the league , defeating Houston and Oklahoma_City in the matter of a few days .
Despite being notoriously poor in second halves early in the season , the Timberwolves used a 51 - 36 second half to bury the Thunder in this one .
Karl-Anthony_Towns led the charge , with a game - high 29 points , to go along with 17 rebounds , 3 blocks , 2 steals and 1 assist , in 37 minutes .
Andrew_Wiggins added 19 points , while Ricky_Rubio chipped in 14 points and dished 14 assists .
The Timberwolves gave up 16 turnovers , but forced 19 out of their opponent , while they shot 45 percent from the field and managed to hold the Thunder to only 39 percent .
The T-Wolves are now 9 - 13 at home and can look ahead to their next game on Sunday in Dallas .
Meanwhile , the Thunder ( 24 - 17 ) saw their 3 - game win streak come to an end , as they were stifled by the determined Timberwolves .
The Thunder struggled from long range , going only 3 - of - 20 .
Russell_Westbrook had a quiet night in the points column , by his standards that is , as he finished with 21 points .
Westbrook added 12 assists and 11 rebounds to notch his 19th triple - double of the season , which is a career - high for him .

The Thunder will look to bounce back as they take on the Kings in Sacramento on Sunday , which will mark the second game of their current 6 - game road trip .

The Philadelphia_76ers ( 6 - 38 ) earned their first Eastern Conference victory Wednesday , defeating the Orlando_Magic ( 20 - 21 ) , 96 - 87 .
With the win , the Sixers are now 5 - 8 since trading for point guard Ish_Smith .
The deal , which sent 2 second - round picks to New_Orleans in exchange for the former Sixer , brought in a veteran point guard to help organize Philadelphia 's ailing offense .
In 13 games with the Sixers , Smith has boasted impressive averages of 17 points , 8 assists , and 2 steals per game .
Smith 's presence in Philadelphia has helped spark a much - needed turnaround for the once 1 - 30 team .

The Cleveland_Cavaliers ( 10 - 7 ) defeated the New_York_Knicks ( 4 - 16 ) 90 - 87 on Thursday .
Cleveland has won 5 straight games , and they 've vaulted themselves out of the early - season hole they were in , at 1 time standing with a sub - .500 record of 5 - 7 .
Kyrie_Irving led the attack on offense , putting up a season - high 37 points in 44 minutes .
LeBron_James facilitated and finished with 19 points and 12 assists in 40 minutes , while Kevin_Love cleaned up the glass to finish with 11 ponts and 11 rebounds in 39 minutes .
James , Irving and Love are all averaging at least 36 minutes per game this season .
The Cavaliers will try to make it 6 straight wins when they continue their road trip in Toronto on Friday against the Raptors .
The Knicks have only reached the 100 - point threshold once in their last 8 games as their offense continues to sputter .
They shot 42 percent from the field and 31 percent from beyond the arc in Thursday 's loss , with Carmelo_Anthony finshing with 9 points on 4 - of - 19 shooting in 30 minutes .
The host Utah_Jazz took down the visiting Los_Angeles_Lakers on Thursday , 96 - 88 .
Utah ( 30 - 18 ) had lost 2 straight but bounced back quickly on Thursday , winning convincingly over Los_Angeles .
Hayward played like an All-Star on Thursday , snapping a cold streak to shoot 7 - of - 14 for 24 points .
Gobert looked like he meant it on Thursday , as he pulled down a team - high 13 rebounds and blocked a whopping 5 shots .
His strong play helped to anchor the tough Utah defense , which held the Lakers to just 42 percent shooting and only 4 three - pointers .
Los_Angeles ( 16 - 34 ) , meanwhile , saw disastrous play from its starting 5 , leading to a heavy reliance on bench output .
Sixth man Lou_Williams offered yet another strong bench performance , leading the team with 20 points .
The Houston_Rockets dominated the Los_Angeles_Lakers 134 - 95 Wednesday at Target Center .
This game appeared to be over after the first quarter , as the Lakers 's ( 10 - 14 ) leaky defense had no answered for the Rockets 's ( 15 - 7 ) high - powered offensive attack , as Houston won the quarter 43 - 27 .
Houston was led by shooting guard Eric_Gordon , who has really adjusted to his new role off the bench , as he scored a game - high 26 points in just 24 minutes on a scorching 9 - of - 13 from the field .
Early MVP-candidate James_Harden was not too far behind , scoring 25 points on top of 8 rebounds , 6 assists and 4 steals .
To round off a terrific performance from the Rockets 's backcourt players , Patrick_Beverley put together his best performance since returning from injury , recording 10 points , 12 assists , 7 rebounds and 3 steals in 32 minutes .
As a team , the Rockets made a living at the 3 - point line , shooting an impressive 15 - of - 36 from long range .
For the Lakers , it was a night to forget , as the team shot a dreadful 39 percent from the field and 25 percent from behind the arc .
Julius_Randle led the way with a double - double of 21 points and 10 rebounds in 29 minutes , while Lou_Williams continued to campaign for a Sixth Man of the Year award , posting an efficient 24 points in 25 minutes .
Meanwhile , Jordan_Clarkson made his first start at point guard this season and posted a lowly 7 points on just 3 - of - 13 shooting from the field .
The Bucks utilized a pair of season - best scoring totals from 2 starters to overcome a game - high 24 points from the Nets 's Bojan_Bogdanovic .
John_Henson and Matthew_Dellavedova posted 20 and 18 points , respectively , and the Bucks shot 47 percent while limiting the Nets to a stingy 37 percent success rate .
Giannis_Antetokounmpo posted a 16 - point , 10 - rebound double - double , while Jabari_Parker managed 15 points .
Tony_Snell registered 10 points and Greg_Monroe paced the bench with 13 points .
Sean_Kilpatrick checked in second on the Nets with 19 points , despite shooting just 3 - of - 13 .
Brook_Lopez had a down game by his standards , posting 13 points , 6 assists , 4 rebounds , 3 blocks and 1 steal .
Anthony_Bennett posted 14 rebounds while drawing the start for Trevor_Booker .
Joe_Harris led the second unit with 17 points .
Dallas have struggled on offense all season and this 78 - point effort shows just why .
Toronto did a nice job on defense though , holding the Mavericks to 37 percent from the field and 28 percent from three - point range .
Rebounding was the key for the Raptors , as they won that battle , 55 - 34 .
Harrison_Barnes led Dallas in scoring , as he dropped 18 points .
Dirk_Nowitzki was their best player , as he totaled 17 points , 7 rebounds and 2 assists .
Dwight_Powell recorded a double - double off the bench , providing 10 points and 10 rebounds .
DeMar_DeRozan carried the load for Toronto , as he accrued 26 points , 6 rebounds , 2 assists and 2 steals .
Norman_Powell started and finished with 19 points , 5 rebounds and 3 assists .
Jonas_Valanciunas recorded a double - double , totaling 14 points and 12 rebounds .
The Atlanta_Hawks ( 35 - 34 ) defeated the Denver_Nuggets ( 28 - 41 ) 116 - 98 on Thursday .
The Hawks made a change to the starting lineup , with Kent_Bazemore heading to the bench with a knee injury and Tim Hardaway , Jr. stepping into the starting 5 in his stead .
The move was highly successful , as Hardaway filled out the stat sheet with 21 points , 7 rebounds , 4 assists and 1 steal .
Atlanta was essentially superior in every category as well , as they posted 50 percent and 46 percent success rates from the field and three - point range , respectively .
They also elicited 14 turnovers from the Nuggets , and hauled in 40 boards on the night .
Augustin paced Denver in his reserve role , tallying 17 points , 7 assists , 1 rebound and 1 block .
A second bench player , Joffrey_Lauvergne , was next in line with 16 points , 6 rebounds , 1 assist and 1 block .
Gary_Harris pitched in 15 points , 4 rebounds , 2 assists and 1 steal .
Emmanuel_Mudiay followed with 12 points , 2 rebounds , 2 assists and 1 steal , as the only other starter besides Harris to manage double - digit scoring .
The Nuggets remain in fourth place in the Western Conference 's Northwest Division , and are 8 games behind the eighth - seeded Dallas_Mavericks .
Jeff_Teague followed Hardway 's effort with 16 points , 8 assists , 3 rebounds and 1 steal .
Paul_Millsap matched Teague 's scoring total and added 11 rebounds , 4 assists and 4 blocks .
Al_Horford and Kyle_Korver rounded out a productive night for the starting 5 with a pair of 11 - point efforts .
Thabo_Sefolosha paced the reserves with 14 points , 3 rebounds , 2 assists and 1 steal .
Kris_Humphries and Dennis_Schroder also had a pair of 11 - point outings in reserve roles .
The Golden_State_Warriors ( 57 - 13 ) defeated the Washington_Wizards ( 40 - 31 ) 107 - 76 on Monday at Oracle Arena in Oakland .
This game looked like it was going to be a close 1 when the Warriors were up just 2 points at the half .
They came out firing in the third quarter though , out - scoring the Wizards 29 - 8 , which allowed them to eventually coast to the convincing 31 - point victory in front of their home crowd .
With the win , the Warriors extended their Western Conference lead to 7 and a half games over the Memphis_Grizzlies , while the Wizards sit in the fifth projected playoff seed in the East , 5 and a half games ahead of the Milwaukee_Bucks .
Stephen_Curry had himself a night , going 8 - for - 14 from the field and 5 - for - 8 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 24 points , while also adding 5 rebounds and 6 assists in just 28 minutes .
Curry has combined to shoot 8 - for - 14 from the three - point line over his last 2 games , helping him score 48 points over that span as well .
Draymond_Green also chipped in with 13 points ( 5 - 11 FG , 3 - 8 3Pt , 0 - 2 FT ) and 6 rebounds .
Their starting frontcourt was miserable , as Marcin_Gortat , Nene Hilario and Paul_Pierce combined for just 18 points between the 3 .
Wall looks to be struggling lately , combining to go just 7 - for - 26 from the floor and 1 - for - 6 from the three - point line over his last 2 games .
Ramon_Sessions and Kevin_Seraphin both reached double figures off the bench with 12 points apiece .
The Portland Trail_Blazers ( 21 - 26 ) defeated the Sacramento_Kings ( 20 - 25 ) 112 - 97 at Moda Center on Tuesday .
DeMarcus_Cousins scored a league high 56 points against Charlotte , but was far from his league leading January numbers against the Blazers .
Sacramento looked exhausted , as expected after playing 6 periods , and ran out of steam at the beginning of the third quarter .
They did hang with Portland for first half and entered the third quarter down 6 points , but the Blazers extended their 6 point lead to as many as 20 midway through the fourth quarter .
Cousins inefficiency resulted in missed opportunities , as he finished with 17 points on 4 - of - 21 shooting , and injured his hand in the second half , which took him out of the game for a brief moment before returning to action the following possession .
Rajon_Rondo added 15 points and 11 assists , marking his 23rd double - double of the season , and uncharacteristically took 17 shots in the loss .
Sacramento will take a day off before visiting the New_Orleans_Pelicans ( 16 - 28 ) on Thursday .
It was an important win , as the Blazers and Kings are currently battling for the 8 - seed in the Western Conference .
Led by point guard Damian_Lillard , who scored 15 points and added 13 dimes , the floor general spaced the floor , resulting in 7 Blazers finishing in double figures .
CJ_McCollum led all Blazers in scoring with 18 points on 7 - of - 16 shooting , Mason_Plumlee added 12 points and Noah_Vonleh scored 10 points of his own .
The Portland bench was equally impressive as the starting 5 , combining for 50 points led by the combination of Allen_Crabbe ( 13 points ) , Ed_Davis ( 11 points ) and Gerald_Henderson ( 15 points ) .
Portland will play their second game of a back - to - back when they host the Charlotte_Hornets ( 22 - 23 ) on Wednesday .
The host Minnesota_Timberwolves obliterated the Philadelphia_76ers , 110 - 86 , at Target Center on Thursday .
In a battle between 2 developing franchises , the Timberwolves showed just how much further along they are than the Sixers .
Minnesota took it to Philadelphia early , as they led by 28 points at the half and held the Sixers to just 33 points in that 24 - minute stretch .
Minnesota also dominated down low , as they won the rebounding battle 49 - 40 and the points in the paint differential 56 - 40 .
Ersan_Ilyasova was a lone bright spot , as he led the starters with 13 points , 3 rebounds and 3 assists .
Nik_Stauskas played well off the bench , totaling 13 points , 4 rebounds and 2 steals of his own .
Dario_Saric led the team in scoring , as he dropped 16 points of his own off the bench .
Robert_Covington struggled with his shot yet again , as he scored just 4 points on 1 - of - 12 shooting .
Joel_Embiid played 22 minutes and amassed 10 points and 10 rebounds .
The Timberwolves ( 4 - 7 ) had their first primetime game in awhile and they did n't disappoint .
Andrew_Wiggins was especially impressive , as he scored a game - high 35 points on 14 - of - 20 shooting .
Karl-Anthony_Towns recorded a double - double in the blowout , totaling 25 points , 10 rebounds and 2 blocks .
Gorgui_Dieng also recorded a double - double , accumulating 12 points , 10 rebounds and 3 assists .
The Indiana_Pacers ( 26 - 23 ) defeated the Brooklyn_Nets ( 12 - 38 ) 114 - 100 on Wednesday .
Despite a remarkably balanced offensive attack that featured all 5 starters posting double - digit scoring , the Nets were outdone by a Pacers team that received their highest point total from a reserve .
Miles managed 27 points in just 22 minutes on the floor , while adding a pair of rebounds and 1 assist .
He was 10 of 15 overall and 4 of 7 from three - point range , playing an integral part in the Pacers 's matching 50 percent tallies from the field and beyond the arc .
Buttressed by Miles 's prolific night , the Indiana bench outscored the Nets reserves by the margin of 58 - 16 .
Paul_George led the starting unit for the visitors with 17 points , 6 assists , 4 rebounds , 1 block and a remarkable 5 steals .
George_Hill followed with 13 points , 4 rebounds , 2 assists and 3 thefts of his own .
With Jordan_Hill only playing 19 minutes on the night , it was Lavoy_Allen who manned the center spot for 25 minutes off the bench and posted a near double - double , totaling 12 points , 8 rebounds , 1 assist and 1 block .
Brook_Lopez led the way for Brooklyn with 21 points , 8 rebounds , 3 assists , 1 steal and 1 block .
Joe_Johnson continued his resurgent play with a near double - double , supplying 20 points , 9 assists , 4 boards and 2 steals .
Thaddeus_Young was a force on the glass , hauling down 14 rebounds and also pitching in 16 points and 1 assist .
Wayne_Ellington supplied 16 points , 2 rebounds and 1 steal , while Donald_Sloan rounded out the starting unit 's productive night with 11 points , 7 assists and 1 steal .
LeBron_James scored 29 points to lead the Cleveland_Cavaliers ( 2 - 1 ) to a 102 - 92 victory over his former team , the Miami_Heat ( 1 - 1 ) , on Friday night .
James was firing on all cylinders from the get go , finishing with 10 points in the first quarter and reaching 18 by halftime while shooting 8 - for - 12 from the field during that span .
He would finish the night with an efficient 13 - for - 19 shooting mark In addition , the Cavaliers received the best performance of the young season so far from Kevin_Love , who tallied 24 points , 14 boards , and 5 assists .
Love and James represented the bulk of the offense for the Cavs in this one , as no other player in the starting lineup had more than 9 points .
Fortunately for Cleveland , Tristan_Thompson was able to provide some complementary scoring off the bench , picking up 13 points on 6 - for - 9 shooting to go along with 9 boards .
Reserve guard Matthew_Dellavedova handed out a team - leading 10 assists and grabbed 5 boards .
Wade contributed 25 points , 4 boards , and 2 assists , while Bosh churned out 16 points on 7 - for - 15 shooting .
The lack of bench contributions ultimately spelled the difference , as the Heat only had 19 points from their reserves compared to the Cavs 's 32 .

Speights chipped in 11 points and 12 rebounds off the bench , and Shaun_Livingston finished with 12 points in 23 minutes .

The Toronto_Raptors defeated the Houston_Rockets 115 - 102 at Toyota Center on Wednesday .
It was a wire - to - wire victory for the Raptors ( 9 - 6 ) , who ended their 2 - game slide Wednesday night on the road .
While he did n't reach his scoring average on the season , DeMar_DeRozan still led the way with 24 points , 9 assists and 5 rebounds in 36 minutes , with DeMarre_Carroll managing to score 20 points of his own on 9 - of - 14 shooting .

As a team , the Raptors shot a scorching 12 - of - 23 ( 52 percent ) from behind the arc .
For the Rockets ( 9 - 6 ) , it was James_Harden , as usual , leading the way with 29 points , 15 assists and 6 rebounds in 41 minutes .
He was , however , a bit careless with the basketball , managing 12 turnovers and nearly matching the Raptors 's team total of 14 .
As a team , the Rockets had an astonishing 26 turnovers , which led to plenty of empty possessions that ultimately left them with little chance to win Wednesday 's contest .
On the bright side , each of the 5 Houston starters scored in double figures , but Ryan Andersen had the next highest total behind Harden with just 13 points .

The defense was the key , as they held the Pistons to just 32 points in the second half .
Durant dropped 34 points , 13 rebounds , 5 assists and 3 blocks in the win .

The Oklahoma_City_Thunder defeated the visting Golden_State_Warriors , 118 - 94 , to take a 3 - 1 lead in the Western Conference finals Tuesday night at Chesapeake Energy Arena .
The Warriors withstood an opening 22 - 8 run from the Thunder to close the gap to 4 to end the first period .
But with the Thunder leading 44 - 40 with 6:39 to go in the first half , Oklahoma_City rattled off a dominant 28 - 13 run to go into the half with a 19 - point lead .
Despite a valiant effort from Klay_Thompson , who scored 19 points in the third quarter , the Warriors were never able to get it closer than 8 points in the second half .
Russell_Westbrook recorded his third career playoff game with a triple - double and at least 30 points , as he scored 36 ( 12 - 27 FG , 4 - 8 3PT ) , dished 11 assists and grabbed 11 rebounds ( 6 offensive ) in a dominant performance .
Kevin_Durant struggled from the floor ( 8 - 24 ) but still scored 26 points and added 11 rebounds , 4 assists , 4 steals and 3 blocks .
Andre_Roberson had his best game of the playoffs , as he scored 17 points ( 7 - 12 FG ) and secured 12 rebounds , and Serge_Ibaka also scored 17 points to go with 7 rebounds and 2 blocks .
Oklahoma_City dominated on the glass ( 56 - 40 overall , 16 - 8 on offensive rebounds ) and blocked 8 shots as they held Golden_State to just 41 percent shooting .
Thompson led Golden_State with 26 points ( 9 - 17 FG , 4 - 11 3PT , 4 - 4 FT ) .
Steph Curry could n't find his shot , and he finished with 19 points ( 6 - 20 FG , 2 - 10 3PT , 5 - 7 FT ) , 5 rebounds and 5 assists against 6 turnovers .
Harrison_Barnes was the only other Warrior to reach double figures with 11 points ( 4 - 6 FG , 1 - 2 3PT , 2 - 2 FT ) .
Golden_State hit just 9 of their 30 three - point attempts , a 30 percent mark that sits over 11 points below their regular season average .
The visiting Boston_Celtics took down the Detroit_Pistons on Sunday , 104 - 98 .
Boston ( 38 - 21 ) was up by double digits for much of the game 's middle portion but saw their lead dwindle towards the game 's end .
The Celtics were actually down by 1 point with 45 seconds remaining , when a deep three - point miss with time on the shot clock from Detroit 's Reggie_Jackson allowed Boston to take possession and the lead .
Brown finished the night with 13 points on 5 - of - 9 shooting .
Thomas scored 33 points and hit 5 three - pointers , helping to extend his streak of games with at least 20 points to 43 .
As a team , the Celtics now are on the second - longest streak of games with at least 10 made three - pointers of all time , as the Cs have met the mark in 17 straight contests .
It was a disappointing night for Detroit ( 28 - 31 ) , as the Pistons entered the game having won 5 of their last 7 contests .
Perhaps the biggest hang - up for Detroit was free - throw shooting , as the team went a miserable 16 - of - 35 from the free - throw line .
A big piece of that was center Andre_Drummond , who went just 1 - of - 11 at the stripe .
Drummond is the worst career free - throw shooter in the league 's history at just over 38 percent during his time in the association .

The Celtics and Raptors traded baskets in the extra period , with 3 lead changes in the final 32 seconds .
Toronto 's Louis Williams canned the go - ahead 3 with 4 seconds to go , but Marcus_Smart answered with a buzzer beater to give the Celtics the win .

Randle pitched in an all around game with 15 points , 8 rebounds and 5 assists .
The Washington_Wizards defeated the Atlanta_Hawks , 95 - 92 , at Verizon Center on Friday .
For over 47 minutes Friday , the Hawks 's Kyle_Korver could n't find the net despite his best efforts .
However , Korver 's first points came at a crucial juncture , as he sank a three - pointer with 41 seconds remaining , closing Atlanta 's ( 3 - 2 ) deficit to 95 - 92 .
Following a missed three - pointer from Bradley_Beal , who led all scorers , Korver had a chance for a game - tying 3 on the very next possession , but instead tallied his eighth missed shot on 9 overall attempts .
The misfire allowed the Wizards ( 1 - 3 ) to escape with a hard - fought victory , their first of the season , despite shooting just 39 percent from the field .
Atlanta was paced by a pair of 20 - point efforts from Dwight_Howard and Dennis_Schroder , with the former also posting 12 rebounds , 1 assist and 3 steals and the latter supplying 7 boards and 3 assists .
Paul_Millsap was next with 16 points , 7 rebounds , 2 assists and 3 steals .
However , the other 2 members of the starting 5 , Kent_Bazemore and Korver , created a scoring void by only registering 3 points on combined 1 - of - 16 shooting .
Mike_Muscala and Tim Hardaway , Jr. helped make up some for the lack of production with a pair of 10 - point efforts off the bench .
Muscala also added 7 rebounds , while Hardaway added 4 rebounds , 3 assists and 1 steal .
Beal contributed a total of 28 points , 3 assists , 2 rebounds and 1 block .
Wall posted 21 points , 10 boards , 6 assists and 2 steals .
Markieff_Morris came just 1 rebound short of a double - double himself , collecting 18 points , 9 rebounds , 1 assist , 3 steals and 1 block .
Marcin_Gortat did accomplish the feat , compiling 12 points , 15 rebounds , 1 steal and 1 block .
The Phoenix_Suns ( 36 - 33 ) held off the New_Orleans_Pelicans ( 37 - 31 ) on Thursday at the US Airways Center by a score of 74 - 72 .
As a result , Phoenix 's Brandan_Wright had free reign of the paint all night , finishing with 7 blocks and 8 rebounds .
Omer_Asik 's departure due to a calf injury did n't help the Pelicans 's cause either as the Suns out - rebounded them by 12 .
These 2 teams are battling for the final playoff spot in the West and will have a pivotal meeting on April 10 to decide the season series .
New_Orleans 's last 2 games have been decided by a grand total of 3 points as they are now a full game behind Oklahoma_City in the Western Conference .
Asik and Davis were n't the only injured Pelicans on Thursday ; Tyreke_Evans was noticeably playing through pain in his left ankle , but gritted out 35 minutes of time on the floor .
Phoenix finished its 5 - game homestand with a 3 - 2 mark after getting a big win Thursday .
The Suns will travel to Houston to take on the Rockets on Saturday before kicking off a 4 - game homestand on Sunday against Dallas .
That homestand is critical for the Suns , who will be on the road for 7 of its final 8 games .
The Indiana_Pacers ( 31 - 26 ) defeated the New_York_Knicks ( 24 - 35 ) 108 - 105 on Wednesday .
A nip - and - tuck battle came down to the last shot , with Carmelo_Anthony missing a 24 - foot three - point jumper at the buzzer that would have sent the game to overtime .
At the 1:19 mark of the fourth quarter , it was looking increasing improbable that the Knicks would even have a chance to tie , as Paul_George had helped the Pacers open up a 107 - 101 lead with a 17 - foot jumper .
However , after New_York got as close as 107 - 105 , Kristaps_Porzingis missed a 27 - foot three - point jumper with 3 seconds remaining , and Myles_Turner was able to haul in the all - important defensive rebound .
Turner 's succesful conversion of one of 2 free - throw attempts resulting from an immediate foul by Langston_Galloway stretched the lead to 3 , setting up Anthony 's last - gasp shot from beyond the arc .
The missed 3 notwithstanding , the Knicks enjoyed a remarkable night from long range , shooting 50 percent .
Porzingis led the way for New_York with 22 points , 2 rebounds , 1 assist , 2 steals and 1 block .
Jose_Calderon was next with 20 points , his second highest total of the season , which he supplemented with 4 rebounds , 4 assists and 1 steal .
Anthony contributed 14 points , 7 rebounds , 3 assists and 1 steal .
Kyle_O'Quinn paced the reserves with 19 points , 6 boards and 1 block in a highly efficient 16 minutes , while Galloway supplied 17 points , 6 rebounds and 4 assists .
New_York remains in third place in the Eastern Conference 's Atlantic Division , and 6 and a half games behind the eighth - seeded Charlotte_Hornets .
Indiana was spearheaded by George , who furnished 27 points , 7 rebounds , 6 assists and 1 steal .
Turner finished with 24 points , 6 boards and 1 steal .
George_Hill registered 10 points , 3 rebounds , 1 assist and a pair of thefts .
Joseph Young led the reserves with 8 points , 3 assists and a pair of rebounds .
It has not been a great start to February for the Thunder 's Victor_Oladipo , who , while averaging 14 points per game through 4 games this month , has been just dreadful shooting the basketball .
Following his 14 points on an ugly 4 - of - 16 shooting performance in Monday 's loss to the Pacers , Oladipo has now failed to shoot over 45 percent in each of those 4 games and has shot under 36 percent in 3 of them .
Overall , Oladipo is now shooting just 20 - of - 62 ( 32 percent ) from the field and an even more dreadful 3 - of - 21 ( 14 percent ) from behind the arc in the month of February .
The Boston_Celtics defeated the Golden_State_Warriors , 99 - 86 , Wednesday at Oracle Arena .
It was at that point , however , where the Celtics ( 41 - 24 ) turned it on and ended up running away with the game .
Courtesy of a 150 run over 3 minutes and a 21 - 7 run overall to end the game , Boston was able to dominate the Warriors ( 52 - 12 ) 27 - 12 in the fourth quarter .
And they did n't need any heroics from Isaiah_Thomas to do so , as the point guard scored just 7 points in the final 12 minutes .
Thomas did , however , finish with a team - high 25 points in 34 minutes , but the team 's most valuable performance Wednesday came off the bench from Kelly_Olynyk , who scored 17 points on 7 - of - 9 shooting in 26 minutes as a reserve .
More specifically , it was a fourth quarter to forget for the reigning 2 - time MVP Stephen_Curry , who was 0 - for - 1 from the field and committed 2 turnovers in the 5 minutes he managed to play in the final period .
Curry still finished with 23 points on 8 - of - 16 shooting from the field to go along with 6 assists and 5 rebounds , while Klay_Thompson added a team - high 25 points on 11 - of - 23 shooting .
In the end , however , Golden_State 's 17 turnovers , 4 of which occurred in the last 7 minutes of the game , were too much for them to overcome late .
The Brooklyn_Nets defeated the Charlotte_Hornets , 120 - 118 , at Barclays Center on Monday .
After a back - and - forth tussle for 3 quarters , the Nets entered the final period on the wrong end of an 88 - 83 score .
However , they battled back to take a 111 - 105 lead with just 3:4 remaining after a Sean_Kilpatrick three - pointer .
The Hornets would n't go quietly however , and following a Cody_Zeller put - back with 3 seconds left , they were back up on top by a 118 - 117 margin .
That set up a final possession for Brooklyn , 1 that culminated in a buzzer - beating 25 - foot three - pointer from veteran sharpshooter Randy_Foye that sealed the victory .
Charlotte was paced by a 24 - point effort from Nicolas_Batum , which he supplemented with 5 rebounds , 5 assists and 3 steals .
Jeremy_Lamb followed from the bench with 17 points , 4 rebounds , 1 assist and 1 block .
Kemba_Walker and Zeller contributed a pair of 15 - point efforts , with the former also supplying 6 assists , 3 rebounds and 2 steals , and the latter adding 9 rebounds , 2 assists and 1 steal .
Michael_Kidd-Gilchrist contributed a 12 - point , 10 - rebound double - double that also included 2 assists and 2 blocks .
Frank_Kaminsky was productive in a reserve role as well with 13 points and 5 rebounds .
The Nets saw Bojan_Bogdanovic lead them with 26 points in 27 minutes off the bench , a total he supplemented with 4 rebounds and 2 assists .
Kilpatrick followed with 23 points , 5 boards and 4 assists .
Brook_Lopez supplied 21 points , 5 , rebounds , 5 assists and 3 blocks .
Jeremy_Lin registered 17 points , 4 assists and a pair of steals .
Rondae_Hollis-Jefferson continued to be productive as a reserve with 10 points and 4 boards .
The Toronto_Raptors defeated the host Indiana_Pacers , 101 - 85 , to take a 2 - 1 lead in the Eastern Conference first - round playoffs Thursday at Bankers Life Fieldhouse .
The Raptors established themselves early , jumping out to a 24 - 17 lead after 1 quarter .
That margin extended to 53 - 36 by intermission , as Toronto was able to receive contributions from 2 key components that had been quiet in the series until now .
DeMarre_Carroll ( 17 points ) and DeMar_DeRozan ( 21 points ) both stepped up to help postseason stalwarts Kyle_Lowry and Jonas_Valanciunas , allowing the Raptors to essentially cruise to a 2 - 1 series lead .
DeRozan and Lowry co - led the attack with their respective 21 - point totals .
Carroll supplied 17 points , 5 rebounds , 1 steal and 1 block .
Valanciunas had his lowest scoring total of the series so far ( 9 points ) , but snared 14 boards and recorded 1 block .
Cory_Joseph continued to play well off the bench , leading the reserves with 10 points , 4 assists , 2 rebounds and 1 steal .
Paul_George did the heavy lifting for the Pacers for the third straight game , tallying 25 points , 10 rebounds , 6 assists , 1 steal and 1 block .
George_Hill contributed 13 points , 3 rebounds , 2 assists and 1 steal .
Monta_Ellis , who 'd missed practice Wednesday with a personal issue , could only muster 7 points , 6 rebounds , 4 assists and 1 steal .
Myles_Turner led the reserves with 17 points , 8 rebounds , 1 assist and 3 blocks .
Matthews scored a team - high 25 points on 10 - of - 14 shooting with 5 three - pointers .
The sharpshooter was complemented by forward Harrison_Barnes , who shot 6 - of - 11 en route to 18 points .
Point guard Deron_Williams went 7 - of - 16 for 17 points and also dished out a team - high 8 assists .
Dallas posted ridiculously high team shooting splits of 58 percent from the field , 46 percent from three - point range , and 83 percent from the line in the game .
Denver , meanwhile , saw a fairly sloppy offensive night , as the team had 16 turnovers and shot just 42 percent .
Westbrook entered Tuesday 's game leading the league in scoring with 32 points per game while averaging 10 assists and 10 rebounds .
The All-Star delivered another performance in line with those numbers in Los_Angeles , as he scored 34 points , dished out 13 assists , and pulled down 8 rebounds .
Westbrook managed to catch fire late in the game , knocking down 4 three - pointers in the fourth quarter alone .
For Los_Angeles , bench guard Jordan_Clarkson led the team with 18 points .
Clarkson also added 4 steals on the defensive end .
Veteran Nick_Young , who had the game 's clinching shot , scored 17 points and shot 4 - of - 7 from three - point range .
Big man Julius_Randle , meanwhile , went cold , scoring just 3 points on 1 - of - 5 shooting .
The Houston_Rockets took down the host Dallas_Mavericks , 106 - 98 , in a matchup of divisional rivals on Friday .

The Utah_Jazz ( 2 - 3 ) defeated the Cleveland_Cavaliers ( 1 - 3 ) 102 - 100 on Wednesday at Energy Solutions Arena in Salt Lake City .
The Jazz were led by the duo of Gordon_Hayward and Derrick_Favors , who each scored 21 points on a combined 16 - of - 25 from the field .
Favors also contributed 10 rebounds , putting togeher his second double - double of the season , while Hayward added 7 assists .

Coming off the bench , Trevor_Booker led all reserves with 9 points and 4 rebounds .

James went 8 - for - 18 from the field and 3 - for - 5 from beyond the arc for 31 points , while adding 4 assists as well .
Irving got off a team - high 23 shots and converted on 12 of them , finishing with 34 points of his own .

Shawn_Marion got the start at shooting guard over Dion_Waiters , but struggled to establish any consistency and finished scoreless with 2 rebounds .
Waiters did n't do much off the bench as he had only 5 points , but considering he only played 13 minutes , it was n't as bad as it looked .

The visiting Toronto_Raptors defeated the Denver_Nuggets in overtime , 113 - 111 , at Pepsi Center on Friday .
These 2 teams have had both of their games go down to the wire this season and the Raptors have escaped with both wins .
Three-point shooting was the Nuggets downfall , as they went 4 - of - 25 in the loss .

The Oklahoma_City_Thunder defeated the host Toronto_Raptors , 123 - 102 , at Air Canada Center on Thursday .
In fact , this was a wire - to - wire win for Oklahoma_City , as they led by at least 19 points for the entirety of the fourth quarter .
Shooting was key , with the Thunder shooting 53 percent from the field and 56 percent from three - point range .
The Raptors could only muster up 46 percent from the field and 26 percent from three - point range .
Rebounding was decisive as well , with Oklahoma_City winning that battle , 47 - 32 .
The 33 assists recorded by the Thunder dominated the 15 dished out by Toronto too .
The Thunder ( 39 - 29 ) have now won 4 - straight games , as they continue to ride Russell_Westbrook 's heavy shoulders .
Westbrook picked up his 34th triple - double of the season in this win , as he collected 24 points , 10 rebounds and 16 assists .
Victor_Oladipo was just behind Westbrook , totaling 23 points , 5 rebounds and 2 assists .
Enes_Kanter was a huge spark off the bench , providing 14 points and 7 rebounds .
Taj_Gibson , Alex_Abrines and Steven_Adams each scored 10 points a piece .
The Raptors ( 39 - 29 ) continue to struggle without Kyle_Lowry and home losses like this show just how much his absence hurts this team .
Cory_Joseph accrued 11 points , 6 assists and 2 steals .
Norman_Powell finished second on the team in scoring , dropping 13 points and 4 rebounds off the bench .

However , Memphis did earn the victory through their own strong offensive play as well , as they tallied superb 52 and 59 percent success rates from the field and three - point range , respectively .
Meanwhile , without their MVP , the Thunder 's offense was largely neutered , as only 2 reserves , Enes_Kanter and Alex_Abrines , managed to get into double digits in the scoring column .

The Hawks ( 10 - 11 ) checked in to Saturday as a badly flawed team , sporting 5 consecutive losses on their ledger and once again missing star power forward Paul_Millsap due to a hip injury .
Their most recent defeat , a 121 - 85 trouncing at the hands of the Detroit_Pistons on Atlanta 's home court , had come just a night prior .
They shot just 40 percent from the field and 25 percent from three - point range in a season - worst 44 - point loss , while surrendering 58 and 54 percent success rates to the Raptors ( 14 - 6 ) in those respective categories .

The Cleveland_Cavaliers ( 42 - 17 ) defeated the Indiana_Pacers ( 31 - 29 ) 100 - 96 on Monday .
A day of rest for LeBron_James on Sunday turned into one of calamity for his teammates , as they looked woefully ineffective in losing to the Washington_Wizards by a 113 - 99 score that belied the extent of the winning team 's dominance .
James returned from his 1 - game sabbatical Monday , but Cleveland still had its work cut out for it in a matchup against their division rivals .
Although LeBron looked refreshed while posting a game - high 33 points , Indiana countered with a pair of standout performances from Monta_Ellis and Paul_George .
After a Cleveland comeback from a 94 - 91 deficit at the 1:30 mark of the fourth quarter , the nip - and - tuck battle came down for 1 last three - point attempt for George with 2 seconds left .
Ellis 's 28 points paced the visitors , and he added 2 assists , 1 rebound and 1 steal .
George followed closely behind with 23 points , 8 rebounds , 6 assists and a pair of steals .
George_Hill was the only other member of the starting 5 with double - digit scoring , collecting 11 points , 5 assists and a pair of rebounds .
Chase_Budinger led the Pacers reserves with 11 points , 4 boards , 1 steal and 1 block .
James added 5 rebounds , 4 assists and a pair of steals to his scoring haul .
Kyrie_Irving , the only Cavalier who looked like he 'd come to play in Sunday 's lackluster outing , put together a 22 - point , 6 - assist , 3 - rebound performance that also included 1 steal .
Kevin_Love bounced back from a forgettable effort versus the Wizards with 13 points , 8 rebounds and 6 assists .
J.R. Smith overcame a tough first half to finish with 11 points , 3 rebounds and 1 steal .
Tristan_Thompson responded to his move to the bench by providing a 14 - point , 11 - rebound double - double that also included 1 block .
The Cavs retain first place in the Eastern Conference 's Central Division , and the top seed in the conference by 2 and a half games over the Toronto_Raptors .
Miami dominated a sluggish Hawks squad on both ends of the floor , shooting a stellar 49 percent while limiting Atlanta to a 39 percent figure and causing 15 turnovers .
Goran_Dragic ( 27 points ) and Dion_Waiters ( 20 points ) once again spearheaded the Heat offense .
Hassan_Whiteside put together an 18 - point , 18 - rebound double - double , while James_Johnson chipped in with 16 points to lead the bench .
Tyler_Johnson was productive as a reserve as well with 11 points .
Kent_Bazemore 's modest 14 points led the Hawks .
Dennis_Schroder followed with 12 points and Mike_Dunleavy provided a bench - leading 11 .
Tim Hardaway , Jr. supplied 10 points ( on 2 - of - 9 shooting ) , while Paul_Millsap , who 'd played 60 minutes in Sunday 's quadruple - overtime affair , totaled 9 points and 7 rebounds .
Dwight_Howard mustered a modest 6 points but hauled in 11 boards .
The Sacramento_Kings ( 21 - 27 ) defeated the Milwaukee_Bucks ( 20 - 30 ) 111 - 104 at Sleep Train Arena on Monday .
Rondo finished 6 - of - 10 from the field and 4 - of - 4 from behind the arc , including 1 deep ball that put the game out of reach with just over 2 minutes remaining in regulation .
Rudy_Gay truly deserves the outburst title in terms of scoring , and abused his matchup with Jabari_Parker after he scored 32 points to lead all scorers , and added 9 rebounds and 6 assists in one of his best performances of the season .
The Kings were still dominant in the rebounding battle and pulled down 53 boards as a unit , as compared to the 37 rebounds from the opposition .
Omri_Casspi and Darren_Collison combined for 27 points off the bench , while the beaten up Kings only went 9 guys deep in the win .
The Kings will host the Chicago_Bulls ( 26 - 21 ) on Wednesday .
The Bucks earned strong performances from their starters in terms of the box score , but physically they were overmatched , although the game had multiple lead changes and was within striking distance until the final 3 minutes of regulation .
Greg_Monroe totaled a double - double with 24 points and 12 rebounds , while Giannis_Antetokounmpo showed off a pretty eurostep throughout the game and scored 17 points , to go along with 5 rebounds in 35 minutes .
Jabari_Parker had one of his most efficient shooting efforts , adding 16 points on 8 - of - 12 shooting , but the percentages do not reflect Rudy_Gay exploiting the sophomores defensive breakdowns .

The Bucks will visit the Portland Trail_Blazers ( 23 - 26 ) on Tuesday .
The Washington_Wizards ( 27 - 12 ) beat the Chicago_Bulls ( 26 - 14 ) on Wednesday .
The Wizards have won 4 straight at home , with their last loss at the Verizon Center coming at the hands of the Chicago_Bulls on Dec. 23 .

The Memphis_Grizzlies defeated the host Houston_Rockets , 110 - 105 , at Toyota Center on Friday .
Houston actually led by 13 at the half , before the Grizzlies rode a 59 - 41 second half to come back and win .
The Rockets were let down by their shooting , as they hit just 40 percent from the field and went 10 - of - 41 from three - point range .
Memphis shot very well , as they went 54 percent from the field .
Rebounding was a huge factor for the Grizzlies too , winning that battle , 45 - 31 .
The Grizzlies ( 25 - 17 ) committed a season - high 22 turnovers in this game , but they were able to prevail with a huge comeback win .
Tony_Allen was the star , as he led the team with 22 points , adding 4 rebounds and 3 assists on 9 - of - 10 from the field .
Mike_Conley was second on the team , providing 17 points , 6 rebounds and 9 assists .

Oklahoma_City finished 42 percent from the field , and 33 percent from 3 , while the Clippers were able to best those numbers with an on fire 55 percent from the field .
The Milwaukee_Bucks ( 5 - 5 ) beat the Miami_Heat ( 5 - 5 ) 91 - 84 on Sunday at American Airlines Arena in Miami .
Miami went into halftime with an 8 point lead , but the Bucks came out of the half on fire and quickly turned the deficit around , out - scoring the Heat 26 to 13 in the third quarter .
They also played some solid defense and held the Heat to shoot only 41 percent from the field .
The Bucks were led by Brandon_Knight , who finished with 20 points ( 7 - for - 13 FG , 4 - 7 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) and 4 assists .
The 2 youngsters , Jabari_Parker and Giannis_Antetokounmpo also held their own in the victory .
Antetokounmpo contributed 11 points and 7 rebounds , as he moved into the starting lineup and pushed Ersan_Ilyasova to the bench .
Parker produced 13 points of his own and grabbed 13 rebounds , as he was pushed to power forward with the addition of Antetokounmpo in the starting lineup as the small forward .
Kris Middleton was dealing with a knee injury coming into this game , but finished with 10 points off the bench in 20 minutes .
The Heat had all 5 starters reach double - digit scoring , but it was n't enough to take the victory .

Shawne_Williams also posted a double - double with 13 points and 11 rebounds , marking his first of the year .
The Houston_Rockets ( 38 - 39 ) kept their season alive on Sunday with a 118 - 110 upset win over the Oklahoma_City_Thunder ( 53 - 24 ) .
All-Star James_Harden led the game with 41 points and added 9 assists .
The team went on a massive 15 - 2 run in the fourth quarter , leading to a comeback over the powerhouse Thunder .
Solid defense on OKC 's superstar duo of Kevin_Durant and Russell_Westbrook helped to get the job done , as the pair turned the ball over a combined 14 times .
Also coming up big for the Rockets was bench big man Clint_Capela , who delivered 4 huge blocks as well as a pair of steals .
Despite the loss , point guard Russell_Westbrook tallied his 51st double - double of the season and was just 1 assist shy of a league - leading 17th triple double .
Elite scorer Kevin_Durant also chipped in 33 points on the night .
The Memphis_Grizzlies ( 53 - 25 ) defeated the New_Orleans_Pelicans ( 42 - 36 ) 110 - 74 on Wednesday in Memphis .
The Grizzlies put on a clinic Wednesday night , shooting 51 percent from the field and 47 percent from 3 .
Four of their 5 starters scored in double figures with Zach_Randolph leading the way .
Randolph scored 15 points ( 6 - 13 FG ) , grabbed 13 rebounds and dished out 6 assists in 30 minutes of play .
Both Jeff_Green and Marc_Gasol added 15 points for Memphis , with Gasol adding 8 rebounds and 6 assists in his effort as well .
Mike_Conley was the fourth Grizzlies 's starter to reach double figures , putting up 10 points ( 4 - 9 FG , 2 - 3 3Pt ) and 4 assists in 33 minutes .
Memphis got plenty of production off the bench , with Beno_Udrih scoring 14 points in 19 minutes , while Vince_Carter reached 10 points in 18 minutes .
In total , the Grizzlies had 47 points scored from their bench .
The win brings Memphis tied with the Rockets for second place in the Western Conference playoff hunt , and it looks as though it will be between those 2 teams for that position .
No 1 on New_Orleans played well , with their best performance being Anthony_Davis 's 12 points ( 5 - 9 FG ) and 5 rebounds in 28 minutes .
Tyreke_Evans ( 10 ) and Quincy_Pondexter ( 11 ) were the only other players for the Pelicans who scored in double figures .
Ryan_Anderson epitomized the Pelicans 's effort , going 0 - for - 6 from the field and scoring zero points in 13 minutes off the bench .
Bradley_Beal made a triumphant return after missing 3 games with a hamstring injury , posting 18 points , 5 assists and 2 rebounds over 29 minutes and knocking down half of his 6 three - point attempts in the process .

The Minnesota_Timberwolves defeated the Dallas_Mavericks , 97 - 84 , at Target Center on Friday .

Defense carried Minnesota , as they held Dallas to 42 percent from the field and 24 percent from three - point range .
The Timberwolves also dominated down low , winning the rebounding battle , 44 - 35 and the points in the paint differential , 48 - 30 .
The Mavericks ( 22 - 35 ) have struggled on offense all season and duds like this against a bad Minnesota defense only adds to those troubles .

The Golden_State_Warriors ( 18 - 2 ) defeated the Minnesota_Timberwolves ( 4 - 16 ) 102 - 86 on Monday at the Target Center in Minneapolis .
They shot 46 percent from the field and 23 percent from the three - point line , while the Timberwolves shot only 36 percent from the floor and a dismal 18 percent from beyond the arc .

Despite only going 1 - for - 7 from beyond the arc , Curry still hit 10 - for - 20 from the field , giving him 21 points , while also adding 7 assists .
