Despite being down 42 - 37 at half , the Sixers came out strong in the third quarter and out - scored the Magic 59 - 46 to finish the second half and steal the victory on the road .
The Sixers were able to out - rebound the Magic 52 - 43 , giving them just enough of an advantage to coast to the victory .

The Bulls ( 7 - 3 ) defeated the Pacers ( 6 - 5 ) 96 - 95 in a close game at United Center on Monday .
With the game on the line and 5 seconds left in regulation , the Pacers looked to Paul_George to lift them past the Bulls , but Jimmy_Butler had different plans .
Despite the final possession , George still finished with a game - high 26 points , the seventh straight game he 's scored 26 or more .
With those 2 sidelined , it was up to Monta_Ellis to provide secondary scoring , which he did a decent job of .
Ellis finished with 20 points ( 9 - 20 FG , 0 - 2 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) , 6 assists and 4 rebounds over 36 minutes .
Center Ian_Mahinmi and power forward Jordan_Hill each had 12 rebounds .
Rose did manage to score a team - high 23 points ( 9 - 18 FG , 2 - 2 3Pt , 3 - 4 FT ) with 6 assists in 33 minutes before he rolled his ankle .
Butler , the Bulls 's savior , scored just 17 points in 36 minutes and was in foul trouble trying to contain George all game .
While Pau_Gasol had an off night on the offensive end , he still managed to rip down 13 rebounds in his second straight game .
These are 2 teams that are really struggling right now , but this marks the Mavericks 12th - straight win over the Lakers .
Despite Los_Angeles leading by double - digits in the first half , Dallas rode a 31 - 13 third quarter to eventually win by 12 .
There was only 1 tie and 2 lead changes , as that run by Dallas really shut off all momentum for the Lakers .
Rebounding and assisting were the big difference , as Dallas won each of those categories by at least 8 .
Julius_Randle led the Lakers in scoring , as he tallied 18 points , 4 rebounds and 3 assists .
D'Angelo_Russell went just 5 - of - 15 from the field , but finished with 15 points , 4 rebounds and 6 assists .
Wesley_Matthews led the Mavericks in scoring , as he scored 20 points to go along with his 6 boards .
Harrison_Barnes was second on the team , tallying 17 points , 9 rebounds and 4 assists .
Deron_Williams scored just 8 points , but dished out a game - high 11 assists in the win .
The Detroit_Pistons ( 6 - 23 ) defeated the Indiana_Pacers ( 10 - 20 ) 119 - 109 on Friday at the Palace of Auburn Hills .
Collectively as a team , the Pistons shot extremely well tonight , going 55 percent from the field and 39 percent from the three - point line .
They were able to put in a big third quarter , where they out - scored the Pacers 36 - 29 , which set them up to secure a 10 - point victory in front of their home fans .
The Pistons also forced the Pacers into 18 turnovers , while having only 11 of their own .
The Pistons had a total team - effort victory Friday , as 7 players reached double - figures in points .
Andre_Drummond led all scorers , posting an effecient 20 points ( 9 - 12 FG , 2 - 8 FT ) and 6 rebounds .
Greg_Monroe also was effecient , going 7 - for - 11 from the field and 5 - for - 8 from the free throw line to score 19 points .
Brandon_Jennings posted a double - double of his own with 14 points ( 6 - 12 FG , 2 - 5 3Pt ) and 10 assists .
The bench was very productive as well , with DJ Augustin and Jodie_Meeks scoring 14 and 13 points respectively .
For the Pacers , most of the offensive damage was done by Roy_Hibbert who scored 19 points and grabbed 5 rebounds before fouling out after playing in 22 minutes .
The other starter to reach double figures in points was Solomon_Hill , who scored 14 points ( 4 - 8 FG , 1 - 2 3Pt , 5 - 5 FT ) in 37 minutes .
Coming off the bench , George_Hill and Luis_Scola scored 13 and 14 points respectively .
The visiting Utah_Jazz took down the Dallas_Mavericks on Friday , 112 - 107 in overtime .
Utah ( 28 - 16 ) won its fifth straight game on Friday after taking down the Mavericks in Dallas .
A big piece of the Jazz 's success was center Rudy_Gobert , who had career highs with 27 points and 25 rebounds , 10 of which came on the offensive end .
Gobert , the anchor of Utah 's tough defense , added 2 blocks .
Rebounding proved to be Utah 's biggest edge over Dallas , as the Jazz held a 53 - 42 advantage on the glass .
The Jazz also saw 26 points from star forward Gordon_Hayward .
Dallas ( 14 - 29 ) had also seen strong play coming into Friday 's matchup , having won 3 of its last 4 games .
Surprisingly , one of the weak links in Dallas 's offense was veteran Dirk_Nowitzki , who scored only 3 points and shot just 1 - of - 13 .
Nowitzki did make up for some of the Mavericks 's weakness on the boards , however , as he pulled down 10 rebounds on the night .
Forward Harrison_Barnes led the team with 19 points .
The Memphis_Grizzlies defeated the host Chicago_Bulls , 98 - 91 , at United Center on Wednesday evening .
The Grizzlies led 54 - 50 at halftime , before going on a 100 to start the third quarter , stretching their lead to 14 , with 9 minutes left in the third .
However , the Bulls managed to battle back with an 11 - 2 run of their own , cutting the deficit to 5 points with 5:22 left in the quarter .
The Bulls continued to battle , keeping it close , with the score at 85 - 83 with 4:20 left in the fourth , but Grizzles finished strong to earn the win .
Marc_Gasol and Mike_Conley paved the way for the Grizzlies ( 38 - 30 ) , with a game - high 27 points each .
Gasol added 7 assists and 6 rebounds , while Conley tallied 9 rebounds and 7 assists .
Tony_Allen was the only other player to score in double digits for the Grizz , as he finished with 10 points .
The Grizzlies bench chipped in 23 points , led by Zach_Randolph , who had 8 points , 9 rebounds and 3 assists , in 25 minutes .
Meanwhile , the Bulls ( 32 - 36 ) struggled from the field , shooting only 37 percent .
Rajon_Rondo was the high - point man for Chicago , with 17 points , while the only other starter to score in double digits was Jimmy_Butler , who finished with 14 points on 4 - of - 16 shooting .
Dwyane_Wade shot only 3 - of - 11 from the field on his way to 8 points , before leaving the game with an apparent elbow injury .
Nikola_Mirotic added 14 points off the bench , and Denzel_Valentine added 11 .
The Bulls have slipped down to 10th place in the East and do not have much room for error if they hope to make their way back into the top 8 .

The Trail_Blazers ( 34 - 38 ) came into Saturday 's contest trying to keep the pressure on eighth - seeded Denver , which they could come within 1 game of catching with a win against the Timberwolves ( 28 - 44 ) .
Portland was able to take advantage of what was likely a tired Minnesota squad that had just given up 130 points on Friday night in an overtime loss to the Lakers .
McCollum once again led the way for the Blazers , which collectively shot an outstanding 63 percent from the floor and 50 percent from three - point range .

The Chicago_Bulls ( 13 - 8 ) defeated the New_Orleans_Pelicans ( 6 - 17 ) 98 - 94 in a nail - biter on Saturday .
There were a ton of swings in this game and it came down to a 34 - point fourth quarter for the Bulls to runaway with a win .
The statistics indicate a Pelicans victory , as they shot 45 percent to the Bulls 42 percent and outassistted Chicago 26 - 17 in the loss .
The key for the Bulls was the free - throw shooting , as they went 24 - for - 29 versus the Pelicans 8 - for - 11 .
The bench was huge for Chicago as well , as they outscored New_Orleans bench 52 - 31 .
Anthony_Davis had a very good game though , as he tallied 22 points , 13 rebounds and 4 blocks in the loss .
Tyreke_Evans also continued his recent run of success , as he contributed 22 points and 8 assists .

They outscored New_Orleans 34 - 24 in the final 12 minutes and made some clutch baskets late to close it out .

The Toronto_Raptors ( 35 - 16 ) defeated the host Detroit_Pistons ( 27 - 26 ) 103 - 89 , at Palace of Auburn Hills on Monday .
After a slow start the surging Toronto_Raptors took the lead with 5 minutes left in the second quarter and did not look back , outscoring the Pistons 84 - 65 in the final 3 quarters .
A buzzer - beating , full - court heave by Andre_Drummond brought the Pistons within 5 points heading into the fourth , but Toronto responded with a quick 5 points in the first minute of the final quarter , stretching the lead to 10 and deflating Detroit 's momentum .
The Raptors have now won 14 of their last 15 games and sit comfortably at second in the East .
Toronto now leads this season series 20 .
Kyle_Lowry led the way for the Raptors , finishing with 25 points ( 9 - 14 FG , 2 - 5 3Pt , 5 - 5 FT ) , 7 assists , 3 rebounds and 2 steals , in 38 minutes .
Lowry 's back - court partner and fellow all - star , DeMar_DeRozan had a complete game with 17 points ( 5 - 14 FG , 7 - 8 FT ) , 7 rebounds and 6 assists , in 33 minutes .
Terrence_Ross was huge off the bench as he hit 4 - of - 6 from deep , on his way to 18 points , along with 4 rebounds , 2 assists and 2 steals , in 29 minutes .

The Pistons could not find the rhythm offensively and struggled to hit from deep as they only converted 8 - of - 28 three - point attempts .
Detroit will host the Nuggets on Wednesday , in what will be a huge game for the Pistons in terms of maintaining their place in the top 8 .

The game was dominated by Oklahoma_City 's superstar duo of Kevin_Durant and Russell_Westbrook , as they combined to score 57 points .
And they brought it when it mattered most , as Durant or Westbrook either scored or assisted on all but 2 of the Thunder 's final 19 points of the game .
Both superstars recorded double - doubles , as Durant led the Thunder with 30 points and 12 rebounds and Westbrook added 27 points with a game - high 12 assists .
On a night when no other Thunder starter scored over 10 points , Enes_Kanter had a monster game off the bench , as he scored 25 points in just 25 minutes on a brilliant 10 - 14 shooting night .

Kenneth_Faried finished with a double - double behind 17 points and a game - high 15 rebounds .

The San_Antonio_Spurs defeated the Phoenix_Suns , 107 - 92 , Thursday at Talking Stick Resort Arena .
The Spurs ( 21 - 5 ) managed to extend their league - best record away from home this season to 14 - 1 , but it did n't come easy , as they held just a three - point lead going into Thursday 's final period .
From there , however , San_Antonio put on a clinic , dominating the Suns in the 4th quarter 33 - 21 .
It was a balanced attack from the Spurs , with 4 of their 5 starters scoring in double figures and 5 players in total reaching double digits .
Kawhi_Leonard led the way , recording a double - double of 18 points and 10 rebounds , while Pau_Gasol matched Leonard 's 18 points and grabbed 9 boards of his own .
LaMarcus_Aldridge scored 14 points , Tony_Parker managed 11 points , while Dewayne_Dedmon scored 11 points off the bench .
For San_Antonio , the game was won at the foul line , as the team hit 24 of their 26 attempts from the charity stripe ( 92 percent ) .
For the Suns ( 8 - 18 ) , their fight only lasted 3 quarters because they could n't get anything productive from their best offensive weapons .
Eric_Bledsoe , who had been averaging 31 points over his previous 3 games , shot just 5 - of - 14 from the field for 14 points in 30 minutes .
His fellow starter in the backcourt Devin_Booker did n't have a much better night , shooting 6 - of - 19 from the field en route to a team - high 17 points .
As a team , the Suns shot a respectable 37 percent from behind the arc overall , but it was their shots inside the three - point line that doomed them , as they ended up shooting just 40 percent overall .

Game 4 is slated for Monday night on TNT in Memphis .
The Cleveland_Cavaliers defeated the Toronto_Raptors , 108 - 89 , in Game 2 on Thursday at Quicken Loans Arena to take a 20 lead in the Eastern Conference finals .
They did it thanks to a variety of strong performances across the starting 5 , with LeBron_James 's triple - double serving as the best all - around effort .
Cleveland dominated as a team in virtually every category , outshooting the Raptors 50 to 40 percent from the field and 33 to 27 percent from three - point range , while also outrebounding them 46 to 38 .
Toronto was led by DeMar_DeRozan , who managed 22 points , 5 rebounds , 2 assists and 1 steal .
Kyle_Lowry endured another tough shooting night , netting 10 points on 4 of 14 shooting , his second consecutive such stat line .
No other starter manage double - digit points , and Bismack_Biyombo was only able to provide 3 points , 5 rebounds and 2 blocks in Jonas_Valanciunas 's stead .
The bench was more productive than the first unit overall , and was paced by 3 11 - point outings from Corey Joseph , Terrence_Ross , and James_Johnson .
Joseph added 5 rebounds , 3 assists , and 2 steals .
Ross also registered 2 rebounds , 1 assist , and 2 steals , while Johnson complemented his scoring with 3 rebounds and 1 assist .
Kyrie_Irving actually led the Cavs with 26 points , and also compiled 4 rebounds , 3 assists and 1 steal .
Kevin_Love pitched in with 19 points , 5 rebounds , 3 assists and 1 block .
J.R. Smith poured in 12 points and added 3 boards .
Tristan_Thompson was the only member of the starting 5 to not hit double - digit points , but did haul in 12 rebounds and block a shot in addition to scoring 9 points .
Channing_Frye paced the reserves with 10 points and 4 rebounds .
The 2 teams reconvene on Saturday night in Toronto for Game 3 , when the Cavs will try to get 1 step closer to a second straight NBA Finals appearance .
For Paul , Tuesday 's game marked the eighth time this season where he reached at least 10 points and 12 assists , while Jordan not only achieved his fourth straight double - double , but Tuesday was also his 13th straight game with at least 9 rebounds .
The Golden_State_Warriors ( 52 - 13 ) beat the New_York_Knicks ( 13 - 52 ) , 125 - 94. The Warriors scored a combined 85 points in the second and third quarter , recording 34 assists on 45 made baskets .
On his 27th birthday , Curry produced 25 points , 11 assists , 3 rebounds , 3 steals and 6 three - pointers in 27 minutes .
Justin_Holiday followed up a career night with 13 points off the bench .
Marreese_Speights returned to the team after being suspended 1 game for pleading no contest to reckless driving .
The win kept the Warriors in the number 1 slot in the overall standings and 6 and a half games ahead of the Memphis_Grizzlies .
Cole_Aldrich blocked 5 shots in 16 minutes , matching the Warriors 's team total .
Andrea_Bargnani scored a team - high 18 points , and Alexey_Shved led the team with 5 assists and 3 steals in 21 minutes .
The Knicks held the Warriors to 14 points in the fourth quarter .
The Warriors play their second game in a 6 - game homestand Monday against the Los_Angeles_Lakers .
The Knicks engage in their fifth road game in 7 nights Sunday against the Phoenix_Suns .
The Los_Angeles_Clippers ( 28 - 14 ) defeated the Boston_Celtics ( 93 ) on Monday 102 - 93 .
The Clippers were in position to shut the door on the Celtics with an 11 - point lead with just over 5 minutes to go in the fourth , but Boston stormed back to within 3 points of Los_Angeles .
Boston went cold after their run as Los_Angeles put the finishing touches on a 9 - point victory .
Boston dropped its third straight game Monday , which is not an ideal way to kick off a 6 - game Western Conference road swing .
Jae_Crowder was held scoreless in 13 minutes on the floor , marking his third straight game with less than 10 points .
Los_Angeles has now won 3 of its last 4 games after defeating Boston on Monday .
Chris_Paul was held in check against the Celtics , going just 3 - for - 9 from the floor .
Recently acquired Austin_Rivers received 16 minutes of playing time , contributing 2 points and 3 assists .
The Houston_Rockets ( 9 - 11 ) defeated the Dallas_Mavericks ( 11 - 9 ) by a score of 100 - 96 , in Dallas on Friday night .
Houston has now won 4 of their last 5 .
James_Harden was flirting with a triple - double as he led the way for Houston with 25 points , 9 assists and 8 rebounds .
Trevor_Ariza was efficient with 18 points on 7 - 10 shooting , including 4 - 7 from deep , along with 6 rebounds , 4 steals , 1 assist and 1 block .
Terrence_Jones chipped in 17 points and 9 rebounds .
Houston shot an impressive 46 percent from the three - point range but a poor 55 percent from the free throw line .
Dirk_Nowitzki logged a double - double , finishing with 16 points , 10 rebounds , 4 assists and 2 steals .
The Mavericks were led in scoring by Deron_Williams who tallied 22 points , along with 6 assists and 2 steals .
Williams however , turned the ball over 8 times .
Devin_Harris came up big in 19 minutes off the bench with 15 points on 6 - 7 shooting from the field .
The Oklahoma_City_Thunder ( 28 - 25 ) defeated the Memphis_Grizzlies ( 39 - 14 ) 105 - 89 on Wednesday at Chesapeake Energy Arena in Oklahoma_City .
The Thunder had a huge first half against the Grizzlies , out - scoring them 66 - 48 to begin the game .
The Thunder also shot much better than them , going 45 percent from the field and 35 percent from the three - point line , while the Grizzlies went just 37 percent from the floor and a meager 17 percent from deep .
Durant went 9 - for - 15 from the field and 4 - for - 6 from the three - point line to score 26 points , while also adding 10 rebounds and 3 blocked shots .
Westbrook , on the other hand , finished with 24 points ( 4 - 15 FG , 1 - 3 3Pt , 15 - 15 FT ) , 9 rebounds and 9 assists , coming just shy of a triple - double .
Like Durant he 's been on fire of late , averaging 32 points and 8 assists over his last 5 games .
The Grizzlies got most of their production from superstar Zach_Randolph , who finished with 16 points ( 5 - 15 FG , 6 - 6 FT ) , 11 rebounds and 4 assists .
In back - to - back games against the Nets and Thunder , he 's combined for 35 points and 19 rebounds , showing no signs of slowing down .
The only other starter to reach double - digit points was Jeff_Green , who posted 11 points ( 4 - 13 FG , 1 - 2 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) and 2 assists in 27 minutes .
The Los_Angeles_Lakers ( 12 - 49 ) defeated the Brooklyn_Nets ( 17 - 44 ) 107 - 101 at Staples Center on Tuesday .
The matchup between 2 of the bottom 3 teams in the NBA featured an explosive performance from rookie point guard D'Angelo_Russell , who scored a career high 39 points to lead the Lakers .
Two youthful counterparts , Julius_Randle and Jordan_Clarkson , aided Russell in the contest , as Randle contributed his 24th double - double of the season with 14 points and 13 rebounds , and Clarkson added 16 points , 7 rebounds and 7 assists .
The Los_Angeles center totaled 14 points on an efficient 7 - of - 9 shooting .
All 5 Nets starters finished in double figures , lead by Lopez 's 23 points , but after fouling out the game , the Lakers had a crucial size advantage in the paint .
Thaddeus_Young totaled 19 points , 15 rebounds , 2 assists , 1 steal and 1 block , while Bojan Bogdanovich added 18 points , 7 rebounds and 3 assists .
Brooklyn shot 5 - of - 18 from behind the arc , granted it is not their strong suit , multiple missed open opportunities proved to be vital down the stretch .
The Denver_Nuggets ( 23 - 37 ) will welcome both teams in each of their next scheduled games , as the Lakers will play the second game of a back - to - back on Wednesday , and the Nets will play on Friday .
The Celtics ( 10 - 14 ) got 21 points from Kelly_Olynyk en route to a 114 - 98 win over the Timberwolves ( 5 - 20 ) on Friday .
Boston shot a scorching 57 percent from the floor and hit 8 three - pointers while out - rebounding Minnesota 43 - 37 .
All 5 starters scored in double - figures , led by 18 points and 7 rebounds from Jeff_Green .
Jared_Sullinger added 14 points and 10 rebounds , and Tyler_Zeller and Avery_Bradley each added 14 as well .
Starting in place of Rajon_Rondo , who was dealt to Dallas on Thursday , Evan_Turner had 10 points and 4 assists in 27 minutes .
The Wolves , who shot 45 percent from the floor , were led by 26 points from Shabazz_Muhammad .
Thaddeus_Young added 13 points and Chase_Budinger had 19 off the bench .
The Phoenix_Suns ( 12 - 16 ) defeated the New_Orleans_Pelicans ( 7 - 19 ) 104 - 88 on Friday in a game with very little energy .
The shooting really killed the Pelicans , as they went just 4 - for - 22 from three - point range .
Phoenix took a 28 - 17 lead in the first quarter and it was n't really a game after that .
New_Orleans 's best player on the night was Anthony_Davis , who collected 16 points and 12 rebounds .
Eric_Gordon shot the team out of the game , as he was just 2 - for - 11 from the field and 2 - for - 19 from three - point range in the loss .
The Suns shot 52 percent in the game and took advantage of a bad defense .
Eric_Bledsoe has another great game , as he tallied 29 points , 9 assists , 5 rebounds and 2 steals in the win .
Alex_Len also played well off the bench , as he amassed 19 points and 13 rebounds en route to a double - double .
The Golden_State_Warriors absolutely demolished the Sacramento_Kings on Wednesday behind the most lopsided quarter of the 2016 - 17 campaign .
The Warriors outscored the Kings 42 - 15 in the third quarter and went on a 47 - 12 run at 1 point .
All-Star shooting guard Klay_Thompson had a team - high 35 points including 7 three - pointers , and had 5 rebounds and 4 assists .
Reigning MVP Steph Curry had 16 points and 9 assists to go along with a pair of blocks .
Former MVP Kevin_Durant had a rounded stat line of 21 points , 7 rebounds , and 7 assists .
Center JaVale_McGee led the team in rebounding with 10 boards in just 18 minutes .
Superstar DeMarcus_Cousins was held to just 13 points and 4 rebounds .
The only significant contributor was forward Matt_Barnes , who scored 15 points and came down with a game - high 14 rebounds .
The Los_Angeles_Lakers came out victorious on the third outing of a 7 - game road trip as they defeated the host 76ers in Philadelphia , 100 - 89 , at Wells Fargo Center on Friday evening .
The Lakers ( 11 - 18 ) broke an 8 - game losing streak as they came together to defeat the 76ers ( 6 - 20 ) .
Julius_Randle finished with a game - high 25 points on 10 - of - 13 shooting , along with 9 rebounds , 4 assists and 3 steals .
Lou_Williams struggled shooting , going 5 - of - 12 from the field and 1 - of - 6 from deep , but finished with 18 points , in 23 minutes off the bench , while D'Angelo_Russell and Nick_Young chipped in 15 points each .
The Lakers shot 46 percent from the field , including 9 - of - 30 from long range , however gave up an ugly 20 turnovers in the game .
The 76ers dropped their second straight game as they fell short , shooting only 36 percent overall and 6 - of - 31 from long range .
Joel_Embiid and Jahlil_Okafor started alongside each other for the second straight game and combined for 29 points and 12 rebounds , in less than 30 minutes each .
Five players scored in double - digits for Philly , including Ersan_Ilyasova , who chipped in 13 points and 10 rebounds off the bench .
The Sixers fell to 4 - 13 at home with this loss , but will look to bounce back as they play host to the Nets on Sunday .
The Toronto_Raptors ( 20 ) defeated the Orlando_Magic ( 0 - 3 ) 108 - 95 on Saturday .
All-Star DeMar_DeRozan paced the Raptors with 26 points and 8 rebounds in just 30 minutes .
Jonas_Valanciunas played 25 minutes as the starting center after having played just 21 minutes in the team 's opener .
Valanciunas finished with 10 points and 11 rebounds to record his first double - double of the season .
Channing_Frye played 32 minutes in his second game back from an MCL sprain which forced him to miss most of the preseason .
Frye finished with 11 points .
Roookie point guard Elfrid_Payton nearly secured the first double - double of his career , putting up 16 points and 9 assists in 30 minutes .
Maurice_Harkless received his first minutes of the regular season after being tied to the bench for the first 2 games .
Harkless finished with 7 points and 5 rebounds in 22 minutes off the bench .
Victor_Oladipo remains sidelined following face surgery and is expected to be out at least another 3 weeks .
The Magic have 2 days off before going on the road Tuesday to face the Chicago_Bulls .
The New_York_Knicks ( 9 - 37 ) defeated the Oklahoma_City_Thunder ( 23 - 23 ) 100 - 92 on Wednesday at Madison Square Garden in New_York .
The Knicks were the superior shooters in this game , going 44 percent from the field and 47 percent from the three - point line , while the Thunder went 40 percent from the floor and a meager 23 percent from beyond the arc .
The Knicks had an impressive second half , out - scoring the Thunder 57 - 47 to seal the victory in front of their home crowd .
Carmelo_Anthony led the Knicks in this game , scoring 31 points ( 12 - 28 FG , 1 - 2 3Pt , 6 - 7 FT ) and grabbing 10 rebounds .
Thomas is averaging 16 points and 6 rebounds over his last 3 games , as he 's played well of late .
With Kevin_Durant sitting out with a toe injury , Russell_Westbrook continued to do the bulk of the scoring , finishing with 40 points ( 13 - 30 FG , 2 - 8 3Pt , 12 - 12 FT ) , 4 assists and 2 steals in 34 minutes .

The Denver_Nuggets ( 3 - 7 ) defeated the Cleveland_Cavaliers ( 5 - 4 ) 106 - 97 on Monday at Quicken Loans arena in Cleveland .
The Nuggets were able to use a strong second - half where they out - scored the Cavaliers 53 - 45 to seal their second victory in the last 3 games .
Denver out - shot Cleveland , converting 48 percent of their field goals compared to the Cavs 's 43 percent from the field .
This marked the end of the Cavaliers 's 4 - game winstreak after an ugly start to the season .
The Nuggets were led by Ty_Lawson who notched a double - double , scoring a game - high 24 points and adding 12 assists .
Arron_Afflalo chipped in 23 points of his own , shooting 8 - for - 17 from the field and 4 - for - 8 from the three - point line .
This was a season - high for Afflalo , who 's found some offensive consistency in the last 3 games and scored a combined 58 points over those games .
Coming off the bench , Darrell_Arthur chipped in a double - double of his own , scoring 13 points ( 5 - 6 FG , 3 - 4 3Pt ) and grabbing 11 rebounds .
He received 26 minutes with J.J. Hickson out , which was the most minutes Arthur has received this season .
LeBron_James led the Cavaliers with 22 points ( 8 - 18 FG , 1 - 4 3Pt , 5 - 7 FT ) and 9 rebounds .
Kevin_Love contributed his fifth double - double of the season , finishing with 20 points and 11 rebounds .

Williams logged 28 minutes and led all scorers with 28 points on 8 - of - 15 shooting .
James_Harden posted a double - double with 25 points and 12 assists , to go with 7 rebounds and only 2 turnovers .
The Rockets leading man was poor from the field sinking only 5 baskets , but made his impact on the free throw line going 14 - of - 17 in the loss .
As for the Pacers , Jeff_Teague was the most effective player on the floor with 25 points , 8 rebounds and 6 assists .
Paul_George was kept in check with 15 points , 7 boards and 5 dimes on 5 - of - 16 shooting .
The Indiana bench saw 3 scorers finish in double figures , as Rakeem_Christmas logged 10 points and 3 rebounds , while Rodney_Stuckey added 17 points and Monta_Ellis finished with 12 points .

The Houston_Rockets ( 11 - 12 ) defeated the Washington_Wizards ( 9 - 11 ) 109 - 103 Wednesday at the Verizon Center in Washington , D.C .
After the Rockets jumped out to a 13 - point lead at the end of the first quarter , the Wizards bounced back with 2 impressive quarters of their own and entered the final period with a 1 - point edge .
Harden finished with a game - high 42 points , 9 rebounds and 7 assists in 40 minutes , and absolutely took over in the fourth quarter .
Houston 's other star , Dwight_Howard , shot just 1 - of - 4 from the field and finished with 4 points , but was active on the glass , grabbing 9 rebounds .

The Milwaukee_Bucks defeated the Boston_Celtics , 103 - 100 , at TD Garden on Wednesday evening .
The Bucks ( 39 - 36 ) checked into Wednesday 's contest playing outstanding basketball , as they 'd notched victories in 12 of their previous 15 games .
Nevertheless , they faced a formidable challenge in the top - seeded Celtics ( 48 - 27 ) , who 'd lost only 9 of 36 home contests .
Milwaukee was able to prevail yet again in what was a see - saw battle , however , with a heavily contested Malcolm_Brogdon 16 - foot jumper with 3 seconds left giving them some breathing room at 103 - 100 .
Marcus_Smart then missed a last - gasp 24 - foot three - point attempt at the 1 - second mark that would have sent the game into the overtime .
The Bucks considerably outperformed Boston shooting - wise , as they posted a 53 percent success rate from the field while limiting the Celtics to a 40 percent tally .
Giannis_Antetokounmpo led the way for the visitors with 22 points , 9 rebounds , 3 assists , 3 steals and 3 blocks .
Khris_Middleton tallied 19 points , 6 boards , 5 assists , 2 steals and 1 block .
Brogdon posted 16 points overall and added 9 assists , 4 rebounds , 1 steal and 1 block .

Isaiah_Thomas paced the Celtics with 32 points , 5 rebounds , 4 assists and 3 steals .
Jae_Crowder collected 13 points , 3 assists and 2 rebounds .

Al_Horford mustered 11 points , 6 boards , 6 assists and 1 steal .
Smart led the second unit with 11 points , 11 rebounds , 5 assists , 1 steal and 1 block .
The San_Antonio_Spurs ( 53 - 26 ) defeated the Houston_Rockets ( 53 - 25 ) 110 - 98 on Wednesday in San_Antonio .
The Spurs are starting to look like the defending NBA champions , as they are now winners of 9 straight games and 12 of their last 13 .
Tony_Parker was questionable coming into the game with an Achilles injury , but the injury appeared to have no major effect on the point guard , as he finished with 27 points ( 13 - 18 FG ) and 4 assists in just 26 minutes .
Kawhi_Leonard was not far behind , scoring 20 points ( 9 - 15 FG ) and recording 4 steals in 35 minutes of play .
Leonard has been a monster on defense as of late , logging 14 steals in his last 3 games .
Off the bench , Manu_Ginobili scored 13 points on 5 - of - 8 shooting , while Boris_Diaw put up a solid line of 15 points ( 7 - 14 FG ) and 9 rebounds in 27 minutes .
The victory brings the Spurs into a tie with the Clippers for fifth place in the Western Conference playoff race , although Los_Angeles currently holds the tiebreaker over them with just 3 games left to play for each .
MVP-candidate James_Harden led the way for Houston , scoring 22 points ( 6 - 15 FG , 2 - 6 3Pt ) , to go along with 4 rebounds and 4 assists in 35 minutes .
Coming off his 41 - point performance against Oklahoma_City , it was a bit of a letdown game for Harden despite still reaching the 20 - point mark .
Dwight_Howard did not play a full load of minutes Wednesday , but still managed 16 points ( 7 - 10 ) and 11 rebounds in 22 minutes , as he continues to recover from a knee injury that kept him out for the majority of the season .
Trevor_Ariza was the only other Rockets 's starter to score in double figures , finishing with 19 points on 7 - of - 12 shooting in 34 minutes .
Off the bench , Josh_Smith contributed 13 points ( 5 - 13 FG , 3 - 8 3Pt ) and 5 assists in 27 minutes .
The assist - to - turnover ratio was the decisive statistic , with the Sixers recording 35 assists to 5 turnovers , while the Clippers matched their assists and turnovers at 17 a piece .
Scoring in the paint was extremely lopsided as well , with Philadelphia winning that battle , 66 - 20 .
Griffin played well in his first game back , totaling 12 points , 11 rebounds and 5 assists .
Jamal_Crawford led Los_Angeles in scoring , dropping 27 points off the bench .
DeAndre_Jordan recorded a 10 - point , 20 - rebound double - double .
Nerlens_Noel had his best game of the season , accumulating 19 points , 8 rebounds , 5 assists , 2 steals and 3 blocks .
Ricahun Holmes scored 18 points off the bench , while Dario_Saric provided 16 points and 8 rebounds off the pine as well .
The Houston_Rockets defeated the visiting Chicago_Bulls , 121 - 117 , in overtime at Toyota Center on Friday evening .
The Rockets then owned the overtime period , where they outscored the Bulls 13 - 9 .
James_Harden led the Rockets ( 37 - 17 ) with 42 points , 12 rebounds and 9 assists , in his franchise - high 34th 40 - point game with the Rockets .
Three other players scored in double digits for Houston , including Eric_Gordon , who came up with 21 points on 8 - of - 17 shooting , in 34 minutes off the bench .
Ryan_Anderson went scoreless in 33 minutes , as he went 0 - of - 7 from the field .
The Rockets shot 16 - of - 43 from deep and struggled from the free throw line , where they hit only 17 - of - 25 .
Meanwhile , the Bulls ( 25 - 26 ) fell apart late in the fourth , after they were leading by 8 with 5 minutes to go .
They gave up 17 turnovers in the contest , which came back to bite them , as a couple of those directly led to the Rockets 's comeback .
Michael_Carter-Williams was the high - point man for Chicago , as he finished with 23 points , to go along with 9 rebounds , 6 assists and 1 block , 35 minutes .
Dwyane_Wade chipped in 19 points , 9 rebounds and 6 assists , while Taj_Gibson added 20 points , 6 rebounds and 3 assists .

The Pacers were down 83 - 75 coming out of the third quarter , but went on a huge run in the fourth , out - scoring the Hornets 28 - 19 to finish off the game .

The San_Antonio_Spurs ( 35 - 6 ) held on to win in a potential NBA Finals preview matchup against the Cleveland_Cavaliers ( 27 - 10 ) Thursday night at AT & T Center , 99 - 95 .
After a tight third quarter , Cleveland led 73 - 72 , but the Spurs raced out to a 15 - 4 run to open the final period and took an 87 - 77 lead that would prove too much for the Cavaliers to overcome .
The Spurs dominated inside , pulling down 11 offensive rebounds and shooting a sharp 50 percent on 2 - point shots .
Tony_Parker led all scorers with 24 points as he looks as fresh as he has all season .
After scoring 31 in Wednesday 's contest against Detroit , Parker now has 2 consecutive games of 20 points or more for the first time all season .
Parker was supported by yet another sharp game from Kawhi_Leonard , who recorded a double - double with 20 points and 10 rebounds and added 5 assists plus strong defense against Cavaliers star LeBron_James .
James topped the Cavaliers with 22 points and 5 assists , but it was n't enough overcome San_Antonio 's efficient attack .
Cleveland had an 8 - game winning streak snap and continue their Texas road trip Friday in Houston .
The Oklahoma_City_Thunder defeated the Los_Angeles_Clippers 85 - 83 at Staples Center on Wednesday .
The Thunder ( 40 ) came away with an offensively sloppy , but defensively sound victory , save for Russell_Westbrook , who continues to pack the box score with phenomenal numbers .
Both the Thunder and the Clippers ( 3 - 1 ) shot far below average from the field .
Los_Angeles completed just 39 percent of their field goals , while Oklahoma_City just edged them out with a lowly 41 percent of their own .
The Thunder were led by Westbrook , who put forth 35 points , 6 rebounds and 5 assists in 33 minutes .
Nobody else on the team put up double figures , and Victor_Oladipo still has not found a rhythm , as he finished with 9 points on 3 - of - 11 shooting .
The Golden_State_Warriors defeated the Houston_Rockets 113 - 106 Tuesday at Toyota Center .
The Warriors ( 60 - 14 ) managed to get off to a hot start Tuesday , as they had already opened up a 17 - point lead by the time the first quarter was over .
It was n't as easy for them the rest of the way , however , as the Rockets ( 51 - 23 ) came back strong over the next 12 minutes and managed to cut the lead to 8 as the teams headed into the locker room .
Curry finished with a game - high 32 points in 33 minutes to go along with 10 rebounds and 7 assists , while Thompson finished with 25 points in 37 minutes .
Both shot an efficient 50 percent from the field , and that aligned with the team 's overall performance , as the Warriors shot 51 percent from the field as a unit .
As for the Rockets , they did not have the same success from the field , as the team shot just 39 percent overall and a very poor 16 percent from behind the arc .
In all , 6 Houston players , including all 6 starters , managed to score in double figures , but the rate they were able to do so at was ultimately too inefficient to take down the league - best Warriors .
Up next , the Warriors will look to extend their win streak to 9 Wednesday in San_Antonio , while the Rockets will travel to Portland on Thursday to take on the Trail_Blazers .
For a big man , Blake_Griffin 's 4 assists per game is rather impressive , especially when you consider his point guard is one of the best passers to ever play in the NBA .
That awareness was on full display Thursday night as Griffin posted a season - high 11 assists in the blowout victory , and there is a correlation between Griffin 's high assists numbers and Los_Angeles 's success this season .
In the 10 games where Griffin has posted at least 5 assists , the Clippers are 10 - 1 , and he recorded under 5 assists in 3 of their 4 losses .
The New_York_Knicks ( 11 - 14 ) defeated the Portland Trail_Blazers ( 10 - 15 ) 112 - 110 on Saturday .
Carmelo_Anthony turned in an impressive performance , flashing his signature mid - range game that led all scorers with 37 points on 13 - of - 21 shooting , to go along with 6 rebounds and 2 assists .
Knicks rookie , Kristaps_Porzingis , struggled for a third consecutive game , and finished the night with zero points and 3 rebounds in 19 minutes .
Outside of Porzingis 's poor night , New_York shot efficiently as a unit , completing 52 percent on field goals and 43 percent from the 3 - point line .
Arron_Afflalo added 15 points in the winning effort and shot 5 - of - 11 from deep .
The bounce back win snapped a 4 game losing streak for New_York and they will look to continue to battle in the Eastern Conference when they return home on Wednesday .
Damian_Lillard continues to prove his elite guard status in the NBA , as the Trail_Blazers star scored 29 points with 8 rebounds and 4 assists on 11 - of - 28 shooting .
McCollum , is beginning to receive most improved player nods from the broadcasts teams , as the Lehigh product finished the night with 22 points , 3 rebounds and 1 assist .
The heavy 3 - point shooting Blazers struggled to find a rhythm from deep in the losing effort and only completed 29 percent of their long range game .
The Knicks host the Minnesota_Timberwolves ( 9 - 13 ) on Wednesday , while the Trail_Blazers will stay home against the New_Orleans_Pelicans ( 6 - 17 ) on Monday .
In a battle of the NBA 's 2 best teams , the Atlanta_Hawks ( 42 - 9 ) beat the Golden_State_Warriors ( 39 - 9 ) 124 - 116 on Friday .
All 5 Atlanta starters scored in double figures , as did Mike_Scott and former - Warrior Kent_Bazemore off the bench .
With the game tied at 83 in the third quarter , Scott hit back - to - back three - pointers and Atlanta would not relinquish the lead the rest of the way .
The Hawks were outrebounded 51 - 38 but still managed to hold on for the win .
Draymond_Green had 12 points , 6 assists , and 20 rebounds for Golden_State , 10 of which were on the offensive glass .
Stephen_Curry followed up his 51 - point performance on Wednesday with 26 points and 9 assists .
The Warriors are 3 - 3 over their last 6 , their worst stretch of the season .
The Miami_Heat ( 20 - 13 ) stifled the Washington_Wizards ( 15 - 17 ) en route to a 97 - 75 win on Sunday night .
They held Washington to just 34 percent shooting from the field and 14 percent from long distance .
The difference in the game was the second quarter , in which Miami scored 25 points while holding Washington to just 7 points .
The Heat also dominated the rebounding , as they won that battle 54 - 45 .
Hassan_Whiteside was a beast once again down low , as he added to his league - leading block total with another 6 swats in this game .
Chris_Bosh was the star of the game though , as he scored 23 points and snatched down 7 rebounds .
No player scored more than 14 points and the only notable line was a double - double from Marcin_Gortat .
The Portland Trail_Blazers ( 35 - 17 ) defeated the Houston_Rockets ( 35 - 16 ) 109 - 98 on Sunday .
Lillard celebrated with an efficient 23 points on 6 - of - 10 shooting from the field and 10 - of - 11 from the line .
Meyers_Leonard put up a nice game off the bench , scoring 12 points and pulling down 6 rebounds in just 15 minutes , while showing off his range on 2 - of - 4 three - point attempts .
The win helped the Trail_Blazers secure a third victory in their last 4 games , with their lone loss coming to the Mavericks on Saturday .
Portland lost 5 of their final 6 games at the end of January , but their recent play has assuaged most concerns about that rough stretch .
He got some help from Josh_Smith , with Smith hitting a career - high 4 three - pointers for the third time in the last 6 games , showing off what may be an improved jumper thanks to the Rockets 's coaching .
Donatas_Motiejunas was the only other Rockets player to finish with double - digit points as the team shot a poor 38 percent from the field and 68 percent from the free - throw line .
Despite the loss , the Rockets have won 6 of the 8 games they 've played since Dwight_Howard went down with his most recent knee injury , proving that they can continue to win even without Howard .
The Denver_Nuggets defeated the Philadelphia_76ers , 106 - 98 , at Wells Fargo Center on Monday .
Danilo_Gallinari led the way with 24 points , 4 rebounds , 3 assists , 2 steals and 1 block .
His effort keyed a 46 percent effort from the field overall from the Nuggets , who snapped a 3 - game losing streak .
Barton checked in right behind Gallinari with a full stat line of 22 points , 8 rebounds , 3 assists , 2 steals and 2 blocks .
Jusuf_Nurkic was only able to provide a modest 8 points but did haul in 10 rebounds .
Emmanuel_Mudiay and Kenneth_Faried combined for just 6 points , but Jamal_Murray led the bench with a 22 - point effort that also included 3 rebounds and 2 assists and helped make up for the scoring void overall .
Wilson_Chandler was also productive in a reserve role , tallying 10 points .
The Sixers were led by a pair of 17 - point efforts from Ersan_Ilyasova and Sergio_Rodriguez , with the former adding 8 rebounds , 2 assists and 2 steals and the latter supplying 7 assists , 4 rebounds and 3 steals .
Joel_Embiid posted 16 points , 4 boards and 1 assist , while Gerald_Henderson poured in 14 points and added 5 rebounds , 3 steals and 1 assist .
Dario_Saric paced the second unit with 17 points , 8 rebounds and 1 steal , and Richaun_Holmes registered 11 points , 8 rebounds , 1 assist and 2 blocks .
The Charlotte_Hornets defeated the Memphis_Grizzlies 104 - 85 Monday at Spectrum Center .
The Hornets ( 10 - 7 ) have now won 2 games in a row after dropping 4 straight , as they jumped out to 17 - point lead at halftime and never let up .
In just 23 minutes off the bench , Lamb scored 21 points on 7 - of - 11 shooting and grabbed 9 rebounds .
In his 2 games since returning from injury , Lamb has posted a total of 39 points and 26 rebounds , which has helped provide a spark for what was a sliding Hornets team .
Kemba_Walker added 21 points of his own , as the 2 guards led the way for a Charlotte team that struggled to get help from anyone else .
The Grizzlies ( 11 - 7 ) , struggled to get help from anyone at all , as their 85 total points was their third - lowest total in a loss this season .
Marc_Gasol and Mike_Conley were the only starters to reach double figures on a banged up Memphis team , scoring 19 and 14 points respectively .
Off the bench , the highlight for the Grizzlies was the solid play of reserve power forward Jarell_Martin , who , with Zach_Randolph ( personal ) out , saw 20 minutes off the bench and posted a double - double of 11 points and 12 rebounds in that time .
As a team , however , it was a night to forget for Memphis , as they shot just over 40 percent from the field and a poor 7 - of - 29 ( 24 percent ) from behind the arc .
Isaiah_Thomas poured in 13 of his 28 points in the fourth quarter to help his team seal the victory .
Thomas shot 9 - of - 21 from the field and added 9 assists and 4 rebounds , in 36 minutes .
Kelly_Olynyk poured in 26 points on 9 - of - 11 shooting , including 4 - of - 5 from long range , to go along with 8 rebounds , 3 assists and 1 block , in 32 minutes off the bench .
Jae_Crowder added 18 points and 9 rebounds , while Al_Horford added 10 points , 6 rebounds and 6 assists .
Meanwhile , Paul_Millsap and Tim Hardaway Jr. led the Hawks in scoring , with 23 points each .
Much of the team 's offense came on the back of sophomore guard Devin_Booker , who scored 27 points on 9 - of - 19 shooting with 3 three - pointers .
Point guard Eric_Bledsoe , meanwhile , scored 17 points to go with a team - high 7 assists .
Rookie Marquese_Chriss had one of the best performances of his young career , scoring 18 and recording 6 rebounds and 2 steals .
Miami , meanwhile , shot under 40 percent and had just 6 threes .
Forward Willie_Reed had career - highs in both points and rebounds , scoring 22 and pulling down 18 boards , including 8 on the offensive end .
Point guard Goran_Dragic also impressed , scoring 24 points and dishing out 9 assists .
The rest of the Heat , however , struggled to find the basket , combining for just 44 points .
The Golden_State_Warriors defeated the visiting Portland Trail_Blazers , 125 - 121 , in Game 5 Wednesday at Oracle Arena to advance to the Western Conference Finals .
Although the Blazers took a lead into halftime for the fourth consecutive game of the series , it was not long before Golden_State ripped off a 13 - 3 run in the third quarter to retake the lead .
In the end , the Blazers and head coach Terry Stotts put up a competitive fight through 5 games , as they overachieved greatly considering their pre - season expectations .
Lillard finished with 28 points , 7 rebounds and 7 assists on 7 - of - 24 shooting , while C.J .
McCollum added 27 points , 8 rebounds and 5 assists on 11 - of - 23 shooting .
Al-Farouq_Aminu and Maurice_Harkless combined for 29 points and were effective on the wings , where they finished 6 - of - 11 from behind the arc .
Klay_Thompson totalled his fourth 30 - plus point game of the playoffs after finishing with 33 points , 2 rebounds and 1 assist on 13 - of - 17 shooting .
The reigning , and now back - to - back MVP , Curry , received his trophy before the game , and did not lose a step after stuffing the stat sheet with 29 points , 5 rebounds and 11 assists on 50 percent shooting .
The Warriors will await the winner of the Oklahoma_City_Thunder vs. San_Antonio_Spurs ( 3 - 2 in favor of the Thunder ) series .
DeMarcus_Cousins came up with a monster 42 - point , 14 - rebound performance , but somehow it was not enough to get his team the win , as no other player scored in double digits for the Kings .
The next highest scorer for Sacramento was Arron_Afflalo , who finished with 9 points on 3 - of - 9 shooting .
Darren_Collison , Garrett_Temple and Ty_Lawson all added 8 points each , but it was much too little to help their team pull off a win .
Wade finished with a team - high 30 points , to go along with 6 rebounds , 4 assists , 4 blocks and 3 steals , in 35 minutes .
Jimmy_Butler added 23 points , 7 assists and 5 rebounds , in 39 minutes .
The Charlotte_Hornets evened their Eastern Conference first - round series against the Miami_Heat with an 89 - 85 win Monday night in Game 4 at Time Warner Cable Arena .
Just as in Game 3 , they were more than up for the task , scoring 55 of the Hornets 's 89 points .
However , it was starting 2 - guard Courtney_Lee who came up with 2 of the biggest non - scoring plays of the night , hauling in 2 key offensive rebounds in the fourth quarter that helped extend possessions when Miami was threatening .
The second of those boards came with 4 seconds left and also drew a key loose ball foul from Luol_Deng , giving Lee the opportunity to drain 2 pivotal free throws that helped seal the victory .
The Hornets played suffocating defense as well over all 4 quarters , elicting 17 turnovers from the Heat and holding them under 40 percent from both the field and three - point range .
Miami was led by Joe_Johnson , who managed 16 points , 7 rebounds , 2 assists and 1 block .
Luol_Deng was next with 15 points , 7 rebounds and 2 assists .
Goran_Dragic and Dwyane_Wade turned in a pair of 12 point - efforts , with the former also supplying 3 rebounds , 3 assists and 1 steal , and the latter dishing out 10 assists , hauling in 7 boards and recording 2 blocks .
Hassan_Whiteside notably only contributed 8 points , 7 rebounds and 3 blocks over 25 minutes .
Walker 's 34 - point total led all scorers , and he supplemented it with 4 rebounds , 1 assist , 3 steals and a pair of blocks .
Lee was the only other member of the starting 5 to hit double - digit scoring , totaling 11 points , 4 rebounds , 1 steal and 1 block .
Lin paced the reserves with 21 points , 3 assists and 2 steals .
Among the starting 5 , Marvin_Williams went scoreless over 37 minutes but brought down 7 rebounds , handed out 2 assists and recorded 1 steal and 1 block .
`` The Greek Freak , '' Antetokounmpo , scored 22 points to go along with a very impressive stat line of 8 rebounds , 3 assists , 2 blocks , and 1 steal .
Middleton , meanwhile , shot 11 - of - 22 from the field for a team - high 26 points .
Milwaukee shot just 42 percent from the field and reached the line only 12 times .
Lillard shot 13 - of - 25 from the field en route to 31 points alongside 7 assists and 4 steals .
However , the Blazers shot only 42 percent from the field and made just 4 three - pointers .
The Chicago_Bulls ( 39 - 23 ) overcame a 10 - point fourth quarter deficit to defeat the Oklahoma_City_Thunder ( 34 - 28 ) 108 - 105 on Thursday at the United Center .
While Russell_Westbrook continued his dominance with 43 points , 8 rebounds , and 7 assists , it was Chicago 's E'Twaun_Moore and Nikola_Mirotic who stole the show late .
Mirotic had 26 points and 8 boards in 34 minutes off the bench .
Moore went 9 - for - 10 in the game and put up 13 points in the fourth quarter .
With time winding down , Pau_Gasol kicked it out to Moore , who canned the go - ahead three pointer .
Russell_Westbrook 's triple - double streak ended at 4 games , and it was fitting that it came to an end in Chicago , where Michael Jordan strung together 7 consecutive triple - doubles back in 1989 .
Still , Westbrook kept his streak of 40 - point games alive with his third straight 40 - point outing .
In addition to Mirotic and Moore 's strong outings , Pau_Gasol notched another double - double with 21 points and 12 rebounds .
The Atlanta_Hawks ( 17 - 12 ) defeated the Orlando_Magic ( 15 - 12 ) 103 - 100 on Sunday .
Orlando came into this game as the superior rebounding team , but Atlanta outrebounded them 41 - 35 despite ranking 28th in the league in boards per game with Rolando ranking sixth .
Atlanta 's shooting really boosted them to a win , as they shot 50 percent from the field and from three - point range .
Atlanta has now won 3 - straight games and playing some of their best basketball of the season .
Paul_Millsap was the team 's best player though , as he tallied 13 points , 13 rebounds , 3 assists , 2 steals and 2 blocks to once again stuff the stat sheet .
Al_Horford also had a nice all - around game , as he accumulated 14 points , 6 rebounds and 5 assists .
This loss snapped a 3 - game winning streak for the Magic , but what really killed them was a 13 - point second quarter .
One bright spot in the loss were the 16 steals that the Magic drew , which are a season - high .
Nikola_Vucevic was Orlando 's best player on Sunday , as he recorded a 20 point - 11 rebound double - double .
Evan_Fournier tallied 17 points , 3 rebounds and 4 assists as well , which is a promising sign with his recent struggles .
The San_Antonio_Spurs ( 40 - 39 ) defeated the Toronto_Raptors ( 38 - 26 ) 117 - 107 on Tuesday at the AT & T Center in San_Antonio .
The Spurs got out to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Raptors 28 - 17 in the first quarter , while gathering a 61 - 41 lead by half .
The Spurs finished at 48 percent from the field and a ridiculous 61 percent from the three - point line , while the Raptors went 44 percent from the floor and just 31 percent from deep .
The Spurs also converted on 24 - of - 30 attempts from the free throw line , while the Raptors made just 13 - of - 18 , which also made a huge difference in the win .
The Spurs were led by Kawhi_Leonard , who posted 24 points ( 10 - 19 FG , 4 - 4 FT ) , 11 rebounds and 5 steals .
It 's no coincidence the Spurs winning streak , that has now extended to 6 games , has coincided with the strong play from Leonard .
He did see some help though , as Tony_Parker went off for 23 points ( 9 - 20 FG , 1 - 3 3Pt , 4 - 6 FT ) and 9 assists in 36 minutes .
After struggling through the month of February , Parker is clearly back on the right track , as he 's averaging 25 points and 5 assists in 4 games since the start of March .
Marco_Belinelli got hot off the bench and did n't miss a shot to score 10 points ( 4 - 4 FG , 2 - 2 3Pt ) in just 21 minutes .
Lowry went 10 - for - 19 from the field and 5 - for - 9 from the three - point line to score 32 points , to go along with 5 assists and 2 steals .
In 3 games since returning from injury , Lowry has looked rejuvenated and is averaging 24 points and 5 assists over that stretch .
DeRozan , on the other hand , scored 21 points ( 8 - 18 FG , 0 - 1 3Pt , 5 - 7 FT ) of his own , while adding 4 assists in 39 minutes .
Like Lowry , he 's played extremely well of late , and is averaging 27 points and 4 assists over the first 5 games of March .
While most of the focus was on those 2 , Amir_Johnson quitely posted a double - double , finishing with 16 points ( 8 - 14 FG , 0 - 2 FT ) and 14 rebounds .
Coming off the bench , Louis Williams chipped in with 11 points ( 5 - 10 FG , 1 - 4 3Pt ) as well .
After a grueling back - and - forth battle , the visitng Miami_Heat ( 25 - 21 ) came away with a 102 - 98 win over the Brooklyn_Nets ( 12 - 34 ) on Tuesday .
It was a veteran effort that put Miami over the edge , with All-Stars Dwyane_Wade and Chris_Bosh leading the Heat with 27 points apiece .
The 34 - year - old Wade was named a starter for the Eastern Conference in the All-Star Game last week ; it will be the star 's 12th All-Star appearance .
Wade played like a star on Tuesday , tacking on 8 assists and 3 steals to his impressive scoring total .
Rookie Justise_Winslow , meanwhile , came off the bench to offer a season - high 13 points in Brooklyn .
Perhaps Miami 's biggest advantage came in the lane , as the Heat edged out their opponents 37 - 32 on the glass and held a 50 - 28 advantage in terms of points in the paint .
The home win on Sunday helped Brooklyn snap a 6 - game losing streak .
Unfortunately for the Nets , they were unable to continue the winning against Miami , as they allowed their opponents to convert on 54 percent of shot attempts .
Despite the loss , Brooklyn saw a double - double from star center Brook_Lopez and a 15 - point , 8 - assist outing from veteran Joe_Johnson .
The Heat will also have 2 days of rest before taking to the road against Milwaukee on Friday .
The Phoenix_Suns ( 28 - 20 ) beat the Chicago_Bulls ( 30 - 19 ) 99 - 93 on Friday .
The Suns are 10 - 4 in January , having put together 2 separate 4 - game win streaks this month .
They 're currently 3 games ahead of the New_Orleans_Pelicans , and would face the Golden_State_Warriors if the playoffs started today .
The Bulls were coming off 2 straight overtime games on their West Coast road trip , and may have just ran out of gas .
They kept themselves in it late , but Eric_Bledsoe 's layup with 10 seconds remaining put it in the bag for the Suns .
Pau_Gasol had a stellar January , averaging 20 points , 13 rebounds , 3 assists and 3 blocks .
Gasol recorded 9 straight double - doubles to end the month .
The Suns have won 2 straight and will take on the Golden_State_Warriors on Saturday .
The Bulls will have off until Wednesday when they face the Houston_Rockets who have won 4 straight games .
The Atlanta_Hawks defeated the Oklahoma_City_Thunder 110 - 108 Monday at Chesapeake Energy Arena .
Monday 's game came with no shortage of drama , as after plenty of back and forth in the final period , Paul_Millsap sit a short jumper that put the Hawks ( 14 - 14 ) up by 2 with just 12 seconds remaining .
The Thunder ( 16 - 12 ) , with 1 last opportunity remaining went to their star guard Russell_Westbrook , who missed a jumper , got the rebound and got his shot blocked before Oklahoma_City was able to call 1 last timeout .
The Thunder inbounded it to Westbrook again , who missed a potential game - winning 3 - pointer , and while Steven_Adams was able to get the rebound for Oklahoma_City , his dunk at buzzer was ruled no good .
In the end , it was a battle between the team 's 2 starting point guards , with Dennis_Schroder and Westbrook putting together 2 of their very best performances of the season .
Schroder scored 31 points on 10 - of - 16 shooting from the field - - his second 30 - point game of the season - - on top of 8 assists and 5 rebounds .
Meanwhile , Westbrook posted 46 points - - his second highest total this season - - 7 assists and 11 rebounds in 35 minutes .
Atlanta 's Millsap recorded 30 points and 11 rebounds in 39 minutes , while the next highest scorer for Oklahoma_City was Jerami_Grant with 15 off the bench .
Up next , the Hawks will head home Thursday to take on the Timberwolves , while the Thunder , who have now lost 3 of their last 4 , will head to New_Orleans on Thursday to play the Pelicans .
The Dallas_Mavericks ( 11 - 8 ) beat the Portland Trail_Blazers ( 7 - 12 ) 115 - 112 in an overtime thriller on Tuesday .
This was a game of runs , as Dallas made the final 1 to close things out .
The Mavericks actually came out and grabbed a 20 - 5 lead , but were then trailing at the half .
Dallas ended up trailing for the majority of the second half , until ending the game on a 70 run to send it to overtime .
Deron_Williams was the star of the show , as he tallied 30 points , 8 assists and 6 rebounds in the win .
Dirk_Nowitzki also played very well , as he totaled 28 points , 7 rebounds and 6 assists .
Zaza_Pachulia is the undervalued stud on this team , as he recorded 14 points and 21 rebound en route to yet another double - double .
These veterans have made an impressive core and they 'll be even scarier when Chandler_Parsons and Wesley_Matthews get back to 100 % health .
Lillard flirted with a triple - double , as he tallied 25 points , 10 assists and 8 rebounds in the defeat .
The rest of the starters killed Portland though , as the other 4 combined for just 14 points with C.J .
McCollum providing 11 of those .
The bench was spectacular though , as Ed_Davis recorded a double - double and Allen_Crabbe , Gerald_Henderson and Meyers_Leonard all scored 18 or more points .
Three-point shooting was the big difference in the game , as both teams took 23 attempts , with Indiana hitting just 6 of those to the Knicks 13 makes .
New_York finished the game shooting 50 percent from the field , as Indiana could n't crack 43 percent .

The Raptors finished at 44 percent from the field and 30 percent from beyond the arc .

That 's when the light went on for the Raptors ( 40 - 29 ) , who rattled off 27 points over the final 12 minutes while limiting Detroit to just 9 points .

The visiting San_Antonio_Spurs beat the Minnesota_Timberwolves , 105 - 91 , on Tuesday to remain undefeated on the road .
San_Antonio ( 18 - 4 ) is undergoing a polar shift from their 2015 - 16 campaign in which they went an NBA-record 40 - 1 at home .
This season , the Spurs have been the league 's most dominant road team , winning all 13 contests they have played outside of San_Antonio .
Forward Kawhi_Leonard had 31 points on impressive 11 - of - 15 shooting to lead the team .
Minnesota ( 6 - 15 ) remains near the bottom of the league for the third straight season despite the blossoming of some young talent .
Center Karl-Anthony_Towns had a career - high 47 points last week , and guards Zach_LaVine and Andrew_Wiggins have been averaging career - highs in scoring .
LaVine led the way for Minnesota with 25 on Tuesday , though the Spurs were able to keep the other Wolves contained .
Towns and Wiggins scored 11 each , and Towns shot just 3 - of - 16 on the game .
As a team , Minnesota struggled , shooting under 44 percent from the field .
The Memphis_Grizzlies defeated the Sacramento_Kings , 112 - 98 , at Golden 1 Center on Saturday afternoon .
The Grizzlies ( 22 - 14 ) benefited from the return of star point guard Mike_Conley , who 'd missed the previous 2 contests with a toe injury .
Memphis had the hot hand overall , posting respective success rates of 51 and 49 percent from the floor and behind the arc .
Meanwhile , they played their typically stingy defense , holding the Kings ( 14 - 19 ) to 43 percent shooting and inducing 12 turnovers from them .
JaMychal_Green provided solid support for Conley , going for 18 points , 7 rebounds , 4 assists and 1 steal .
Tony_Allen provided 11 points , 4 boards , 1 assist and 1 steal .
Chandler_Parsons continued his slow journey back to full health , posting 7 points , 2 assists , 1 rebound and 1 steal over 16 minutes .
Marc_Gasol had a particularly quiet effort , amassing just 2 points on a pair of free throws and adding only 2 rebounds and 2 assists over 21 minutes .
Zach_Randolph co - led the second unit with 14 points , 6 rebounds and 3 assists to make up for some of that offensive void , while the ageless Vince_Carter matched his point total and supplemented it with 3 rebounds , 1 steal and 1 block .
Troy_Daniels supplied 11 points in a reserve role as well .
DeMarcus_Cousins led the way for Sacramento with a game - high 26 points , along with 8 assists , 4 rebounds and 5 steals .
Matt_Barnes got the start at small forward and totaled 20 points , 8 rebounds and 3 assists .
Darren_Collison compiled 16 points , 4 rebounds and 2 assists .
Anthony_Tolliver came off the bench to register 16 points , 6 rebounds and 2 assists over 28 minutes .
The Toronto_Raptors ( 48 - 21 ) are now just a single game away from leading the Eastern Conference after a 105 - 100 win over the Orlando_Magic ( 29 - 40 ) on Sunday .
Key players Jonas_Valanciunas and Cory_Joseph sat out the game for rest , leaving the bulk of the burden up to Toronto 's Sunday afternoon starting 5 .
The squad measured up to the task , with All-Star DeMar_DeRozan leading the game with 25 points .
Fellow All-Star guard Kyle_Lowry also impressed , scoring 18 , dishing out 7 assists , and stealing the ball 3 times .
Toronto played strong , well - rounded ball , turning the ball over just 10 times on the whole and outrebounding Orlando 45 - 40 .
Despite superior 48 percent shooting , Orlando got into major fould trouble , sending Toronto to the line 45 times on the night .
In fact , Boston pulled out a wire - to - wire win , as they held a double - digit lead for the final 3 quarters .
Points in the paint really helped Boston , as they won that battle , 48 - 38 .
Booker was the star of the game , as he scored a franchise - record 70 points in the defeat .
Alex_Len and Alan_Williams did a nice job at center , as they combined for 20 points and 20 rebounds .
Isaiah_Thomas led Boston , as he accrued 34 points and 7 assists .
Al_Horford finished with 15 points , 10 rebounds and 6 assists .
Jae_Crowder also recorded a double - double , totaling 13 points and 10 rebounds .
The Orlando_Magic ( 33 - 44 ) defeated the visiting Memphis_Grizzlies ( 41 - 36 ) 119 - 107 , at the Amway Center on Sunday .
The Grizzlies continue to struggle as they piled up their sixth loss in a row , this time to a feisty Orlando squad who have now won 3 straight at home and 4 of 5 overall .
After a huge 38 - point second quarter , the Magic continued the intensity into the second half , to lead by as many as 20 points in the third quarter .
The Grizzlies managed to cut into the lead and make it a 10 - point game with 3 minutes left , but the Magic hit 2 of their 10 made three - pointers in the last minute to put the game far out of reach .
Three players scored over 20 points for Orlando as the Magic 's offense was rolling in this one .
Nikola_Vucevic led the way with a game - high 25 points ( 10 - 19 FG , 5 - 7 FT ) , along with 10 rebounds , 3 assists , 2 steals and 1 blocked shot , in 32 minutes off the bench .
Evan_Fournier followed up with 22 points , while Victor_Oladipo added 22 points of his own , to go along with 7 rebounds and 2 assists .
The Magic took goo care of the ball , with only 10 turnovers , while shooting 48 percent from the field and 39 percent from long range .
Matt_Barnes was the only player to score at least 20 points for Memphis , as he finished with 24 points ( 8 - 17 FG , 5 - 10 3Pt , 3 - 3 FT ) .
JaMychal_Green finished with 11 points and 10 rebounds , in 30 minutes off the bench , while Zach_Randolph finished with 15 points , 7 rebounds and 7 assists , in 32 minutes .
The Denver_Nuggets defeated the New_Orleans_Pelicans , 107 - 102 , in their season opener Wednesday at Smoothie King Center .
Denver point guard Emanuel Mudiay scored the final 5 points for the Nuggets as they were able to play spoiler on New_Orleans All-Star Anthony_Davis 's career night .
Davis filled up every single category on the stat sheet , recording 50 points , 16 rebounds , 5 assists , 7 steals and 4 blocks over 41 minutes in what was an unbelievable way to start the season for the big man .
Davis scored nearly half of his team points and outscored the rest of the starting lineup by 21 points , as he single - handedly kept the Pelicans in the game .
New_Orleans 's next highest scorer was starting point guard Time Frazier , who managed 15 points on top of 11 assists in 37 minutes .
E'Twaun_Moore , who scored 10 , was the only other player in double figures for the Pelicans .
For Denver , Jusuf_Nurkic led the way with a team - high 23 points on an efficient 9 - of - 13 shooting from the field on top of 9 rebounds .
Starting shooting guard Will_Barton was n't far behind , scoring 22 points of his own in 35 minutes .
Mudiay struggled in the debut of his sophomore season , shooting just 2 - of - 8 from the field for 11 points on top of managing just 3 assists .
In the end , the game was won on the glass , as the Nuggets managed to out - rebound the Pelicans 58 - 34 on the night .
After a strong start , the Boston_Celtics ( 2 - 3 ) were able to comfortably beat the Washington_Wizards ( 3 - 2 ) on Friday by a score of 118 - 98 .
The Celtics got off to a hot start , finishing the first half up 72 - 49 .
Center Kelly_Olynyk excelled off the bench , stuffing the stat sheet for 19 points , 7 rebounds , 4 assists , and 4 steals .
Olynyk also knocked in 3 attempts from beyond the three - point line .
However , Boston was able to make up for the absence of the guard 's strong defense , holding Washington to just 41 percent from the field and forcing 24 turnovers on the night .
Beal posted a game - high 24 points , and has now racked up at least 24 points in each game of the season .
Now , the fourth - year guard is averaging over 25 points per game and is leading the Wizards in scoring .
Washington will be taking on the 5 - 1 Hawks in Atlanta .
The Los_Angeles_Clippers ( 18 - 7 ) defeated the Indiana_Pacers ( 8 - 18 ) 102 - 100 on Wednesday .
Los_Angeles is on a 2 - game win streak .
Blake_Griffin led the way with a game - high 31 points and 16 rebounds , while DeAndre_Jordan put up 15 points and a season - high 23 rebounds .

Indiana has lost 9 of their last 10 games .

The Indiana_Pacers ( 5 - 7 ) knocked off the Charlotte_Hornets ( 4 - 8 ) 88 - 86 at the buzzer on Wednesday night at the Bankers Life Fieldhouse .

Jeff_Green scored 25 points and Marcus_Thornton added 21 , leading the Celtics to a 101 - 93 victory over the Wizards in Boston on Sunday .
In a game in which Boston nearly blew a 25 - point second - half lead , Rajon_Rondo recorded a triple - double ( 13 points , 13 rebounds , 11 assists ) as the Celtics won their third straight game .
Rasual_Butler paced Washington with 22 points and 4 rebounds , while John_Wall had 17 points and 14 assists .
Bradley_Beal , who shot just 4 - of - 18 from the floor , finished with 10 points and Paul_Pierce added 16 in his first game in Boston as a member of the Wizards .
Washington shot a paltry 37 percent from the floor but converted 11 - of - 27 three - point attempts and won the rebounding battle 52 - 49 .
The Wizards turned the ball over 19 times , 6 of which were charged to Wall .
Boston , which led by 17 entering the final period , allowed the Wizards to creep back into the game , and a Butler three - pointer with just under 3 minutes remaining sliced the lead to just 1 .
After a pair of Tyler_Zeller free throws , Wall responded with a lay - in on the other end , but Avery_Bradley responded with a corner three - pointer to put Boston up by 4 .

The Bucks ( 3 - 4 ) handed the Grizzlies ( 6 - 1 ) their first lost of the season Saturday night , pulling out a 93 - 92 victory at the BMO Harris Bradley Center .
Milwaukee , which trailed by 6 entering the final period , took the lead on a pair of Giannis_Antetokounmpo free throws with just under 10 minutes remaining .
The teams would trade baskets the rest of the way , and a Mike_Conley free throw put Memphis up 92 - 90 with 8 seconds to play .
Knight sunk the free throw , putting Milwaukee up 1 .
The Bucks , who had 11 players see double - digit minutes , were led by 18 points from Antetokounmpo , who was at his best in the fourth quarter .
Knight finished with 14 points and 6 assists , while Larry_Sanders had 4 points and 8 boards in 18 minutes .
Jabari_Parker contributed 13 points and 4 rebounds .
Memphis , which shot a season - low 35 percent from the field , got 22 points and 14 rebounds from Zach_Randolph .
Marc_Gasol added 18 points and 4 rebounds , and Mike_Conley chipped in 11 points , 8 rebounds and a pair of assists .
Memphis also got 8 points from Tayshaun_Prince off the bench .
The Grizzlies went 31 - of - 34 at at the free throw line , including 19 - of - 20 in the first half .
Milwaukee attempted only 11 free throws but out - rebounded Memphis 43 - 40 while notching 24 assists on 40 field goals .
In an offense - laden affair , the Magic stormed to an early lead by shooting over 50 percent from the field through the first 3 quarters , but they faded late in the contest while the Thunder gained steam .
Four players finished with 20 - plus points for the Magic , with Victor_Oladipo 's triple double ( 21 points , 13 rebounds , 10 assists in 51 minutes ) representing the most well - rounded stat line of the quartet .
Along with Oladipo , Nikola_Vucevic , Tobias_Harris , and Evan_Fournier were the others who surpassed 20 points .
Vucevic keyed the Magic 's early success , nailing his first 9 shots before finishing the night with 26 points on a 10 - for - 14 mark from the field , while Harris accumulated 30 points and 9 rebounds .
Fournier finished with 22 points on 8 - for - 21 shooting .
As per usual , the Thunder 's 2 stars , Kevin_Durant and Russell_Westbrook , were the driving forces behind the team 's comeback win , as the duo combined for 91 of the team 's 139 points .
Durant was the steadier of the 2 from the field for much of the contest and churned out 43 points and 12 boards , but seemed to lose steam offensively down the stretch while playing a game - high 54 minutes .
However , he found enough within himself to hold off a last - ditch effort by the Magic in double overtime , blocking 2 shots in the final 3 seconds .
Westbrook , meanwhile , shook off some early shooting woes to lead all scorers with 48 points to go along with 11 rebounds and 8 assists .
Westbrook caught fire in the fourth quarter and the 2 overtime periods , most notably banking in a three - pointer in the waning seconds that sent the contest to the extra period .
The Golden_State_Warriors defeated the Sacramento_Kings , 117 - 106 , at Golden 1 Center on Sunday .
DeMarcus_Cousins had the Kings ( 15 - 22 ) up 10 points with just about 3 minutes remaining in the second quarter before his frustrations got the better of him , leading to a technical foul and an outburst directed at the chair he was sitting on .
Cousins did not see further penalty from the refs , but the Warriors ( 32 - 6 ) were able to rally behind their starters and retake the lead midway through the third quarter after Stephen_Curry drained a 25 - foot three pointer .
The Golden_State bench was otherwise absent from the contest given the 22 total points contributed from the likes of David_West and Andre_Iguodala , but the scoring output was not in peril given the 30 and 28 points that Curry and Kevin_Durant dropped , respectively .
Draymond_Green rounded out the box score again and finished with 9 points , 7 rebounds , 10 assists , 2 steals and 2 blocks on 4 - of - 9 shooting , while Klay_Thompson added 18 points and 6 rebounds on 8 - of - 19 shooting .
The Kings got most of their offensive production from their starters as well , led by Rudy_Gay 's 23 points and Cousins 's 17 points and 10 boards .
Ty_Lawson contributed 15 points across 22 minutes off the bench on 4 - of - 8 shooting , while doing most of his damage from the free throw line , where he finished 7 - of - 8 in the contest .
Kyle_Lowry scored 16 points in the fourth quarter , on his way to a game - high 33 points on 10 - of - 17 shooting , along with 6 rebounds , 5 assists and 3 steals , in 41 minutes .
DeMar_DeRozan followed up with 23 points , although struggled shooting , going 8 - of - 26 from the field .
DeRozan added 7 rebounds , 2 assists , 2 steals and 1 block , in 37 minutes .
Jonas_Valanciunas came up big with 18 points on 7 - of - 11 shooting , and 13 rebounds , in 31 minutes .
The Raptors shot only 39 percent from the field but made up for it in the hustle categories to come up with the win .
Meanwhile , only 3 players scored in double figures for the Jazz .
Shelvin_Mack was the high - point man with 17 , while Gordon_Hayward added 16 points .
Rudy_Gobert was solid in the middle , with 15 points , 16 rebounds and 3 blocks .
Center Myles_Turner had one of his best performances of his sophomore season , shooting 7 - of - 9 for 17 points to go along with 16 rebounds .
Turner also played stellar defense , coming away with 2 blocks and 1 steal .
As a team , the Pacers shot just 41 percent from the field but held Philly to just 39 percent and forced 14 turnovers on the night .
Star forward Paul_George led the team with 21 points , despite shooting just 7 - of - 17 .
It was a particularly bad night for Rookie of the Year front - runner Dario_Saric , who shot just 3 - of - 15 from the field en route to 9 points .
The Golden_State_Warriors defeated the Houston_Rockets , 104 - 78 , in Game 1 of the Western Conference first - round playoffs Saturday at Oracle Arena .
This only seemed to fuel the noise in Oracle Arena , however , as the Warriors with and without Curry were able to breeze by the 8 - seeded Rockets .
Forward Draymond_Green was dominant on the boards and on defense , notching 10 rebounds and 4 blocks .
In particular , stars James_Harden and Dwight_Howard appeared weak , combining for 11 turnovers and 10 personal fouls .
Saturday 's contest also marked the first time in 148 games that Harden failed to reach the free - throw line .
Forward Corey_Brewer , meanwhile , also recorded an unfortunate statistic , having now gone 0 - for - 20 from three - point range in his last 10 outings .
Lillard dropped a game - high 33 points , including 5 three - pointers and 10 - of - 11 from the free - throw line .

The host Golden_State_Warriors squeaked by the Philadelphia_76ers on Tuesday , 106 - 104 .
The win gave Golden_State ( 53 - 14 ) control of the first seed in the West once again after a 4 - game losing streak caused the Warriors to fall behind San_Antonio in the standings .
Much of Golden_State 's success was due to strong play from Draymond_Green , who barely missed a 5 by 5 .
Green led the team with 8 assists , 7 rebounds , 6 blocks , and 4 steals while scoring an impressive 20 points including several clutch free - throws in the fourth quarter .
Curry , who celebrated his 29th birthday on Tuesday , led the team with 29 points but shot just 8 - of - 23 along with 5 turnovers .
Philadelphia ( 24 - 43 ) nearly pulled off the stunning win but slowed down at the beginning of the fourth quarter .
Rookie phenom Dario_Saric scored in double digits for the 17th straight game , leading the team with 24 points .
His output almost matched Green 's , as he dished out 6 assists , had seen rebounds , blocked 2 shots , and came away with 3 steals .

The Memphis_Grizzlies ( 3 - 2 ) defeated the Sacramento_Kings ( 1 - 3 ) 103 - 89 on Tuesday .
The Grizzlies bounced back nicely after a 50 - point loss Monday by handling the Kings rather easily .
What really changed the game was the defense for Memphis in the second quarter , as they allowed just 11 points and scored 26 points of their own .
The loss of big man DeMarcus_Cousins clearly hampered the Kings down low , as they were outrebounded 50 - 35 while recording just 1 block .
Power forward Zach_Randolph had his best game of the young season , as he tallied 20 points and 11 rebounds in the absence of Gasol .
The Grizzlies also got a nice performance from JaMychal_Green off the bench , as he recorded 12 points and 12 boards in the victory .
The Kings really shot themselves in the foot in this matchup by shooting under 40 percent from the field and missing an unforgivable 15 free throws .
The team was led by Rudy_Gay , who accumulated 19 points , 5 rebounds and 3 assists across 32 minutes .
Second-year player Ben_McLemore continues to struggle for the Kings , as his 2 - point outing here brought his season averages to 4 points , 2 rebounds , and 1 assists in nearly 19 minutes per game .
Those are dreadful numbers , and if he continues to play like this , coach George Karl may opt to go to a 2 - point guard lineup that would see Darren_Collison inserted into the starting 5 .
