Game 3 will take place Tuesday in Cleveland at the Quicken Loans Arena .
Matthew_Dellavedova , who was filling in at point guard for the injured Irving , was a difference maker on the defensive end and scored all 9 of his points in the fourth quarter and overtime .
Cleveland will need to minimize those miscues in Game 3 , but for now , it 's happy to be going back to its home court with the series tied .
In addition to Curry 's struggles from the floor , no bench player managed more than 7 points in Game 2 and the Warriors shot just 40 % from the flooor and 23 % from beyond the arc .
There were some positive takeaways from the Warriors on Sunday , namely Draymond_Green 's defense and Klay_Thompson 's 34 points .
The Warriors will need Curry to bounce back in Game 3 on Tuesday in order to regain the series lead .
The Cleveland_Cavaliers ( 18 - 11 ) defeated the Orlando_Magic ( 11 - 21 ) 98 - 89 on Friday at the Amway Center in Orlando .
Despite suffering the 9 - point loss , the Magic took the upper hand in shooting percentages .
The Magic shot 49 percent from the field and 43 percent from the three - point line , while the Cavaliers went 41 percent from the field and only 27 percent from the three - point line .
Although they finished with the superior shooting percentage , the Magic were forced into 17 turnovers , which ultimately may have been the difference in this one .
The Cavaliers were led by LeBron_James , who despite going 0 - for - 5 from the three - point line , was able to convert 10 - for - 20 from the field to score 29 points , while also contributing 8 assists .
In his last 2 outings , he 's combined for 59 points and 16 assists , as he 's been the Cavaliers 's offensive focal point .
He 's now averaging 17 points and 10 rebounds on the year and was needed for scoring with Kyrie_Irving sitting out .
It was a nice bounce back game for him offensively , after scoring only 8 points in 28 minutes on Thursday against the Miami_Heat .
It was a nice turn around game for Fournier , who shot only 22 percent ( 2 - 9 FG ) against the Boston_Celtics on Tuesday .
Like Fournier , Oladipo really struggled against the Celtics on Tuesday , shooting 13 percent ( 2 - 15 FG ) from the floor , so it was again good to see a bounce back game from him .
Ben_Gordon had 10 points off the bench as well .
The host Sacramento_Kings defeated the Portland Trail_Blazers , 126 - 121 , behind 55 points from All-Star center DeMarcus_Cousins .
It was an interesting night for Sacramento ( 11 - 17 ) , as the team came away with the win despite an emotional roller coaster .
Portland ( 13 - 17 ) is heading in the wrong direction , having now lost 7 of its last 8 .
McCollum led the team with 36 points , while Lillard had 24 and dished out 15 assists .
Blazers center Mason_Plumlee scored 27 while delivering 13 rebounds as well .
Defensive statistics were huge , with Boston combining for 12 blocks and steals , while the Clippers could only muster up 4 .
Blake_Griffin was the only Los_Angeles starter to play well , as he tallied 23 points , 8 rebounds and 4 assists .
Jamal_Crawford was great off the bench , providing 23 points , 5 assists and 3 steals .
Raymond_Felton also played well off the bench , collecting 16 points , 5 rebounds and 4 assists .
Isaiah_Thomas led the Celtics in scoring , accruing 28 points and 8 assists .
Al_Horford finished with 13 points , 15 rebounds and 6 assists .
Kelly_Olynyk and Marcus_Smart carried the bench , as they scored 13 points apiece .
The Portland Trail_Blazers defeated the Los_Angeles_Lakers 118 - 109 at Moda Center on Thursday .
The Trail_Blazers ( 16 - 22 ) improved to 10 - 7 on their home court and saw a strong game from Damian_Lillard , who returned to the lineup after a few missed games due to an ankle injury .
The Blazers responded stronger in the second half , taking advantage of the Lakers pour ability to close out games , and scored 30 - plus points as a unit in each of the third and fourth quarters .
McCollum 's driving 6 foot jumper with just over 4 minutes remaining in the game put the Blazers up by 1 point , and the hot shooting McCollum dropped in a long distance 3 to add to the lead .
The Lakers best performer was D'Angelo_Russell , who finished the game with 22 points , 4 rebounds and 2 assists on 6 - of - 18 shooting .
Nick_Young managed 3 buckets from behind the arc , but finished just 3 - of - 9 for the game and scored 13 points .
Julius_Randle rounded out the box score again , as he went for 17 points , 9 rebounds , 5 assists and 1 steal .
Brandon_Ingram drew the start at small forward and finished with 11 points on 3 - of - 6 shooting .
Chicago looked poised to pull out a wire - to - wire win , but Atlanta went on a huge run to take their first and only lead with less than 2 minutes left .
In fact , the Hawks finished the game on a 19 - 4 run to win by 5 .
Atlanta 's offense was key , as they shot 52 percent from the field and 57 percent from three - point range , while handing out 29 assists .
Six players on Atlanta score at least 16 points , with Dennis Schroeder leading the team with 24 points and 9 assists .
Paul_Millsap was second on the team , totaling 21 points and 6 rebounds .
Dwight_Howard and Kent_Bazemore each scored 16 points a piece , with Howard adding 12 rebounds and Bazemore contributing 6 rebounds , 7 assists and 3 blocks .
Dwyane_Wade and Jimmy_Butler carried the load for Chicago , as they combined for 73 points on 27 - of - 46 from the field , with the rest of the team going just 16 - of - 48 .
Butler led the team with 40 points , 4 rebounds 3 assists and 3 steals , while Wade finished with 33 points , 5 rebounds , 2 assists and 2 steals .
The Milwaukee_Bucks defeated the Chicago_Bulls , 116 - 96 , at United Center on Saturday .
The dynamic duo of Giannis_Antetokounmpo and Jabari_Parker were at it again for the Bucks ( 16 - 16 ) , as they posted over half of the team 's scoring total while each played at least 40 minutes .
Their combined 23 - of - 34 effort from the field spearheaded a red - hot Milwaukee offense that drained their buckets at a 57 percent clip , and that also was successful on 60 percent of their 15 attempts from behind the arc .
Meanwhile , the Bulls ( 16 - 18 ) could only get 1 such standout effort , which came from Jimmy_Butler .
The offensive imbalance ultimately left them unable to keep pace as the game wore on , and accordingly , the Bucks outscored their hosts by a 67 - 45 margin in the second half .
Antetokounmpo tallied a game - high 35 points , and added 9 rebounds , 7 assists , 7 blocks and 2 steals in a remarkable performance .
Parker followed with 27 points , 5 rebounds , 3 assists , 1 steal and 1 block .
Malcolm_Brogdon continued his rapid development , as he managed 15 points , 12 assists and 11 rebounds , his first career triple - double .
Greg_Monroe led the bench with 15 points , 12 rebounds , 3 assists and a pair of steals .
Butler 's 26 points paved the way for Chicago , and he complemented them with 8 assists , 7 boards and 2 steals .
Robin_Lopez provided a 12 - point , 10 - rebound double - double that also included 1 assist and 1 block .
Taj_Gibson contributed 11 points , 5 rebounds , 1 assist and 1 block .
Michael_Carter-Williams , who drew the start for the struggling Rajon_Rondo , and Dwyane_Wade both struggled , as they only supplied 4 and 8 points , respectively .
Doug_McDermott ( 13 points , 3 assists , 1 rebound and 1 steal ) and Nikola_Mirotic ( 10 points , 4 rebounds ) helped make up for some of the scoring void off the bench .
The Minnesota_Timberwolves ( 16 - 36 ) defeated the Chicago_Bulls ( 27 - 23 ) 112 - 105 on Saturday .
Chicago carried a 6 - point lead heading into halftime , but it was clear their tired legs let them down in the second half .
The Timberwolves outscored the Bulls by 12 points over the final 3 minutes and that was truly the difference in the game .
A key for the Wolves was the rebounding , as they snatched down 45 boards to the Bulls 31 .
Pau_Gasol was able to play after a 1 - game absence , as he tallied 25 points , 8 rebounds , 3 assists and 2 blocks in the defeat .
Derrick_Rose also played well , as he accumulated 18 points , 10 assists and 5 rebounds in the loss .
Chicago has now lost 11 of their last 16 games .
This gives Minnesota a 2 - game winning streak , with both wins coming against very good teams .
The Timberwolves were horrible from three - point range , as they went 1 - for - 12 , but shot nearly 59 percent from inside the arc .
The big men were key in this game , as Karl-Anthony_Towns went for 26 points and 17 rebounds , while Gorgui_Dieng amassed 24 points , 12 rebounds and 7 assists .
Minnesota will look to extend their modest winning streak to 3 games on Monday when they host the New_Orleans_Pelicans .

The key for Brooklyn was their shooting , as they shot 48 percent from the field and 50 percent from three - point range against a dominant Jazz defense .

The Oklahoma_City_Thunder ( 6 - 3 ) defeated the Philadelphia_76ers ( 0 - 9 ) 102 - 85 on Friday night .
Philadelphia scored only 61 points after the first quarter and defense is going to be the key for this Thunder squad going forward without Durant .

Jahlil_Okafor had an especially bad game , as he shot 3 - for - 18 while committing 4 turnovers in the defeat .
Oklahoma_City ( 19 - 20 ) got 36 points from Kevin_Durant and Russell_Westbrook had a triple - double as the Thunder knocked off the West-leading Warriors ( 31 - 6 ) 127 - 115 on Friday .
The Thunder found themselves trailing for much of the first half but went on an 11 - 2 run late in the second quarter that opened up a 7 - point advantage .
The lead was extended to 9 at the half , but Golden_State was able to keep it close in the third quarter and entered the final period down 98 - 91 .
Though he did n't score in the fourth quarter , Westbrook played a major role in putting the game away , as he recorded 8 assists and 6 rebounds in the final 12 minutes .
Westbrook finished with 17 points , 17 assists ( career - high ) and 15 rebounds ( tied career - high ) , while Durant 's 36 points led all scorers .
Serge_Ibaka tied his career high with 27 points , and Dion_Waiters added 21 points off the bench .
Oklahoma_City , which had lost 3 of its last 4 , shot a sizzling 53 percent from the floor and knocked down 10 - of - 22 three - point attempts .
The Warriors , meanwhile , had a solid offensive showing but simply could not stop the Thunder 's big 3 .
Klay_Thompson led the Warriors with 32 points , including 3 three - pointers , and Stephen_Curry added 19 points and 6 assists .
Marreese_Speights , starting in place of Andrew_Bogut ( rest ) had 20 points ( 9 - 16 FG ) , and Harrison_Barnes finished with 18 to go with 6 rebounds .
Andre_Iguodala was also rested by coach Steve Kerr , as the Warriors are in the midst of a 4 - games - in - 5 - nights slate .
Oklahoma_City is off until Sunday , when it faces the Rockets in Orlando to begin a 5 - game road swing .
Seven of the Thunder 's next 8 games will be played away from Chesapeake Energy Arena .
The Denver_Nuggets ( 2 - 2 ) beat the Los Angles Lakers ( 0 - 4 ) 120 - 109 on Tuesday at the Staples Center .
Denver has really struggled over their last 2 games , suffering blowouts to the Minnesota_Timberwolves and Oklahoma_City_Thunder , but showed up here against the hapless Lakers .

But the Bucks could n't find their three - point shot at all ( 3 - 14 , 21 percent ) and they lost despite going 28 - 32 ( 88 percent ) at the free throw line as a result .
The host Indiana_Pacers handily defeated the Philadelphia_76ers on Sunday , 107 - 94 .
Indiana ( 37 - 36 ) has been one of the most consistently average teams in the league , hovering around .500 since late January .

While Tuesday 's loss was an ugly 1 for the Trail_Blazers , the team is still 5 - 2 through 7 games in March and Lillard has been unstoppable offensively throughout .
After scoring a game - high 29 points against the Pelicans , Lillard is now averaging 28 points per game in March , making him on pace to have his highest per - game average for a full month this season .

Cleveland has won 4 straight games , and in their last 3 games , they 've scored at least 118 points .
While James has always facilitated the offense , he has n't spent a lot of time at point guard , and using a 6 - 8 forward there is creating devastating matchup problems for the Cavaliers 's opponents .
James scored 32 points Saturday and has averaged 35 points over the last 3 games .
The Cavs defeated the Nuggets 110 - 101 in their first matchup .
Atlanta was on a 4 - game win streak before they ran into the monolithic Cavaliers .
The Hawks gave up 33 points on 19 turnovers , all but handing over the game to the Cavaliers .
Cleveland was up 71 - 43 at halftime , and the Hawks were resigned to their fate .
The Cleveland_Cavaliers defeated the host Indiana_Pacers , 132 - 117 , at Bankers Life Fieldhouse on Wednesday .
Despite the Pacers leading by 11 after the first quarter , the Cavaliers cruised to an easy win .
The third quarter was the difference in the game , with Cleveland outscoring Indiana , 40 - 18 .
Efficiency was the key for the Cavaliers , as they shot 55 percent from the field and 92 percent from the free - throw line .
The Cleveland bench was a huge spark as well , outscoring Indiana 's bench , 50 - 28 .
The Cavaliers ( 36 - 15 ) have now won 6 of their last 7 games , as this comeback shows just how scary they can be .
Kyrie_Irving was the player of the game , as he tallied 29 points , 7 assists and 2 steals .
Kyle_Korver tied the team - high with 29 points , as he shot 10 - of - 12 from the field off the bench .
LeBron_James finished with 25 points , 6 rebounds and 9 assists .
Kevin_Love shot just 4 - of - 11 from the field , but totaled 14 points and 11 rebounds .
The Pacers ( 29 - 23 ) defeated the Cavaliers earlier this season without LeBron_James , but this was a different story .
Miles led the team in scoring , as he dropped 23 points on 6 - of - 9 from three - point range .
Jeff_Teague was Indiana 's best player , as he accumulated 22 points , 5 rebounds , 14 assists and 2 steals .
Paul_George collected 22 points , 8 rebounds , 6 assists and 2 steals .
Monta_Ellis was the only bench player with more than 5 points , as he provided 13 points , 2 rebounds and 3 assists .

The Hawks on the other hand shot 41 percent from the floor and 37 percent beyond the arc .

Philadelphia will wrap up a 3 - game homestand Wednesday against the Raptors .

His backcourt partner Ben_McLemore added another 22 points , including 6 three - pointers .
Cousins scored 22 points to go along with 11 rebounds and 7 assists , but shot just 6 - of - 17 .
Three-point shooting proved to be the team 's bread and butter , as the Kings hit 18 threes on the night .
Shooting guard Tim Hardaway Jr. scored 28 points and shot 9 - of - 17 from the field .
All-Star Paul_Millsap added 25 points and 6 rebounds , while point guard Dennis Schroeder had 20 points and 6 assists .
However , the team had only 11 three - pointers to Sacramento 's 18 .
The Los_Angeles_Clippers ( 30 ) are on a roll , winning 114 - 109 over the Sacramento_Kings ( 1 - 2 ) notching their third straigh victory .
The Cippers had a dominant second quarter , out - scoring the Kings by 11 .
However it still went down to the wire as Marco Bellinelli brought the Kings within 3 points with 15 seconds remaining .
Griffin filled it up with 37 points on 13 - 22 shooting , also grabbing 9 rebounds and dishing 6 assists .
Griffin had plenty of help though , Chris_Paul added 17 points , 6 rebounds and a big 11 assists , while DeAndre_Jordan brought it big time with 15 points , 18 rebounds and a whopping 7 blocks .
J.J. Redick scored 23 points on a hot 8 - 9 shooting , 2 - 2 from deep .
Griffin , Jordan , Redick and Paul all played big minutes , each over 35 .
Sacramento fielded a balanced attack , with 6 players scoring in double digits and although they played well , it just was not enough to silence the Clippers .
The Kings lacked offensive efficiency shooting only 42 percent from the field , Rudy_Gay having a part in that with his 8 - 23 shooting , resulting in 20 points .
On the bright side Gay did pull down 9 rebounds .
Rookie Willie_Cauley-Stein had a respectable outing with 8 points on 3 - 5 shooting , with 9 rebounds , 3 steals and 1 block .
The Sacramento_Kings ( 18 - 32 ) defeated the Phoenix_Suns ( 29 - 24 ) 85 - 83 on Sunday .
The Kings went up 2 - 1 on the Suns for the season series with the win , but former Sacramento teammate Isaiah_Thomas did everything he could to try and take home the win for the Suns .
With 1 less guard in the rotation , Thomas played 39 minutes and scored 26 points .
Only 1 other player ( Goran_Dragic ) finished in double figures , with the Suns shooting a woeful 36 percent from the field and 18 percent from beyond the arc .
Though the Kings shot better than the Suns from the field ( 45 percent ) , they also allowed the Suns to stay in the game by coughing up 17 turnovers and giving up 18 easy points off of them .
DeMarcus_Cousins led the way with a game - high 28 points and 12 rebounds .
Ramon_Sessions played well in his second straight spot start in place of Darren_Collison ( hip ) , putting up 10 points , 7 rebounds and 6 assists in 32 minutes .
The Warriors won the turnover battle and that 's evident through the shot attempts , as Golden_State took 95 shots to New_Orleans 's 82 .
One strange stat is the fact that the Warriors committed 12 turnovers , while the Pelicans recorded 12 steals .
Anthony_Davis carried the load for the Pelicans once again , tallying 28 points , 8 rebounds and 5 blocks .
Jrue_Holiday had a nice all - around game too , accruing 10 points , 8 rebounds , 6 assists and 4 steals in the defeat .
Draymond_Green recorded his first triple - double of the season , accumulating 12 points , 12 rebounds , 10 assists and 4 steals .
Stephen_Curry led the team with 30 points , while Kevin_Durant dropped 27 of his own .
The New_York_Knicks defeated the host Miami_Heat , 114 - 103 , at American Airlines Center on Tuesday .
Defense was key for New_York , as they held Miami to 43 percent shooting .
The Knicks shot 49 percent on their end and outrebounded the Heat , 53 - 46 .
New_York ( 12 - 9 ) has finally been starting to gel over recent weeks and they received some big performances in a big road win .
Carmelo_Anthony was the player of the game , scoring a game - high 35 points on 13 - of - 27 shooting .
Kristaps_Porzingis recorded a double - double , totaling 14 points and 12 rebounds .
Derrick_Rose finished the game with 10 points , 2 rebounds and 3 assists before leaving early due to back spasms .
Joakim_Noah had one of his best games as a Knick , accruing 10 points and 10 rebounds in just 14 minutes of action .
Miami ( 7 - 14 ) are starting to play better , but they ran into a hot Knicks bunch that did n't want to lose .
Goran_Dragic continued his fantastic form , accumulating 29 points , 4 rebounds and 7 assists in the loss .
Hassan_Whiteside recorded yet another double - double , amassing 24 points , 13 rebounds and 3 blocks .
Wayne_Ellington was the only other starter in double figures , dropping 14 points .
Tyler_Johnson did provide 13 points and 5 rebounds off the bench .
The Golden_State_Warriors earned their 11th win in a row as they defeated the visiting Minnesota_Timberwolves 115 - 102 on Saturday night at Oracle Arena .
The Timberwolves came out strong on the second night of a back - to - back , leading 33 - 30 after 1 quarter , however they significantly dropped - off in the second and third quarters where they were out - scored 60 - 40 .
The Warriors ( 15 - 2 ) got their 11th - straight win but saw their franchise - high 30 - assist streak come to an end at 10 - games as they tallied 25 assists on their 45 - made field goals .
Stephen_Curry finished with a game - high 34 points , while Kevin_Durant followed up with 28 and Klay_Thompson added 23 , to combine for 85 points .
Kevon_Looney started in place of the injured Draymond_Green and finished with 6 points , 3 rebounds , 2 assists and 1 steal , in 18 minutes .
The Warriors are now 6 - 1 at home and can improve on that as they look forward to the second game of a 5 - game home stand on Monday versus the Hawks .
After a solid win in Phoenix , the Timberwolves ( 5 - 11 ) slipped back into their old ways with a good start and then a lull period in the middle quarters .
Karl-Anthony_Towns was a good example of that as he scored 12 points in the first quarter and then did not score again until the final 4 minutes of the third quarter , only to finish the game with 18 points .
Zach_LaVine led the way offensively for Minnesota , with 31 points , while Andrew_Wiggins chipped in 16 points .
The Timberwolves have lost 4 of their last 5 games and fall to 2 - 7 on the road , however they head back home for 2 games , beginning with the Jazz on Monday .
The Detroit_Pistons defeated the visiting Minnesota_Timberwolves , 116 - 108 , at The Palace Of Auburn Hills on Friday evening .
Marcus_Morris poured in a career - high 36 points to lead the Pistons to a much - needed victory .
It was a close contest the whole way , despite a 24 - 18 first quarter for Detroit , which proved to be the difference maker .
The Pistons ( 23 - 27 ) won the first , third and fourth quarters , while they were outscored 34 - 29 in the second .
Morris added 6 rebounds , 2 assists and 1 steal to his impressive point total , while Andre_Drummond came up large with 12 points , 18 rebounds , 3 blocks and 2 steals .
Jon_Leuer added 24 points on 8 - of - 16 shooting , as the second - highest scorer for Detroit .
Meanwhile , the Timberwolves ( 19 - 31 ) dropped their second straight game , despite outscoring the Pistons 60 - 36 in the paint .
Karl-Anthony_Towns led the way for Minnesota with 24 points and 11 rebounds .
Andrew_Wiggins followed up with 21 points , while Zach_LaVine chipped in 20 points .
Two other players scored in double digits for the T-Wolves , including Shabazz_Muhammad , who continued his strong play with 15 points in 23 minutes off the bench .
The Toronto_Raptors ( 40 - 19 ) defeated the Utah_Jazz ( 28 - 32 ) 104 - 94 on Wednesday .
Kyle_Lowry and DeMar_DeRozan both tallied over 30 points , and Jazz shooting guard Rodney_Hood exited the game in the second quarter after suffering a blow to the head , further dampening Utah 's prospects .
Despite Hood 's absence for the entire second half , the Jazz battled throughout , and even managed to considerably outperform Toronto from three - point range by a margin of 39 percent to 27 percent .
Gordon_Hayward spearheaded the offensive attack for Utah with 26 points , half of which came in the first quarter .
Derrick_Favors was next with 15 points , 7 rebounds , 1 assist and 1 block .
Rudy_Gobert checked in with 10 points , 8 boards , 2 assists and 2 steals .
Trey_Burke and Raul_Neto paced the reserves with respective tallies of 11 and 10 points .
Lowry paced the Raptors with 32 points , 5 assists , 4 rebounds , 3 steals and 1 block .
DeRozan was right behind him with 31 points and 5 rebounds .
Jonas_Valanciunas collected 10 points , hauled in 8 boards and recorded 1 block .
Terrence_Ross paced the Toronto reserves with 11 points , 3 rebounds and 2 steals .
Toronto remains atop the Eastern Conference 's Atlantic Division , and possesses the second seed in the conference , 2 games back of the Cleveland_Cavaliers .
The San_Antonio_Spurs ( 59 - 10 ) defeated the Golden_State_Warriors ( 62 - 7 ) 87 - 79 on Saturday .
San_Antonio showed what makes them so great , as they dominated defensively against the most potent offense in the NBA , holding them to a season - low 79 points .
In fact , they held the Warriors to 14 points in the fourth and under 20 points in 3 separate quarters .
The Warriors were also held below 38 percent shooting for the first time all year .
The rebounding was key as well , as they Spurs brought down 53 boards to the Warriors 37 .
Steph Curry had a nightmare shooting night , as he went 1 - for - 12 from three - point range and 4 - for - 18 from the field .
Klay_Thompson also struggled , as he went 1 - for - 7 from long distance , but scored a team - high 15 points .
Draymond_Green flirted with a triple - double once again , as he accumulated 11 points , 9 rebounds and 8 assists .
This extended the Spurs home winning streak to 44 games and it may have been the most impressive win in that span .
LaMarcus_Aldridge was huge , as he amassed 26 points and 13 rebounds .
Kawhi_Leonard was also majestic , as he tallied 18 points , 14 rebounds and 4 assists in the win .
Boris_Diaw started for Tim_Duncan to match the Warriors small - ball and collected 14 points and 8 rebounds in a quality performance and brilliant decision from Gregg Popovich .
The shorthanded Miami_Heat ( 31 - 24 ) defeated the tired Washington_Wizards ( 25 - 19 ) 114 - 94 on Saturday .
Miami has played without its 2 best players since the All-Star break and is undefeated in the 2 games since .
This marked Washington 's third game in 3 days and it was obvious the Wizards did n't have their legs underneath them .
The Wizards shot 40 percent from the field , 52 percent from the free - throw line and 14 percent from three - point range .
The Heat got off to a 30 - 19 start in the first quarter and never looked back after that .
One huge key for Miami was the rebounding , as they brought down 67 boards to the Wizards 45 .
Playing 3 games in 3 days is a rarity is today 's NBA , but a cancellation earlier in the season brought up this unfortunate circumstance for the Wizards .
Marcin_Gortat recorded yet another double - double , as he amassed 14 points and 13 rebounds in the defeat .
Bradley_Beal led the team with 19 points , as he came off the bench yet again .
Luol_Deng played fantastic , as he tallied 27 points , 10 rebounds and 4 assists in the win .
Goran_Dragic also played well , accumulating 24 points , 8 assists and 7 rebounds .
Hassan_Whiteside made his return from a 1 - game suspension and put up a ridiculous 25 - point , 22 - rebound line off the bench .
The Detroit_Pistons defeated the Phoenix_Suns , 112 - 95 , at Palace of Auburn Hills on Sunday .
In fact , the Pistons went on a 35 - 12 run in a 10 - minute span between the third and fourth quarters to overcome a 12 - point deficit and eventually pull away .
Phoenix really struggled with their shots , as they went just 35 percent from the field , 27 percent from three - point range and 63 percent from the free - throw line .
Rebounding was also key for Detroit , as they won that battle , 63 - 47 .
The Suns ( 22 - 48 ) had a tough task here without Eric_Bledsoe and Devin_Booker , as they did n't have enough ammunition to match with the Pistons .
Tyler_Ulis shot just 7 - of - 24 from the field , but still accrued 17 points , 3 rebounds , 11 assists and 3 steals .
T.J. Warren finished with 15 points , 6 rebounds , 3 steals and 2 blocks .
Alan_Williams recorded a double - double off the bench , providing 11 points and 12 rebounds .
The Pistons ( 34 - 36 ) are in must - win mode every game out and this one was a bit too close for comfort .
Kentavious_Caldwell-Pope was the player of the game , as he collected 23 points , 3 rebounds and 8 assists .
Andre_Drummond was equally as good , accumulating 18 points , 18 rebounds , 2 assists and 2 blocks .
Marcus_Morris amassed 16 points , 5 rebounds and 3 assists .
Aron_Baynes was huge off the bench , totaling 13 points and 17 rebounds in just 17 minutes of action .
Detroit 's next game is a favorable 1 , as they play the Brooklyn_Nets on the road on Tuesday .
The Portland Trail_Blazers ( 18 - 24 ) beat the Brooklyn_Nets ( 11 - 29 ) 117 - 104 on Friday night .
There was n't much to differentiate the 2 teams on the stat sheet aside from the bench play , as the Blazers bench scored 47 points to the Nets 26 .
The Trail_Blazers also shot over 50 percent from the field and this was the best their offense has looked in quite some time .
Damian_Lillard was spectacular in this game , as he provided 33 points and 10 assists in the victory .
Allen_Crabbe , Ed_Davis and Meyers_Leonard provided some good production off the bench , as they combined for 41 points and 23 rebounds .
Donald_Sloan has taken over starting point guard duties recently and he had his game of the season here , as he tallied 15 points , 9 rebounds and 9 assists in a brilliant game .
Brook_Lopez also had a good game in just 28 minutes of play , as he scored 25 points to go along with 7 boards .
The Wizards ( 29 - 13 ) took care of the 76ers ( 8 - 33 ) 111 - 76 in Washington , D.C. on Monday afternoon .
The advantage was 23 points at halftime , and Washington continued to pour it on in the second half , even with most of its regulars resting .
The Wizards won every quarter and outscored Philadelphia 26 - 18 in the fourth en route to the 35 - point margin of victory .
Washington had 7 players in double - figures , including all 5 starters .
Marcin_Gortat 's 20 points and 8 rebounds led the way , while Nene added 12 points and 6 boards in 18 minutes .
John_Wall and Brad Beal chipped in 11 and 10 points , respectively , and Wall added 10 assists .
Otto_Porter scored 10 points off the bench , and Kevin_Seraphin added 14 to go with 9 rebounds .
The Wizards turned it over 22 times as a team but were able to compensate with 56 percent shooting and a 53 - 30 rebounding advantage .
Philadelphia shot a measly 33 percent from the floor and knocked down only 6 of its 24 three - point attempts .
While Henry_Sims ( 13 points ) and Robert_Covington ( 10 ) turned in solid performances , the rest of the starting 5 combined for just 21 points on 8 - of - 31 shooting .
Michael_Carter-Williams , in particular , struggled , scoring just 7 points on 2 - of - 13 shooting .
The Sixers have now dropped 2 straight since beating the Pelicans on Friday .
The Philadelphia_76ers ( 7 - 39 ) led final 3 quarters Tuesday to beat the Phoenix_Suns ( 14 - 32 ) at Wells Fargo Center , 113 - 103 .
The game was decided at the three - point line , as the 76ers had a 15 - point advantage from downtown thanks to a sharp 11 - 28 shooting night ( 39 percent ) .
The Suns , meanwhile , managed just 6 of 19 from deep ( 32 percent ) and missed 10 of their first 13 attempts from beyond the arc , by which point it was too late to mount a comeback .
Archie_Goodwin led all scorers with 26 points on a strong all - around night for Phoenix , as he grabbed 6 rebounds , dished 6 assists , and notched 2 steals .
Alex_Len posted a double - double with 16 points and 12 rebounds , but nobody else got going , as just 4 Suns finished in double figures and nobody besides Goodwin or Len managed more than 12 .
The 76ers have won 2 of 3 and 3 of their last 5 , and they 'll head on the road for a Wednesday game against the Pistons .
The Portland Trail_Blazers defeated the host Denver_Nuggets , 115 - 113 , in an overtime thriller at Pepsi Center on Saturday .
Denver dominated at the free - throw line , going 31 - for - 39 , while holding Portland to 15 - for - 21 .
Rebounding was huge as well , as the Nuggets snatched down 61 boards to the Blazers 45 .
Denver shot under 40 percent from the field and lost the turnover battle 17 - 15 though .
The Trail_Blazers won despite failing to hit a shot for an 8 - minute stretch in the third quarter , allowing Denver to go on a 170 run .

Tucker ( 10 ) joining , Bledsoe , Dragic and Markieff_Morris .

Phoenix takes on Houston on Saturday on the road , looking to extend their winning streak to 3 games .

Chandler has grabbed 100 rebounds in his last 6 games .
The Houston_Rockets ( 20 - 19 ) moved back over .500 for the first time since Dec. 21 with a victory Wednesday night over the Memphis_Grizzlies ( 21 - 19 ) at FedEx Forum , 107 - 91 .
Terrence_Jones exploded for 10 of his 20 points in a decisive 35 - 22 fourth quarter for the Rockets , his first 20 - point game since doing it twice in a row back on November 13 and 14 .
Rockets star James_Harden led all scorers with 25 points behind 4 three - pointers and a clean 9 - 10 performance from the free throw line .
Dwight_Howard 's 14 rebounds led all players , and he added 17 points on a sharp 6 - 10 shooting ( including a rare perfect 5 - 5 night from the free throw line ) .
The Rockets shot a ludicrous 18 - 35 ( 51 percent ) from the three - point line , too much shooting for the Grizzlies to overcome .
Marc_Gasol 's 20 points on 8 - 15 shooting led the Grizzlies .
Tony_Allen added 17 points and Courtney_Lee scored 16 , each on 6 - 12 shooting nights .
But the Grizzlies just could n't produce enough offense to stay with Houston 's vicious three - point attack , despite a decent night from downtown themselves ( 7 - 18 , 39 percent ) .
Jimmy_Butler scored a career - high 53 points as the Chicago_Bulls ( 23 - 15 ) came from behind to defeat the Philadelphia_76ers ( 4 - 37 ) 115 - 111 in overtime .
Butler attempted a season - high 30 shots , making half , and went 21 of 25 from the free - throw line .
His tied the highest - scoring performance of the season , matching the 53 points dropped by Golden_State 's Stephen_Curry on Halloween .
Butler added 10 rebounds , 6 assists and 3 steals .
Starting point guard Derrick_Rose sat out with left knee tendinitis , and backup Kirk_Hinrich managed just 5 points and 4 assists in 32 minutes .
Power forward Nikola_Mirotic , meanwhile , shot a paltry 2 of 13 from the field .

Noel was still able to put up 8 points , 6 rebounds , and 3 blocks in 24 minutes of play .

The Cleveland_Cavaliers ( 51 - 20 ) defeated the Milwaukee_Bucks ( 30 - 42 ) 113 - 104 on Wednesday .
With only a 2 - game lead coming in to the night , Cleveland finds itself in a must - win scenario for the time being every time they take the court .
Fortunately , they were back at full health Wednesday , with Kevin_Love back after a 1 - game absence due to an illness .
The power forward was outstanding in his return , taking advantage of the Bucks 's nototriously vulnerable frontcourt to post a 24 - point , 10 - rebound double - double that also included 4 assists , 1 steal and 2 blocks .
Love and LeBron_James helped the Cavs overcome some shooting struggles from long - range - - where they only tallied a 29 percent success rate - - to secure the key victory .
The Bucks were spearheaded by Giannis Antetokunmpo , who managed 24 points , 6 assists , 6 rebounds and 1 block .
Jerryd_Bayless followed with 15 points , 5 rebounds and 1 assist .
Greg_Monroe was next with 14 points , 2 rebounds , 1 assist and 1 steal .
Jabari_Parker checked in with 12 points , 3 assists , 1 rebound and 4 steals .
John_Henson paced the reserves with 12 points , 3 rebounds , 1 assist , 1 steal and 1 block .
The Bucks remain in last place in the Eastern Conference 's Central Division , and are 7 games back of the eighth - seeded Chicago_Bulls .

Kyrie_Irving contributed 16 points , 8 rebounds , 8 assists and 1 steal .
J.R. Smith tallied 13 points , 4 assists , 3 rebounds and 1 steal .
Timofey_Mozgov managed 10 points , 3 rebounds , 2 assists and 1 block .

The Cavaliers have clinched the Eastern Conference 's Central Division , and are momentarily 2 games ahead of the second - seeded Raptors , pending the outcome of tonight 's Toronto - Boston game .

The Philadelphia_76ers ( 14 - 49 ) defeated the Atlanta_Hawks ( 49 - 13 ) 92 - 84 on Saturday at the Wells Fargo Center in Philadelphia .
The Atlanta_Hawks came into this game on a 6 - game win streak , while the Sixers had lost 4 in a row , so it was an extremely surprising result when the Sixers came out with the victory on Saturday .
Despite the loss , the Hawks were the superior shooters , going 39 percent from the field and 44 percent from the three - point line , while the Sixers went 37 percent from the floor and just 35 percent from deep .
The Sixers did the majority of their work in the second half though , where they out - scored the Hawks 45 - 31 , helping push them to the 8 - point victory in front of their home crowd .
Thompson received some help though , as Luc Mbah A Moute posted 19 points ( 8 - 16 FG , 3 - 7 3Pt ) of his own , while adding 3 rebounds and 1 steal .
Nerlens_Noel was a big factor in the win as well , as he finished with 11 points ( 4 - 12 FG , 3 - 6 FT ) , 17 rebounds and 5 steals .
Starting at point guard , Isaiah_Canaan added 12 points ( 2 - 13 FG , 2 - 9 3Pt , 6 - 8 FT ) , 5 rebounds and 8 assists .
In the Hawks defense , they did decide to rest 3 of their starters , including DeMarre_Carroll , Paul_Millsap and Kyle_Korver , as they have already locked up a playoff spot in the Eastern Conference playoffs .
The Hawks also received a solid contribution off their bench though , with Dennis_Schroder posting 16 points ( 6 - 13 FG , 1 - 3 3Pt , 3 - 4 FT ) and 6 assists .
Both Al_Horford and Mike_Scott reached double figures as well , adding 12 and 11 points respectively .
The Washington_Wizards defeated the Portland Trail_Blazers , 120 - 101 , at Verizon Center on Monday .
In fact , Washington pulled out a wire - to - wire victory , as they took a 37 - 21 lead after the first quarter , with the game never getting within 10 points after that .
Three-point shooting was the difference , with the Wizards going 13 - of - 23 , while the Blazers hit just 8 - of - 26 from long range .
The Trail_Blazers ( 18 - 25 ) have struggled on defense all season and a 75 - point first half allowed to the Wizards only adds to those troubles .
Damian_Lillard was the lone bright spot for Portland , as he tallied 22 points , 7 rebounds and 3 assists .
McCollum and Al-Farouq_Aminu were second among starters , scoring 12 points a piece .
Evan_Turner led the bench in scoring , dropping 14 points to go along with his 3 rebounds .
The Wizards ( 21 - 19 ) have been dominant at home this season , as this marks their 17th win at Verizon Center .

The Atlanta_Hawks ( 26 - 8 ) defeated the Los_Angeles_Clippers ( 23 - 12 ) 107 - 98 on Monday at the Staples Center in Los_Angeles .
After going into the half down 2 points , the Hawks were able to have a very strong second half , out - scoring the Clippers 63 - 52 , therefore allowing them the 9 - point victory .
While both teams shot similar percentages from the field , the biggest difference may have came in the turnover category , as the Hawks forced the Clippers into 21 , while only committing 12 of their own .
Millsap finished with a team - high of 23 points ( 8 - 16 FG , 1 - 2 3Pt , 6 - 7 FT ) , while also adding 8 rebounds .
Teague on the other hand went 6 - for - 13 from the field and 3 - for - 6 from the three - point line to score 20 points , while also adding 9 assists and 4 steals .
Like Millsap , he 's also had a hot hand of late and is averaging 23 points over his last 5 games .
The Clippers were led by an impressive performance from Blake_Griffin , who neared a triple - double with 26 points ( 6 - 17 FG ) , 10 rebounds and 6 assists .
DeAndre_Jordan was able to to notch a double - double and went a perfect 7 - of - 7 from the field to score 15 points and grab 16 rebounds .
Chris_Paul had a double - double of his own , as he recorded 10 points ( 4 - 9 FG , 0 - 2 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) and 10 assists .
J.J. Reddick was another top scorer , as he had 14 points ( 5 - 9 FG , 1 - 4 3Pt , 3 - 3 FT ) in 35 minutes .
The Houston_Rockets ( 27 - 11 ) defeated the Brooklyn_Nets ( 16 - 22 ) 113 - 99 on Monday at the Barclays Center in Brooklyn .
The Rockets had a strong start to this game , out - scoring the Nets 37 - 28 in the first quarter .
Along with the strong start , the Rockets also secured an advantage from the three - point line , finishing at 40 percent from beyond the arc , while the Nets shot a meager 24 percent from deep .

Both Trevor_Ariza and Patrick_Beverley reached double figures in points as well with 12 and 11 points respectively .

Jack scored 13 points ( 6 - 16 FG , 0 - 4 3Pt , 1 - 2 FT ) and handed out 6 assists in 38 minutes .

Unfortunately for the Nets , the moves amounted to the proverbial rearranging of chairs on the Titanic , with the veteran Johnson being the only one of the 3 to provide an offensive spark in the blowout loss .
Brooklyn also had a difficult time keeping the ball out of the hands of the Spurs 's suffocating defense , committing 19 turnovers that led to 30 San_Antonio points .
Kawhi_Leonard was the only other starter to tally double - digit scoring , amassing 17 points , 8 rebounds and 1 steal over an efficient 30 minutes .

The Spurs improved to 33 - 6 and remain atop the Western Conference 's Southwest Division .

Despite Brooklyn 's numerous difficulties this season , the big man has been the 1 constant in terms of offensive production .

The Indiana_Pacers defeated the Washington_Wizards , 107 - 105 , at Bankers Life Fieldhouse on Monday .
An entertaining , high - scoring affair fittingly came down to the buzzer , as Bradley_Beal misfired on a 22 - foot three - point jumper that would have sent the Wizards ( 12 - 15 ) home winners .
With less than a second remaining , it has been Thaddeus_Young who 'd made a clutch basket for the Pacers ( 15 - 14 ) to snap a 105 - 105 deadlock .
The game featured a strong first quarter from Washington in which they outscored their hosts by a 36 - 29 margin .
However , Indiana roared back to outpace the visitors by a 59 - 43 margin over the second and third periods , before seeing the Wizards make a comeback over the final 12 minutes .

The Cleveland_Cavaliers came out strong on the second night of a back - to - back to defeat the Charlotte_Hornets , 116 - 105 , at Quicken Loans Arena on Saturday evening .
LeBron_James absolutely dominated the game as he broke - out for 44 points , along with 10 rebounds and 9 assists , in 42 minutes .
It marks the 73rd time in his career that James has scored more than 40 points .
Cleveland shot a blazing 58 percent from the field and 42 percent from long range , while LeBron_James , Iman_Shumpert and Kyrie_Irving combined to go 11 - of - 19 from downtown .
The Cavs are 11 - 2 at home and will look to add to their win streak as they play host to the Grizzlies on Tuesday .

Cody_Zeller followed up with 17 points and 9 rebounds .
The Hornets did well to force 18 turnovers from the Cavs but still gave up 14 of their own .
They will look to get back on track as they face the second game of a 5 - game road trip , on Monday in Indiana .

However , Minnesota was ultimately done in by a solid shooting night from the home team , who drained 52 percent of their attempts from the field , including an impressive 48 percent of their 25 tries from beyond the arc .
The above - average accuracy helped Boston post a 32 - 19 third quarter that blew open what had been a 7 - point halftime lead .

The Jazz has the fifth best record since trading Enes_Kanter , winning 2 - thirds of their games since the All-Star break .
Booker shocked the NBA world with a career - high 36 points , 9 rebounds , 2 steals , 1 block , 1 assist and 4 three - pointers in 36 minutes .
Dante_Exum recorded 6 turnovers in 23 minutes while Rodney_Hood scored 21 points and dished out a career - high 8 assists in 31 minutes .
He 's averaging 20 points on 51 percent shooting the last 5 games , challenging the Timberwolves 's Andrew_Wiggins for Western Conference Rookie of the Month .
Elijah_Millsap , Chris_Johnson and Bryce_Cotton all scored 11 points off the bench , topped by Jeremy_Evans 's 12 points to give the Jazz 's reserves 45 points .

The Utah_Jazz defeated the New_York_Knicks , 114 - 109 , at Madison Square Garden on Sunday .
The Jazz ( 4 - 3 ) braced themselves for an offensive void when they lost Gordon_Hayward to a finger injury in preseason , as he was slated to miss a minimum of 6 weeks .
However , the standout forward beat the recovery timetable by at least 2 weeks , starting at the 3 on Sunday for Utah .
His effort spearheaded a highly productive day for the Jazz offense that saw all 5 members of the first unit hit double - digit scoring and Utah produce a collective 51 percent success rate from the field .
George_Hill , who 's helped pick up a good bit of the offensive slack in Hayward 's absence , continued to thrive despite the latter 's return to the court , totaling 23 points , 6 rebounds , 4 assists and 1 steal .
Rodney_Hood was right behind with 18 points , 6 rebounds , 4 assists and 1 steal .
Rudy_Gobert and Derrick_Favors turned in a pair of 13 - point efforts from the frontcourt , with the former also contributing 8 rebounds , 1 assist , 3 blocks and 1 steal , and the latter supplying 6 boards .
Joe_Johnson , who headed to the bench with Hayward 's return , tallied 10 points to pace the bench .
The Knicks ( 2 - 4 ) were co - led by a pair of 28 - point outputs for Carmelo_Anthony and Kristaps_Porzingis .
Anthony also registered 9 rebounds and 3 assists , while Porzingis supplied 8 boards , 1 assist and 2 blocks .
Derrick_Rose continued his strong stretch of play to open his tenure in the Big Apple , totaling 18 points , 8 assists , 4 rebounds and 1 steal .
Courtney_Lee was the fourth member of the starting 5 to hit double digits in the scoring column , posting 10 points , 6 boards and 3 steals .
The Phoenix_Suns defeated the Dallas_Mavericks , 100 - 98 , at American Airlines Center on Saturday .
In fact , Booker scored the final 8 points for Phoenix , as he hit a game - winning jumper at the buzzer to seal the win .
Defense was key for the Suns , as they held the Mavericks to 38 percent shooting , while Phoenix shot 47 percent on their end .
Scoring in the paint was a huge factor as well , with the Suns winning that battle , 38 - 20 .
The Suns ( 22 - 44 ) have now won 4 of their last 6 games , as they continue to disappoint playoff contenders .
Booker was the star , as he scored a game - high 36 points , including that game - winner .
T.J. Warren finished second on the team , totaling 16 points and 8 rebounds .
Eric_Bledsoe accumulated 12 points , 2 rebounds and 6 assists .
Tyler_Ulis and Alan_Williams came off the bench to combine for 18 points , 8 rebounds , 6 assists , 2 steals and 3 blocks .
The Mavericks ( 28 - 37 ) needed this game to stay within 1 game of the 8 - seed in the west , but they allowed a 22 - win Phoenix team to play major spoiler .
Dirk_Nowitzki did all he could for Dallas , as he amassed 23 points and 11 rebounds on 10 - of - 14 shooting .
Harrison_Barnes shot just 5 - of - 16 from the field , but matched Nowitzki 's 23 points , adding 7 rebounds to his tally .
Devin_Harris was the only bench player in double figures , tallying 14 points , 3 rebounds and 2 assists .

The Atlanta_Hawks ( 2 - 2 ) tied up the series with their 106 - 101 win over the Washington_Wizards ( 2 - 2 ) .
Paul_Pierce , unable to recreate his Game 3 heroics , missed the game - tying three - pointer with 7 seconds remaining .
The referees failed to call Kyle_Korver for traveling on the ensuing possession , leading to 2 Paul_Millsap free throws .
Coach Mike Budenholzer reinserted Paul_Millsap into the starting lineup after promoting Pero_Antic in Game 3 due to Millsap 's illness .

The Hawks 's fourth All-Star , Kyle_Korver , struggled to get open looks for the second straight game , scoring 6 points on 2 - of - 4 shooting .
Even though he was n't able to tie the game late , Paul_Pierce scored 22 points and passed Dennis Johnson on the all - time playoff scoring list .
Wall 's absence has been doubly difficult on Marcin_Gortat , who played 93 percent of his regular - season minutes with Wall on the court .
In Game 4 , Gortat was limited to 3 points on 1 - of - 7 shooting and a team - high 8 rebounds in 31 minutes .
Game 5 will take place in Atlanta on Wednesday night .

The New_Orleans_Pelicans ( 34 - 29 ) defeated the Memphis_Grizzlies ( 44 - 18 ) 95 - 89 on Saturday at the Smoothie King Center in New_Orleans .
Coming into this game sitting just 1 game back from the Oklahoma_City_Thunder for the final projected playoff seed in the Western Conference standings , the Pelicans pulled off a big win Saturday , bringing themselves to within a half game of the Thunder .
Despite being down 50 - 38 at half , the Pelicans took off in the third quarter , out - scoring the Grizzlies 33 - 17 to help set themselves up for the 6 - point victory in front of their home crowd .
The Pelicans were the superior shooters in this game , going 48 percent from the field , while the Grizzlies finished at just 43 percent .
Evans went 10 - for - 16 from the field and 3 - for - 8 from the three - point line to finish with a team - high of 26 points , to go along with 7 rebounds and 3 steals .
He struggled to just 11 points on Friday against the Boston_Celtics , so it was good to see him rebound with a big performance .
Davis , on the other hand , finished with 23 points ( 11 - 21 FG , 1 - 1 FT ) , 10 rebounds and 5 blocked shots in 40 minutes .
After missing 5 games in a row with a shoulder injury , the Pelicans are loving what they 're seeing from their superstar , as he 's averaged 30 points , 12 rebounds and 5 blocks in the 3 games since his return .

The visiting Phoenix_Suns took down the host Toronto_Raptors on Sunday , 115 - 103 .
Phoenix ( 15 - 29 ) has now won 2 straight and has seen excellent play from its young backcourt .
Sophomore shooting guard Devin_Booker followed up 26 points on Saturday with 20 against Toronto , including 5 three - pointers .
Of course , Booker 's excellent play was nothing compared to point guard Eric_Bledsoe , who dropped 40 points and dished out 13 assists .
Bledsoe shot 11 - of - 17 and was a perfect 14 - of - 14 on free - throws .
Strong shooting was the story of the night for Phoenix , as the team shot over 50 percent from the field and knocked down almost 93 percent of its free - throws .
In addition to strong offensive play , Bledsoe played a role in containing the powerful Toronto backcourt of Kyle_Lowry and DeMar_DeRozan , who shot just 11 - of - 34 on the night .
Toronto ( 28 - 16 ) was demolished by the Hornets on Friday and was unable to rebound from the loss on Sunday afternoon .
In what was a surprising turn , both of Toronto 's All-Star guards struggled , as the 2 normal top scorers made just 11 shots for 34 points .
Lowry had a particularly tough performance , shooting just 1 - of - 9 from beyond the arc .
The Raptors as a whole struggled from the field about as much as the Suns succeeded , as the team finished shooting under 40 percent on the night .
In particular , Toronto went ice cold in the fourth quarter , getting outscored by 15 points in the period .
The Denver_Nuggets defeated the Los_Angeles_Clippers , 106 - 102 , at Staples Center on Monday .
The Clippers ( 22 - 11 ) came in to the game lacking some serious star power , as the starting backcourt of Chris_Paul and J.J. Redick both joined Blake_Griffin ( knee ) on the bench Monday night .
However , the Nuggets ( 13 - 18 ) just had more firepower overall , as the duo of Nikola_Jokic and Danilo_Gallinari combined for a pair of double - doubles to lead the offensive attack .
Gallinari sunk 4 key free throws in the last 16 seconds of the game to seal the win , Denver 's seventh on the road this season .
Jokic 's 24 - point , 10 - rebound double - double led the way for the visitors , and he supplemented those numbers with 4 assists and 3 steals .
Gallinari added 23 points , along with 11 rebounds , 1 assist and 3 steals .
Will_Barton chipped in off the bench with 23 points of his own , as well as 8 boards and 6 dimes .
Gary_Harris contributed a modest 10 points , 4 rebounds and 1 assist .

DeAndre_Jordan tallied a 12 - point , 11 - rebound double - double that also included 3 steals and 1 block .
Brandon_Bass and Raymond_Felton registered 11 and 10 points , respectively , off the bench .
The Atlanta_Hawks ( 2 - 1 ) were able to pull out a 97 - 94 home victory over the Charlotte_Hornets ( 0 - 2 ) on Friday .
After a tight first half , the Hawks were able to claim a 14 - point lead with under 6 minutes remaining in the fourth quarter , but a run of 9 unanswered points by the Hornets resulted in an outcome that was too close for comfort .
Still , Atlanta was able to make enough stops down the stretch to deny the late rally , as Kemba_Walker missed the game - tying attempt from 25 feet to give Atlanta the victory .
He also tacked on 9 rebounds for good measure , a total that was only second to Paul_Millsap 's 10 boards for the team lead .
Millsap also accrued 18 points , while Al_Horford ( 18 ) , Jeff_Teague ( 14 ) , and Dennis_Schroder ( 14 ) rounded out the double - digit scorers .
The winless Hornets were foiled by their top 2 offensive threats suffering from poor shooting nights .
Al_Jefferson and Kemba_Walker both shot 5 - for - 15 from the field to combine for just 23 points between them , while no other scorer on the team exceeded 14 points .
Charlotte was at least able to win the battle of the boards , 54 - 45 , thanks to double - digit rebound efforts from Marvin_Williams ( 12 ) , Nicolas_Batum ( 11 ) , and Jefferson ( 11 ) .
The 2 teams will get together for a rematch Sunday , with that game to take place in Atlanta .

The Clippers came into this game on a 9 - game winning streak but none of those wins came against a team with a record better than .500 .
The Heat came in having lost 3 of their last 4 and in the midst of a 6 - game road trip , which put them in a tough spot against the streaking Clippers .
Now the Clippers boast a 10 - game win streak , which includes 1 win against a formidable opponent , while the Heat are 1 - 3 on their road trip and have dropped 4 of their last 5 .

The Milwaukee_Bucks ( 29 - 38 ) defeated the Brooklyn_Nets ( 18 - 48 ) 109 - 100 on Sunday .
Despite playing a competitive game through 4 quarters , the Nets provided a textbook example of how statistics can sometimes be deceiving .
Both figures were superior to those of the Bucks in those categories , but 1 other area of the stat sheet largely did Brooklyn in Sunday .
The Nets committed more than double the turnovers of the visitors , handing the ball over 20 times to the Bucks .
The miscues led to 33 points by Milwuakee , which severely undermined Brooklyn 's efforts to secure a victory .
They also found themselves powerless to stop one of the game 's emerging superstars in Giannis_Antetokounmpo , who managed his fourth triple - double in the last 11 games .

The Suns ( 1 - 4 ) grabbed their first win of the season in emphatic fashion against a tough opponent in the Trail_Blazers ( 2 - 3 ) .
A neck - and - neck performance from end to end resulted in not 1 , but 2 moments that got every Suns fan out of their seats .
Eric_Bledsoe drove the lane and sank a layup with 0:1 left in regulation to put the Suns up by 2 points , but Meyers_Leonard was the end of a fantastic drawn up play to drop in the buzzer beating equalizer to send the Blazers and Suns to overtime .
Phoenix pulled away by 6 points after T.J. Warren dropped in 2 free throws with just over :30 left in the overtime period , but the Blazers simply would not go away .
After Damian_Lillard drove the lane for his own layup , and grabbed the foul , to the tie the game at 115 - 115 with :6 left , Eric_Bledsoe sank the game winning three - pointer to cap off a wild finish in Phoenix .
T.J. Warren led the Suns in scoring with 27 points , to go along with 7 rebounds , while Eric_Bledsoe added 20 points , 7 rebounds and 4 assists .

McCollum also tallied a solid scoring mark with 24 points , 4 boards and 5 assists .

The Charlotte_Hornets ( 43 - 31 ) made easy work of the Philadelphia_76ers ( 9 - 66 ) Tuesday night at Wells Fargo Center , 100 - 85 .
This 1 was competitive early , but nursing a 36 - 32 lead in the second quarter , the Hornets pushed it into high gear .
Charlotte finished the half on a 16 - 4 run to take a 52 - 36 halftime lead that would prove to be insurmountable .
The big run was powered by Nicolas_Batum , who scored 5 points and dished a pair of assists in the 4:33 stretch .
Batum recorded his second triple - double of the season with 19 points ( 8 - 16 FG ) , 12 rebounds and 12 assists .
Cody_Zeller added an efficient 18 points ( 7 - 8 FG , 4 - 4 FT ) and 11 rebounds , and Kemba_Walker knocked down 4 three - pointers and finished with 16 points .
Charlotte shot poorly - - just 44 percent from the field and 7 - 25 ( 28 percent ) from 3 - - but they dominated the defensive glass , grabbing 56 of Philadelphia 's 66 missed shots , a brilliant 85 percent defensive rebound rate .
Robert_Covington launched from three - point land all night and led the 76ers with 18 points on 6 - 14 shooting from deep ( 6 - 16 overall ) .
Ish_Smith scored 15 ( 6 - 17 FG ) and dished 6 assists and Nik_Stauskas scored 13 ( 4 - 11 FG , 2 - 5 3PT ) off the bench .
Philadelphia shot 36 percent from 3 ( 16 - 44 ) but had no chance inside against Charlotte 's solid interior defense , as they shot a brutal 14 - 52 ( 27 percent ) on 2 - point attempts .
The Toronto_Raptors defeated the Dallas_Mavericks , 100 - 78 , at Air Canada Center on Monday .
There were actually 6 ties and 8 lead changes in the first half , as the Raptors then outscored the Mavericks , 50 - 32 , in the second half .
Rebounding was the glaring difference in the game , with Toronto winning that battle , 55 - 34 .
They also stifled Dallas with their defense , holding the Mavericks to 37 percent from the field and 28 percent from three - point range .
The Mavericks ( 28 - 38 ) are battling for the 8 - seed in the west and losses like this are devastating for that pursuit .
Harrison_Barnes led Dallas , as he scored 18 points on 7 - of - 16 shooting .
Dirk_Nowitzki was n't far behind , as he tallied 17 points , 7 rebounds and 2 assists .
Dwight_Powell led the bench , as he provided 10 points and 10 rebounds .
It was n't just a loss in the record book , as Wesley_Matthews suffered a calf strain and was unable to return after 17 minutes of action .
The Raptors ( 39 - 28 ) had lost 4 of 6 headed into this matchup , so this win is just what the doctor ordered .
DeMar_DeRozan led the way for Toronto , as he collected 25 points , 6 rebounds , 2 assists and 2 steals on 10 - of - 17 shooting .
Norman_Powell finished second on the team , accruing 19 points , 5 rebounds and 3 assists .

The San_Antonio_Spurs defeated the visiting Oklahoma_City_Thunder , 124 - 92 , in Game 1 of the Western Conference second - round playoffs Saturday at AT & T Center .

The Spurs shot 18 - for - 22 in a 43 - point first quarter , while holding the Thunder to 7 - for - 24 while scoring just 20 points on their end .

The Cleveland_Cavaliers defeated the visiting Atlanta_Hawks , 123 - 98 , to take a 20 lead in the Eastern Conference semifinals Wednesday at Quicken Loans Arena .
The contest was such a blowout at 1 point that even the 25 - point final margin of victory belies the extent of Cleveland 's domination .
The 74 - 38 halftime lead rendered the second half a veritable formality , and even with the Hawks outscoring a disinterested Cleveland squad by a score of 60 - 49 over the final 24 minutes , they never got within striking distance of the home team .
It was an all - around stellar effort from the Cavs , which shot 47 percent from the field and 56 percent from three - point range , and elicited 16 turnovers from an overmatched Atlanta unit .

The Charlotte_Hornets ( 16 - 25 ) defeated the Indiana_Pacers ( 15 - 27 ) 80 - 71 in overtime on Saturday at the Time Warner Cable Arena .
Both teams shot under 15 percent from beyond the arc and Charlotte shot just 30 percent from the floor overall .

The Pacers were held scoreless for the first 4 - and - a - half minutes of the overtime period as Charlotte pulled away .
Indiana let this game slip away as its losing skid extended to 4 games .
Roy_Hibbert had a solid night with 12 points and 14 rebounds .
George_Hill is nearing a return and is expected to rejoin the lineup sometime during this 5 - game road trip .

The Golden_State_Warriors ( 60 - 13 ) notched their 60th win of the season Saturday with a 108 - 95 victory over the Milwaukee_Bucks ( 36 - 37 ) at the BMO Harris Bradley Center .
With Saturday 's victory , Golden_State set a franchise record with 60 wins on the season .
Steph Curry continued to make his case for MVP with a 25 point outing in which he hit 6 three - pointers .
The Bucks took a 16 - 14 lead in the first , but that would be their last lead of the game as the Warriors eventually pulled away .
Golden_State swept the season series against Milwaukee 20 .
The Warriors have now won 9 in a row .
Eight of those 9 wins have been by double digits with the lone single digit victory coming against the Lakers .
The Warriors have topped 100 points in 11 straight contests as well .
The Bucks shot just 38 % from the floor as a team and committed 15 turnovers .
Khris_Middleton led the team in scoring with 14 points on 5 - of - 14 shooting .
The Cleveland_Cavaliers defeated the Charlotte_Hornets , 100 - 93 , at Quicken Loans Arena on Sunday .
It was a different story Sunday , however , as veteran Channing_Frye actually led the way with a season - high 20 - point effort in 25 minutes off the bench .
The aforementioned starters were n't necessarily underwhelming , as they combined for 55 points , including 4 total three - pointers from Love and James .
Defense was also undeniably a factor , as Cleveland ( 8 - 1 ) held the Hornets ( 6 - 3 ) to 38 percent success rates from both the field and three - point range .
The Hornets were led by Kemba_Walker , who tallied 21 points , 4 assists , 2 rebounds and 1 steal .
Marvin_Williams posted 16 points , 6 rebounds and 2 assists .
Nicolas_Batum managed a near double - double with 15 points , 9 boards , 7 assists , 2 steals and 1 block .
Michael_Kidd-Gilchrist did get there , supplying 11 points , 10 rebounds , 2 assists and 1 steal .
Frye added 3 rebounds and 3 blocks to his team - high scoring total .
Love was strong as well , pouring in 17 points and bringing in 11 rebounds , 4 assists and 1 steal .
Tristan_Thompson mustered a modest 4 points , but did bring in 12 rebounds .
The Suns , on the other hand , finished 25 percent from behind the arc and a lowly 67 percent from the charity stripe .
While Phoenix was able to create from the field ( 47 percent overall as a unit ) , the efficiency from deep and the free - throw line resulted in multiple failed comeback efforts .
An interesting note on rookie Dragan_Bender for Phoenix stood out with his plus - minus of plus - 10 , the highest amongst all Suns players on the night .
D'Angelo_Russell was the best player for Los_Angeles in Thursday 's win and finished with 28 points on 10 - of - 20 shooting , to go along with 4 rebounds and 3 assists , including 6 three - pointers .
Brandon_Ingram also impressed with 14 points , 6 boards and 3 assists for Los_Angeles in the 122 - 110 win over the Phoenix_Suns .
Julius_Randle added 13 points , 8 rebounds , 4 assists , 1 steal and 1 block in 32 minutes of action .

T.J. Warren completed a double - double with 17 points and 13 rebounds , while rookie Marquese_Chriss managed 18 points on 3 - of - 4 shooting from behind the arc .
The Atlanta_Hawks defeated the New_York_Knicks in quadruple overtime , 142 - 139 , at Phillips Arena on Sunday .
After the Knicks ( 21 - 28 ) held a 65 - 61 lead going into halftime , the 2 teams combined for just 84 points in the second half .
With 4 overtimes , there were plenty of opportunities for heroics , and Carmelo_Anthony and Courtney_Lee capitalized on 3 of them .
Dennis_Schroder then turned the tables , draining a driving layup with 3 seconds remaining in the third overtime .
Finally , it was Paul_Millsap who put an end to the Knicks 's first 4 - overtime tilt since 1951 , pouring in a shot with 27 seconds remaining that gave Atlanta ( 28 - 20 ) a 141 - 139 lead they would n't relinquish .
In all , 4 Knicks players , including Anthony , fouled out , while Millsap played a whopping 60 minutes .
Anthony led the way for New_York with a season - high 45 points , along with 6 rebounds , 4 assists and 1 block over 46 minutes , taking a whopping 36 shots in the process .
Brandon_Jennings , starting for Derrick_Rose ( ankle ) , totaled 18 points , 11 assists , 3 rebounds and 1 steal .
Lee had a near double - double with 17 points , 9 rebounds , 2 assists , 2 steals and 1 block .
Kristaps_Porzingis managed 15 points , 5 boards , 1 assist and 3 blocks .
Justin_Holiday stepped up with a bench - leading 15 points , which he supplemented with 9 rebounds , 2 assists and 1 steal .
Mindaugas_Kuzminskas posted 13 points , 4 rebounds , 4 assists , 1 steal and 1 block in a reserve role as well .
Kyle_O'Quinn hauled in 12 boards off the bench , and Joakim_Noah had a modest 6 points but added 14 rebounds , 5 assists , 3 steals and 2 blocks .
Millsap paced Atlanta with a 37 - point , 19 - rebound double - double that also included 7 assists , 1 steal and 1 block .
Kent_Bazemore managed 24 points and 9 rebounds .
Schroder posted a 23 - point , 15 - assist double - double that also included 4 rebounds , while Dwight_Howard posted a 19 - point , 13 - rebound effort of his own .
Tim Hardaway , Jr. matched Howard 's point total while dishing out 8 assists , hauling in 5 rebounds and recording 1 steal .
Mike_Dunleavy led the reserves with 12 points .
The Houston_Rockets ( 21 - 19 ) defeated the visiting Minnesota_Timberwolves ( 12 - 28 ) 107 - 104 on Wednesday at Toyota Center .
With 9 seperate lead changes , each team had their chance to make a run and close the game out , but in the end , the Rockets came out victorious .
In the fourth quarter , down by 7 with 1 minute and a half left in the game , the Timberwolves did everything they could finish strong .
A bucket by Kevin_Martin and a pair of free throws from Karl Anthony-Towns brought them within 3 .
After a missed shot by the Rockets , Martin had a chance to tie the ball game at 107 , but missed a three - pointer at the buzzer to take the loss on the road .
Harden started the game out strong , scoring 16 points in the first half alone .
Howard has dealt with lingering back spasms this season , but did n't show any ill effects Wednesday and added 15 points ( 5 - 7 FG , 5 - 10 FT ) , 10 rebounds and 2 blocked shots .
While the above duo played well , they also received some help off the bench , as Terrence_Jones chipped in with 16 points ( 7 - 11 FG , 1 - 4 3Pt , 1 - 2 FT ) and 9 rebounds .
Towns recorded 12 points ( 4 - 10 FG , 1 - 1 3Pt , 3 - 4 FT ) and 16 rebounds over 33 minutes of action .
The Miami_Heat ( 12 - 6 ) handily defeated the powerhouse Cleveland_Cavaliers ( 13 - 7 ) on Saturday , winning 99 - 84 .
The 30 - year - old superstar was coming off of a grueling overtime game in New_Orleans the night before , so his absence is indicative of the team wanting to preserve their star 's energy .
Miami was able to capitalize on King James 's absence , jumping out to a 12 - point lead by the end of the first quarter that they simply would not let go of .
Things seemed to be firing on all cylinders for the Heat , as the team shot 54 percent from the field while holding their opponents to a measley 37 percent .
Veteran Dwyane_Wade and sophomore Tyler_Johnson tied for the team lead in scoring , dropping in 19 points apiece .
Meanwhile , center Hassan_Whiteside , who was averaging a whopping 5 blocks per game coming into the matchup against the Cavaliers , continued his historic shot - blocking season , posting 5 blocks despite logging just 21 minutes .
All-star Kevin_Love was held to just 2 - of - 11 from the floor , recording just 5 points .
Shooting guard J.R. Smith also exhibited questionable shot selection at times , finishing just 4 - for - 12 .
The Toronto_Raptors ( 23 - 15 ) defeated the Washington_Wizards ( 15 - 19 ) 97 - 88 on Friday .
If this keeps up , DeMar_DeRozan 's approval rating in Washington is going to sink faster than that of some politicans . The Raptors 's shooting guard has been positively deadly against the Wizards this season , and particularly the last 2 games .
Just 8 days ago , he blasted Washington for 34 points , 6 rebounds , 5 assists , a pair of steals and a pair of blocks in Toronto .
Factoring in his 20 - point outing in the season 's initial meeting between the 2 teams back on Nov. 28 , DeRozan has now averaged just under 30 points per contest against one of the worst defenses in the league versus shooting guards .
Luis_Scola was the only other starter whose points reached double figures , with the power forward posting 11 points and hauling in 5 rebounds .
Corey Joseph led the reserves with 8 points , 4 rebounds , 2 assists , 1 steal and 1 block .
The Raptors improved to 23 - 15 and remain atop the Eastern Conference 's Atlantic Division .
As customary , John_Wall led the way for Washington with 21 points , 4 assists and 3 blocks .
However , like his counterpart on the Raptors , he was a bit careless with the ball , committing 7 turnovers .
Otto_Porter was next on the totem pole , collecting 16 points , 5 rebounds , 3 assists , a pair of steals and 1 block .
The Wizards 's big man posted a 12 - point , 10 - rebound double - double that he supplemented with 3 assists and 3 blocks .
Ramon_Sessions put together one of his typically productive efforts off the bench to pace the Washington reserves , pouring in 14 points and adding 4 rebounds , 1 assist and 1 block .
The Wizards fell to 15 - 19 and remain in last place in the Eastern Conference 's Southeast Division .
The Detroit_Pistons ( 39 - 34 ) defeated the Charlotte_Hornets ( 41 - 31 ) 112 - 105 on Friday .

The Detroit 2 - guard came out on the better end of things Friday , as he tallied a team - high 21 points , 7 rebounds , 4 assists and a pair of steals .
Meanwhile , Williams could only muster 7 points , 2 rebounds and 2 assists over a modest 22 minutes of action .
The Pistons also established a dominant presence down low , as they out - rebounded the visitors by the notable margin of 62 - 42 , and outscored them in the paint , 50 - 32 .

Anthony_Tolliver was also productive off the bench , registering 11 points , 8 rebounds and 1 block .

The Hawks ( 28 - 8 ) put an end to the Pistons 's ( 12 - 24 ) 7 - game winning streak Friday , holding on for a 106 - 101 victory at home .
Atlanta got off to a hot start , jumping out to a 9 - point lead after the first quarter .
The lead reached 19 points at the half , as the Hawks outscored Detroit 33 - 23 in the second quarter .
Detroit was able to chip away at the deficit in third but still trailed by 15 entering the final period .
The Pistons began the fourth on a 9 - 3 run spurred by back - to - back threes from Anthony_Tolliver and Kentavious_Caldwell-Pope .
Atlanta responded , pushing the lad back to 14 points , but Caldwell-Pope answered back with 7 consecutive points , and a pair of Greg_Monroe free throws trimmed the deficit to just 7 points with 2:35 remaining .
Kyle_Korver drilled a three - pointer to put the Hawks up 105 - 95 but Caldwell-Pope answered back again , converting back - to - back threes and brining Detroit back to within 4 .
The Hawks , who shot nearly 49 percent from the floor , placed all 5 starters in double - figures , paced by 19 points and 16 rebounds from Al_Horford .

Monroe also added 12 rebounds .
Andre_Drummond was limited to just 4 points and 5 rebounds in 17 minutes , despite not being in foul trouble .
Over the last 2 games for Philadelphia , however , a different young frontcourt player has stepped up to the plate .
First-year player Dario_Saric played 28 minutes off the bench Wednesday , and each one of his 24 points and 8 rebounds were necessary for the Sixers to end their 5 - game winning streak .
Now , in his last 2 games , Saric has recorded a total of 44 points in 49 minutes while shooting a wildly impressive 16 - of - 26 ( 62 percent ) from the field and 7 - of - 10 from behind the arc .

Oklahoma_City was outstanding on both ends of the floor throughout the game , as they managed a 51 percent success rate from the field , and 39 percent from three - point range .
They also suffocated the Spurs 's long - range attack , limiting them to just 17 percent shooting from beyond the arc .
San_Antonio received a trio of 20 - point - plus efforts from their starting 5 , spearheaded by Tony_Parker 's team - leading 22 points .
Kawhi_Leonard was right behind him with 21 points , which he complemented with 6 rebounds , 2 assists and 4 steals .

The host New_Orleans_Pelicans handily defeated the Los_Angeles_Lakers on Tuesday , 105 - 88 .
New_Orleans ( 7 - 12 ) has been able to turn its season around after a horrendous 1 - 9 start .
Holiday scored 22 points and hit 4 of New_Orleans 's 8 three - pointers on Tuesday .
Of course , the biggest factor for the Pelicans was All-Star forward Anthony_Davis , who scored 41 points and grabbed 16 rebounds .
Davis is currently the league 's leading scorer and an emerging candidate for Defensive Player of the Year , a case Davis furthered with 4 steals and 2 blocks on Tuesday .
The outing was Davis 's 11th game of 25 points and 10 rebounds on the season .
Thanks in large part to Davis 's dominance , it was an easy win for New_Orleans , which hopped out to a 24 - point lead by halftime .
Los_Angeles ( 9 - 10 ) , meanwhile , has been surprisingly hot to start the season but saw an unfortunate night on Tuesday .
Veteran Nick_Young was forced to exit the game and was diagnosed with an Achilles strain after just 2 minutes of play .
The Lakers consequently saw big minutes from their bench on Tuesday , with 5 bench players tallying over 20 minutes .
Sixth man Lou_Williams led the team with 16 points , while starter Julius_Randle scored 12 and had 10 rebounds in just 22 minutes .
The Dallas_Mavericks ( 24 - 19 ) defeated the visiting Boston_Celtics ( 22 - 20 ) 118 - 113 in overtime at American Airlines Arena on Monday .
The battle between 2 playoff caliber teams produced fireworks on Monday with a neck - and - neck second half and overtime period that eventually went in favor of the home town Mavericks .
With :34 remaining in the 4th quarter , Jared_Sullinger blocked Raymond_Felton 's floater , resulting in a Jae_Crowder fast break layup to take a 1 point lead .
A pair of Dirk_Nowitzki free throws and Deron_Williams free throws followed on the next 2 possessions , giving Dallas a three point advantage with :15 left .
Boston inbounded and worked the ball to Jae_Crowder , who pulled up for a 3 - point shot and was fouled on his follow through by Raymond_Felton .
Crowder sank all 3 from the charity stripe , forcing overtime .
The overtime period was dominated by Deron_Williams , who scored 10 points , including back - to - back 3 - pointers and 1 assist to Dirk_Nowitzki in the corner for a third straight trey .
Williams hot hand resulted in 20 points ( 7 - of - 17 FG , 2 - of - 5 3PT , 4 - of - 4 FT ) , 5 rebounds and 6 assists in 36 minutes .
Nowitzki turned back the clock and led all scorers with 31 points , to go along with 11 rebounds .
Wes Matthews helped the Mavs to get a solid first half lead with 15 points on 3 - of - 8 from behind the arc , but was mostly positioned in a defensive role down the stretch .
The Mavericks will take a day off before hosting the Minnesota_Timberwolves ( 13 - 29 ) on Wednesday .
The Celtics produced 6 players in double figures , led by Isiah Thomas 's 20 points , 4 rebounds and 7 assists .
Bradley scored 19 points on 4 - of - 8 shooting from deep , while Marcus_Smart turned in an all around , stat stuffed performance with 20 points , 8 rebounds , 3 assists and 2 steals .
The Celtics will head north and visit the Toronto_Raptors ( 26 - 15 ) on Wednesday .
