The Golden_State_Warriors ( 70 ) defeated the Sacramento_Kings ( 1 - 6 ) 103 - 94 on Saturday .
The most notable stat line was a triple - double from Rajon_Rondo , as he accumulated 14 points , 12 rebounds , 15 assists and 4 steals in the loss .
Both teams were playing the second half of a back - to - back and that really showed , as both the Kings and Warriors barely shot above 40 percent and committed 39 combined turnovers in what 's usually a high - scoring matchup .
The Warriors continued their raving success , despite MVP Steph Curry shooting 2 - for - 10 from long distance .
The key tonight for the Warriors was the defense , as they accumulated 13 steals and held the Kings to 44 percent shooting .
Draymond_Green also flirted with a triple - double , as he amassed 10 points , 9 rebounds and 7 assists in the victory .
The Kings now fall to 0 - 5 without DeMarcus_Cousins with this close loss to the NBA champs , but this may have been their best performance of the season .
They appeared to have one of the worst defenses in the NBA coming into this matchup , but holding the Warriors to 103 points on 41 percent shooting is a win in its own right .
Along with Rondo 's triple - double , the Kings got matching 22 - point performances from Rudy_Gay and Marco_Belinelli .
The Oklahoma_City_Thunder defeated the Utah_Jazz 109 - 106 Tuesday at Chesapeake Energy Arena .
Nevertheless , an 18 - 2 Utah run not only brought them back into the game , but gave them a three - point lead with just over 2 minutes remaining .
From there , Russell_Westbrook completely took over the game , scoring the next 10 points for the Thunder , which was topped off with a game - winning three - point play .
Westbrook finished with yet another triple - double of 43 points , 11 rebounds and 10 assists in 38 minutes .
Doug_McDermott had a great shooting night , hitting 4 of his 6 shots from outside en route to scoring 16 points with Enes_Kanter adding 15 points of his own off the bench .
For the Jazz , it was a solid team effort with 6 different players managing to score in double figures .
All-Star Gordon_Hayward led the way scoring for them , scoring 19 points but on just 7 - of - 17 shooting from the field .
Rodney_Hood added 18 points , while Rudy_Gobert notched a double - double of 13 points and 10 rebounds .
Up next , the Thunder will look to extend their win streak to 5 at Portland on Thursday , while the Jazz will return home Wednesday to take on the Timberwolves .
Orlando started the game on a 16 - 2 run , but Milwaukee started the fourth quarter with a 16 - 2 run of their own .
In fact , every quarter in the game was decided by at least 7 points , with the Bucks winning the second and fourth quarters by 19 and the Magic winning the first and third quarters by 17 .
Milwaukee won this game despite being dominated in the rebounding , losing that battle 54 - 37 . Turnovers are what got the Bucks their win , as they forced 24 of them , while committing just 13 of their own .
That also led the Milwaukee winning the fastbreak differential , 27 - 12 .
Giannis_Antetokounmpo was the player of the game , as he tallied 21 points , 10 rebounds , 10 assists , 5 teals and 3 blocks in an amazing performance .
The host Los_Angeles_Lakers defeated the Oklahoma_City_Thunder on Tuesday , 111 - 109 , at Staples Center .
Los_Angeles ( 8 - 7 ) got off to a hot start , establishing a 13 - point lead by the end of the first quarter .
Veteran Jose_Calderon slid into the starting role , playing 23 minutes and shooting 4 - of - 5 from the field for 12 points .
Meanwhile , bench guard Jordan_Clarkson scored 18 points while snagging 4 steals on the defensive end .
The Lakers were given a run for their money as the game ended , however , with the Thunder able to regain the lead with under 20 seconds to play .
Luckily for Los_Angeles , veteran wing Nick_Young was able to drain a clutch three - point shot with 5 seconds remaining to win the game .
The three - pointer was Young 's fourth of the night and gave him 17 points .
The Thunder ( 8 - 7 ) have now lost 6 of their last 8 contests after a hot 6 - 1 start to the season .
Westbrook finished just shy of a triple - double , posting 34 points , 13 assists , and 8 rebounds .
Westbrook has become no stranger to such stat lines , as he entered the game averaging 32 points , 10 assists , and 10 rebounds per game .
Big man Steven_Adams complemented Westbrook by delivering one of his best performances of the season , scoring 20 points on 9 - of - 13 shooting .
The Utah_Jazz defeated the host Houston_Rockets , 115 - 108 , at Toyota Center on Wednesday .
In a battle between 2 Western Conference contenders , the Jazz were able to escape with a huge road win .
It was a dominating showing from Utah , as they led for 46 minutes in a near wire - to - wire win .
Rebounding was a huge factor in the win for the Jazz , as they won that battle , 45 - 31 .
Shooting was also a big difference , as Utah hit 54 percent of their shots to Houston 's 44 percent .
The Rockets three - point shooting left them down too , as they went just 8 - of - 32 from long distance .
The Jazz ( 41 - 24 ) had to play this game without Derrick_Favors ( knee ) and George_Hill ( toe ) , but they still escaped with an impressive road win .
Gordon_Hayward tallied 23 points , 7 rebounds and 4 assists .
Rudy_Gobert also scored 23 points , adding 10 rebounds on 7 - of - 8 shooting .
Rodney_Hood finished third on the team , accruing 19 points and 6 rebounds .
Joe_Johnson got a rare start and provided 16 points , 2 rebounds and 2 assists .
The Rockets ( 44 - 21 ) had won 8 of 11 headed into this game , but a date with this Jazz defense is one of the toughest in the league .
James_Harden did all he could for Houston , totaling 35 points , 4 rebounds and 6 assists .
Clint_Capela recorded a double - double , amassing 19 points and 12 rebounds .
Lou_Williams and Montrezl_Harrell each scored 12 points off the bench .
The Detroit_Pistons ( 21 - 32 ) routed the Charlotte_Hornets ( 22 - 30 ) 106 - 78 on Tuesday at the Time Warner Cable Arena .
In a game between 2 teams fighting for one of the last playoff spots in the East , Detroit dominated the third quarter to give the Pistons a decisive advantage .
The Pistons entered the game ranked 21st in the league in scoring , but that was n't evident as they were able to top 100 points for the fifth time in 6 games .
Detroit did n't only have an excellent offensive showing , it also played suffocating defense , holding Charlotte under 80 points .
With Tuesday 's victory , Detroit has now won 4 of its last 6 games .
The Pistons got another big game from Greg_Monroe , who finished with 23 points and 12 rebounds for another double - double .
On the bright side , P.J Hairston had a career - high 16 points in 26 minutes on the floor .
The Jazz posted respective success rates of 48 percent from the floor and 45 percent from behind the arc , and the Thunder shot 50 percent overall .
Utah was outrebounded , 43 - 36 , with Rudy_Gobert ( knee ) out .
Dante_Exum 's 22 points led the way and Alec_Burks followed with 21 .
Trey_Lyles posted 10 points .
George_Hill and Gordon_Hayward turned in matching 9 - point efforts .
Rodney_Hood , Joe_Johnson and Jeff_Withey combined for 11 .
Victor_Oladipo contributed 22 points and Taj_Gibson had 15 .
Steven_Adams produced a near double - double of 11 points and 9 rebounds .
Enes_Kanter 's 16 points led the bench .
The Golden_State_Warriors ( 3 - 2 ) defeated the Cleveland_Cavaliers ( 2 - 3 ) , 104 - 91 , on Sunday at the Oracle Arena to win Game 5 of the NBA Finals .
Curry 's stat line of 37 points on 56 percent shooting , including 7 - for - 13 from three point range , and 7 rebounds does n't fully do his performance justice .
The timeliness and degree of difficulty with which Curry buried his shots changed Game 5 and swung the momentum in Golden_State 's favor .
When LeBron_James gave Cleveland a lead midway through the fourth quarter on a 34 - foot three pointer , Golden_State needed an immediate answer with the game hanging in the balance .
Curry delivered , canning a deep three pointer of his own the next time down the floor to reclaim the lead .
The Cavaliers now face elimination and will look to extend the series with a win in Game 6 on Tuesday at the Quicken Loans Arena .
History is on Golden_State 's side after Sunday 's win , however , as the winner of Game 5 when the series is tied 2 - 2 in the Finals have gone on to win the series 71 percent of the time .
Cleveland attempted to match Golden_State 's undersized lineup with a small lineup of its own , but could n't sustain that style of play for the full 48 minutes .
Coach David Blatt played center Timofey_Mozgov just 9 minutes on Sunday after Mozgov went for 28 points and 10 rebounds in Game 4 .
James finished with 40 points , 14 rebounds , and 11 assists over 45 minutes of action .
J.R Smith got off to a hot start with 14 points in the first half , but went scoreless in the final 2 quarters .
Those contributions helped Golden_State win the rebounding battle and also hold Cleveland to just 40 % shooting as a team .
The Warriors are now poised to win their first championship in 40 years and will have home court advantage for the decisive Game 7 if necessary .
The Detroit_Pistons ( 21 - 16 ) defeated the Brooklyn_Nets ( 10 - 26 ) 103 - 89 on Saturday .
The game featured a showdown between 2 of the more offensive - minded centers in the NBA , Brook_Lopez and Andre_Drummond .
When all was said and done , the Detroit tandem was able to claim victory , as the Pistons outscored the Nets 60 - 48 in the paint , and outrebounded the visitors 47 - 38 as well .
Lopez managed 19 points , 7 rebounds , 1 assist and 3 blocks to lead the Nets 's offensive charge .
Joe_Johnson followed with another double - digit scoring performance , pitching in 14 points , 4 rebounds and 4 assists .
Young was just 1 rebound shy of a double - double with 12 points , 9 boards and 1 steal .
Shane_Larkin was a bit lackluster again in another start at point guard , contributing 8 points , 3 assists and 1 rebound .
He was outperformed by backup Donald_Sloan , who managed a double - double off the bench with 15 points , 10 rebounds and 2 rebounds over 24 minutes , and might be making progress towards securing the top job .
Brooklyn fell to 10 - 26 and remains in fourth place in the Eastern Conference 's Atlantic Division .
The Pistons were co - led in scoring by Drummond and Reggie_Jackson , who each managed 23 points .
Ilyasova turned in one of his most impressive performances to date in a Detroit uniform , posting 19 points , hauling in 13 boards , and adding 1 assist , 1 steal and 1 block .
Rookie Stanley_Johnson posted a modest 8 points , 4 rebounds , 1 assist , a pair of steals and 1 block in a start in Marcus_Morris 's ( knee ) stead .
Anthony_Tolliver led the reserves with a 10 - point , 3 - rebound effort that also included a pair of assists , 1 steal and 1 block .
Detroit improved to 21 - 16 but remains in fourth place in the Eastern Conference 's Central Division .
The Washington_Wizards defeated the Minnesota_Timberwolves , 112 - 105 , at Verizon Center on Friday .
The Wizards ( 17 - 18 ) came in to the contest with a superb 13 - 6 home mark , while the Timberwolves ( 11 - 25 ) had only mustered 5 wins in 17 tries on the road .
A 32 - 20 edge in the fourth quarter propelled the Wizards to victory , after they 'd entered the period facing an 85 - 82 deficit .
Karl-Anthony_Towns was a distant second on the Timberwolves with an 18 - point , 10 - rebound double - double that also included 5 assists , 1 steal and 1 block .
Gorgui_Dieng also accomplished the feat , posting 15 points , 11 rebounds , 2 assists and 2 steals .
Zach_LaVine endured a difficult shooting night as his 3 - for - 14 tally led to an 8 - point effort .
Brandon_Rush paced the bench with 10 points .
Bradley_Beal led the way for the Wizards with 22 points , 3 assists and 2 rebounds .
Marcin_Gortat turned in a customary stat line of 19 points , 10 boards , 1 assist and 3 blocks .
John_Wall turned in a 18 - point , 18 - assist double - double that also included 2 rebounds and 2 steals .
Otto_Porter supplied 17 points , 6 boards , 2 assists , 2 blocks and 1 steal .
Markieff_Morris rounded out matters for the starting 5 with 15 points , 6 rebounds and 1 assist .
Jason_Smith had a productive night off the bench , totaling 10 points , 3 rebounds , 2 assists and a pair of blocks , one of those a highlight - worthy stuff of Karl-Anthony_Towns .
The Milwaukee_Bucks ( 24 - 33 ) defeated the visiting Los_Angeles_Lakers ( 11 - 47 ) 108 - 101 , Monday night at BMO Harris Bradley Center .
Milwaukee led the whole way en route to their fourth win in 5 games .
The Bucks came in averaging 110 points per game in their last 3 wins and almost reached that number again , which is surprising considering their offense was ranked bottom - 5 in the league for much of the season before the All-Star break .
The Bucks have now won 2 in a row and improve to 16 - 9 at home .
Antetokounmpo also blocked 4 shots and nabbed 3 steals , in 41 minutes .
The Bucks shot 51 percent from the field thanks largely to their excellent job moving the ball , which resulted in 32 assists on 44 made field goals .
The Lakers struggled to formulate any consistent offense as only 36 percent of their shots were successful .
Nick_Young tallied a team - high 19 points ( 5 - 12 FG , 3 - 8 3Pt , 6 - 8 FT ) , along with 3 rebounds , in 23 minutes off the bench .
Jordan_Clarkson scored 15 points , along with 3 assists , 3 rebounds and 2 steals , in 24 minutes .
The Lakers gave up a sloppy 17 turnovers , leading to 20 points for the opponent .
In the first of 4 games in their season series , the Toronto_Raptors ( 30 ) remained undefeated against the Milwaukee_Bucks ( 0 - 3 ) at home .
The Raptors , rallying around a well - rounded performance from All-Star point guard Kyle_Lowry in which he posted 15 points , 7 assists , and 4 steals , were able to maintain a steady lead on the visting Bucks throughout the game .
Toronto thrived on the defensive end , forcing their opponents to turn the ball over 18 times and holding them to just 26 percent shooting from beyond the three - point line .
The Raptors , despite being a bottom - 10 defense in 2014 - 15 , have allowed an average of just 96 points to opponents in their first 3 games .
Third-year forward Giannis Antetenkoumpo posted his second 20 - point performance in as many games , while also recording 9 rebounds and 1 block .
Offseason addition Greg_Monroe also impressed , putting up 14 points , 6 rebounds , 5 assists , and missing only 2 shots .
However , as a team , Milwaukee struggled mightily from beyond the arc and had overall issues with efficiency , shooting just 42 percent from the field .
The Bucks will hope to snap a 3 - game losing streak as they travel to Brooklyn on Monday to face the Nets .

New_York was neverthless ready to give the Grizzlies a battle , and saw 2 previously slumping players step to the forefront in the effort .
Despite the valiant effort , New_York was unable to muster enough offense in Anthony 's absence to keep up with Memphis , as they shot 38 percent from the field overall .
Memphis 's top 2 scorers came from the second unit .

The Toronto_Raptors ( 3 - 1 ) defeated the Oklahoma_City_Thunder ( 1 - 4 ) 100 - 88 on Tuesday at the Air Canada Centre in Toronto .
The Thunder turned the ball over 21 times compared to only 10 from the Raptors .
They were also outscored 27 - 18 in the fourth quarter , which allowed the Raptors to secure the 12 - point victory .

The Boston_Celtics ( 36 - 25 ) earned a home win Monday at TD Garden over the Utah_Jazz ( 28 - 31 ) , 100 - 95 .
The Jazz opened up a double - digit lead early in the second quarter and threatened to pull away , but the Celtics trimmed the lead to 3 by halftime .
Jae_Crowder finished with a game - high 22 points for the Celtics on an ultra - efficient shooting night ( 7 - 12 FG , 3 - 5 3PT , 5 - 7 FT ) .
Avery_Bradley ( 7 - 13 FG ) and Isaiah_Thomas ( 8 - 19 FG ) added 18 points apiece , and Thomas finished with a game - high 9 assists .
The Celtics did n't have their deep shots working ( 6 - 18 , 33 percent from 3 ) but their passing was crisp , as they recorded 27 assists against just 9 turnovers .
The Jazz got a pair of double - doubles from starting big men Rudy_Gobert ( 12 points , 12 rebounds ) and Derrick_Favors ( 11 points , 16 rebounds ) .
Shelvin_Mack scored 18 points ( 8 - 13 FG , 2 - 3 3PT ) , tied for the team lead with Trey_Lyles ( 8 - 18 FG ) , who also grabbed 10 rebounds in just 23 minutes off the bench .
The Jazz shot a putrid 38 - 101 ( 38 percent ) and just 7 - 24 ( 29 percent ) from deep .
They just could n't get their shots off against Boston 's deep front line , which recorded a mammoth 13 blocks on 77 2 - point attempts ( 17 percent ) .

The Utah_Jazz ( 36 - 37 ) defeated the host Minnesota_Timberwolves ( 24 - 49 ) 93 - 84 , Saturday evening at Target Center .
Their opponent , the Timberwolves , despite their record , have been a formidable foe over their last 7 games , winning won 4 - of - 7 , as well as their last 2 in a row .
Minnesota started out terribly slow , with a 10 - point first quarter , but managed to cut the deficit to 1 by half time .
Utah used a 90 run , culminating at the 8:30 mark in the fourth quarter , in order to create some separation , which they were then able to maintain until the final buzzer .
The Jazz used a balanced team effort to emerge victorious , as 4 players scored 15 or more points , while the team played solid defense and rebounded well .
Gordon_Hayward was solid , with 18 points , 5 rebounds , 5 assists and 2 blocked shots , in 39 minutes , while Derrick_Favors added 19 points , 5 rebounds , 2 assists and 2 blocks , in 34 minutes .
Rodney_Hood finished with 15 points , 4 rebounds and 4 assists , in 33 minutes .
The Jazz shot 47 percent from the field and 43 percent from long range , en route to their 14th victory on the road .
The Timberwolves were not able to win their third straight , but still managed to put up a good fight , as they shot 38 percent from the field , 36 percent from deep and hit 16 - of - 19 free throws .
Ricky_Rubio led the Timberwolves in points , assists and steals , as he finished with 23 points , 6 assists , 5 rebounds , 4 steals and 1 blocked shot , in 30 minutes .
Karl-Anthony_Towns chipped in 14 points and 11 rebounds , while Andrew_Wiggins added 13 points , 4 rebounds and 2 assists .
No other Timberwolves players scored in double digits , as the rest of the team accounted for only 34 points .
The Jazz have an opportunity to grab another win and get closer to securing a spot in the top 8 , when they host the Lakers on Monday .

Batum has settled nicely into a prominent role in his first year in Charlotte , averaging 17 points and 6 rebounds per game on the season , The Bulls , meanwhile , saw a disappointing loss in what has been an otherwise strong season thus far .

The Rockets ( 53 - 24 ) took down the Thunder ( 42 - 35 ) 115 - 112 at the Chesapeake Energy Arena on Sunday .
Houston 's James_Harden put up 41 points ( 12 - 22 FG , 6 - 9 3Pt , 11 - 13 FT ) , to go with 6 rebounds , 6 assists and 3 steals in 38 minutes .

They tied the game 100 - 100 on a Westbrook three - pointer with 3:12 on the clock .
Harden responded by scoring the Rockets 's next 8 points , bringing the score to 108 - 101 .
Westbrook continued to hit shots from beyond the arc to keep his team in the game , but was unable to sink a 3 that would 've tied the game as time expired .

The Los_Angeles_Clippers ( 37 - 19 ) defeated the Phoenix_Suns ( 14 - 43 ) 124 - 84 at Staples Center on Monday .
The Clippers were able to exploit the Suns defensive breakdowns which eventually led to a 40 points blowout win .
Los_Angeles burst out the gate and opened up a 19 point lead by the end of the first quarter .
Phoenix was held under 20 points in both the first third quarters , as every matchup was a mismatch .
The Suns shot 35 percent as a whole , and were led in scoring by Archie_Goodwin , who came off the bench .
Goodwin 's 20 points in 37 minutes were far from enough to soften the deficit .
Ronnie_Price totaled 12 points , 5 rebounds and 3 assists , while Devin_Booker pitched in a lowly 5 points to round out the backcourt .
Alex_Len started at the center position and added 14 points and 8 rebounds , but simply got abused by DeAndre_Jordan throughout the matchup .
The Clippers strolled to victory behind Chris_Paul and his 16 points and 14 assists .
Paul almost out assisted the entirety of the Suns ( 20 - 14 ) , as he showcased supreme ball movement and spacing .
JJ Reddick was on the receiving end of many of Paul 's dimes , and he turned the easy looks into 22 points on 7 - of - 14 shooting , including 4 baskets from behind the arc .
DeAndre_Jordan dominated the paint and added 17 points and 11 rebounds , while Paul_Pierce pitched in 11 points in his starting role .
None of the Clippers starters needed more than 27 minutes of game time , as the bench was able to hold the strong lead .
Newcomer Jeff_Green contributed 18 points , 5 rebounds and 2 assists on 6 - of - 10 shooting in 24 minutes off the bench , as he highlighted his ability to create off the dribble .
The Clippers will continue their homestand and host the Denver_Nuggets ( 22 - 34 ) on Wednesday , while the Suns host the Brooklyn_Nets ( 15 - 41 ) on Thursday .

The Indiana_Pacers used a big second - half comeback to defeat the host Sacramento_Kings , 106 - 100 , on Wednesday at Golden 1 Center .
The Pacers ( 22 - 19 ) , who trailed by as many as 22 in the first half , were down 60 - 41 at halftime before rallying behind Paul_George and Jeff_Teague to outscore the Kings , 65 - 40 , in the second half .
George finished with 24 points on 8 - of - 15 shooting while Teague totaled 22 points , 11 assists and 7 rebounds .
Teague , who was 11 of 11 from the free - throw line , hit 2 foul shots with 1:55 to play to give Indiana a 99 - 98 lead that it would not relinquish .

Bazemore , who many coming into the season considered a downgrade from last year 's starter Demmare Carrol , has made a name for himself in the first 8 games , helping to contribute to the Hawk 's league - best 7 wins thus far .

Atlanta has been the only team to effectively keep Beal in check , as prior to Saturday the fourth - year guard had not scored fewer than 24 points in any game this season .

The Oklahoma_City_Thunder defeated the New_York_Knicks 112 - 103 Monday at Madison Square Garden .
The Thunder ( 10 - 8 ) managed to hand the Knicks ( 8 - 8 ) just their second loss at home this season behind the play of , as always , Russell_Westbrook .
With 27 points , 18 rebounds and 14 assists , Westbrook notched his third straight triple - double and his eighth of the season .
It was n't a 1 - man show , however , as Enes_Kanter came off the bench to notch a double - double of 27 points and 10 rebounds in just 28 minutes .
Starting center Steven_Adams also managed to notch a double - double of his own , posting 14 points and 10 boards .
As a team , Oklahoma put together one of their better shooting nights of the season , shooting 51 percent overall from the field .
The same could not be said for New_York , however , as the Knicks failed to shoot over 40 percent from the field as a team .
Despite that , Derrick_Rose managed to put together his best performance of the season , scoring a game - high 30 points on 10 - of - 20 shooting on top of 7 rebounds and 4 assists .
Kristaps_Porzingis added 21 points of his own , while Carmelo_Anthony struggled mightily , shooting just 4 - of - 19 from the field en route to 18 points in 34 minutes .
Ultimately , while the New_York starters played solid , they got little - to - no help from their bench , as the 6 reserves combined to score just 19 points .
The Charlotte_Hornets ( 38 - 29 ) defeated the Orlando_Magic ( 29 - 38 ) on Wednesday , 107 - 99 .
The Hornets have now won 8 of their last 9 games , quickly rising up the Eastern Conference standings .
A large part of Charlotte 's push has been due to the play of point guard Kemba_Walker , who is averaging 26 points and 7 assists over the team 's last 10 contests .
Walker made another big contribution on Wednesday , scoring 16 and pulling down a surprising 8 rebounds .
He was upstaged , however , by forwards Marvin_Williams and Nic Batum , who posted 26 points apiece .
Batum also facilitated the offense nicely , dishing out a team - high 9 assists .
For the Magic , meanwhile , any playoff hopes are beginning to slip away , as the team now sits 9 games below .500 .
Guard Victor_Oladipo scored 25 points in one of his stronger outings of the season .
The scoring was needed , however , as the frontcourt combo of Aaron_Gordon and Dewayne_Dedmon combined for just 1 point on the night .

The surprising victory may have well have been one of the best road victories for the Nuggets ( 27 - 33 ) this season , considering the environment and quality of opponent .
Denver accomplished the rather improbable feat with a stellar offensive effort that saw 7 players post double - digit scoring and the team collectively shoot an outstanding 56 percent from the floor and 43 percent from three - point range .
Chicago 's cause was significantly undermined by an atypically poor shooting night from Jimmy_Butler , who posted only 8 points on a 3 - of - 13 tally from the floor .

Anthony_Morrow drew the start as well , and added 19 points and 3 assists .
Portland , who has surprised many this season after eclipsing their expected win total by 10 wins at this point in the season , rallied behind C.J .
The back court duo of McCollum and Lillard is dangerous to deal with at all points , but it was Lehigh shooting guard who turned in the bulk of the Blazers offense , as he finished with 26 points , 3 rebounds and 3 assists .
Lillard struggled to find his stroke from the field and scored just 11 points on 13 shots , but he added 9 assists and kept the ball movement in tact .
Aminu has been a bright spot for Portland in the second half of the season , and contributed another strong performance with 27 points , 6 rebounds , 5 assists , 3 steals and 1 blocked shot in 37 minutes of action .
Both teams play on Saturday , as the Blazers host the Minnesota_Timberwolves ( 26 - 52 ) , while the Thunder head south to take on the Sacramento_Kings ( 31 - 47 ) .
T.J._McConnell 's 12 - foot basket at the buzzer sealed the home win for the Sixers .
Joel_Embiid 's 21 - point , 14 - rebound double - double led Philadelphia .
Ersan_Ilyasova supplied 16 points , while Robert_Covington and Nerlens_Noel turned in matching 13 - point efforts .
Gerald_Henderson was productive in a reserve role with 12 points .
McConnell compiled a modest but full stat line of 8 points , 7 assists , 6 rebounds and 2 steals .
Carmelo_Anthony 's 28 points paced the Knicks and Derrick_Rose , fresh off an infamous 1 - game absence , was right behind with 25 points .
The remainder of the starting 5 , Courtney_Lee , Porzingis and Joakim_Noah , underwhelmed , as they were only able to produce a trio of 7 - point efforts Wednesday .
Kyle_O'Quinn led the bench with a 10 - point , 15 - rebound double - double that also included 3 assists , 2 steals and 2 blocks .
The Dallas_Mavericks evened their Western Conference first - round playoff series against the host Oklahoma_City_Thunder on Monday with an 85 - 84 win in Game 2 at Chesapeake Arena .
Raymond_Felton stepped in for the injured J.J._Barea ( groin ) and was fantastic , as he scored a game - high 21 points ( 8 - 16 FG ) for the Mavericks and pulled down 11 rebounds .
Dirk_Nowitzki added 17 points and Salah_Mejri added a key 12 points ( 5 - 7 FG ) off the bench .
Durant matched Felton 's 21 points but shot a brutal 7 - 33 from the field and committed 7 turnovers .
Westbrook scored 19 , added 14 rebounds and dished 6 assists but shot just 8 - 22 from the floor and 1 - 6 from three - point range .
Serge_Ibaka was the only other Thunder player to reach double figures with 12 points ( 4 - 7 FG , 2 - 4 3PT , 2 - 2 FG ) .
The Thunder 's lack of offensive options beyond Durant and Westbrook loomed large , as Oklahoma_City 's offense went completely cold - - the Thunder shot 34 percent from the field and commmitted more turnovers ( 15 ) than they recorded assists ( 11 ) .
The series moves to Dallas for Game 3 , scheduled for Thursday night at 7:0 PM Eastern Time .
The Brooklyn_Nets ( 3 - 11 ) defeated the Boston_Celtics ( 7 - 6 ) 111 - 101 on Sunday .
The Celtics learned before the game that they will be without guard Marcus_Smart for up to 2 weeks due to a lower leg injury he suffered in their Friday victory over this same Nets squad .
Smart 's absence opens up a starting spot for Avery_Bradley , who continued his outstanding play Sunday with a 27 - point , 4 - rebound effort that also included 1 assist , 1 block and a pair of steals .
Bradley had averaged 18 points per game over the previous 4 outings , all in which he came off the bench .
The 24 - year - old also drained a season - high 7 three - pointers on 50 percent shooting overall from beyond the arc , leading a furious second - half comeback by the Celtics that ultimately fell short .
Boston also received a matching 27 - point effort from Isaiah_Thomas , which equaled his season high .
However , the rest of the Celtics starters could only muster relatively meager contributions , a pivotal factor in the 59 - 42 deficit they faced at halftime .
Starting forwards Amir_Johnson and Jae_Crowder only totaled 7 points between them , while Jared_Sullinger contributed 9 points , 10 rebounds , and 3 assists .
Evan_Turner paced the Boston bench with 13 points , his second consecutive outing with double - digit scoring .
The Celtics fell to 7 - 6 and currently reside in third place in the Eastern Conference 's Atlantic Division .
The Nets avenged the 120 - 95 drubbing by the Celtics on Friday with the help of solid production from their starting 5 .
Lopez tallied 23 points , 10 rebounds , and 1 steal for his sixth double - double in November .
Jarret Jack was outstanding with 22 points of his own on a season - best 64 percent shooting , and added 4 rebounds , 4 assists , and 1 steal over 33 minutes .
Thad Young posted his fourth double - double in 5 contests ( 11 points , 12 rebounds ) , while the ageless Joe_Johnson pitched in with a 17 - point effort , his second - highest scoring total of the season .
Brooklyn improved to 3 - 11 and remain in fourth place in the Eastern Conference 's Atlantic Division .
The Los_Angeles_Clippers defeated the New_Orleans_Pelicans 133 - 105 at Staples Center on Saturday .
The Pelicans ( 7 - 17 ) were without Anthony_Davis ( rest ) , Jrue_Holiday ( toe ) and E'Twaun_Moore ( toe ) , making the game very 1 sided from the gate .
The New_Orleans reserves played physical basketball and found scoring lanes in the first half , falling just 6 points short of the Clippers ( 17 - 7 ) at the end of the second quarter .
The second half was a different story , as Los_Angeles outscored the Pelicans by 12 points in the third quarter and 10 points in the fourth quarter .
Chris_Paul dropped one of the biggest double - doubles of the season , racking up 20 points and 20 assists , with 18 of those assists coming in the first 3 quarters of action .
Paul added 5 rebounds and 3 steals on 8 - of - 16 shooting in 30 minutes of action , which was even more helpful given Blake_Griffin 's ( knee ) absence .
DeAndre_Jordan worked the pick and roll with Paul to perfection , and with no Anthony_Davis clogging the lane on the other end , Jordan found his way to 19 points and 9 rebounds rather easily .
Jamal_Crawford and Marreese_Speights added scoring help from the bench , as they finished with 22 points and 17 points , respectively .
Tim_Frazier led the Pelicans on the other end , scoring 20 points and adding 11 assists on 6 - of - 13 shooting .
Buddy_Hield drew 36 minutes and contributed 15 points on 2 - of - 5 shooting from behind the arc .
The Dallas_Mavericks ( 35 - 18 ) pulled off a huge comeback to defeat the Portland Trail_Blazers ( 34 - 17 ) 111 - 101 Saturday at the American Airlines Center .
Portland held a 16 - point lead early in the fourth , but Dallas took advantage of the Trail_Blazers 's second unit and began to chip away at the deficit .
The Trail_Blazers could n't close out the Mavericks despite having plenty of chances to do so as they were doubled up in the fourth 26 - 13 .
Dirk_Nowitzki canned an open 3 to tie it up with 20 seconds remaining in the fourth .
Chandler_Parsons was a huge difference maker in overtime , scoring 10 points and also securing a key offensive rebound that he then kicked out to Monta_Ellis for a three - pointer .
Dallas ended the game on a 28 - 7 run .
The Trail_Blazers appeared to be well on their way to a third straight win to help minimize the impact of their 3 - 8 stretch to end January , but let a huge lead slip away en route to their first overtime loss of the season .
Chris_Kaman returned to the rotation after sitting out Thursday , but only contributed 4 points and 5 rebounds in 16 minutes .
Dallas 's comeback victory puts the Mavericks 1 game ahead of the Trail_Blazers in the win column .
Devin_Harris and J.J Barea provided solid production at the point guard spot in Rajon_Rondo 's absence , combining for 23 points , 13 rebounds , and 9 assists .
Dallas remains undefeated in overtime games this season with a 50 record .

The Pelicans led 86 - 84 with 7 minutes remaining in the fourth quarter but the Grizzlies turned it up at that point , out - scoring the Pelicans 24 - 11 the rest of the way .
Vince_Carter was a big part of that late surge by Memphis as he exploded for 11 of his 13 points in the final 5 minutes .
With this win the Grizzlies are 8 - 1 in their last 9 games and have won 4 straight , while the Pelicans finished their 7 - game home stand with a 5 - 2 record .
The Grizzlies 's bench contributed 48 points to the winning cause .
Jeff_Green led the team in scoring , with 24 points ( 8 - 13 FG , 3 - 4 3Pt , 5 - 5 FT ) , along with 7 rebounds , in 33 minutes off the bench .

Mike_Conley also notched a double - double , with 17 points ( 5 - 7 FG , 1 - 2 3Pt , 6 - 6 FT ) and 10 assists , along with 4 rebounds , in 28 minutes .
The Grizzlies shot 60 percent from the field and 56 percent from long range , including 5 - 6 from deep in the fourth quarter to run away with this one .

Anthony_Davis tallied 23 points ( 10 - 20 FG , 1 - 2 3Pt , 2 - 3 FT ) in 37 minutes as well .
No 1 else scored in double digits for the Pelicans as they saw their win streak stopped short at 2 games .
The Chicago_Bulls ( 4 - 2 ) routed the Milwaukee Bulls ( 2 - 4 ) , 120 - 66 , Thursday at the BMO Harris Bradley Center in Game 6 of their series to advance to the Eastern Conference Semifinals .
The Bulls got off to a big lead and never looked back , taking a 65 - 33 lead into halftime .
Chicago now advances to the next round of the postseason with momentum on its side and will face a Cavaliers team that is missing J.R Smith for 2 games and Kevin_Love .
Milwaukee battled hard to stave off elimination on its home court in Game 4 , but simply did n't have the fire power to force a Game 7 on Thursday .
The Bucks shot 33 % from the field for the entire game and only managed 20 points in the paint .
Their leading scorer was center Zaza_Pachulia , who posted 8 points in 18 minutes on the floor .
Despite Thursday 's tough loss , the Bucks possess a talented young nucleus and are positioned to compete again in the 2015 - 16 season .

The San_Antonio_Spurs ( 3 - 2 ) defeated the Los_Angeles_Clippers ( 2 - 3 ) 111 - 107 on Tuesday at the Staples Center in Los_Angeles .
In a game 5 thriller , the veteran Spurs were able to pull off the victory and steal home court advantage as they head back to San_Antonio .
The Clippers were on the brink of taking the lead with just under 4 seconds left in the game , but a DeAndre_Jordan tip - in was called off and ruled as goaltending .
The Spurs finished this game shooting 44 percent from the field and 48 percent from the three - point line , while the Clippers went 47 percent from the floor and an awful 7 percent from deep .
The Spurs 's bench also out - scored the Clippers 's bench 48 - 17 .
Duncan finished with a team - high of 21 points ( 8 - 13 FG , 5 - 6 FT ) , to go along with 11 rebounds and 3 steals .
He constantly made big plays both offensively and defensively and even went as far as blocking Griffin 2 straight times during 1 point in the fourth quarter .
Duncan continues to show no signs of slowing down this postseason , averaging 17 points and 11 rebounds while recording 4 double - doubles .
Kawhi_Leonard played a big factor in the win as well though as he recorded 18 points ( 5 - 16 FG , 0 - 3 3Pt , 8 - 10 FT ) and 9 rebounds over 36 minutes .
Keeping the Clippers close in this game was Blake_Griffin , who finished with a game - high of 30 points ( 10 - 25 FG , 0 - 1 3Pt , 10 - 14 FT ) , while also adding 14 rebounds , 7 assists and 4 steals .
Griffin scored 21 of those points in the first half and he seemed to struggle during the fourth quarter , but he was still huge for this team as he did a little bit of everything despite the loss .
Paul went 7 - for - 14 from the field but missed both of his three - point attempts to score 19 points , to go along with 10 assists over 41 minutes .
Continuing his domination of the boards , DeAndre_Jordan posted 21 points ( 7 - 9 FG , 7 - 16 FT ) , 14 rebounds and 2 blocked shots .
It really payed off for them as Jordan made just 7 - of - 16 free throw attempts .
The Clippers shot just 1 - for - 14 from the three - point line , which will always make it very tough to win .
These 2 teams will take the court again on Thursday in San_Antonio for game 6 .

The Golden_State_Warriors ( 38 - 4 ) routed the Cleveland_Cavaliers ( 28 - 11 ) Wednesday night at Quicken Loans Arena , 132 - 98 .
Golden_State dominated from the opening tip , as they jumped out to a 12 - 2 lead in the game 's first 3 minutes and enjoyed leads of 34 - 21 after the first quarter and 70 - 44 at halftime .
The Warriors just could not be stopped offensively , as they shout a brilliant 54 percent from the floor , including an absurd 19 - 40 ( 48 percent ) from 3 .
Steph Curry paced all scorers with 35 points and added 7 three - pointers to increase his league - leading total to 193 for the season .
Andre_Iguodala came off the bench to pitch in 20 on an ultraefficient 7 - 8 shooting , and Draymond_Green notched 16 points and 10 assists and finished just 3 rebounds away from a triple - double .
LeBron_James led the Cavaliers with just 16 points on a lukewarm 7 - 16 shooting night , and he added 5 assists and 5 rebounds for one of his quieter games this season .
J.R. Smith chipped in 14 on 6 - 9 shooting , and Matthew_Dellavedova led Cavaliers reserves with 11 points and 6 assists .
It was a mediocre shooting night for Cleveland ( 48 percent from the floor , 37 percent from 3 ) , nowhere near enough to keep pace with Golden_State 's perpetual motion machine of an offense .

The Chicago_Bulls ( 20 ) defeated the Milwaukee_Bucks ( 0 - 2 ) 91 - 82 on Monday at the United center in Chicago in game 2 of their first round matchup of the Eastern Conference playoffs .
In a chippy game featuring 7 technical fouls and an ejection ( Zaza_Pachulia ) , the Bulls were able to have a big fourth quarter to pull out the 9 - point win and grab a 2 - game lead in the series .
The Bucks had a strong defensive effort in the first half , forcing the Bulls into 11 turnovers before the break , but they were unable to get anything going offensively and the Bulls took a 1 - point lead into the half .
It was the fourth quarter where the Bulls took the advantage though , as they went on a 130 run with 6 minutes left in the game to put them up 10 fueled by Jimmy_Butler , who was nearly unstoppable in this outing .
Including that huge final quarter , Butler finished with a game - high of 31 points ( 10 - 19 FG , 3 - 9 3Pt , 8 - 14 FT ) , while adding 9 rebounds and 2 assists over 46 minutes .
Derrick_Rose struggled mightily in the first half , going scoreless on 0 - for - 7 shooting from the field .
Helping to give the Bulls an impressive 64 - 48 rebounding advantage was the duo of Pau_Gasol and Joakim_Noah , who combined to record 35 of the team 's 64 rebounds .
Gasol finished with 11 points ( 4 - 12 FG , 0 - 1 3Pt , 3 - 6 FT ) , 16 rebounds and 4 blocked shots , while Noah added 6 points ( 3 - 9 FG ) , 19 rebounds and 5 assists .
Middleton had 18 points in game 1 on Saturday as well , but he just has n't gotten enough scoring help to stay even with the Bulls .
The only other Buck in double - digit points was Michael_Carter-Williams , who posted 12 points ( 5 - 12 FG , 0 - 1 3Pt , 2 - 3 FT ) , 5 rebounds and 2 assists .
Antetokounmpo added 11 rebounds , 4 assists and 2 blocked shots , but it just was n't enough in the end .
Despite forcing the Bulls into 15 total turnovers , while committing just 4 of their own , the Bucks just could n't establish enough of an offensive presence to keep up in the end .
These 2 teams will now head to Milwaukee for game 3 of the series on Thursday .
No Milwaukee player managed above 11 points as the Bucks ( 5 - 8 ) were pulverized by the Indiana_Pacers ( 8 - 5 ) at Bankers Life Fieldhouse .
The Pacers have now won 5 or their last 6 , due in large part to the extremely high - caliber play of star small forward Paul_George .
Despite having an off shooting night ( just 6 - for - 17 ) , George contributed positively to the Indiana effort , tallying 7 rebounds and 7 assists whle playing outstanding perimeter defense .
Indiana on the whole shot the lights out , hitting 52 percent of their shots from the field and 50 percent of their three - point attempts .
Indiana 's team defense also looked beautiful , as the Bucks were held to just 29 percent from beyond the arc and committed 23 turnovers .
20 - year - old small forward Giannis `` The Greek Freak '' Antetenkoumpo had a rare inefficient night from the field , tallying just 9 points on 3 - for - 8 shooting .
Point guard Michael_Carter-Williams also struggled , posting just 3 assists while turning the ball over 3 times .

The Sacramento_Kings defeated the Cleveland_Cavaliers in overtime , 116 - 112 , at Quicken Loans Arena on Wednesday .
The Kings ( 18 - 27 ) may have initially looked like easy prey , considering their losing record and the fact that they 'd recently lost their second - best playmaker , Rudy_Gay , for the season with an Achilles injury .
However , the old adage of `` that 's why they play the games '' rang particularly true Wednesday , as Sacramento forced the Cavs into an uncharacteristic 18 turnovers and made the shots when it counted most to emerge as surprising victors .
DeMarcus_Cousins naturally played a pivotal role , posting a near triple - double with a game - high 28 points , 11 rebounds , 9 assists , 3 steals and 1 block .
He made a driving layup with 3 seconds remaining in regulation to send the game into overtime , and then made another in the extra period to help the Kings come back from a 111 - 106 deficit with 2:30 remaining .

Ultimately , the Hornets saw Lin score 15 of his 29 points in the fourth quarter , and they withstood 2 three - point attempts from Patty_Mills and Danny_Green at the end of regulation to hold on for the victory .
The Spurs were led by Tony_Parker 's 19 points , which he complemented with 7 assists , 5 rebounds , 1 steal and 2 blocks .
LaMarcus_Aldridge was right behind with 18 points , 12 rebounds , 5 assists and 1 block .
Tim_Duncan was excellent in his return to the starting lineup , posting a 16 - point , 10 - rebound double - double that also included 2 assists , 2 steals and 4 blocks .
Kawhi_Leonard pitched in with 15 points , 6 rebounds and 2 steals .
Lin added 7 rebounds , 2 assists and 1 steal to his game - high scoring total , which included 4 three - pointers .
Lee was next with 17 points , 2 assists , 2 rebounds and 4 steals .
Batum registered 15 points , 6 rebounds , 3 assists , 1 steal and 1 block .
Cody_Zeller could only contribute a modest 6 points , but did haul in 14 boards and dished out 3 assists .
The Washington_Wizards ( 12 - 14 ) defeated the Sacramento_Kings ( 11 - 17 ) 113 - 99 on Monday .
Marcin_Gortat exploded for a 27 - point , 16 - rebound double - double in which he made a season - high 19 shot attempts .
Rajon_Rondo struggled through a 1 for 7 shooting performance that netted a season - low 2 points , and could only contribute 9 assists and 1 steal otherwise .
Quality reserves Marco Bellinelli and Darren_Collison led the Kings 's bench with 15 - and - 13 point outings , respectively .
Sacramento could only muster 41 percent shooting from the field , and a 32 percent figure from beyond the arc .
The Kings fell to 11 - 17 and remain in fourth place in the Western Conference 's Pacific Division .
Wall supplemented Gortat 's breakout night with a career - high 19 assists , and added 12 points , a pair of rebounds and 4 steals .
Temple also provided outstanding offensive support , managing his second straight 20 - point performance with a 23 - point , 5 - rebound , 3 - assist tally over a robust 42 minutes .
Jared_Dudley was the fourth Washington starter in double digits with 13 points , while Ramon_Sessions and Kris_Humphries paced the Wizards bench with a pair of 15 - point efforts .
Washington improved to 12 - 14 but remains in last place in the Eastern Conference 's Southeast Division .
The Oklahoma city Thunder ( 19 - 9 ) defeated the host Los_Angeles_Clippers ( 16 - 13 ) 100 - 99 at Staples Center on Monday thanks to 2 clutch plays by Kevin_Durant in the waning seconds .
Durant hit a 19 - footer with 6 seconds remaining to give the Thunder the lead , then blocked a game - winning attempt by Chris_Paul at the buzzer to seal the victory .
Paul , who totaled 32 points and 10 assists , gave the Clippers a 99 - 98 lead with 10 seconds left on a driving layup , but he could n't overcome Durant , who finished with 24 points , 9 rebounds , 7 assists and 2 steals .
Russell_Westbrook scored a game - high 33 points to lead the Thunder to their 11th win in 14 games .
Serge_Ibaka totaled 17 points and 8 rebounds .
J.J. Redick and Blake_Griffin both scored 15 for the Clippers , who lost their third straight .
The Thunder will play again at Staples Center on Wednesday as they face the Los_Angeles_Lakers , whom they beat by 40 points Saturday .
The Milwaukee_Bucks ( 33 - 29 ) defeated the Washington_Wizards ( 35 - 28 ) 91 - 85 on Saturday at the BMO Harris Bradley Center in Milwaukee .
With the game tied late in the fourth quarter , Khris_Middleton came up clutch for the Bucks , and hit a three - pointer with just over 40 seconds left in the game to put them up 3 .
This game marked a big win for the Bucks , who had lost 4 games in a row .
Helping secure the win , the Bucks shot 46 percent from the field and 50 percent from the three - point line , while the Wizards finished at 38 percent from the floor and just 32 percent from deep .
Michael_Carter-Williams also played a factor in the win , as he finished with 12 points ( 6 - 11 FG , 0 - 1 3Pt ) and 9 assists in 27 minutes .
Jerryd_Bayless gave a solid contribution from the bench , recording 13 points ( 4 - 8 FG , 1 - 1 3Pt , 4 - 4 FT ) , 4 rebounds and 4 assists in 21 minutes .
The only other Buck reaching double figures in points was Ersan_Ilyasova , who posted 10 points ( 4 - 7 FG , 2 - 3 3Pt ) and 5 rebounds in 23 minutes as a starter .
Paul_Pierce led the team in scoring , finishing with 14 points ( 4 - 15 FG , 3 - 9 3Pt , 3 - 4 FT ) , to go along with 8 rebounds in 24 minutes .
John_Wall struggled with his shot and recorded just 11 points ( 3 - 14 FG , 2 - 6 3Pt , 3 - 5 FT ) , but he did add 9 rebounds , 6 assists and 2 steals , as he provided a little bit of everything else .
The only other starter in double figures was Marcin_Gortat , who posted 10 points ( 5 - 7 FG ) and 9 rebounds .
The Oklahoma_City_Thunder defeated the Memphis_Grizzlies , 103 - 95 , at Chesapeake Energy Arena on Wednesday .
In fact , the Thunder never led by more than 12 , as this was a single - digit game for well over 40 minutes .
Oklahoma_City did most of their damage in the first half , as they took an 11 - point lead into the locker room .
Memphis struggled with their shots all night , as they went 41 percent from the field , 57 percent from the free - throw line and 29 percent from three - point range .
Defensive rebounding was key for Oklahoma_City , winning that battle , 42 - 26 .
The Grizzlies ( 24 - 17 ) had a tough task against the Thunder and just could n't quite make a big enough run to grab that elusive lead .
Mike_Conley led the team , accruing 22 points , 4 rebounds , 6 assists and 3 steals .

The Timberwolves were up by 1 , with 9 seconds left when Zach_LaVine attempted to use Minnesota 's foul - to - give on Devin_Booker .
Booker however , managed to throw up a wild shot that dropped , leading to a three - point play that put the Suns up by 2 .
The Timberwolves responded with a set play that had Andrew_Wiggins driving to the basket for a lay up , but with 5 seconds on the clock the Suns immediately called timeout .

Tyson_Chandler had a solid game , with 14 points , 11 rebounds and 2 blocked shots , in 30 minutes .

The Timberwolves were heavily out - rebounded , 57 - 36 , which really made the difference , especially in the final minutes .

The visiting Memphis_Grizzlies snapped the host Los_Angeles_Clippers 's 7 - game win streak with a 111 - 107 win on Wednesday .
After a historically strong start to the season , the Clippers ( 10 - 2 ) took their second loss in heartbreaking fashion .
Memphis came out strong in the second quarter , establishing a 15 - point lead by halftime .
Los_Angeles was able to fight back and hold the lead with under 30 seconds to go in the game .
However , 1 foul and turnover put the Clippers up just 1 with 14 seconds remaining , at which point Grizzlies 's ( 6 - 5 ) center Marc_Gasol hit a game - winning three - pointer .
The Grizzlies hit 15 three - pointers on 57 percent shooting from beyond the arc .
11 of those makes came from point guard Mike_Conley , who led the team with 30 points , and Gasol , who had 26 points and the game - winner .
Conley was able to shoot 9 - of - 12 from the field while also dishing out 8 assists and holding Clippers 's All-Star Chris_Paul to just 9 points .
While Redick , who ultimately fumbled the potential game - winner , had a season - high 29 points , while he accounted for 7 of the Clippers 's 9 three - pointers .
All-Star forward Blake_Griffin was integral in leading the comeback effort for LA , however , posting 25 points , 8 rebounds , and 3 assists without 1 turnover .
The Cleveland_Cavaliers defeated the Los_Angeles_Lakers 125 - 120 at Staples Center on Sunday .
The Cavaliers ( 46 - 23 ) and Lakers ( 20 - 50 ) provided some showtime moments after LeBron_James , Kyrie_Irving and D'Angelo_Russell put on a show at Staples Center .
The competitive back - and - forth affair saw the Lakers up 10 points heading into the fourth quarter , but Irving proved too much to handle in crunch time as the Cavaliers dumped 43 fourth quarter points on Los_Angeles .
Irving knocked down a pair of free throws before hitting the step - back go ahead three pointer to extend a three point lead for Cleveland .
Irving finished with a game high 46 points , to go with 3 assists and 2 rebounds on 15 - of - 21 shooting .
James added 34 points , 6 boards and 7 assists , while Kevin_Love posted a double - double with 21 points and 15 rebounds .
Cleveland opted to go 4 players deep on the bench , with both Richard_Jefferson and J.R. Smith seeing 27 - plus minutes of play .
Smith was unable to knock down a three - pointer in the contest where he finished 0 - of - 5 from deep .
D'Angelo_Russell scored 40 points , which marks a career high , and added 6 assists and 2 rebounds .
All 5 Lakers starters finished in double figures scoring , with Jordan_Clarkson leading the remainders with 19 points , while Julius_Randle pitched in 10 points , 7 assists and 7 rebounds .
The Atlanta_Hawks ( 58 - 19 ) throttled the Phoenix_Suns ( 39 - 39 ) , 96 - 69 , Tuesday at the Philips Arena to set a new franchise record for wins in a season .
After looking a little sluggish in late March , the Hawks have opened April with 2 blowout victories .
The Hawks dominated the glass even without Paul_Millsap , out - rebounding the Suns by 17 .
All of Phoenix 's starters were held to single digit points and the only Phoenix player to score in double figures was Gerald_Green with 15 off the bench .
Atlanta completed its first season sweep of Phoenix since the 1991 - 92 season .
The Suns 's starters combined for just 38 points , low - lighted by P.J Tucker 's 5 points on 2 - of - 10 shooting .
Atlanta looked dominant throughout Tuesday 's contest , holding Phoenix to under 20 points in 3 quarters and just 26 points in the second half .
Muscala took advantage of the added playing time by putting up 16 points , 7 rebounds , and 4 steals and finished with a plus - 28 + / - rating .
Dennis_Schroder returned from a 2 game absence , but he was capped to just 15 minutes on the floor .
The Golden_State_Warriors defeated the Oklahoma_City_Thunder , 118 - 91 , in Game 2 on Wednesday at Oracle Arena to even the Western Conference finals .
The Warriors entered in the unfamiliar position of having their backs against the wall in a playoff series , and after only 1 game to boot .
Despite the quick deficit , the Thunder battled back in the second period , and knotted the game at 49 with 1:35 left before halftime on a Kevin_Durant jumper .
However , the Warriors used the final 90 seconds before intermission to go on a game - turning 80 run that featured a `` you 've got to be kidding '' and - 1 play by Andre Iguodola .
Golden_State then kept the momentum going in the third quarter , putting plenty of distance between them and the Thunder by outscoring them 31 - 19 .
The dominating stretch was more than enough to allow for a final period that was markedly more relaxed for the Warriors than that of Monday 's Game 1 .
Durant led the way with 29 points , and he added 6 rebounds , 1 assist and 1 steal .
Russell_Westbrook tallied a 16 - point , 12 - assist double - double that also included 1 rebound and 2 steals .
No other starter or reserve was able to achieve double - digit scoring , but Steven_Adams did notably compile 9 points and 10 rebounds .
Among the starting 5 , Serge_Ibaka was only able to pitch in with 3 points , although he did haul in 8 rebounds and record a trio of steals .
In contrast , the Warriors saw 4 of 5 starters enjoy productive nights , led by Stephen_Curry 's 28 points .
Klay_Thompson followed with 15 points , 4 assists , 2 rebounds and 1 steal .
Harrison_Barnes contributed 11 points , 6 rebounds , and 3 assists .
Draymond_Green had a quiet game by his standards , but still filled up the stat sheet by collecting 10 points , 8 rebounds , 7 assists , 2 blocks and 1 steal .
Mareese Speights turned in one of his trademark ultra - efficient performances , supplying 13 points and a pair of rebounds in just 9 minutes .
Festus_Ezeli got in on the fun as well , posting 12 points , 5 rebounds , 1 assist and 1 block .
The 2 teams are now off until Sunday night , when they 'll reconvene for Game 3 at Chesapeake Energy Arena in Oklahoma_City with the series knotted in a 1 - 1 tie .

Parker was 9 of 14 from the field and 7 of 8 from the free - throw line .

Duncan also had 6 blocks .

Denver shot just 39 percent from the field .

Memphis only hit 2 - of - 11 from long range but made up for it at the foul line where they went 33 - of - 38 .
The Grizzlies forced 19 turnovers and pulled down 13 offensive rebounds as they dominated the hustle game .

Thomas added 3 rebounds , 2 steals and 1 block to his game - high scoring total , and was also notably 6 - of - 11 from behind the arc .
Al_Horford and Jae_Crowder had matching 8 - point efforts , with the former adding 8 assists , 7 rebounds and a pair of blocks , and the latter providing 6 rebounds , 2 assists and 1 steal .
Gerald_Green paced the bench with 15 points and 3 boards , while Kelly_Olynyk offered 12 points , 4 assists and 4 rebounds in a reserve role as well .
The Milwaukee_Bucks ( 13 - 21 ) defeated the Indiana_Pacers ( 18 - 14 ) 120 - 116 on Thursday .
The New Year 's Eve showdown between the 2 Central Division rivals was atypical in a number of ways .
The Pacers had entered Thursday 's contest sporting an impressive 11 - 5 home record and playing quality basketball overall .
Meanwhile , Milwaukee had managed a paltry 3 wins in 18 tries away from the Bradley Center , including consecutive road losses to the Mavericks and Thunder preceding Thursday 's game .
However , the light has seemingly come on for Milwaukee , and their side of the scoreboard , over their last 2 outings .
After tallying 123 points in the loss to Oklahoma_City on Wednesday , the Bucks roared right back with another outstanding night on offense , shooting a stellar 58 percent from the field and 43 percent from beyond the arc .
They also managed 35 of their points off 20 Indiana turnovers .
As it turned out , they needed every one of those buckets before all was said and done , with the Pacers coming on strong with a 39 - point fourth quarter to make things close until the final seconds .
Milwaukee was once again led by standout guard Khris_Middleton , who is in the midst of one of the hottest shooting stretches of his 4 - year career .
Thursday , Middleton managed 33 points , 5 rebounds , 4 assists , 1 block and a pair of steals to lead all scorers , including an impressive 4 - for - 6 performance from three - point range .
Greg_Monroe pitched in with 23 points and 3 rebounds of his own , while Jabari_Parker and Giannis_Antetokounmpo contributed a pair of 14 - point efforts .
Michael_Carter-Williams closed out a remarkable night for the starters with a stat - sheet - stuffing 11 - point , 7 - rebound , 8 - assist effort that also included 3 steals and 3 blocks .
Jerryd_Bayless paced the Bucks 's reserves with 14 points as well .
The Bucks improved to 13 - 21 but remain in last place in the Eastern Conference 's Central Division .
Indiana 's starting 5 enjoyed a highly productive night , and were encouragingly led by a resurgent effort from All-Star Paul_George , who 'd been struggling considerably with his shot in recent games .
After having shot an abysmal 28 percent ( 23 - for - 83 ) over the previous 5 contests , Thursday 's result was a particularly welcome sight for George and the Pacers .
Miles shook off an ailing back to support George 's effort with 19 points , 5 rebounds , 1 assist and 1 steal .
George_Hill followed with a 15 - point , 6 - rebound , 3 - assist night that also included 1 block .
Lavoy_Allen continued to thrive in his starting opportunities in place of the ailing Ian_Mahinmi , collecting 14 points and supplementing the scoring with 4 rebounds , 3 assists , 1 steal and 1 block .
Monta_Ellis poured in 13 points and dished out 7 assists , while Rodney_Stuckey and Myles_Turner led the reserves with a pair of 8 - point efforts .
The Pacers fell to 18 - 14 and currently reside in third place in the Eastern Conference 's Central Division .
The Toronto_Raptors ( 49 - 33 ) defeated the Charlotte_Hornets ( 33 - 49 ) 92 - 87 on Wednesday at the Air Canada Centre in Toronto .
The Raptors were the superior shooters in this game , going 49 percent from the field and 36 percent from the three - point line , while the Hornets went 42 percent from the floor and 36 percent from deep .
DeMar_DeRozan had a solid showing in the win as well , posting 16 points ( 8 - 13 FG , 0 - 2 3Pt ) , 6 assists and 2 steals .
Jonas_Valanciunas and Terrence_Ross were the other 2 Raptors in double figures .
Valanciunas finished with 18 points ( 9 - 11 ) and 5 rebounds , while Ross added 13 points ( 5 - 15 FG , 3 - 13 3Pt ) and 3 assists .
After combining to go just 3 - for - 10 from the field and 0 - for - 5 from the three - point line during Monday 's game against the Rockets , Gerald_Henderson and Kemba_Walker had much better performances this time around .
The Hornets saw a nice contribution from their bench as well though , as Troy_Daniels finished with a team - high of 24 points ( 7 - 15 FG , 6 - 13 3Pt , 4 - 4 FT ) over 29 minutes .
The New_Orleans_Pelicans ( 9 - 19 ) defeated the Portland Trail_Blazers ( 11 - 20 ) 115 - 89 on Wednesday .
The Blazers have now lost 4 consecutive games , with the last pair of defeats coming with Damian_Lillard sidelined with plantar fasciitis .
The Blazers have now failed to hit the century mark scoring - wise in both contests that Lillard has missed , underscoring how much the offensively - challenged team misses his 25 points and 7 assists per game .
McCollum was able to muster 19 points , 7 assists and 5 rebounds while serving as the point guard for the night in Lillard 's stead .
Allen_Crabbe ( 12 points ) and Al-Farouq_Aminu ( 10 points ) joined him in tallying double - digit points but went a combined 8 for 23 from the field .
Mason_Plumlee managed a modest 8 points but did contribute 12 rebounds , the fifth time in the last 6 games he 's hauled in double - digit boards .
Meyers_Leonard paced the Portland reserves with a productive 15 - point , 5 - rebound outing over 27 efficient minutes .
While Portland did manage to outrebound New_Orleans on the offensive glass by the significant margin of 22 to 8 , their general inability to do much with their second chances served as a reflection of their current scoring struggles .
The Trail_Blazers dropped to 11 - 20 and currently reside in the last place in the Western Conference 's Northwest Division .
Davis managed 28 points , 12 rebounds , 1 assist , 1 steal and 3 blocks .
Meanwhile , Tyreke_Evans was right behind him with a performance that was just 1 assist and a couple of rebounds short of a triple - double , compiling 24 points , 9 dimes and 8 boards .

The Pelicans upped their record to 9 - 19 but remain in last place in the Western Conference 's Southwest Division .

Curry finished with 19 points , 11 assists , 7 rebounds and 3 steals , but shot only 2 - 9 from deep .

In fact , there were 48 combined turnovers between the 2 teams and an NBA-high 29 turnovers committed by the Nuggets .
Denver actually took an 11 - point lead after the first quarter , but proceeded to allow Washington to win the other 3 quarters by at least 5 points each .
Defense was key for the Wizards , as they held the Nuggets to 41 percent shooting and the aforementioned turnover total .
Shooting was bad all - around for the Nuggets , as they went 67 percent from the free - throw line and 22 percent from three - point range .

The Rockets , on the other hand , were on a poor streak of their own , as they were losers of 4 straight .
The win gets them back on the right track though , as they still hold a 2 - game lead over the Portland Trail_Blazers for the third projected playoff seed in the Western Conference .

The New_York_Knicks ( 17 - 19 ) defeated the Altanta Hawks ( 21 - 15 ) 107 - 101 on Tuesday .
The Knicks have shown considerable signs of improvement so far in the 2015 - 16 campaign , after losing a whopping 65 games last season .
A tangible sign of that progress has come over the last 2 games , when New_York managed to get the best of the first - place and playoff - caliber Atlanta_Hawks in each team 's home arena .
The Hawks entered the final period trailing 84 - 71 , but closed to within 2 after Dennis_Schroder 's free throw made it 103 - 101 with 40 seconds remaining .
However , Carmelo_Anthony secured the defensive rebound on Schroder 's intentional miss of his second attempt from the charity stripe , and then drained 2 key free throws himself with 13 seconds to extend the lead to the final margin of 107 - 101 .
Anthony led the way for New_York scoring - wise , tallying 23 points , 11 rebounds , 7 assists , 1 steal and a pair of blocks .
Arron_Afflalo , who decimated the Hawks on Sunday with a 38 - point barrage , put together a solid encore performance by matching Anthony 's scoring output and adding 7 rebounds , 4 assists and 1 steal .

Jeff_Teague was next in line with 16 points , but could not contribute much else , failing to dish out any assists and only tallying 1 rebound and 1 steal otherwise .
Kent_Bazemore ( 15 points , 5 rebounds ) and Kyle_Korver ( 12 points , 3 rebounds ) were productive , and Al_Horford managed his third double - double in 4 games with 13 points , 10 rebounds , 8 assists and a pair of blocks .
The Hawks fell to 21 - 15 and remain in second place in the Eastern Conference 's Southeast Division .

The Warriors ran most of the plays through Green at the top of the arc , and he was able to find Kevin_Durant , Klay_Thompson and Stephen_Curry in multiple comfortable positions so that all 3 were able to finish with 20 - plus points .
Green finished with 15 points , 13 assists and 10 rebounds in the win .

The Grizzlies carried a 17 - point lead into halftime and got into garbage time before the fourth quarter began .

The Charlotte_Hornets ( 12 - 8 ) defeated the Detroit_Pistons ( 12 - 10 ) 104 - 84 on Monday .
Pistons center Andre_Drummond has undeniably been one of the NBA 's most improved and productive players of the 2015 - 16 campaign , having impressively tallied double - digit scoring in every game , as well as double - doubles in all but 1 contest .
Meanwhile , a Charlotte defense that was ranked in the bottom 10 of the league in points and rebounds surrendered to opposing centers had recently been weakened even further by the loss of center Al_Jefferson to a multi - week calf injury .
However , the Hornets somehow managed to get Drummond into foul trouble Monday , limiting him to 24 minutes and prompting his first single - digit scoring night of the year .
The home team surprisingly dominated overall down low , outscoring the Pistons 46 to 34 in the paint and outrebounding them 57 to 41 .
The unexpected success led Charlotte to post their third victory with a margin of 20 or more points this season .
For Detroit , veteran power forward Ersan_Ilyasova stepped up during Drummond 's extended stint on the bench , totaling 15 points , 13 rebounds , 1 assist , 1 steal and 1 block for his first double - double of the season .
Steve_Blake paced the Pistons 's bench with a second consecutive 9 - point performance .
Detroit dropped to 12 - 10 and currently resides in fourth place in the Eastern Conference 's Central Division .
The Hornets were lead by a second straight strong effort from Cody_Zeller in Jefferson 's stead , as he tallied a season - high 20 points and added 6 rebounds , 1 assist and a pair of steals .
The outing comes on the heels of a 17 - point , 8 - rebound performance by the third - year pro versus the Bulls .
Marvin_Williams supported Zeller in the frontcourt with a 14 - point , 12 - rebound double - double .
Kemba_Walker , questionable before the game with an illness , came within 1 rebound of his own double - double , totaling 14 points , 9 boards , a pair of assists , 1 steal and 1 block .
Nicolas_Batum stuffed the stat sheet once again , amassing 13 points , 8 assists , 7 rebounds and a pair of steals .
Jeremy_Lin paced the Charlotte reserves with an efficient 13 - point , 4 - assist , 3 - rebound effort , while also adding a pair of steals .
The Hornets improved to 12 - 8 and currently reside in second place in the Eastern Conference 's Southeast Division .

The Atlanta_Hawks ( 39 - 8 ) passed one of the toughest tests they 've gotten during their remarkable 18 - game winning streak , fending off the Portland Trail_Blazers ( 32 - 15 ) 105 - 99 Friday at the Philips Arena .
Up by just 1 point with momentum swinging in Portland 's direction , Mike_Scott buried a three - pointer to give Atlanta a 4 point lead .
From that point on , Atlanta allowed just 8 points in the last 4:11 of the fourth quarter to capture its 12th straight win over a Western Conference opponent .
Portland has now dropped the first 2 games of a quick Eastern Conference road trip after coming up short Friday in Atlanta .
LaMarcus_Aldridge nearly willed his team to victory with his 37 point , 11 rebound performance against the Hawks .
Kent_Bazemore was then called into action , where he contributed 12 points and 5 rebounds in a team - high 40 minutes on the floor .
The Chicago_Bulls ( 19 - 12 ) defeated the New_York_Knicks ( 15 - 19 ) 108 - 81 on Friday night .
It actually got down to a 2 - point game in the third , but Chicago dominated in the fourth quarter for a runaway result .
In fact , they outscored the Knicks 65 - 26 in the first and fourth quarters .
The Bulls were scorching from long distance as well , as they went 10 - for - 16 in the win .
The Knicks have lost 4 of their last 5 coming into this game and things just keep rolling downhill .
In fact , they allowed Chicago to start off 3 quarters in this game on a 60 run or larger .
Carmelo_Anthony was the teams best player , as he scored a team - high 20 points to go along with 7 boards .
Jose_Calderon also had a nice game , as he tallied 18 points , 4 rebounds and 4 assists .
Kristaps_Porzingis shot continued to struggle here , as he went just 4 - for - 14 for just 9 points in the loss .
Jimmy_Butler stepped up in his absence , as he tallied 23 points , 6 assists and 4 rebounds in the win .
Bobby_Portis continues to breakout as well , as he dropped 16 points and 10 rebounds off the bench .
Nikola_Mirotic has been struggling recently , but he had one of his best games of the season here , amassing 17 points , 7 assists , 5 rebounds , 2 steals and 2 blocks in the victory .
The Milwaukee_Bucks ( 1 - 3 ) defeated the Brooklyn_Nets ( 0 - 4 ) on Monday by a score of 103 - 96 at the Barclays Center in Brooklyn .
Bayless finished with a game - high 27 points after playing nearly the entire game at 47 minutes .
Greg_Monroe continues to be a force down low , as he recorded his second double - double of the season of 23 points ( 10 - 14 FG ) and 13 rebounds in 39 minutes .
Giannis_Antetokounmpo added 21 points and 8 rebounds of his own , while Khris_Middleton scored 17 points .
The Bucks starters dominating the playing time and the scoring , collecting 93 of the team 's 103 points .
Brook_Lopez led the way in the losing effort for the Nets , recording 18 points and 9 rebounds in 34 minutes .
Bojan_Bogdanovic was solid off the bench for the second straight game , scoring 14 points in 25 minutes , and he has now scored 33 total points in his last 2 contests .
However , while 7 Brooklyn players managed to reach double figures in points , the team 's 18 turnovers to just 21 assists ultimately cost them .
The Cleveland_Cavaliers defeated the Miami_Heat , 114 - 84 , at Quicken Loans Arena on Friday .
With a roster still missing James_Johnson , Justise_Winslow , Dion_Waiters and Josh_Richardson , the Heat ( 7 - 16 ) came in to Friday 's matchup against NBA champs already behind the 8 - ball .
Miami fought valiantly in the first half , however , and the Cavs ( 16 - 5 ) only held a relatively modest 57 - 46 lead at halftime .
Kevin_Love , who had been a game - time decision with a back injury , led the way with a 28 - point , 15 - rebound double - double that also included 3 assists , 1 steal and 1 block .
The Heat 's first unit was led by Goran_Dragic , who collected 15 points , 4 assists , 3 rebounds and 1 block .
Wayne_Ellington supplied 10 points , 2 assists and 1 rebound .
Hassan_Whiteside could only pour in 8 points , but he did haul in 12 rebounds .
Rodney_McGruder and Josh_McRoberts were only able to muster a pair of 6 - point efforts , with the former filling out the stat sheet with 8 rebounds , 5 assists and 2 steals , and the latter registering 4 boards and 4 assists .
The second unit was highly productive for Miami , with Derrick_Williams pacing them with a team - high 17 points .
Tyler_Johnson pitched in with 12 points , 5 rebounds , 2 assists and 2 steals in 38 minutes off the bench , while Willie_Reed totaled 10 points and 11 boards in a reserve role as well .
LeBron_James checked in second behind Love against his former squad , posting 27 points , 8 rebounds , 8 assists and 3 steals .
Kyrie_Irving came through with 23 points , 3 assists and 1 rebound .
Iman_Shumpert led the second unit with 10 points , 4 rebounds , 1 assist and 1 steal .
Overall , the Big Three of Love , James and Irving impressively combined to go 32 - of - 55 from the field on the night .
The Philadelphia_76ers defeated the Los_Angeles_Clippers , 121 - 110 , at Wells Fargo Center on Tuesday .
It was a tale of 2 halves , with the Clippers leading by 9 after the first half and the Sixers outscoring Los_Angeles by 20 in the second half .
The assist - to - turnover ratio was the decisive statistic , with the Sixers recording 35 assists to 5 turnovers , while the Clippers matched their assists and turnovers at 17 a piece .
Scoring in the paint was extremely lopsided as well , with Philadelphia winning that battle , 66 - 20 .
Free-throw shooting also killed Los_Angeles , as they went 26 - of - 41 , while Philly went 21 - of - 22 .
The Clippers ( 30 - 17 ) got Blake_Griffin back for this game , but it still was n't enough to beat a hungry Philly team .
Griffin recorded a double - double in his return , totaling 12 points , 11 rebounds and 5 assists .
Jamal_Crawford was the teams best player , dropping 27 points on 9 - of - 14 shooting off the bench .
J.J , Redick finished with with 22 points , while Austin_Rivers tallied 20 points , 2 rebounds and 3 assists .
DeAndre_Jordan did collect 10 points , 20 rebounds and 3 assists , but went 4 - of - 12 from the free - throw line .
The Sixers ( 16 - 27 ) played this game without Joel_Embiid ( knee ) and Jahlil_Okafor ( knee ) , but they put in a valiant effort and pulled out an upset win .
Nerlens_Noel starter for Embiid and accumulated 19 points , 8 rebounds , 5 assists , 2 steals and 3 blocks in his best game of the season .
Robert_Covington contributed 14 points , 8 rebounds , 3 steals and 2 blocks .
Richaun_Holmes was second on the team in scoring , dropping 18 points off the bench .
Dario_Saric was also huge off the bench , amassing 16 points and 8 rebounds .
Sergio_Rodriguez and T.J._McConnell played all the point guard minutes and combined for 18 points and 17 assists .
Tuesday 's performance was yet another example for the Spaniard , as he posted a game - high 16 assists , which was his highest total since he dished out 17 on Jan. 11 against the Rockets .
And while Rubio did an adequate job of getting his teammates involved , he struggled to get himself involved , scoring just 5 points on 2 - of - 8 shooting from the field .

The San_Antonio_Spurs ( 1 - 1 ) used a big third - quarter run to turn Friday 's game against the Brooklyn_Nets ( 0 - 2 ) into a laugher , claiming a 105 - 78 victory over the visitors .
San_Antonio trailed by 5 after an uninspired first half , but the team came out of the break with some fire .
Tony_Parker was instrumental in turning the game into a runaway , scoring the first 8 points of the third quarter to spark a 28 - 11 run that flipped a 5 - point deficit into a 12 - point lead heading into the fourth .
The Spurs would continue their dominance over the final 12 minutes to easily dispatch the Nets , relying on a rather balanced scoring attack to accomplish that feat .
What began as an encouraging start for the Nets resulted in a second consecutive 15 - point loss , putting the team in an early hole to begin the season .
Brook_Lopez led the team with 17 points on a respectable 6 - for - 11 from the field , but his inability to make an impact on the glass ( 3 rebounds ) was true for the rest of his teammates .
The Spurs outrebounded the Nets by a 56 - 32 count .

The Kentucky product is back on form halfway through the season after a mishap in Dallas last year , and over his last 10 games , Rondo is averaging 12 assists .

The Golden_State_Warriors ( 44 - 4 ) destroyed the New_York_Knicks ( 23 - 27 ) on their own home court on Sunday , winning 116 - 95 .
All-Star forward Draymond_Green accepted the blame for the team 's season - low 35 points in the second half , admitting that he was chasing a triple - double .
Green finished with 20 points , 10 rebounds , and 10 assists while shooting a perfect 9 - for - 9 from the field .
Golden_State pulled away in the second quarter and never looked back , going on to outscore the Knicks 61 - 46 in the second half .
The win is the Warriors 's seventh in a row , and puts the team even closer to the 1995 - 96 Bulls 's record of 72 wins .
Curry also finished below his season averages in rebounds and assists , notching just 4 of each .
Fellow `` splash brother '' Klay_Thompson , however , took the reigns of the offense , leading the team with 34 points on 14 - for - 18 shooting and 5 - for - 6 from three - point territory .
While superstar Carmelo_Anthony poured in 24 points and shot a respectable 8 - for - 18 , no other player scored more than 14 and the team shot just 37 percent on the night .
Defensively , New_York was able to force 18 turnovers ; however , the team simply could not contest Golden_State 's red - hot perimeter shooters , as they allowed 58 percent of their opponents 's shots to fall .
The Knicks saw a 16 - 6 disadvantage in terms of three - pointers made , and shot 22 percent worse than their opponents from deep .
The Golden_State_Warriors ( 45 - 4 ) defeated the Washington_Wizards ( 21 - 26 ) in a fast - paced , high - scoring contest Wednesday at Verizon Center , 134 - 121 .
Stephen_Curry caught fire from beyond the arc , as he tied a career high with 11 made three - pointers on 16 attempts and scored 51 points to lead all scorers .
It overshadowed a fantastic performance from John_Wall who scored 41 points ( 17 - 25 FG , 3 - 3 3PT ) and dished 10 assists , but it was n't enough to defeat the first place Warriors , who sunk 20 three - pointers as a team .
Curry was backed up by another triple - double from Draymond_Green ( 12 points , 12 assists , and 10 rebounds to go with 5 blocks ) , his NBA-leading 11th of the season .
Klay_Thompson unleashed his own three - point barrage , as he sunk 6 of his 13 attempts and scored 24 points .
The Warriors 's ball movement was on sharp display , as Golden_State assisted on 35 of their 49 made field goals ( 71 percent ) .
Wall was the only one of Washington 's starters to reach double - digits , but Bradley_Beal scored 18 points in 29 minutes off the bench , and Nene dropped an efficient 12 points and 7 rebounds in just 19 minutes .
Ramon_Sessions added 12 points on 5 - 6 shooting .
The Wizards made a respectable 8 of 23 three - pointers ( 34 percent ) , but that left them with a 24 - point deficit at the three - point line against Golden_State , too much to make up .
The Warriors have won 8 straight and return home for a matchup against Oklahoma_City on Saturday .

Outside of a 32 - point second quarter , the Wizards could only amass 57 points in the other 3 quarters and never scored more than 20 in any individual 1 .
The second half was especially tough , as Washington scored only 39 point while shooting just 32 percent from the field .
The rebounding was huge for Toronto as well , as they snatched down 48 rebounds to the Wizards 35 .
Washington has now had 2 dud performances in a row , which is quite concerning considering they appeared to be turning things around just last week .
